1a1(mdo): med pa 'an nan pa bar da to/ dngos po byed pa nyid rnas pa rnams lam
1a2(mdo): dan to// dbang kyi rnams lam ni'i na ngas
1a3(mdo): sa ga dang po na 'a mams yang lan ya dular med do// migs pa'i bdes skyems ma/ 'asam tan rnams la ma
1a4(mdo): yin rnams la da pa gzugs byod pa ban da rnams pa mdzod pa na gan
1a5(mdo): sa rnams la mdza du 'ad dang na pa byed 'od pa myed pa mab na mngon patur 'dzin na
1a6(mdo): nagazu slong rje chen po la yang zhen/ de bzhin su myoms pa'i poms rnams yo mngon skye mjig pa bya ma
1a7(mdo): na na pa pon nyi pa ngos rgyas dus sa la zhem to// de dag de yang mngon pa man pa so de yum 'am yin 'di chos mam
1a8(mdo): yongs su na de da' shi mtho kyim sa myi mthong / zlags supa na po mi ma nga ra
1b1(mdo): phya gar skad tu/ a n+yam tu gni ma snar nam ma sA yan su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa pa' sa smrab pa @/ da
1b2(mdo): zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo'o// / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' klo8/ zhes bya sa pa 'i grog/ sa byos nye
1b3(mdo): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyalaweg/ legs pa la / 
1b4(mdo): byed kyi tshal 'gon mye da zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge can gyis gatshigs
1b5(mdo): 'dun chen po chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong thams cad kyi go cha chen po der
1b6(mdo): bgos pa sha stag dang / 'dod pa na/ spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / thabs
1b7(mdo): gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas/ yongs su bskor cing / mdun gyis bltas
1b8(mdo): nas chos stond to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi byophyir
2a1(mdo): byed pa sang dag par thugs pa'i byang chub las kyid kyi log pas yog da bas te/ 'khod nyid tu 'dus par byung das 'ag pa gas sumapa zag pa gcig tu pa sa/ sum ma gsas pa'i ltung
2a2(mdo): btsugs te// 'phrang / dpal gzhon nu byung nga ba kal ba de logs su thal lo srung pa bdud ngas// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa la 'di skad smram mo// 'jas dpal khyod da rung de bzhin gshes
2a3(mdo): ma la mchod pa'i las mdzad pas mchis 'am// 'jam dang / dkyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam tu sems/ byam tsho ched na po chu thams cad lend pas gzham yang chog zhes sam/ ma
2a4(mdo): zus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma lags so// 'jam pa pal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin du rgya mtsho chen po gting dpag dka' ba de lta bu'i thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes tshang / 
2a5(mdo): myed pa bas 'a bste/ sa sa dpa' de bzhin gnags pa 'a mchod pa'i las kyis ka'adas sa// ma'i sa 'angs dpal kya chub sems dpa' sa
2a6(mdo): tI de bzhid gshegs pa la mchod par bgyi// 'jas dpal gyis smras pa/ 'i tha byang chub sem sa dpa' sa dmyigs pa bdis de bzhin gshegs pa la marjod par bya'o// bzhi gang byed/ 'dri
2a7(mdo): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dbyigs pa dang / sems can rag tu dgral ba la dmyigs pa dang / dkor mchog gsum gtu kyi 'chad par bya ba la dbyigs pa dang / sangs rgyas nyi ni di
2b1(mdo): yon tan bkod pa yongs su gzung ba la dmyigs pa ste/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sa dmyigs pa bzhi po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis/ 
2b2(mdo): tshangs pa'i ris kyi lha'i bu'i rab tu tshangs pa gtsug phud can la/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam bzhi pa la bsgrub pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad pa de/ 'jam dpal legs par bshad du gsol/ 
2b3(mdo): de la ni bdag dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di yang nyan par 'tshal lo// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi ser snga ma mchis// slob dpon gyi chos kyi dpe'akhyud kyang ma mchis so// 
2b4(mdo): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu de'i phyir legs par da tu nyon la yid zung shig dang / bzhi pa bsgru pa zhes bya ba'i chos da kyi rnam grangs de ras khyod la bshad do// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di
2b5(mdo): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sems bskyed par rig par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ lho'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can dpag tu myed pa
2b6(mdo): su ba'i phyir sems bskyed pa dang // sems can dpag tu myed pa yongs su sbyinang par bya ba'i phyir sems bskyed pa dang / ma ga na byas e da/ dab du rdzogs par rtogs pa sh+ya hrI/ 
2b7(mdo): phyir sems bskyed pa'i phyir/ lha'i bu ba'i po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sems bskyed par rig par bya'o// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rngam
2b8(mdo): kyi semam bskyed pa brag lta bu yin no// ba'i gapazhe na/ thong ba rnams la kho mtshwa ba'abyed pa'i sems dang / log par zhugs pa rnams la snying rje ba'i sems dang / shes rab las nyams
3a1(mdo): pa'i mams dang / bcob pa nyam pa 'og tu chud par byed pa'i sems te// sa'i khu bani po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa khrag lta bu yin no// kwa'i bu 'am po 'dir// 
3a2(mdo): ji bya chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa ma da par 'phags pa yin no// bani gang zhe na/ ma'im pa mngon par 'phags pa dang / thos pa mdzod par 'phags pa dang / byams pa ched pa ma
3a3(mdo): bar 'phags pa dang / snying rje cher po mngon par 'phags pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa brtad pa'i snying po can gyi byed pa rdo rje la na
3a4(mdo): bzhi ga bzhe na/ bsam pa las kyi byed pa dang / mja' ba/ sa kyi byed pa dang / theg pa chen po las kyi byed pa ste/ bzhi po/ 'di dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems
3a5(mdo): dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa bsnyend dka' ba yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ nyon mongs pa dang ma 'dres pa dang / brnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa ma 'dres pa da
3a6(mdo): theg pa dang / dman pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / skye bo myi bgrangs pa thams cad dang ma 'dres pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa
3a7(mdo): bla na byed pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ phangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sems dang / byin nas 'gyod pa myed pa'i sems dang / rnam par sbyin pa la re ba byed pa'i sems dang / 
3a8(mdo): byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i sems te// bzhi po de dag ko// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyi bor phyi nang pa'i chos so// bzhi gang zhe na// shes rab kyi sa
3b1(mdo): sa kyi pa dang / @#pa dang / dang mtham 'dod pa dang / ma cad pa myed par dan pa dang mtshan pa'ad #
3b2(mdo): dpa' rnams kyis marton par byed pa'o// bzhi gang zhe da/ pha rol tu phyind pa rnams la brtson pa dang / bcu ba'i dngos po rnams kyi rjes su mthun pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas bsgrub pa dang / mngan
3b3(mdo): par shes pas rnam par rtse ba ste// bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos gya nom pa dam pa'i mchog yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la
3b4(mdo): khong khro ba myed pa dang / gang dag de dag 'gal bar byed pa/ de dag nyid la rab tu tha rad par bya bar sems bskyed pa dang / ci tsi gyi yul rgya chen po zhig 'byor da kyang de la bag yod pa dang
3b5(mdo): ji tsam tu dbul bas phongs par gyur kyang chos spyod pa ste bzhi po de dag ko// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub me rnabs kyi bos pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ khyim par gyur da na
3b6(mdo): bdag ni langs spyod kyis chog shes pa dang / gzha ni dam ma mdzad par 'dod pa byed pa dang / rab tu byalar 'phags pa'i chos kyimachog shes pa dang / byangs pa'i yod tan dang po byang chungs pa
3b7(mdo): ban po des/ 'i sraba'i pa 'di dag ni bya chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'o// bzhi gang zhen/ tsas kyi sbyin pa dang / ngang gi sbyin pa dang / nog shog dang / dag dang / 
3b8(mdo): ga pa dang / thegs pa ma phyin pa dang / tshab rdzam la mams 'phag pan sazhanas po zhes bya ba gyid pa nye/ bzhi pa de dag go// ka'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni bya da sa pal
4a1(mdo): kyi snying po nyid do// thos pa las nan tan gyi snying po nyid dang / longs spyod rnams las gtong ba'i snying po nyid dang / lus las bla ma la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i snying po nyid dang / srog las dge'
4a2(mdo): rtsa ba bskyed pa'i snying po nyid de bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su gtad par gyi bya'o// bzhi ka bzhe na/ byang chub kyi sems yongs
4a3(mdo): btang bar gyi bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su btang bar gyi bya ba dang / dge' ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad yongs su btang bar gyi bya ba dang / dge' ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad yongs
4a4(mdo): btsal ba yongs su btang bar myi bya ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam sa kyi skyed mos tshal lo// bzhi gang zhe na/ dgon pa
4a5(mdo): gnas pa dang dben pa la mngon par dka' ba dang / dka' ba'i chos la 'dun pa dang / thabs mkhas pas sems can yongs su sbyi dad par byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag
4a6(mdo): no// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag gi// byang chub sems dpa' thabs kyi gzhal byed khang do// de dums pa'i gnas pa dang / 'brel pa'i gtam kyi chos nyan pa la dga' ba myong bar byed pa dang
4a7(mdo): stong pa nyid la nges par sems pa dang / skye bo ris mthun pa dang 'dra ba ste/ bzhi po de dag ko// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nor myi zad do// bzhi ka
4a8(mdo): thos pa'i dor dang / chos stodang pa'i dong dang / sems can dbul po'i dong dang / byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i nor te bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang
4b1(mdo): mas dpa' rnams / ga shed/ rnams kyi mthus pa'i ga1 rnam kyigate dang / yongs spyod kya kyigs pa'i gter te gni ba / 
4b2(mdo): bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'byung ba'o/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du 'ji las byung ba dang / yul thams cad las byung ba dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i
4b3(mdo): ba las byung ba dang / khams gsum da thams cad las byung ba'o// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bde ba'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ dngos po
4b4(mdo): thams cad la myi blta ba'i phyir bdag gi ba myed cing yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa'i bde ba dang / yul spangs pas dben pa'i bde ba dang / nyon mongs pa myed pa'i phyir zhi 'i
4b5(mdo): bde ba dang / sems cad yongs su myi gtong ba'i phyiramya ngan las 'dra ba'i bde ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ 'di // lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni bya
4b6(mdo): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mchog tu dka' ba'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas mchog tu dka' ba dang / chos thos pas mchog tu dga' ba dang / sbyin pa la 'gyor pa
4b7(mdo): byed pas macig tu dka' ba dang / sems can thams cad la bde bskyed pas mchog tu dga' ba ste bzhi po de dag no// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bded
4b8(mdo): ba'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems kyi gtong ba dang / yid dam las kyi nyams pa dang / skyabs su song ba dag yongs su gyi gtong ba dang / ngag bsdams pas tshig thams cad bden min
5a1(mdo): bzhi po de dag go// lha'i grwa bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge' ba'i chos so// bzhi gang zhe na/ dge' ba'i chos thams cad las lhag pa'i khasam pas sbyor ba dang / 
5a2(mdo): ma bslabs pa thams cad la myi rnyas pa dang / gsol da ba ma btab par sems cad la bshes gnyen du gyurd pa dang / yon tan thams cad la sgrub pa la phyir bya ba'i re myed pas lan gyi re ba ste/ bzhi po de dag/ 
5a3(mdo): ko// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa rnam par dag pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag myed pa'i phyir tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang / sems can byed pa'i phyir/ 
5a4(mdo): ting nge 'dzind rnam par dag pa dang / srog myed pa'i phyir shes rab rnam par dag pa dang / gang zag myed pa'i phyir rnam par dgrol ba rnam par dag pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu
5a5(mdo): bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rkang pa'o// bzhi kang zhen/ chos kyi rkang pa dang / don gyi rka pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pas
5a6(mdo): 'jug pa'i rkang pa dang / byang chub kyi lam gyi tshogs spogs pa'i rkang pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu 'azhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lag pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na dad pa'i lag pa
5a7(mdo): dang / zos pa'i lag pa dang / shes rab kyi lag pa ste bzhi po de dag ko// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byig ka myig go// bzhi gang zhen/ las legs par
5a8(mdo): byas pa'i phyir ga'i myig dang / mngon par shes pa las kyi nyams pa'i phyir lha gyis nga shi nang tu thos pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir shes rab kyi byig dang / chos thams cad la nges par ses
5b1(mdo): pa'i phyir mchog gi myig ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi myongabs pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pas kyi ngoms pa dang / dgon pa la gnas pas kyi ngoms pa
5b2(mdo): chos nyan pas kyi ngoms pa dang / dge' ba'i chos thams cad kyis kyi ngoms pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i khu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dga' ba byed pa'o// bzhi gang zher/ 
5b3(mdo): sems can bathu' chung ba rnams la bzod cing dang du blang ba dga' ba byed pa dang / dbul po la bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bsam pa dga' bar byed pa dang / yan lag gi mchog bgo slong
5b4(mdo): gos khong khro ba byed pa'i sems dka' ba byed kyi steng du dge'aba'i bshes gnyen du sems bskyed pa dang / skye ba la gyi rtog pas bsams bzhin du skye bar byed pa'i dga' ba byed pa ste/ 
5b5(mdo): bzhi pa de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chusems dpa' rnams kyi nang myed do// bzhi gang zhen/ sa mnyam pas dang byed pa dang / nyon mongs
5b6(mdo): gdung ba byed pas dang myed pa dang / sems cad thams cad la bde bar gzhog pas dang byed pa dang / chos thams cad la the tsom byed pas// nang byed pa ste bzhi po de dag go/ kwa'i buM bzhi pa
5b7(mdo): 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdag gi phyogs so// bzhi gang zhe na/ pha rol tu phyind pa'i phyogs dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi phyogs dang / dge' ba'i bshes nyen
5b8(mdo): yang dag pa'i phyogs dang / sdig pa thams cad kyi bya ba'i phyogs de bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi myi spyod pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 
6a1(mdo): nas yid kyi spyod ba dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa las kyi spyod pa dang / yang dag pa'i dang tad las kyi spyod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag na// lha'i bu ba'i po la
6a2(mdo): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs so// bzhi gang zhen/ zhi gnas kyi tshogs dang / lhag mthong gi tshogs dang / thos pa'i tshogs dang / dge' ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi tshogs te bzhi po de dag ni
6a3(mdo): lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos drang du 'brel par 'gyur ba'o// bzhi gang zhe/ bsam pa dang / skyong bzung du 'brel pa dang / gtong ba dang / bsngo ba thu ru 'bram
6a4(mdo): pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang zung tu 'brel pa dang / das dang shes rab zung du 'breld pa ste bzhi po de dag go// lto/ bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi
6a5(mdo): bsgrub pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmyi lam mo// bzhi ga pa zhe na/ khroHpa rdul can mthong zhing de'i gting yang zla ba'i dkyil/ 'khor ma tho pa dang / mtshe'u 'am/ rdzing pu 'am/ khron pa rnyog pa can
6a6(mdo): mthong na des pa cas kyi tang mamang pa dang / rna yin can papa ga cir de la ya zla ba'i gyis nyam mang pa dang / sa das sung dang / tu dang / tubs krigs par mamatshan de sa yang thams kyis nyamar mthong sa ste/ can pa dedag go sus na pa did / na me gyung sems dpa rnams kyisas kyi sgrib pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i phyi lam mo// bzhi gang de
6a7(mdo): ma/ g.yang sa chen po nas bdag gsang du srung bar mthong ba dang / lab mthol dman tsam du mthong ba dang / bdag lam phrag dog par zhugs par mthong ba dang / skyi lam dang phyogs bskrad cing 'jigs
6a8(mdo): pa mang po mthong ba ste bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmyi lam mo// bzhi gang zhe na// dug drag pos dkun
6b1(mdo): par mthong ba dang / gcan thar gtub po phal po che'i sgra thos pa dang / bdag g.yod can gi dpar gnas par mthong ba dang / bdag gi lus dri ma can dang / gos dri ma cad du mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag no/ 
6b2(mdo): lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnabs kyi gzungs 'thob pa'i sgra mthun pa'i skyilam mo// bzhi gang zhe na/ gteng ched do rin po che sna tshogs kyis gang bam mthong ba dang / rdzing bu me ton
6b3(mdo): pad ma rgyas pas yongs su gapa' mthong ba dang / bdag gos dkar po'i lpags pa rnyed par mthong ba dang / rtswa zhig spyi bo'i myig na gdugs 'dzind par mthong ba ste/ bzhi pa de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po de
6b4(mdo): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa'i mya mthun pa'i skyil ma mo// bzhi gang zhe na/ bu mo babang mo// brgya dang bzang pos brgya dad pa me tog sil ma 'bul bar mno
6b5(mdo): ba dang / nab mkha' la bya dpa dkar po thal kang gi khyu skad 'byu nad cing 'gro bar mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mang pos brgya nad pa'i phyag spyi bor 'jog par mthong ba dang / 
6b6(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa me tog pad ma la bzhugs shing bsam gtan mdzad par mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa ma
6b7(mdo): ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i skyil pa mo// / bzhi gang zhen/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'chang bar mthong ba dang / nye ba'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba mthong ba dang / be tog pa la khwa 'dus pa pa bzong ba dang / changs
6b8(mdo): pa'i dbang po'i bang byan pam tshungs pa 'thong ba nyi/ lha'i khu bzhi po de dag ni byal chu 'asem sa dpa' rnams kyi bzhi gshegs pa mthong ba'i rgya mthur ba'i phyil ma'o// lha'i bu bzhi po 'ang/ 
7a1(mdo): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rgyu mthur pa'i skyil ma yo// bzhi gang zhe na/ shing sa la chen po 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis gang bar mthong
7a2(mdo): dang / khar ba'i snod gser gis gang bar mthong ba dang / dam mkha'i ngos gtugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gis gang bar mthong ba dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go// 
7a3(mdo): lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brgyad btul ba'i chu mthun pa'i la ma yo/ bzhi gang zhe na/ kyang chen pos byad thams cad ma nad nas pa dan thogs te/ 'gro bar mthong ba
7a4(mdo): dang / dpa' bo cheng po g.yul las 'das te/ 'gro ba bzod/ ba dang / rgyal po dbang sgyum par mthong ba dang / bdag nyid byang chub kyi snying po la 'jug cing bdang 'dul ba mthong sa ste
7a5(mdo): bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sem sa dpa' rnams kyi phyir gyi ldog pa'i rtags kyi rgyu mthun pa'i rgya lam yo// bzhi ka zhe na/ bgo la zod kar pos bcings pa
7a6(mdo): mthong ba dang / bdag gtan pa myed pa'i mchod sbyin byed par mthong ba dang / bdag chos kyi bstand chen po la 'dug par bathong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs shing chos ston pa
7a7(mdo): bathong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' da kyin gyi snying po 'thob pa rgyu mthun pa'i rmyi lam mo// bzhi gang zhe na/ bum pa mthong ba dang / bya tsa shas skor bar
7a8(mdo): mthong ba dang / gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de nyid du shing thams cad ldang zhing 'dud la phyag 'tshal bar byed pa da // gser gi kha dog lta bu'i sdang ba chen po mthong ba ste/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni
7b1(mdo): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyu mthun pa'i rmilam yo// / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pas bzhi pa bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha'i bu dpal bzangs ldan
7b2(mdo): dga' mgu yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes pa nas 'khor dang bcas pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyu dad pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ lha'i me tog man da ra ba dag dang / 
7b3(mdo): ud pa la dang / pad pa dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gtor to// me tog de dag gtor ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gi bar snga
7b4(mdo): la ka me tog pad ma shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam kyi tshad lta na stug pa/ gsung dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba dag byung bar gyurd to// me ta ka de dag gi dbus kyi snying po la byang chub sems dpa' lus
7b5(mdo): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgya dad pa dag kyang byung bar gyurd to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyu rad pa lha'i bu dpal bzangs ldan gyis 'di skad ces smra
7b6(mdo): 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gang ras lhags// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu me tog 'di dag lngas 'ongs pa nyid nas so/ lha'i bus sbas pa/ 'jam
7b7(mdo): dpal me tog 'di dag ni sprul pa ste/ bdag gis khyod la mchod pa'i las bgyi ba'i slad du gtor da to// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu ji ltar me tog 'di dag sprul pa yin pa ltar/ byang
7b8(mdo): chub sems dpa' de dag gi lus la yang de bzhin tu blta'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kang gi tshe/ 'dzum pa mdzad kyi
8a1(mdo): mdzad pa'i cho ba nyid de/ de'i chi bcom ldan 'das kyi lal kyi gdas 'od zhes ladog rgyas 'di sa ste/ ldan po dang sen po dang / dbang po dang / dkar po dang / leb na dang / shel das da
8a2(mdo): kha dog lta bu dag byung ngo // de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gi khams mtha' yas su byed pa sdung ba sa khyab par byas nas// steng du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gi bar du mngon par byung ste/ gzi rjid kyis nyi ma/ 
8a3(mdo): dang zla ba'i gzil brjid de dag zil kyis man nad nas/ slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu'i phyug tu nub po// de nas lha'i bu dpal bzangs ldan bstan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu kar+m+ma
8a4(mdo): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'ad/ sa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyard pa btud nas// bcom lda na 'das la tshigs su bcad pas stod pa/ gser bzangs dri ma
8a5(mdo): myed pa'i 'od kyi gzi' brjid ldan/ skyes cen mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis sna tshogs mnga'// yon tan khrag khrig yon tan gzhal yas gzi' brjid can/ mgor po ci'i slad du mdzum/ 
8a6(mdo): ba stond mdzad pa// sgra bstan 'byind par mdzad cing rab tu gsung 'phelang pa// tshangs pa'i dbyangs su gsung zhing 'jam pa'i tshig gsung ba// nor bdun 'od zer rgya chen bde gshegs blo gros ldan
8a7(mdo): ka la bying ka'i gsung tsam ji srad 'dzum pa gsungs// gyi mchog skyes bu dam pa ngan pa'i tshogs can 'dul// bdud kyi stobs ni rtag par mthal 'dzind par mdzad// lha dang lha phyin napa mkha' ldi
8a8(mdo): gis rtag mchod pa// stobs bcwa ldan pas 'dzum la bstand// dri myed dri bral dri ma gsum spangs pa// zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur zhal rgyas pa// mun pa rab rib bsgrib pa'i rdul gi nyes gnod
8a9(mdo): bde ldan sbyin par mdzad pa 'dzum don gsungs/ bde bar gshegs pas dang lta yul pan pa mchog
8b1(mdo): pa// bu de ldan sbyin/ mdzad yon tan mtha' yas pa// mtshungs shing 'brel pa legs gsung gsal ba'i gsung ldan pa// 'dzum bstand 'di'i don ni ji ltar rtogs pa ra bgyi// ling tog stug po mun pa rab
8b2(mdo): rig rnam pas la pa// shes rab pasgron ma 'od kyi gzil brjid ldan pa'o// klang cher khru mchog stabs dang seng ge'i stabs ltar brjid// 'gro ba'i don mdzad 'dzum pa'i dor ni bstan du gsol/ 
8b3(mdo): phyi'i dam pa gyi ngan tshogs can 'dul mdzad pa// zab cing mthong bam dka' lta// srid pa'i rgyadi skye bas mdzad mnyam pa myed pa can sgyu myed stobs bcu ldan gyis 'dzum pa ci slad bsta dang // rga shi zhi bar
8b4(mdo): bgyi ba'i bdud rtsi'i don gro la da pa/ zhabs ni 'jam zhing dra ba drag dang 'khor lor ldan// blur ba skyong mdzad srid pa gsum sa mnyam myed pa/ ye shes chen po mnga' bas 'dzum don stan du
8b5(mdo): dgasal // de skad ces gsos pa dang / bcom ldan 'dasakyis lha'i bu dpal bzangs ldan la 'di skad ces bka' sna yad to// lha'i bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpal steng gi bar
8b6(mdo): sA la seng ge'i khril pad ma'i snying po la 'khod pa 'di dag mthong ngas/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
8b7(mdo): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa 'di dag thams cad ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur nga ba'i drung du chos mnyadad pa dang / bzhi pa bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa'i phyir lha
8b8(mdo): so// byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag thams cad ni 'jam dpal ka zhon rur gyur pas/ yongs su sbyind par byis pa yin mo/ yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag thams cad ni
9a1(mdo): zad byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis sogs pa yin te/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams kying sna tshogs kyis dus rgyas kyi'ingaga'ang dang ka'ang dag tu skye ba gcig zhen
9a2(mdo): thogs pa yin te/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams kying tshogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ka'ad dang kazhang dag tu tha da byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyabapa 'gyur
9a3(mdo): lha'i bus gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gi grangs rtogs par rdo gyi thog na/ ji snyed cig mchis// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bul
9a4(mdo): bka' stsald pa/ sha ri'i bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'adi dag gis grangs rtogs par num sa ma// nam med pa 'tshon ldan 'das bdag gis stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
9a5(mdo): gi khams na/ gang skad pa'i gzugs de dag thams cad rga/ cig yud tsam gcig gis bgrang bar spro'i// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i di dag ni lo rgyad yang bkang
9a6(mdo): sprob ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ sha ra'i bu ga lad te 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyis gang bar gyur kyang / rdul phra rab de dag bgrang ba'i tshul gri mdza'
9a7(mdo): rtogs par dus kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par gyi nus te// byang chub sems dpal 'dus pa 'di dag ni de tsam tu tshad byed do// gsold pa/ bcom
9a8(mdo): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gang du byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed mchis par ga la 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bku' stsa la pa// 
9b1(mdo): sha ri'i khu kha rog de skad ma sma shika/ ka sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad byed pa dag de bzhin gshegs pas stong ngo // sha ri'i bu yongs su brtag pa bzung na galang te de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad
9b2(mdo): bskal pa gapa'aga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gyu rang la mI re re thams cad la'ang chos bshad pa'i gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'jug par gyur cing // chos bshad pa thams cad la'ang byang chub sems dpa'
9b3(mdo): ganga' ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed lung bstand par gyur da la/ gapa 'dis shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gcig mtshan mar gzhag kyang
9b4(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis de tsam du stong na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sha'i spyad tha ma la bas gzigs pang 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas
9b5(mdo): kyi zhing de dag tu skyes pa'i sems can de dag gi sems de bzhi na gshegs pas mkhyend pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni/ sa stong pa lta ji smos// de ras nyan pos chen po de dag dang
9b6(mdo): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar da du gyu dad nas/ tshig 'di skad du bdag cag gi ston pa de dag de ltar rdzu 'phrul che// de ltar mtha' che/ de ltar ye shes gzigs pa chen po dang ldan te/ 
9b7(mdo): bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par brnyed do// zhes smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams nas 'dus pa/ steng zhi bar snga la 'khod pa de dag par
9b8(mdo): sA de las babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon dur gyu rang pa'i 'bras la mgo bos phyag 'tshal da te bskor da nas phyogs bcud dong ngo // de nas 'jam dpal ka 'on nu
10a1(mdo): srung ba la / kwa'i bu dpal ba'angs ldan kyis 'di skad ces smras so// 'jas dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas mdzad pa mdzad cing / sems cad cad byed pa byang chub tu yongs su sbyin par mdzad pa len/ 
10a2(mdo): so legs so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub yongs su smyind par bgyid pa'i chos las rtsams te/ spobs par mdzod cig/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
10a3(mdo): rnams kyi byang chub yongs su sbyind par byed pa'i chos ni sum cu rtsa lnga'o// sum cu rtsa lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste// dus su bskul ba dang/ tshod la bskul ba dang / rang pa na bskul pa dang / dbang po la bskul pa dang / 
10a4(mdo): brtand par bskuld pa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa la bskul pa dang / thabs la bsku lad pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa la bskul pa dang / byams pa chen po la bskul ba dang / snying rje chen po la
10a5(mdo): skal da pa dang / theg pa chen po la skul ba dang / theg pa dman pa la skul ba dang / bden pa la bskul ba dang / de bya ba la sku la ba dang / chos spu ba bar skul ba dang / thos pa stand par
10a6(mdo): skul ba dang / sems can sna tshogs su phyi dbye bar skul pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa la sbyin pa'i gnas su mtshungs par skul ba dang / bdud kyi las bstadang par bskal pa
10a7(mdo): dang / dam bcas pa nyams pa nyams 'og tu chud par bskul pa dang / 'khob pas yongs su myi bskyo bar bskul pa dang / bdud btul bar bskul ba dang / byas pa shes pa dang / byas pa gzo
10a8(mdo): skul ba dang / rgyu zad pa la 'jug par skul ba dang / rnam par ba dad pa'i sgrol gyi 'jigs par skul ba dang / de bzhid gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya bar bskul pa dang / sems can
10b1(mdo): thams cad la ji bya snyam pa la spro ba bskul ba dang / / por skal/ 'jig rten gi chos dang ma 'dres par skul ba dang / dgon pa la dga' bar bskul ba dang / 'dod pa chung zhing chog shes par skul / 
10b2(mdo): dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa/ ma grol bAH/ dbugs ma phyind pa dbugs byung ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngang 'ad bar sprul pa dang / dkod mchog gsum gyi gdung gyi 'am
10b3(mdo): pa bskul ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yod ter bkod pa yongs su dag pa thang bar bskul ba ste// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub yongs su sbyid par byed pa'i chos ni sum cu rtsa lnga po de da/ 
10b4(mdo): yin no// lha'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' yongs su phyin pa byas pa ni/ slar byed pa yang bdag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bskyod du byed pa yin te/ de ni phas kyi rgol ba thams cad
10b5(mdo): kyis thul bar myi nus so// de phyin cad kyang byang chub sems rapa'i dregs pa brgyas dregs par myi 'gyur ro// bcun/ bzhe na/ tshul khrims kyis dregs pa dang / thos pas dregs
10b6(mdo): pa dang / spoms pas dregs pa dang / brnyed pa dang / bkrung sti dang / tshigs su bcad pas dregs pa dang / dkon par gnas pas dregs pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yod tad dang / yo byad sbyangs par dregs
10b7(mdo): pa dang / gzugs dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang / g.yog 'khor kis dregs pa dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba snyen bkur byed pas dregs pa dang / bsam gtan
10b8(mdo): dang / mngon par shes pas dregs pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dpa/ dge' 'dun la dad pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dpa/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding da / myi 'am dzi da
11a1(mdo): dang / lto 'phye chen po dag 'dod pa dang / stod pa dang / bsngags par byed pa des kyang bsnyems pa byed pa yin te/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i dregs pa bcu po de dag gis myi bsnyems rab tu
11a2(mdo): sa gyi bsnyems so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur da pa la lha'i bu dpal 'azangs ldan gis 'di skad ces smras so// lajam dpal khyod phyogs gapar gnas pa dang / chos kyi rab grangs de ga pan spyod pa
11a3(mdo): der ni sangs 'byung bar blta'o// de ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar blta'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa// de de bzhin no// lha'i bu de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no// 
11a4(mdo): phyogs gang na 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur da pa gnas pa/ 'di ni stong pa ma yin par mngon do// gang na chos kyi rnam/ grangs spyod par gyur pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi
11a5(mdo): bdag nyid brtson par mdzad do// gang chos kyi rnam grang 'di la nyan par byed/ mos par byed pa'i sems cad de dag ni nga'i yid par 'gyur ro// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs
11a6(mdo): 'di nya dad pa dang / mos pa'i sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul bar blta'o// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzidad pa dang / de bzhin du nan tad byed pa de dag ni thar byed
11a7(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang rgyag las phyir gyi ldog pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa
11a8(mdo): kun dga' bo la bka' stsa lad pa/ skyes bu dam pa bdag ji tsam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blang ba dang / gzung ba dang / bdad pa dang / kun chub par byed pa'i phyir khyod la bshad do// 
11b1(mdo): da ni ring po myi thogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'ad bar 'gyur gyis de'i phyir khyed kyis sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi bya ba'i chos kyi rjes grangs 'dis gnas par gyis shig/ byams pas gsol da pa/ bcom
11b2(mdo): ldar 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i rgya ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzu bar bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang pa/ byams pa de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ba'i ba bslab pa
11b3(mdo): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang / byang chub sems dpa' yongs su phyid par byed pa zhes bya bar byang shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa lang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byam sa ya
11b4(mdo): tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'ad bo dang / lha dang kyi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig na yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
11b5(mdo): bstod do// / !'phagasazhi ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo' rdzogs s+ho// 
11b6(mdo): rgya kar gyi mkhan po 'dzin gyi tra dang / da ra shi la dang / zhwa chen gyi lo cha bA ban de ye zhes sdes baspyadad cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// 
11b7(mdo): rgya ka skad du/ ar+ya bud d+ha pa la dA ra/ pra ti hAr+ya 'bi ku par ri man+te sha na ma ma ha ya na su tra// bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi stobs bskyed pa'i cho 'phrul
11b8(mdo): bar 'phrul ba bstanang pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdol/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa tus cig ma/ bcom ldan 'a
12a1(mdo): chu ched po'i tha med dza 'bras nga/ 'phags pa spyan ngas gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / lag na rjed pa / byams pa dang / 'jab dpal la rdzogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' btang ba das
12a2(mdo): 'byord dang / sha ri'i bu dang / me la 'gal gyi bu la phyogs la/ nyan thos ched lo thams cad dang / thabs gcig tu 'azhugs te/ brgya byid dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rte skyong ba thams cad dang / rgyam
12a3(mdo): dang / dran po dang / bram ze dag khyim bdag thams cad kyis bskrod cing bdun tu 'dang te/ zhal zas kyi bya 'a byas nas/ 'jor gyi dkyil 'chab de dag chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis rim par byas/ 'asum
12a4(mdo): bzeng stong/ yang dag par dga' bar byas te// 'khod kyi dkyil 'khor dang babs gcig tu/ de bzhir gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul cher thos klong khyer ba yan ser gshegs te/ ba ran po'i zhing ma 'dra
12a5(mdo): ba'i tshal na bzhugs so// den pa de'i tshe na sa cher g.yos par gyurang nas// seng ge'i khri cher po rin po che sna bad+ha/ na las byas pa 'phang du dpag tshad gcig tsam/ zhe tu dpag
12a6(mdo): tshad phyed tsam gyi tshad legs par smras pa/ shi nad tu dka' bar 'gyur ba/ yid du 'ong ba/ dang kyi rgyan po btags shing dbyangs pa/ lha'i na bza' brgya stong du ma bting ba lha'i me tog gi chun po bye ba
12a7(mdo): rarab tu sbyangs pa/ lha'i dri dang lu dog dang 'dra ba/ de ba'i du gshegs pa'i rjod kyi dga' ba'i rtsa b.las skyes pa/ de mthong sa pan tu sems can thams cad kyi skye ba'i chos la bzang
12a8(mdo): zam pa bcad lazhi gzung ngo // de dpa bcom ldang 'das se na'i khri de nyid la bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas las ma tsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzid ma snyoms par zhugs ras/ byang chub pa
12b1(mdo): dpal 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal da pa/ 'phags pa spyan rab gzigs kyi dbang phyug khyod yo ba la/ myi mched kyi 'jig rten gi khams 'di dang / phyogs bcu'i 'dzi// 
12b2(mdo): rten gi khams gzhan dag na/ khyod kyis 'dul bar gyur pa'i sems can/ bsnyigs ma'i rang bzhin can/ ma dad pa sdig pa spyod pa// nyon mongs pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dag gis bsgribs pa/ mar myi
12b3(mdo): zhes pa/ par phyizhes pa/ dge' sbyong du gyi 'dzin pa/ bram zer gyi 'ji dad pa dkon mchog gsum la mngod papa ma dad pa/ de dag thams cad lag rdo rje dpa gnyis kyis/ rdzu 'phrul chen po ji
12b4(mdo): ting nge 'dzind kyi stobs kyi thugs kyis/ 'khong gi dkyis 'khod 'dir sus shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa sun das mthigs dbang phrag dang / byang chub sems dpa' la ka rjepa
12b5(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa las tshig 'di thos nas te/ sems can zan sa cad la blta ba dang / yang dag pas bskul bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la stobs yang zhugs so/ ting nge 'dzin
12b6(mdo): de'i mthus sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ yang dag par rab tu g.yos so// de nas lus las 'od gzer brgya stong du ma byung ngo // byung nas kyang stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
12b7(mdo): gi khams 'di kun tu snang bar byas te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad gzugs yod pa dang / gzugs kyis khyab pa man chad tu snang bar byas te/ 'od zer de dag las kyang yang dag par skul ba'i tshigs su
12b8(mdo): bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // bka yod pa dang nyon mongs myed par byos// bka byed pa'i dbang du ma 'gro shika/ skye dang rke shis katses pa sug bsngal te/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bstand pa 'byung
13a1(mdo): thaska lad pa bye ba phrag brgya grangs myed tu / srid pa'i rgya mtshor nges par 'okhar ba da nga/ nyon mongs dog pa rtag tu 'khor ba na// mtsho ma rungs pas ni skrag myi 'gyur// rnyed dang chags dang bud myed rtag pa// 
13a2(mdo): ma myin/ rtag tu gru ka pa sgyu ma'i chos dang ldan// bskal da pa tu mar bde ba myong nas kyang // phyis ni sdug bsngal rjes su thob par 'gyur// rnam par slu bar gyur da pa 'di la ltos/ 'di la mar gyur da pa yang chung / 
13a3(mdo): mar 'gyur// de'i sha dge yongs su zos nas kyang // gyi mkhas pa dag myi shes dga' bar 'dzind// srid pa'i sdug bsngal rgya mtshor skye ba de// myis ni ma myong byed la skrag pa myed// myi rnams kyi ni dam
13a4(mdo): ba'i chos 'chad kyis// bde ba gshegs la mchod par 'dod nam das dang // gyi 'dul kha lo sbyar ba de mthong nas// ting 'dzin zhi ba bsgom pa thob 'gyur gyis/ de'i phyir sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'/ 
13a5(mdo): myi gang rnams// skrag par gyis la tha rad par 'dod par 'byos / myi rnams kyi ni dam pa de la mchod// gzhan gi srog ni ma gcod de bzhin tu// gzhan gi nor dag ma byin len ma byed
13a6(mdo): gzhan gyi bud myed dag la 'tshe ma byed// sangs rgyas chos la rtag tu gus par byos// nga rgyal rgyags dang bamalan nas kyang // ba ra na se zhes bya ba 'i// a 'dra srung ba mo'i tshal du deng / 
13a7(mdo): myi mchogs ni rgyab cu blta bar byis/ de ni dkon pa rgya cher yid tu 'ong // dge' slong dge' 'dun rtag tu rdzu 'phrul can// byang chub sems dpa' rgya chen rdzu 'phrul che// sems can gyi sa khas chung / 
13a8(mdo): rbang kyang pa/ thams cad bye ba yang po tharang bya'i phying// 'od ming rtag tug gis btang ba'o// mtshan ni spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug go// gang dag rgyal lcags khyengs bgying gyuras
13b1(mdo): nga / mas rgyamatshab la rib zo ma gying pa// makA rdzu man rnam sems cad 'jon// rtag tu 'ad cing gtong zhing go bang byed// de'i gzugs ni yangs shing tu'aphrul te// banas pa bye ba de ni band kyi rdzogs/ 
13b2(mdo): 'dir ni bde bar gshegs la mchod pa'i phyir/ dri dang 'ar ba gos mchog rgyad khyer la// phyi'i 'drend pa 'di la mchod pa byos// sangs rgyas 'byung bapa 'gyur ba rab dkon na// 'dod phyir bskal pa byes
13b3(mdo): mang bor yang // rtag tu sdug bsngal thob cing 'thob par 'gyur// mkhas pas rtag tu tha rad par 'dod par gyis/ gyi mchog sangs rgyas la ni mchod pa byos// bu dang bu mo de bzhin gnyen rnams dang / @
13b4(mdo): ma chung ba bshes yang skye bo rnams/ thams cad sgyu ma 'dra bas don byed dre// rtag par gzhan dang gzhan tu skye bar 'gyur// de ltar gse dar dang drangul yang glog dang 'dra// 'di la snying po 'ag yang shAng
13b5(mdo): pa byed// byang chub ko 'phang thob par bya ba'i phyir/ gyims 'dren pa la ni mchod pa byos// de nas de'i tshe ma'o/ gzer las byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pas skul ba gcig nas
13b6(mdo): gcig tu chud pa 'dis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gi khams smras gang bar gyur du nas/ sems can thams cad sprul par gyur da te/ sems can kang dag log par blta ba de dag ra
13b7(mdo): yang dag pa'i lta ba la bkod par gyur da/ gang dag pa rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / glengs pa dang / 'gyings pa de dag ni nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / khengs pa rnams dang / bral bar byed par gyur / 
13b8(mdo): gang dag 'dod chag ma la rjes su spyod cing / bag myed par gyur nga pa de dag mi 'dod chags dang bral bar gyungs/ gang dag thog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par gsem pa dang / 
14a1(mdo): gyi dge' ba'i chos brgyad la gnas pa de dag thams cad lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa rnams/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par gyur // thams cad kyang dgod pa dang / ku re dang / dga' ba ra/ 
14a2(mdo): dang/ 'dod pa dang / Tha dang/ mag dog nas la yangs sa mangs da / de ba'idi gshegs pa bsgrub dang / brnyed pa dang / btad pad bya bas smra bar gyu // thams cad kyang sa ca 'dad pa
14a3(mdo): to// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / gyi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / kyi dang byi ma yin pa dang / klu'i rgyal po dang / rgyal po 'khar gyi bdag pa dang / rgyal za dang / 
14a4(mdo): stobs kyi 'khor 'os sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang / dgel slong dang dgel spong ba dang / dge' bsnyen ma gang de dag thams cad kyis de bzhi na gshegs pa la mchod pa'i phyir/ lha'i me tog dang / 'phreng
14a5(mdo): pa dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gtugs dang / rgyal mtshar dang / sil snyan dang / dang gi chun po rnams thogs te/ grong khyer chen po par da se zhes bya ba kang na ba dang/ a pra srung
14a6(mdo): b.la' tshal gapa bder dang das bdag 'dag gi tham dadapas lam phyel pa'i dgal ba'i ma 'as de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'khang gang kyis 'khor 'bus la bdod par marjod de/ be tog ni rang dang / de'i
14a7(mdo): rnam sa napa// de napa ma ma ldan 'das kyis 'ja bu'i gling 'di dag a 'dra byung mamam pa/ dpa ga cad kyi kwa'ig pargya shing da tu ma cho 'a byin gyimarna
14a8(mdo): ti sa gzhi lag 'brel ltam mnyam la// lha'i yid rtsa 'ong ba kha dog dang lda ba/ dri dang ldan pa dang / lha'i me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang / spos kyi zhing dang / rin po che'i shing dang / dang
14b1(mdo): bsams kyi shing dang / gos kyi shing rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i seng ge'i khri dang ldan pa/ rin po che dang / dar dang me tog gi chun po rab tu sbyangs pa/ lha'i dril bu'i dra ba'i sgras brgyand par gyur da te/ 'di lta ste/ 
14b2(mdo): dper na/ bde ba can gi 'jig rten gi khams bzhin tu yid 'phrog par byed pa// tshim par byed pa// mgu bar byed pa/ mngon par dga' bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / lha
14b3(mdo): dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am rtsi dang / lto 'che chen po nas/ dge' slong dang / dge' slong ma dang / dge' bsnyen dang / dge' bsnyen ma dang / rgyal po dang / 
14b4(mdo): blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyi bar du de dag gis gang bar byin gis thabs so// de nas byang chub sems dang dal 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / byang chub
14b5(mdo): sems dpa' lag na rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste phyi nad pa dang / lan ga ma du bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
14b6(mdo): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa dang / sems cad yongs su sbyin par bgyi ba ni mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das de bzhi
14b7(mdo): gshegs pa'i gzi' 'dzid dang/ rdzu 'phrul kyi mthas/ byang chugasams dpa' sems dpa' tshan pad nya thos chen po dang / sa dang / u dang / gnang sbyin dang / dri na da / ma yin dang / ra
14b8(mdo): da kyilamakyi dang/ gyi chen mo dang / rgyal pa dang / blan pa dang / bram zen kyis 'a dang / dge'atshang dang / dga' rdzob pa dang / dga' 'phen dang / dkyil babyed pa rnams yang tu 'a
15a1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu legs so// kye rgyal po dag de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang / sems can yongs su sbyind par bya ba ni mang ngo // 
15a2(mdo): ma sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta bu dang / ji ltar 'dul ba dang / dgel ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu dang / sems can rnams kyi mos pa sna tshogs kyi spyod pa mkhyerd nas chos stond te/ sems can kha cig ni byang chub so/ 
15a3(mdo): dpas 'dul/ kha cig ni nyan thos kyis 'dul/ kha cig ni rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul// kha gcig ni lhas 'dul/ kha cig ni tshangs pas 'dul/ kha cig ni klus 'dul/ kha cig ni rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'dul// 
15a4(mdo): kha cig ni rgyal pos 'dul/ kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin gis la tul/ kha cig ni chos nyan pas 'dul/ kha cig ni cho 'phrul// gyis 'dul/ kha cig ni de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su
15a5(mdo): mya ngan las 'das pas 'dul ba/ kha cig ni ring bsrel gis dul/ kha cig ni mchod rten byed du gzhug pa dang / rdzug lag nga dang / mchag sa dang / skyed mos tshal byed du gzhug pa'i dgen
15a6(mdo): ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas 'dul// kha cig ni sku gzugs byed du gzhug pa dang / ri bo dang / gser dang / dngul dang / ra kan ki sku gzugs byed tu gzhug pa dge' ba'i rtsa ba la slo ba bskyed pas 'dul/ kha cig
15a7(mdo): ni dge' slong gi dge' 'dun la mchod pa dang / bkur sti bya ba'i dge' ba'i rtsa ba la slo ba skyed pas 'dul// kha cig ni mdo' sde bri ba dang / 'drir gzhug pa dang / klag pa la spro ba skyed pa bas 'dul/ kha cig
15a8(mdo): ni mar me dang / spos dang / me tog dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang do shal la rdzogs pa brgya dad pa la slob bskyed pas 'dul ba yin te// don dam pa la mkhas pa'i chos dang ldan pa dang
15b1(mdo): mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos dang ldan pa ni ma yin no// kye rgyal ba'i bu dag yang de bzhin gshegs pa la ni kyi mkhyend pa 'am/ myi gzigs pa 'am/ gyi gsan pa 'am/ rnam par rtsi lakhyen pa cung zad kyang
15b2(mdo): gyi mnga' ste/ 'ongs pa yang mkhyend/ ma 'ongs pa yang mkhye nang / 'das pa yang mkhyerang / da ltar byung ba yang mkhye dang / sems cad thams cad kyi spyod lam yang mkhyedang/ spyod pa yang mkhyend/ 'bras
15b3(mdo): kyang mkhye nad/ skye ba yang mkhyenang/ 'byung ba yang mkhyend to// kye rgyal ba'i bu dag 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sman pa legs par skabs pa'i tshe/ rig pa yan lag brgyan pa thams cad la/ khas 'ches
15b4(mdo): shing khams thams cad la mkhas la sman dang yo byad sbyor ba la brtson pa ni/ sems can nad pa nad sna tshogs kyis lus yongs su kuni dad pa rnams kyi khams kyang shes// dus kyang shes
15b5(mdo): chod kyang shes/ smand kyang shes/ cu las gyu ra ba dang / khris pa las gyu da pa dang / bad kan las byu dad pa dang / 'dus pa las gyurd pa dang / khrag las gyu rad pa dang / 
15b6(mdo): ma zhu ba las gyu dad pa dang / sman dang / dbu rdzing dang / snying nad dang / mdze' dang / g.yan pa dang / shu ba dang / 'bras la bugs pa dang / dug dang / bye dpal la phyogs pa yang shes so// des dz+ra
15b7(mdo): cad shes nas/ sman gi rdzas sna tshogs kyis rgyag pa dang / 'dra ba dang / phye ma sbya ra pa dang / rdza las byugs pa'i las dang / gtang ka gdab pa dang / mar dnga'abru mar brko la pa dang / sbyin par
15b8(mdo): bya ba rnams sbyor ba'i thabs kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi dang thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed cing / nang sna tshogs kyis 'jigs pa las yongs su 'dad par byed do// kye rgyal ba'i bum
16a1(mdo): de ba'in bye bzhi gshegs pas kyang ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs dang / rtswa 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / stobs dang / gyi 'jigs pa dang / lha'i myig dang / na pa rnams kyi tshe'i rig pa yan lag brgyad pa
16a2(mdo): ldan te/ sems can gi khams dang / bsam pa dang / sbyor ba sna tshogs la mkhas pas// 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nad dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i na kyis gzi da pa'i/ 
16a3(mdo): sems can dang rgyam dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pas bsgribs pa dang / chags pa dang / mya nga dang / 'jigs pa dang / khro bas sgribs pa rnams sems can dargyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yid nga/ 
16a4(mdo): kyi skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gi gnas nas yongs su ma dad par bya ba'i phyir/ thabs mkhas pa sna tshogs dang / rgyarab sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs dang / rdzu 'phrul
16a5(mdo): gyis rnam par rome pas// sems cad rnams yongs su rbo/ la bar byas nas/ bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bachub kyi bar du bkod nas/ lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan la
16a6(mdo): 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'ad par mdzad no// myi dge' ba'i chos rgyad las yongs su tha rad par mdzad cing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma sos 'god de/ rigs kyi
16a7(mdo): 'di la sted ba pad/ zla ba'i dkyis 'khor ni thabs la pa zhus pa dang ldan 'as/ jis pa khams kyi dga' ba'i skyabs 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi danang tu bdag nyid kyi snang ba la bskonang/ 
16a8(mdo): 'amapas bu'i dkyis 'ag kyang stonang / zla ba sang gi dong pa/ yang mi ngal sngo dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rgyas pas pa sto dang / sum dag 'i bas po thams cad kyang rnas par sel da/ 
16b1(mdo): car shing rtses pa dang / gang dang 'phrul phyogs pa la chis bar byed do// kye rgyal ba'i bu dag de ba'i ma bya de bzhin gshegs pas kyang / sug baphral rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa'i sems can rnams dang / 
16b2(mdo): khams sna tshogs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi spyod pa mkhyend nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'dab yang ston/ skye ba yang ston / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang ston/ rtse ba dang dga' ba
16b3(mdo): bud byed kyi bzhad gang dang / dgra re dang / rmi dang phreng ba la dga' zhing / rtse ba yang dz+nyA nad/ khyim nas 'byung ba dang / rab tu 'byung ba dang / dka' ba spyod pa rnams kyang s+ho dang / bdud btul ba dang / 
16b4(mdo): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / chos kyi sprin chen po'i char bab pas/ sems can rnams tshim par byed pa'i ba / tu yang ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su
16b5(mdo): mya ngan las 'das kyang / sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis ring bsre la mchod pa dang / mchod rten dang / gtsug lag khang dang / sku gzugs byed du gzhug pa dang / rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir
16b6(mdo): khyim nas byung ba dang / dge' slong gi dgel 'dun la mchod pa dang / dam pa'i chos bri ba dang / klag pa dang / kha ton tu bya ba la slob skyed pa dag gis kyang / sems can thams cad tha dad par ma
16b7(mdo): bslab pa 'dzind pa dang / brtul zhugs dang / sdom pa dang / nye bar gnas pa dang / dge' bsnyen gi bsdom pa rnams 'dzind tu gzhug pa'i thabs mkhas pas kyang / sems can rnams tha dad par
16b8(mdo): mdzad de/ sems can dmyal ba dang / tud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / myi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro thams cad las yongs su tha rad par mdzad nas
17a1(mdo): chos nyam pas tshim par mdzad de/ bla ma byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phung du kod do// phengs de'i tshe lha'i bu tho chung ba kha cig 'di snyam tu sems par gyur te/ ji ltar sngon ni/ 
17a2(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa mdzad de/ sku che shin tu ring por byid kyis rlabs nas/ sems can thams cad
17a3(mdo): skye ba dang / rga ba dang/ ra ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'dod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su tha dan par mdzad pa de ltar/ de bzhin
17a4(mdo): gshegs pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa thamasacad darung ma mdzad kyis kyang / 'dis mya ngan las 'ad ba la/ shin tu bsngags shing brjod de/ 'khor mang po smras nas
17a5(mdo): rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul snga tshogs ston/ da pa las na// de ci de bzhin gshegs pa 'di myur ba nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'ang bar bzhed pa lta snyam nas
17a6(mdo): de dag yid kyi dgaka' ste/ cang kyi smra bar gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sems kyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems shes nas/ lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// 
17a7(mdo): lha'i bu dag de ltar ma sems ma smra yid myi dka' bar ma byed cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa ni mang ste/ zabs dang shes rab dang / ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyi dge'
17a8(mdo): rtsa ba'i stobs kyis byin rlabs kyis/ sems can bsam pa sna tshogs dag la chos ston te/ lha'i bu dag ngas sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs yakhas pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam
17b1(mdo): par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul ji ltar mthong ba de ltar ngas shes pa las ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi stobs bskyed pa'i cho 'phrul zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'i sde'i rgyal po 'chad par bzhed pa dang / sangs
17b2(mdo): rgyas par mdzad par bzhed par gyi 'gyur ram// yang lha'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las myi 'da' ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'dab yang byed/ 
17b3(mdo): sku tshe zad par 'gyur ba yang byed de/ skal pa bye ba dpag tu myed pa bskal pa brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs yod kyi/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams
17b4(mdo): la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang sto dang / dam pa'i/ chos chub par rgya da pas pa stodang / sems cad mya ngan las 'das pas 'dul ba dang / ring sril gyis 'dul ba snyigs / 
17b5(mdo): rang bzhin can// de bzhin gshegs pa la ma dad pa/ bla ma la sti stang du byed par myi 'gyur ba'i sems can dag/ ji ltar ji ltar mthong ba de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yongs
17b6(mdo): su mya ngan las 'ad ba ston mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni byond pa yang byed/ gshegs pa yang byed do// gang gi tshe sems can rnams dge' ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sbyin par 'gyur cing
17b7(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa blta bar 'dod pa dang / mchod par 'os pa dang / chos nyan par 'dod pa dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin tu 'dod par gyur da pa/ de'i tshe lha dang myi rnams kyi skye bo mang po la
17b8(mdo): phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde bar bya ba dang / dkon mchog gsum stsal par bya ba dang / rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten tu 'byung mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skye
18a1(mdo): bskyed de// rga ba dang 'chib yang byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ me long gi dkyil 'khor shi nad tu legs par byis pa la gzugs sna tshogs sdang bar 'gyur/ gyi snang bar 'gyur mod kyi// gzugs
18a2(mdo): ma brnyan ni der 'ongs pa dang 'gro bar snang ba myed do// lha'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la yang de ltar blta bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma byed pa legs par bslabs pa ni/ grong khyer dang / rta babs
18a3(mdo): dang skyed mos tshal sna tshogs dang / shing rta sna tshogs dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs dang / dka' ba dang rtse ba sna tshogs bstand te/ mya sdang bar byed kyang de la 'pho ba yang myed/ myi 'pho ba yang myed// 'ong ba
18a4(mdo): yang myed/ 'gro ba yang myed do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'dab la ba lta hA bya'o// yang lha'i bu dag sngon gyi smon lam gis de bzhin ka
18a5(mdo): gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas/ tshe lta lon pa 'am/ mya nga las 'das ras ba zhal dpar lond pa 'am/ mya ngan la sa 'das nas bskal pa bye bar lo nad kyang / sems can
18a6(mdo): rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / ring srel gyi mchod rten byed du bzhug pa dang / sku gzugs byed du gzhug pa dang / mtshan nas brjod pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzind pa dang / mchod pa
18a7(mdo): byed pa'i sems can 'jig rten ki khams sna tshogs na gnas pa rnams tha rad par mdzad de/ sems cad dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / myi khom pa dang / ngan song dang
18a8(mdo): ngan 'gro log par ltung ba thams cad dang / sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su thard par mdzad nas/ rim gyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya
18b1(mdo): brgya langag gang dag brji gnags pa la mngon sum du ma tog dang / spom dang / bre dang 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / ra bka' dang / brgyad rnams kyi mdzad pas mchod pa lnga rdzob kyang cidan ma/ lha'i budag dang / 
18b2(mdo): sems can pa las/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kya rnams 'das nas/ mo brgya sto sa/ bskas pa bye ba 'od kyang / sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal ma zhem mtshan nam lan bdum tu ban das/ nam ma
18b3(mdo): la me tog gtor na/ de dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed par 'gyur ro// me tog nam mkha' la gtor ba lta zhog gi/ gang dag dad pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su slob pa la la zhig gis de bzhin
18b4(mdo): gshegs pa la mchod pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims bslab pa la cig tsam 'dzind tam/ nyin cig kam/ mtshan gcig gas// yud tsam zhig de bzhin gshegs pa la
18b5(mdo): mchod pa yid la byed par brtsod na/ de sdug bsngal mthar da bya sa nas rim gyis bla ra myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chunatu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// gang gis
18b6(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i phyir bzhan 'gad dam/ dku mo 'am/ byis pa'i rgyal ka 'am/ rtsed mor kyang bye ma 'am/ 'jim pa las mchod rten byed na/ de dag thams cad sdug bsngal mtham bya
18b7(mdo): nas/ blan myed pa yang bdag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur na/ gang gis ring bsrel gi mchod rten 'am/ ring srel ki sku gzugs byas te/ sems can thas
18b8(mdo): cad la snying rje batsho khor shes nas/ sems cad thams cad sdug bsngal las yongs su dkrol lo rnyam ste/ bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ lha'i spros pa
19a1(mdo): phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / me tog dang / sil snyan dang / gtugs dang / rgyal mtshan rnams kyis mchod pa lta spos kyang mi dgos te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// 
19a2(mdo): ma de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'dond pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su tha dad par 'gyur te/ ji srid tu bla na myed pa
19a3(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyurd pa// de srid kyi bar du bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro// lha'i bu dag de ltar na// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngon gi smon
19a4(mdo): lam la mkhas shing mthun pa yongs su dag pa yin no// de nas dalha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te/ kye ma ho 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa 'di ni shes rab chen po dang ldan no/ 
19a5(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchog tu thabs mkhas pa ni ye kas na/ gang 'jam dpal gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ mya ngan las 'das nas/ bskal pa bye ba tu ma lond kyang 'jig
19a6(mdo): rten gi khams ga par bzhugs shing / thabs mkhas pa sna tshogs kyis// sems can rnams yongs su spyi dad par mdzad do// zhes smras pa de ji ltar bu 'di ci zhig snyam mo// 'jam dpal gzhon nung kyu dang / 
19a7(mdo): pa'i sems kyis// lha'i bu de dag gis/ sems shes nas// 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu dag legs so legs so// yud tsam zhig sdod cig/ khyod kyi yid la byed pa skyes pa 'di dang / sngar zhus
19a8(mdo): par gyurd pa 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin kyi rlabs yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'dra mdzad pa mngon par mdzad pas// de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug
19b1(mdo): phrad can dang / thams cad skyob pa dang / log par dang sel dang / gser thub dang / 'od srung dang / rnam par gzigs dang / gyi 'khrugs pa dang / 'od dpag tu byed pa de dag 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs shing / de bzhin
19b2(mdo): gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs nas nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpang bcas par bskord cing / 'khor rgya mtsho lta phul chos stond par snang ba dang / sharang dang / lho dang / nub byang gi phyogs kyi 'jig
19b3(mdo): rten gi khams dag na yang de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs nas// chos 'chad cing bzhugs par mthong ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do// de nas thams cad dang ldan
19b4(mdo): ba'i 'khor de dang / lha'i bu de dag das par gyur da te/ mchog tu dka' zhing yid mgu ba skyes nas/ bdag bdag gi dge' ba'i dam pa las skyes pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs skyed pas// de bzhi
19b5(mdo): gshegs pa de dag la me tog dang / spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / rgya nad rnams kyis mamon pa mchod de// lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas// tshigs su bcad/ 
19b6(mdo): pa'adas pas / ting 'dzidi dang ni zhes rab 'asnor// ji gar 'jig nyid spod sa rnams/ 'das nas nas bcu gang // sems can rnamasa' par pa'i byed/ dab gachenag
19b7(mdo): 'di na bzhugs/ byang chub sems dpa' ma yongs pasko na cing // seng ge'i khri la bzhugs/ pang kada'// sangs rgyas mthong ba legs pa ste// chos nyan pa yang legs pa yin// dge' ba'i banas
19b8(mdo): gnyed blta ba dang // mnyan pa'ang de bzhin legs pa yin// gang dag 'dir ni bslab 'dzind pa'i// lus kyi sdom pa legs pa yin/ nang tad kyis ni bslab pa dag/ de kun byang chub 'thoza bar 'gyur/ 
20a1(mdo): \u0f7f/ thabs dang shes rab mkhas pa rnams// 'di ni sems can tha dang bar mdzad// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba dang // de bzhin sgyu ma byed pa 'dra// 'ong ba dang ni 'gro ba yang // de bzhin gshegs pa ston par mdzad
20a2(mdo): ma mchod rten dang niri mo sapa// sku gzugs byed bya 'dzag pa dang // mchod dang bkur sti bya ba'i phyir// gang dag mtshan ni dran byed pa// byang chub phyir di gnas pa rnams// thams cad tha rad par thob par 'grur/ 
20a3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal nas// dam pa'i chos ni mnyand pa dang // mchod cing 'dzind pa 'ang de bzhin te// sdug bsngal kun las grol bar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gi rlabs dang / rnam pa
20a4(mdo): 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul yang dag par bstan pa 'di bshad pa na// srog chags drug khri bzhi stong gis myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags nyi khris chos la chos kyi byig rnam par dag go// 
20a5(mdo): lha'i bu lnga stong gis lemed pa myed par zag pa las sems rnam par krol te// phyir gyi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyurd to// dge' slong dang / dge' slong ma dang / dge' bsnyen dang / dge'
20a6(mdo): bsnyen ma bdun brgyas ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs thob par gyur rad to// 'jam dpal da'od nur gyurd pa la rgyal po gsal rgyal gis 'di skad ces spras so// rgyal ba'i sras khyod kyis sems can thams
20a7(mdo): cad kyi dong tu dris pa'i yan bshad pa 'di ni khyod kyis legs par bshad do/ legs yod kyi dad pa la rgyal po gsol rgyal shes ma lo me com cung zad cig skyes kyis/ gang thos das sems can rnams kyis
20a8(mdo): yid la byas te/ de dag thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las grol bar 'gyur ba dang / bde 'gro 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur
20b1(mdo): kho bos dris pa'i de sta nad cing lung ston cig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis sngon dge' ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin rlabs kyis spobs pa skyes pa ni legs so/ 
20b2(mdo): legs so// khyod gang dang gang 'dod pa dris shig dang / ras khyod la bshad par bya'o// smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mtshan zos pa tsam dang / mchod pa dang bkur sti byas pa nyid
20b3(mdo): kyis sdig byed pa'i sems can rnams/ sems can dmyal ba dang / tud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten las grol bar 'gyur zhing / bde 'gror 'gro ba de dag gang lags/ de dag 'jig rten
20b4(mdo): gi khams ni gang na bzhugs/ de dag la mchod pa ni ji ltar ba kyi/ 'jab dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang gi phyir/ dasems can rnams ngan song du 'gro bar myi 'gyur ba dang / 
20b5(mdo): gang ngan sob du skyes pa de dag sems can dmyal ba dang/ hud/ 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / kashin rje'i 'jig rten las yongs sukrol bar 'gyur ba'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
20b6(mdo): pa de dag gi mtshan rnams dang / 'jig rten gi khams su mdzad cong/ sti stang bya ba bshad kyis nyor cig/ 'jig rten gi khams bye ru bya snang ba la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
20b7(mdo): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas can gyi tha byen cu 'od kyi rgyal po ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshal gnyis zhing chos kyang stodad pa yod do// 'jig rten gi khams gtsug phrad cam / de bzhin gshegs pa
20b8(mdo): ngas bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i gtsug zad can zhes bya ba yod do// 'jig rten gi khams dri ma byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa sa bdag yar rdzogs
21a1(mdo): pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma myed par 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod do// 'jig rten gi khams zhi ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu zhi ba bkod pa zhes bya/ 
21a2(mdo): kha yod do// 'jig rten gi khams bde ba can na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ 'od dpag tu myed pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gi khams pad mo'i bla ma na/ de
21a3(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pang po 'byung ba zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gi khams rdo rje na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mkhregs pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gi/ 
21a4(mdo): khams mya ngan byes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan dang / ngas pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rted gi khams 'jig pa byed pad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tuzhi bar man
21a5(mdo): pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gi khams rtogs pa dang / zlo rmA sa su ldan pa ra de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba thams cad yod su sbyor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gi khams bral ba na/ 
21a6(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa ngan mong thams cad zhi bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gi khams dri ma byed pa ra/ de bzhin gshegs pa tho gros rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gi las
21a7(mdo): dbang po na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i blo gros zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i mtshan bzung ba nyid kyis lha'i dbang por 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gi khams zla ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba rgya
21a8(mdo): pa drim byed pa zhes pa la yod de/ de'i mchad bzung zhing mchad pas/ nyan mongs pa thams cad yongs su mtho bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rted gi khabs khyab pang thob pa nga/ de bzhin gshegs pa
21b1(mdo): zhi bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i mtshan bzung zhing mchod pas/ ngan 'gro thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gi khams legs par mthong ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems
21b2(mdo): ca thams cad thug par mthong ba zhes bya ba sod pa/ de'i mtsha 'azung zhing mchod pas// 'jig rten gi khams thams cad mngod par dga' bar 'gyur ba// rigs kyi bu ma dpapa de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 
21b3(mdo): ba'i dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa can dan gi dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa bdud thams cad kyi stobs rab tu 'jom pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug pas
21b4(mdo): cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob dang / de bzhi na gshegs pa log par dad sel dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gser thab dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung dang / rgyal po chen po
21b5(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag mya ngan las 'das nas// lo bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong lon pa'am/ mya ngan las 'dasanas bskal pa brgya lond pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan la
21b6(mdo): 'das rnams kyi mtshar bzung ba dang / ring srel gi mchod rten byed du 'jug pa dang / ri mo dang sku gzugs byed du 'jug pa dang / mar me dang / smos dang / me tog dang / dri dang / byug pa rnams kyi
21b7(mdo): mchod cing bkur sti byas pa dang / bslab pa 'dzind pa dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub dang / sdom pa dang / nye bar gnas pa rnams kyis sems can thams cad ngan song thams cad dang / 
21b8(mdo): ngan 'gro thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// bskalang par gangs pa'i las kyi bsgrib pa mtshams myed pa lnga la sogs pa yang yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ bde 'grod 'gro b.ram
22a1(mdo): 'byung zhibangan 'gro 'gro bar myi 'gyur ba nas// rims kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// galan te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
22a2(mdo): dad pa byang chub kyi sems dran pa nyams pa zhig gis sdig pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa dag la sku rad pa 'debs pa dang / mtshams myed pa lnga byed pa dang / srog gcod pa dang / dkon
22a3(mdo): mchog gsum gyi nor rku ba dang / sems cad dmyal ba mnang myed par 'gro ba dang / ngan song gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi don dang / grogs po dang gnyen rnams yongs su tha dad par bya ba'i phyir/ 
22a4(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi ri mo'i sku gzugs dang / 'jim pa'i gzugs byed du 'jug cig byed du 'jug nas kyang // sems can thams cad la snying rje'i sems gtso bor byas te/ 'phags pa'i yang
22a5(mdo): lag brgyad pa dang ldan par 'gyur nas// zla ba yar gyi tshes brgyad nas brtsams te// tshes bco lnga'i bar du de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa de dag la me tog dang / spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang
22a6(mdo): byug pa dang / mar me dang / pil snyan dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bo da rnams kyi mtshan lan gsum/ nyin lan gsum brjod de/ sems can de dag tha rad par bya ba'i phyir/ mi nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom
22a7(mdo): ldan 'das de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis mkhye da pa/ lha'i snyun gis ni gsan// lha'i spyan gis ni gzigs shing / sems can de dag bde 'gro 'gro bar 'gyur gyi/ 8
22a8(mdo): 'gro bar gyud kyi/ ngan 'gror 'gro bar myi 'gyur ba dang / legs par bya ba byed kyi/ ngan par bya ba myi byed pas yongs su bsngo zhing / de ltar sems can ngan song du skyes pa de dag tha dad par bgyi
22b1(mdo): 'di gshegs pa de dag la gsom pa gangs so// gags pa dang mthom pas sdig pa 'tha'as ya gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos pa bya cig/ dad 'gro ba mas cad mam yangs / 
22b2(mdo): thos par byud da cig/ ji srid tu thar byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar bya/ bdag gi sbyor ba dang / mthun par spyod par gyur da cig ces/ de ltam mo
22b3(mdo): su bsngo bar bya'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang bris pa dang / 'dring bcug pa dang / bcangs pa dang / klags pa dang / mchod na de'i phyir/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi smon lam gi mthus/ 
22b4(mdo): sems cadan ma byed par 'gro ba dang / ngad song gsum ci daskyes pa'i de dag gi rna par mtshan rnams thos par 'gyur ro/ dachos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mabus kyang sdig pa thams cad mas
22b5(mdo): par 'gyur ro// de zhi dgade kasade dag ni dkyi di'i yu // de bzhin gshen
22b6(mdo): pa de dag gi gzi' brjid kyim bu dang / chob kyi ma sbyangs 'di'i 'dus dge' ba dang / kyi dge' ba'i las rjes su dran par gyur nga nas/ phyis sdig pa'i las byed par gyi 'gyur te/ de nas mug pa
22b7(mdo): da sas yongs sugs par 'gyur ning bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ zla kyang ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i thanganab mngan pa'i rdzogs par 'angs kyis kyi bza byed pa 'thung bar 'a
22b8(mdo): jide rdzob kyi bgrangs 'dzid ci cad par ma dang 'ad 'ang dab ming po kyi chen po dang 'dra ste/ ming pa'od kyang nga b.ring ci ba'i di rgya 'asam pa thams cad 'gyul
23a1(mdo): byed/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms par byed/ ngad 'gro'i sgo thams cad gcod par byed/ bde 'gro'i sgo dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sgo rnams mi 'byed de/ rigs kyi bu de ltam na de bzhin gshegs pa
23a2(mdo): ma/ rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa dang / smon lam dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byin gis rlabs dang / ting nge 'dzind sna tshogs pas mya ngan las 'das nas/ bskal pa brgya lon pa'i 'jig rten gi khams sna tshog
23a3(mdo): ma gnas pa dag nyand cing mchod pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa nyid kyis/ ngan song thams cad las yongs su tha rad te/ bde 'grong bkod par 'gyur na/ gang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug
23a4(mdo): pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par stond pa lta spos kyang mi dgos te/ yon tan de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos yongs su bzung bar gyur na/ de'i bsod nams mngon par/ 
23a5(mdo): 'du bya ba dang / dge' ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba'i ma/ na tan de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par brjod par/ bsla ba ma yin no// rgyal po de lta bas na yon tan 'di / 
23a6(mdo): la ltos/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcang bar bya'o// klag par bya'o// bshad par bya'o// mchod par bya'o// dkon mchog gsum la da po gyi byed par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la rtag tu mchod
23a7(mdo): cing bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bstand pa yang dag par gzung bar bya'o// 'khor ba las ying spyi nang ba g.yod pa dang / 'khor ba gad cig la yid la byed pa dang ldang bar byar/ 
23a8(mdo): ya rgyal po 'dod pa la bsnyend pas/ zhaladang pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar sug bsngal dang / mngal na gnas pa'i sdug bsngal sems can dmyal ba dang cud 'gro'i skye gnas dang
23b1(mdo): gshin rje'i 'jig rten ki sdug bsngal dang / dbul ba'i sdug bsngal dang / bcad pa dang / gzhom pa dang / brdung ba dang / brdeg pa dang / bsreg pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur te/ 'du byed thams cad yongs/ 
23b2(mdo): su spangs te/ 'gro dgos pas rgyal po chen po khyod kyis snying rtse ba rtse bar bya ba dang / chos dang tha radad pa 'dod par bya'o// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal gis/ 'jam dpal la
23b3(mdo): legs so zhes bya ba byind te/ 'jam dpal legs so legs so// chos kyi char phab pas bdag cag tshim par bgyis// rangs par bgyis/ byang chub la rab tu bzhag pas// bag yod par bgyi'o// 
23b4(mdo): rdo nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' ltad po ma den gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang/ la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dA
23b5(mdo): gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bstand pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dri ba po dang / 'chang ba po dang / klog papo de dag la me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa tra/ 
23b6(mdo): gos dang brgya nad rnams kyis mchod na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i bsod nams ci snyed cig skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ 
23b7(mdo): zo 'am blod po 'am/ dge' grong 'am dge' slong ma 'am/ dge' bsnyed nas/ dge' bsnyen pa la la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pas/ bcangs pa dang / mtsha
23b8(mdo): pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'dri 'jug pa dang yang dag par bstan dar/ des yon tan chen po brgyad thob par 'gyur ro// brgyad kang zhe na/ gang dag 'jig rten na nad dang / gnod pa de dag la
24a1(mdo): thams cad kyi thams cad du gyi 'byung ba dang / gang 'jig rten na gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / sha za ma dngas 'phrog pa de dag thams cad byams pa la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag gzhed byed dang / byang / 
24a2(mdo): dang sngags dang ro langs gzhan gi gnod pa de dag de'i lus la gnod par myi 'gyur ba dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / dge' slong dang / dge' slong ma dang / dge' bsnyen ma thams cad
24a3(mdo): de la dga' zhing yid mgu bar byung nga nas/ de'i don thams cad 'grub par 'byung ba dang / lha thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'di 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / lag na rdo rjes yongs su gzun
24a4(mdo): bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa'i gnas su skye zhing / tshe rab das dran par 'gyur ba ste/ yon tan chen po de brgyad thob par gyur ro// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag la de bzhin gnye/ 
24a5(mdo): pa'i lha'i mchod pa dang / mngon sum du mchod pas lo 'bum gyi ma du mchod par 'gyur ro// gang yang 'dzam bu'i grong 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring sril gyi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun
24a6(mdo): las byas pas gang bar byas te/ lha'i phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / me tog dang / mar me dang / rin po che'i gtugs dang / sis bstan dang / rgyal mtshan rnams kyis mo 'bum tu bkur sti byas te/ brjed cing mchod pa
24a7(mdo): pas/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / gzhan dag la yang dag pa sa rab tu bstan na/ de bas 'di ches bsod nams pang du 'phel
24a8(mdo): rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig gis/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can de dag 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gzhog cing / bzhag nas kyang lha'i lo stong du yo byad thams cad kyis myi 'brel da par brjed
24b1(mdo): cing mchod pa pas gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam yang mnyand pa dang / 'chang ba dang / 'dri ba dang / 'dri 'jug pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgyas par byed pa na/ de bas la
24b2(mdo): 'di bsod nams mang tu 'phes lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don nyid rgya cher brjod par bya ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// zhing stong bye ba gzhan du gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas mkhas pa/ 
24b3(mdo): mtha' yas bye ba dag/ sems can rnams kyi phyir ni dgongs mdzad cing // ngan 'gro las ni sems can tha rad par mdzad/ snying myed las la gnas shing sbyin byed dag/ las byas nas ni ngan gror song ba rnams// de dag
24b4(mdo): thadad bar bya ba'i gyi bcos 'dod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag mchod par gyis// ri ma mchod rten napa mchog sabyor gser dang dngul da dade ltar lugs rnams dang // 'jim pa'i sku gzugs dag ni
24b5(mdo): byed bcug nas/ mchod pa sna tshogs kyis ni mchod par gyis me tog dang ni phreng 'byug pa dang / mang me sil snyad dri mchog thos kyis mchod// shes rab che bas sngo ba dag kyang gis/ 
24b6(mdo): mdo' sde bshad cing 'dir yang gzhug par gyis/ de bzhin gshegs dang mdo'i sde'i gzi' brjid kyis/ sdig pa'i las las sems can de thard kyis// bla myed byang chub reg par gyur bar du// drag gi
24b7(mdo): gnas su skye ba 'dzind par 'gyur // sngon gyi las rnams rjes su dran 'gyur zhing // dran nas mkhas pa sdig pa byed kyi 'gyur// kyi'i byang chub sems dpa'as mdo sde 'di// 'and pa des ni
24b8(mdo): bsod nams yang tu thob// de ni lha rnams kun gyis bsrung bar 'gyur// de'i lus 'di la ni nad kyi 'byung // de'i rgyal srid kun la gnod kyi 'byung / khyim dang grong dang grong khyer zhi bar 'gyur// 
25a1(mdo): gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni rtag 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzod ni rtag 'dzind 'gyur// gang zhig mchod cing brjed dang 'dri 'jug dang / las gzhan myed par nyan du 'jug pa ni// des ni sangs rgyas
25a2(mdo): yang dag la tshad bar 'byung // de la ni byang chub gyu nga tu mtshog rtags 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yad mo can gyis 'di skad ces gso yad to// bcom ldan 'ad/ 
25a3(mdo): bdag ni 'di la the tsom skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das ji lus 'dis rgyal srid kyis longs spyod pa bslabs ngas/ slar yang sdug bsngal bslab par 'gyur ram/ 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ skyo bar gyi 'gyur ro/ 
25a4(mdo): skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang dgas 'dond pa dang / sdug 'astsal ba dang / yid kyi dade ban/ mas myong bar 'gyur zhingapa/ ji ltar skye/ dza ltar 'dzub
25a5(mdo): ji ltar 'tsho// ji ltar 'de ba bsgrub par 'gyur/ ji ltar gyunabasngal myong bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ltad mo can la 'di skad
25a6(mdo): ces bka' stsal to// ltad yo cad 'di ni las kyi rkye nang yin par blta'o// rigs kyi bu gang 'di la gang yang skye ba byed/ 'chi ba byed/ 'tsho ba byed de// rigs kyi bu 'di la rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i rkye
25a7(mdo): cing / 'tsho ba'i khams mi rtag tu lus kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas so// yang las kyi kye dang dang / las kyi gzhi pa skye ba sna tshogs su 'ongs shing 'phos nas bde ba dang / sug bsngal myong bar 'gyu
25a8(mdo): te/ bde ba la bde bar 'du shes/ sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal du 'du shes/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa la/ bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i 'a
25b1(mdo): shes bskyed mod kyi/ lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'dra ba'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'dra ba'i chos can du gyurd kyi bar du/ skyo ba'i sems bskyed par myi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ 
25b2(mdo): dper na skyes bu la la zhig gos sar pa gyon te/ des de gyon nas las thams cad byed cing bde ba dang sdug bsngal yang myong bar 'gyur ro// yang dus gzhan zhig na kos de snyings shing mugs te/ dri ma can
25b3(mdo): mthar shad par gyur pa dang / des de dong ba'i chos can du shes nas bor ro// bo nas yang gos sar pa gsar ma gzhan zhig btsald te/ kyo dang to// des de gyod nas yang las byed cing / bde ba dang sdug bsngal myong ma
25b4(mdo): gyu da nas dong dam pa'i gos phra zhing btan la gyi shigs shing chod pa byon par gyur gyi ba \u0f7f/ gcig nas gcig tu chud 'di lta bus ban ma pa tu pa 'das kyang kos da bgom lo 'am/ 
25b5(mdo): bor ro zhes kyi rtog rnam par gyi tog gi// de ni lus kyi dbang tu/ 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du gang gi tshe 'tsho ba'i khams das lus 'jig pa dang 'brel ba'i mthar gyur par ma'ong
25b6(mdo): de'i tshe lus de bor nas/ yang sad pa gzhon nu gzhan btsal te/ de de'i las byed cing de bgos nas/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar rang gi bsod nams las skyes pa'i gos de 'jam
25b7(mdo): ba dang / sra ba dang / rtsub pa'i bgo ba de bzhin du/ 'tsho ba'i khams kyis bgo ba lta bu'i lus blangs te/ ji ltar rang gi las kyi kye rad kyi dge' ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa bzhin du lha dang rgyal po dang / 
25b8(mdo): sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su skye bar 'gyur to// lus de yang 'tsho ba'i khams kyi dbang gis 'gro zhing 'tsho ba'i khams kyi yongs su brta ya
26a1(mdo): gyi rton rnam par ni rtog go/ rigs kyi lu de bzhin du lus gos lta bur blta bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sAl ni las kyi rkye nad kyis dus mthar thund pa de bor nas ra gi lus kyi
26a2(mdo): gzugs kyis 'gro zhing 'ong ste/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal myong bar gyur kyang shudad pa de myi tog rnam par gyi rtog go// de bzhin du 'tsho ba'i khams ni sbrul lta bur blta'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/
