144b1(mdo): tog ga pa de gshegs khyod sa rin cen rnams kyis mchod / rdo'i snying po ma snying du bu gang / sna tshogs snying po dwa mying ror bu gapa/ rin po me dang nyi ma tha ba'i 'od// khyod kyi sku'i 'od kyis zil du chag/ thub pa khyed kyi mu 'ad btan/ 
144b2(mdo): par ni// sa bcu'i bar la gnas pa myi dmyigs so// 'jig rten mo khyod sa la bzhugs kyang go// rdzu 'phrul yon tan srid pa'i rtser gnas mthong // rgyal ba'i 'khor rnams thams cad re res kyang // rgyal ba rang rang
144b3(mdo): mdun na bzhugs par shes// thams cad phyogs nas mngon gsum mngon par yang // kun nas sgo nas mtshungs pa myed pa mthong // la las bzhugs dang man lad dang 'chag pa dang // 'khor rnams la las bde gshegs
144b4(mdo): gsung ba dang // myi gsung bzhugs shing bsam gtan dgyes pa dang // mtshungs myed khyod kyi spyod lam mtha' yas mthong // khyod kyi ba spu/ re nas 'od gzer mchog/ btang ma thag tu phyogs bcu thams cad rgyas/ 
144b5(mdo): rgyal ba'i sku ni pad ma'i 'byung gnas 'dra// bsam pa ci bzhin yid kyi dka' bar mdzad// bden la gnas shing rtag tu bde ba dgyes bden pa lhur mdzad ci gsung de bzhin mdzad// chos kyi 'byung gnas don
144b6(mdo): dang 'dul la mkhas// yon tan kun mthar phyind la phyag 'tshas lo// de nas bu mo rlis chen gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshogs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'ang
144b7(mdo): skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ zhus nas zhu ba lung bstand pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na/ bdag 'dus pa'i le'u// chos kyi rnam grangs las/ bka' mchid
144b8(mdo): kyi rlud 'ga' zhis bsams te bu'o// mam ldan 'das kyis bka' sa pa / bu mo khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la ci dang mi 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bsanang pas khyod kyi sem sa rangs par bya'o// 
145a1(mdo): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i skabs bye ba dang / bu mo ron chen gyis bcom ldan 'das sa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji skar da/ byang chub sems dpa' bder par sla ba rnams lags// / de bzhin
145a2(mdo): gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bden par gsung ba ni gang lag pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltaman/ byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba rnams lags// de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos gsungs
145a3(mdo): pa ni ka lags// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' don smra ba rnams lags// de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la don tu gsungs pa ni gang lags// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
145a4(mdo): 'dul ba smra ba rnams lags// de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems da dpa' rnams la 'dul bar gsungs pa ni gang lags pa/ de nas bcom da ldan 'das kyis bu mo rin cen la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ bu mo
145a5(mdo): legs so legs so// khyod kyi rtog pa 'thad po// dri ba tshul bzhin yin no/ spobs pa dge'o// / bu mo de bas ma legs pa nyon la yid la dru ngashig dang / ngas khyobs bshad do// bu mo rini cen gyis bcom ldan 'ad
145a6(mdo): la legs so zhes gsol te// bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' saHlang to// bu mo gsum po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas la gyi
145a7(mdo): slu ba dang / bdag kyi slu ba dang / sems can thams cad la myi slu ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dang / bdag dang / sems can thams cad la slu ba ji lta bu zhe na/ te gal te byang chub sems dpa' bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
145a8(mdo): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dod par byed cing smon te// mngon par dga' ba de lta bu ni bu mo// byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dang / bdag dang / sems can thams cad la slu ba'o// bu mo
145b1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dang / bdag dang / sems can thams cad la myi slu ba ji lta bu zhe na/ bu mo gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bdud dang dmyigs pa can thams cad kyis ci tsam du tshegs
145b2(mdo): phyung zhing / ci tsam du gnod pa byas pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis tho bsams shing / ci bris shing 'bral bar byed cing / ral gri dang / mdung thung dang mtshon che gnyis pas phug pa dang / ma thob pa dang / ma grags dang smad pa dang
145b3(mdo): sdug bsngal bas kyang myi g.yo/ myi 'khrul rnam par myi 'phrul myi zhum/ sgyid lug par myi 'gyur/ myi skrag/ kun tu myi skrag/ kun tu skrag par myi 'gyur/ yi mug par myi 'gyur/ 'gyod par myi 'gyur bar thog ma'i lhag pa'i bas
145b4(mdo): ba de yang myi gtong zhing brtan por yang dag par 'dzin la/ byang chub kyi sem das rin po che bskyed pa dang / 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi
145b5(mdo): skyabs dang / 'gon dang / dpung gnyen gyi sems bskyed pa dang / mtshungs pa/ myed cing 'dra ba myed pa'i sems bskyed pa de las kyang / nyams myi nus te/ theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa'i sems can 'ga' yang myi skyed par
145b6(mdo): sangs rgyas dran pa chos kyi 'khor lo rton/ sems can thams cad mngon du byed/ stobs nye bar ston da/ mthu skyed par byed/ mas kyis rnam par gnon/ brtson 'grus gom ste/ pha rol gi tshig gis gnod par myi nus pa de lta bu ni
145b7(mdo): bu mo byang chub sems dpal sangs rgyas dang / bdag dang / sems can thams cad la myi slu ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dang / bdag dang / sems can thams cad la myi slu ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bdes pa
145b8(mdo): mchog go// de rnam pa bzhis sangs rgyas la gyi sku ste/ brtan pa dang / mthu dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus tu la pa'o// de nam pa bzhis bdag la gyi sgra ste/ bsam pa dang / skrag pa'i bsam pa dang / g.yo byed pa dang / sgyu myed do/ 
146a1(mdo): de rnam pa bzhis sems can thams cad kyi su ste/ sbyor ba dang / byams pa dang / snying dang / sdud pa ste/ bu mo gang 'di byang chub kyi sems yongs myi gtong zhing / sngon dam bcas pa las myi nyams pa 'di ni
146a2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la 'jug pa dang po'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa ni gang 'di dag/ bsdams pa dang / ngag bsrungs pa dang / ngag 'khrul pa myed pa dang tshig bden pa ste/ de gcig pu
146a3(mdo): yang ru skye bo mang po'i nang du gnas kyang rung / tshig bden par smra ste/ de rgyal srid kyi phyir yang brdzun gyi tshig myi smra/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di rin po ches rab tu bkang bas khrid kyang brdzun gyi
146a4(mdo): tshig myi smra'o// bu mo de la byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa ni rnam pa su bcu rtsa gnyis yongs su dag pa ste/ rnam pa sum bcu \u0f7f gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ngo tsha shes pa'i rnam pa ste/ yon tan gyi ni
146a5(mdo): pa dang / khrel yod pa'i rnam pa dang / nyes pa'i rnam pa dang / bcos ma ma yin pa'i rnam pa dang / ma smad pa'i rnam pa dang / myi dmyig sa pa'i rnam pa dang / lhas rnam par rig pa'i rnam pa dang / 'jig
146a6(mdo): pa myed pa'i rnam pa dang / ngan 'gro gcod pa'i rnam pa dang / bde 'gro 'byed pa'i rnam pa dang / 'phags pa'i skye bo mngon par dga' ba'i rnam pa dang / mo khas pas mchod par 'os pa'i rnam pa dang / nang dag pa'i rnam pa dang / 
146a7(mdo): phyi rol legs par byas pa'i rnam pa dang / bzung bar 'os pa'i tshig gi rnam pa dang / zang bar 'os pa'i tshig gi rnam pa dang / tshig myi brlang ba'i rnam pa dang / 'jam pa'i tshig gi rnam pa dang / khyad par can gyi rnam pa dang / Sha hri
146a8(mdo): rab tu zhi ba'i tshig gi rnam pa dang / bka' gro bde ba'i nas pa dang / su pa byed pa'i rnam pa dang / gdung ba skyed pa'i rnam pa dang / dga' zhing ma chog tu dga' ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag la nges par sems pa'i das pa dang / gzhan
146b1(mdo): la nges par sems pa'i rnam pa dang / 'khrul pa myed pa'i rnam pa dang / kha na ma tho la byed pa'i rnam pa dang / sbyin pa'i gnas kyi rnam pa dang / sangs rgyas mnyes par byed pa'i rnam pa dang / bder pa'i rjes su mthun pa la dag
146b2(mdo): rab tu 'thob pa'i rnam pa ste// bu mo 'di dag ni bden pa'i rnam pa/ yongs su dag pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis so// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa ni/ gang dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o// de tsam
146b3(mdo): phyir med pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa la mos pa dag gi yid kyi/ ser snga can dag gi ma yin gyi/ 'di ni de'i dam bcas pa'o// gang bdog thams cad yongs su gtong bar kun tu spang ba 'dir de'i bden pa'o// 
146b4(mdo): byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dag gis na gyi/ ngang tshul ngan pa dag gi ma yin gyi/ 'di ni de'i dam dacas pa'o// / gang tshul khrims yongs su dag par kun tu sdang ba 'di
146b5(mdo): ni de'i bden pa'o// / byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa'i sto/ bas rab tu thob pa dag gi yin gyi/ gnod sems can ngag ni ma yin te/ 'di ni de'i dam bcas pa'o// gang bzod pa dang des
146b6(mdo): par kun tu snang ba 'a 'di ni de'i bden pa'o// byang chub ni byang chub sems da pa' brtson 'grus batshams pa dag gi yin gyi/ le lo can dag gi ma yin gyi/ 'di ni dam bcas pa'i// gang dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad bsno
146b7(mdo): bar kun tu snang ba 'di ni de'i bden pa'o// byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan tu ga nas pa dag gi yin gyi/ sems g.yeng ba dag gi me yin te/ 'di ni dam bcas pa'o// gang bsam gtan gyi yan lag
146b8(mdo): yang dag par bsgrub par kun tu snang ba 'di ni de'i bden pa'o// byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang ldan pa dag gi yin te/ shes rab 'chal pa dag gi ma yin te/ 'di ni de'i dam bcas pa'o// gang shes rab dang / 
147a1(mdo): ye shes kun tu spang ba de 'i de'i bden pa'o// gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / tshangs pa'i gnas dang / mngon par shes pa dang / zhi ba dang / 
147a2(mdo): zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la yang de bzhin no// byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos thams cad dang bdag gi yin gyi'o/ dge ba'i rnam par spangs pa dag gis yin te/ 'di ni de'i dam bcas pa'o// gang dge ba'i/ 
147a3(mdo): chos thams cad la kun tu snang ba 'di ni de'i bden pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang 'phags pa'i rnam pa'i bden pa de la byang chub sems dpa' brtson par bya ste/ gang 'di sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba spong ba dang / 'gog pa
147a4(mdo): shes pa dang / lam sgom pa'o// de la sdug bsngal shes pa ni gang phung po rnams la rang bzhin gyis myi skye bar shes pa'o// kun 'byung / da pa spong ba ni sred pa gang gis phung po rnams yang dag par 'grub par
147a5(mdo): 'gyur ba'i srid pa shi nad tu myi 'byung zhing chags pa dang bral ba mngon pa rka' ba myed pa ste/ gang mngon par dga' ba myed pa de ni gdod ma nas 'ong ba myed pa'o// gang gdod ma nas 'ong ba myed pa de ni
147a6(mdo): chos nyid ma spangs pa'o// gang chos nyid ma spangs pa de ni kun 'byung spang ba'o// de la 'gog pa shes pa ni gang mtshan ma dang / dmyigs pa shi nad tu zad cing 'gags pa ste/ gang 'gag pa'i tshe dngos po 'jig par 'gyur
147a7(mdo): pa yang myed la dngos po yod pa dang / dngos po myed pa mtshungs shing / mnyam par gyurd pa'i chos thams cad la gang mnyam par mthong ba ni 'gog pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// de la lam ni gang mnyam par lta zhing mnyam
147a8(mdo): bar sbyor ba/ myi rtog pa'i myi mnyam pa mtshan nyid ma yin pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi tshol ba/ bdag gi byed pa/ yongs su 'dzind pa byed pa/ send pa byed pa// ma byas pa/ rnam par ma byas pa/ 'di ni
147b1(mdo): lam zhes bya'o// 'di la gang bden pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes dang / sems yang dag par thob par byed kyang / bdag mngon sum du myi byed pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// bden pa bstand pa 'di bshad pa/ 
147b2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' khris bden pa shes pa yongs su bsgom pa'i bzod pa ba thob bo// bu mo de la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos spa yin zhe na/ gang gi tshe chos la rton par 'gyur ba dang / chos smra ba dang / chos som/ 
147b3(mdo): ba dang / chos bsam pa dang / chos spyod yul ba dang / chos spyod pa dang / chos don tu gnyer ba dang / chos 'dod pa dang / chos la dga' bas dka' ba mos pa dang / chos kyi dpung dang / chos kyi rtog pa dang / chos kyi mtshon
147b4(mdo): dang / chos gi go ma bgos pa dang / chos kyi ya yang bgos pa dang / ro das kyi spang ba dang / chos kyi mar me dang / chos kyi dran pa dang / dachos kyi blo thos dang / chos rtogs pa dang / chos dpyod pa dang / chos ma
147b5(mdo): sbyor ba dang / chos myod par gyur pa dang / chos kyis nyal ba dang rjes kyi spyod lam dang / chos srung ba dang / chos kyi ro dang / chos kyi zad pa dang / chos rgyache ba dang / chos kyi bya ba byed pa dang / com
147b6(mdo): lus dang / chos kyi ga dang / chos kyi yid la byed pa kyi gtong ba ste/ sa myong ba rnam pa 'dig bu ldan pa de na chos smra ba yin te/ chos ma yin pa smrab ma yin no// de la 'os smra ba gang yin zhes/ bden pa gang yin pade da
147b7(mdo): bar smra ba dang / sangs rgyas la bsngags pa smra ba dang / chos la srung ba smra ba dang / dge 'dun la tha ma dang / sri shu bya bar smra ba dang / byang chub kyi sems la mos par bya ba bsnyad pa smra ba dang / bsam pa myi 'dor bar smra ba dang
147b8(mdo): lhag pa'i bsam pa la dmyigs pa smra ba dang / sbyor ba myi nyams par smra ba dang / 'phags pa rnams kyi lta ba smra ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen pa smra ba dang / nga rgyas myed pas gus pa dang / ri mo bya ba smra ba dang / rtag tu
148a1(mdo): ma lba ba dang / byas pa 'a'o ba dang / byas pa shes pa dang / byas pa chud kyi gson pa smra pa dang nam gyi ma na pa dang / danon pas ldan pa myed par lbab dang / 'phags pa'i rigs mnyas pa smra ba dang / sbyangs pa'i yor
148a2(mdo): can gyi smra ba dang / dges mas kyi mam sa 'dug pa snga' dang / sprin rje ldanapa sgyub dang / tha chu tubs su gyu kyis khrims kyi des palta ba dang / bzod pa'i stobs su ba dang / bso 'das
148a3(mdo): kyi bum pa skyed pa snga pa dang / bsapa gtan gyi rab tu ba sgra pa dang / dashes rab kyi 'ong du chud pa sngam dang kyi yongs sugs dbar byed pa smra ba dang / byams pa'i skyabs smra ba dang / snying rje'i
148a4(mdo): dang mngo pa shes pa rnams kyi bskyed pa lnga ba dang / cod pa rnams kyichos ltapa dang / chom gyi mngongs pa rtsom shing badrang bar smrab dang / dran pa ci ba gzhags rnams kyi dran pa brjed pa byed pa sba ba dang / sad
148a5(mdo): spong ba kyas kyi ya dag pa zhi tad bya ba dang / chu'agyu gyigang sa rnams kyi mngon par sred pa smra ba dang / dbang pornams byin pag pa dang / thobs rnams kyi kyi rtsub smra ba dang / kyang chub kyi nas garnams kyi pa
148a6(mdo): gam ma mas dang / sa ma tshul pa skab nga / niganas kyi 'drug pa slab dang / snyan ma ming ga pa'idags sa sla da / rig pa dang rnam par thos pa la sa lugasas par byed pa blam dang / la gyi / 
148b1(mdo): lis li ji lta ba smra ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa stod pa smra la dang / theg pa chen po'i yon tam zan yongs su bsgrags pa smra ba dang / rton cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i lugs dang mthun pa sla ba dang / zong / 
148b2(mdo): pa nyid la skrag pa myed par smra ba dang / mtshan ma myed pas bsnyad pa smra ba dang / smon pa myed pa la so sor rtog pa smra ba dang / phung po rnams la sgyu mar bstand pa smra ba dang / khams rnams la nam mkha'i khams dang / 
148b3(mdo): mtshungs pa nyid smra ba dang / skye mched rnams la rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid smra ba dang / nor bdun smra ba dang / rjes su dran pa drug smra ba dang / gus pa dang bcas pa smra ba dang / yang dag par dka' bar bya ba smra ba dang / 
148b4(mdo): mngon par shes pa drug smra ba dang / pha rol tu phyind pa drug smra ba dang / myig lnga smra ba dang / don dam pa smra ba dang / kun rdzob la 'dradag pa smra ba dang / legs par byas pa'i las smra ba dang / sems can
148b5(mdo): thams cad la sems snyoms pa smra ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dra/ sa cad kyi yon tan dang / bsngags pa chad byed pa sba ba'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba ni bdag tu snga
148b6(mdo): ba ma yin/ sems can du smra ba ma yin/ srog tu smra ba ma yin/ gang zag tu spro ba ma yin/ chad par smra ba ma yin/ rtag par smra ba ma yin/ 'byung bar lta ba smra ba ma yin/ 'jig par lta bar smra ba ma yin/ mtha'
148b7(mdo): las lend pa smra ba ma yin/ dbus la mngon par zhend pa ma yin/ myi mthun pa smra ba ma yin/ 'gal ba smra ba ma yin/ phod pa smra ba ma yin/ phyogs yongs su 'dzind pa smra ba ma yin/ dmyigs pa smra ba ma
148b8(mdo): yin/ lta ba kun nas bkris pa dang / the tsom dang / sgrib pa dang / chod pa dang / bka la nyal ba dang / khong khro ba spab pa yin/ chos dang 'gal ba smra ba ma yin/ chos 'jig pa smra ba ma yin// chos spong ba sla bas
149a1(mdo): chos la mngon par chos sems su byed pa smra ba ma yin/ chos la log par 'jug pa smrab ma yin te/ chos smra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos kyi rjes su malen pa'i chos sgrub pa smra ba dang / yang dag par/ 
149a2(mdo): sba ba dang / chos sba ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis myi tshugs par sba ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba ni/ chos thams cad snang ba dang / 'breld pas phyis bsrung bar dka' ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa
149a3(mdo): chos smra ba ni/ dbyigs pa myed pa'i khyod yul bas stong pa nyid smra ba ma yin/ myi 'khrug pa'i chos can pas/ mtshan ma myed pa smra ba ma yin/ khams gsum dang ma 'dres pas smon pa myed pa smra ba ma yin/ 'dus byas kyi
149a4(mdo): skyon mthong bas mngon par 'du myi byed pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' tshe ngas smra ba ni/ chos kyi don rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir skye ba myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa smra ba yin no// bu mo chos shes bya ba ni rjod du myed pa
149a5(mdo): yi ge myed pa snyam du myed pa/ slar myed pa/ gzugs myed pa/ bstan tu/ myed pa/ thogs pa myed pa/ rnam par rig pa ma yin pa/ rnam par/ shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes
149a6(mdo): pa dang bral ba/ rdul myed pa/ rdul dang bral ba/ 'dod chags dang bral ba/ mun pa myed pa sdang ba myed pa/ bdag gi myed pa/ yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa/ 'dzind pa ma yin pa/ 'dzind pa dang bral ba/ yul myed pa/ yul
149a7(mdo): ma yin pa/ yul thams cad dang ma 'dres pa/ zhi ba grol ba/ lta ba dka' ba/ khong du chud pa dga' la/ rtog ge ma yin pa/ rtog ges myi chud pa/ 'phags pa mkhas pas shes shing rtogs pa/ tshor ba myed pa/ tshor ba thams
149a8(mdo): cad kyi rgyun bcad pa/ ji lta ba bzhin du rus gsum stong pa/ 'chi 'pho myed pa/ 'pho bar 'gyur ba ma yin/ 'pho ba myed pa/ skye ba myed pa/ phum sum tshogs pa ma yin pa/ rgyud ma yin pa/ 'byung ba myed pa/ 'jig pa myed
149b1(mdo): sbyor babyed pa ga pa byed pa/ 'dra ba byed pa/ mtshungs pa byed pa phyim nyam pa dang mnyam pa kyi bdes pa myi brdzun pa/ bden pa byed pa sug bsngas byed pa/ 'du ba byer pa 'bral ba skyed pa/ ldan
149b2(mdo): byed pa/ myi ldan bskyed pa myong byed pa/ gzugs myed pa'o sgo dar ba byed pa/ snying po myed pa/ ma yin par dbyer byed pa ste/ dar byed pa ma yin pa/ de rje ma yin pa/ 'phags pa'i mtshan nyid
149b3(mdo): ma yin pa/ de kho na de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa nyid/ ring ba do/ yin pa/ nye ba ma yin pa/ 'dog myed pa rtog pa byed pa/ rnabs myed pa/ mtshan ma myed pa/ 'di ni ma yin pa/ pham yin/ 
149b4(mdo): demam ma yin pa/ gzhan las ma yin pa/ nang ma yin pa/ phyi ma yin pa/ gnyi ga ma yin pa// gzhan ma yin pa/ gzhan ma yin pa yang ma yin pa/ gzhan dang gzhan ma yin pa yang ma yin pa/ mthong ba byed pa/ 
149b5(mdo): zos pa myed pa/ dran pa myed pa/ brjed pa myed pa/ shes pa myed pa/ rnam par shes pa myed pa/ rnam par shes par bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/ grangs myed pa/ grangs myed pa ma yin pa/ grangs thams cad
149b6(mdo): bral ba ste/ bu mo 'di ni chos shes bya'o// gang 'dra ba'i chos skad dang / brda sna tshogs kyis 'chad cing / yang dag par rab tu stond pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba zhes bya'o// gzhan ya rmosma smra ba thams cad
150b1(mdo): gzhanas smon pa ma yin no// keng bag la sdang dang / chos la spang bar myi byed do// mdo sde dang mdo sde 'gas par gyi byed do// 'dul bas 'dus pa yim par myi byed da tsham nyid dang 'gas par gyi byed do// 
150b2(mdo): tshul bzhin sbyong tha'i chos gung la yang chom su yin par myi mthong ngo // brgyal gyis nga rgyal 'phel bar myi byed do// chom las nyams pa yang yin no// byas pa chud kyi gson pa ma yin no// bag sa nyas kyi 'dzi nang to// sti spangs
150b3(mdo): rjes su chags pa ma yin no// gi steng byed pa sa khong khro ma yin no// mdza' ba dang myi mdza' ba la gnyis kyi 'du shes kyi skyed do// rgyu dang 'bras bu chung kyig yor no// chom smra ba ni las kyi rnam par sbyin pa la myi mos pa ma yin na/ 
150b4(mdo): kyi yis byar / sa so// ga sa byed / pas la pa byed do// chos sna 'jig zhan la ra 'a
150b5(mdo): pa'i phyir dgon par gnas pa ma yimado// 'thob pa 'dod paphyir 'dod pa chung ba sa ston pas yin// 'a ldan pa 'dod pa pa yin na// chob lta ba rnams rgyas
150b6(mdo): rgyab gzhan gyim byas par bya rgya/ khyim nyim par med par rgyamams// no bdun rung bar mi byed do// ga ba rgya yin no// pa'i rig sa gcod pa sa yin do// gnan gyi yon nas du sa par ba
150b7(mdo): bdag gi yang tan brjod pa ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi mas cad yod par gnod pa ma yin no// chos smra ba ni shig pa chen po'i bsngags pa brjod pas kyi 'ams te// de'i phyir mchom ldam zhes rgya'o// 
150b8(mdo): sa byang sa ma pa das ma/ da cis byam ma nabya sa
151a1(mdo): 'gro ba ni don to gzhen byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ni don to// sbyin pas rnam par sbyin pa la myi re ba ni don to// sems can rnams bde ba myong bar byed pa ni don to// tshul khris
151a2(mdo): las nyams par myi byed pa de ni don to// bzod pas ma smas pa de ni don to// brtson 'grus kyis dgos pa thams cad mthar phyin pa ni don to// bsam gtan gis nye bar zhi ba ni don to// shes rab kyis the tsom myed pa ni don to// 
151a3(mdo): byams las sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa yi don to// snying rjes sems can thams cad kyi tso bye ba byed pa ni don to// dga' bas mchog la dka' zhing mos pa ni don to// btang snyoms kyis bde ba dang sdug bsngal
151a4(mdo): thams cad myi byed pa ni don to// sbyin pas 'gyod pa myed pa ni don to// snyan par smra bas khong khro ba myed pa ni don to// don byed pas chos dang ldan pa'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni don to// don
151a5(mdo): mthun pas sems can rnams theg pa chen po yang dag par 'dzind du'ajug pa ni don to// bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams kyis sems rnayongs su smyin par byed pa ni don to// 'du byed thams cad myi rtag
151a6(mdo): ba dang sdug bsngal ba ni don to// chos thams cad bdag myed pa ni don to// nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi ba ni don to// chog 'bru las don rton pa ni don to// rnam par shes pa las ye shes las rton pa ni don to// mdo sde
151a7(mdo): thams cad las nges pa'i don gis mdo sde la rton pa mngon to// srog dang gang zag gi sgra las chos nyid la rton pa ni don to// don so so yang dag par rig pas bstan gyi zad pa ni don to// chom ma so yang dag par rig pas
151a8(mdo): chas kyi rgyangs 'as pa byed pa ni dan to// ngang pa mngon sa gas gas ga pa zung ba sum tsha lazhes kyis su 'jug pa ma dang ta/ thabs tham ma yang dag par dan lam mtshags pa chas gnang pa ngas
151b1(mdo): to// sbyin pa'i tshogs kyis myi ngoms pa'i don to// tshul khrims kyi tshogs las smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni don to// thos pa'i cho ga las nan tan snying por byed pa ni don to// bsod nams kyi tshogs las
151b2(mdo): mtshan yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni don to// ye shes kyi tshogs las sem rnathams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa ni don to// zhi gnas kyi tshogs las sems las su rung ba ni don to// lhag mthong na
151b3(mdo): tshogs las rig pa dang rnam par grol ba ni don to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis dran pa nye bar gnas pa ni don to// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis dge ba'i chos thams cad skyed pa ni don to// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa nas
151b4(mdo): kyis phyogs bcu bgrod pa ni ngon to// dran pa nya ba dbang po rnams dkyis tshig rab tu 'byed pa mi ngon to// stobs rnams kyis nyan dmongs pa thams cad 'dus pa ni don to// byang chub kyi yam lag nas
151b5(mdo): kyi chos thams cad khong du chud pa ni don to// lam gis chos thams cadamyi 'khrugs pa ni don to// stobs rnams kyis nyan mongs pa tha mas cad 'dul ba na ngan te// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chas
151b6(mdo): mngon par shes pa rnams las shind tu nyams pa myed pa ni don to// de ltar na gang chos rnam pa 'di lta bu las don rab tu myong ba de ni 'di ltar don smra ba yin te/ don ma yin pa smra ba ma yin no// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
151b7(mdo): dod smra ba yin no// bu mo gzhan yang dmyigs par lta ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir stong pa nyid kyi don to// byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid du smra ba ni don smra ba yin no// rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs/ 
151b8(mdo): pa'i phyir mtshan ma byed pa'i don na don te byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma myed pa smra ba ni don smra ba yin no// khams gsum pa thams cad kyi gyod lam dang bral ba'i phyir/ smon pa myed pa'i don ni don te// byang chub sems
152a1(mdo): dpal smon pa byed pa smra ba ni/ dor smra ba yin no// de bzhin du bsdus te 'du byed thams cad kyi rgyur gcad pa'i phyir// mngon param 'du gyi byed pa'i don na don to// skye ba thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i phyir skye ba myed pa'i don ni
152a2(mdo): don to/ skye ba nye bar len pa'i skye ba thams cad kyi skye myi 'byung ba don ni don to// byang chub sems dpa' myi skye ba smra ba ni dor smra ba yin no// sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang / lam dang / 'gog pa'i don ni don te/ 'gog pa
152a3(mdo): smra ba dang / chos thams cad la gang zag myed pa'i don ni don te/ gang zag myed pa sba ba dang / skad dang tshig thams cad brjod du byed pa'i don na don te/ brjod du byed pa smra ba dang / brtul zhugs thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
152a4(mdo): bya ba'i phyir bden pa'i don ni don te/ bden pa smra ba dang / byang chub kyi phyog das chos thams cad la bka yod pa'i don ni don te/ bag yod pa ste dab dang / thos pa'i don thams cad la nan tan byed pa'i don ni don te
152a5(mdo): nan tan byed pa'i sme ba dang / theg pa thams cad theg pa chen po'i don ni don ti/ byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po smra ba ni don smra ba yin te/ bu mo gzhan yang dbyer myed pa'i don ni don to// sems can myed
152a6(mdo): pa'i don ni don to// ro gcig pa'i don na don to// tha dad pa myed pa'i don ni don to// tshul gcig pa'i don ni don to// tshig myed pa'i don ni don to/ myi zad pa'i don ni don to/ myi srid pa'i den ni don to/ myi ste myi 'byung
152a7(mdo): ba'i don ni don to/ 'ong ba myed pa dang / 'gro ba myed pa'i don no don to// myi skye myi 'gag pa'i don ni don to// rjes su 'gro ba'i don ni don to// dge ba myed cing bzhag pa myed pa'i don ni don to// mngon par 'du byed pa'i
152a8(mdo): don ni don to// 'dus ma byas pa'i don ni don to// sgo btags pa byed pa'i don ni don to// rnam par rig pa myed pa'i don ni don to// 'khor gsum yongs su sbyor ba'i don ni don to// dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi
152b1(mdo): don na don to// 'khor gsum dri ma byed pa'i don na ngon to/ 'gog pa byed pa'i don na don to/ 'jig pa byed pa'i don na don to/ thun mong ma yin pa'i don ni don to// yongs su gdung ba byed pa'i don na ngon to// nye ba
152b2(mdo): yi ba'i don ni ngon to// 'dre ba byed pa'i don ni don to// rgyub byed pa'i don mngon to// gzung ba myed pa'i don na ngon to// sngon gi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mthal yongs su ma chad pa'i don ni don to// gyi 'khrugs pa'i dzin
152b3(mdo): na don to// chos dang chos ma yin pa la rnam par gyi rtog pa'i ngom mngon to// mtha' dang mtha' myed pa dang / chad pa dang / rtag pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la 'jug pa'i don ningon to/ yi ge dang nges pa'i cho ga dang
152b4(mdo): sgra dang tshig gi lam thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du nan tan du bya ba dang / khong du chud par bya ba'i don ni don to/ sems dang yid dang rnam par zhes pa dang / spros pa la myi rgyu ba'i don ni don to// 
152b5(mdo): 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mongs pa rnam par myi rtog/ pa'i don ni don to// chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de tha myi dad cing sA tshogs myed pa'i don ni don to// stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa
152b6(mdo): dang / smon pa byed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba byed pa'i don no don to// don dam pa'i bden pa'i don na don to// gzhan ka dro la gyi 'jog pa'i don ni don to// rnam par rig pa myed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni ngon to// 
152b7(mdo): shind tu btags pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to// sdug bsngal ba'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to// dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to// gnas pa myed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to// don bya ba ma rung bar myi byed/ 
152b8(mdo): pa'i don ni don to// dper myed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to// de kho na dang de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa'i de kho na'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to// shin tu dul ba nges pa'i don gi mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to/ 
153a1(mdo): phung po smra ma'i mtshan nyid kyi don kyi don to// khams chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid kyi don mngon to// skye mched dben pa'i mtshan gyi don ni ngon to// nang nye bar zhi ba'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to// phyi ro long du sgrub byed
153a2(mdo): ba'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to// sbyin pa dul ba dang / nye bar zhi ba'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don do// bden par yang dag par slub myed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don na don to// nyon mongs pa thams cad ni yang ma yin pa'i don mngon
153a3(mdo): to/ rdo rje ltar sra zhing myi byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to// 'jig rten thams cad dang myi 'gal ba'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to// legs par byas pa shi nad tu mthar gtugs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don na don to// thams cad
153a4(mdo): kyi rjes su song ba khong du chud pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to// nam/ par tha rad pa'i slob pa myed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to// 'gro pa thams cad du yang dag par zhugs shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos thos rba
153a5(mdo): kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don kyi don to// mnyam pa dang rmyi mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par stond pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don ka den to/ ting nge 'dzind dang shes rab las nges par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid
153a6(mdo): kyi don ni don to// nas par grol ba'i ye shes mthong pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to// ye shes kyi rgyu mthun pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to// btags pa rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don na don to// yang dag pa'i zhes
153a7(mdo): bas lam 'debs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don mngon to// don thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to// byang chub sems dpa' ga pa don 'di lta bu dang ldan pas don gang bstand de dag thams cad na ngan bstan dang
153a8(mdo): ste/ de'i phyir don sba ba zhes bya'o// bu mo de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba smra ba yin zhe na/ 'dul ba ni de bzhin gshegs pas gnyis su gsungs te// gnyis gang zhe na/ srung ba 'dul ba dang / 
153b1(mdo): nyon mongs pa 'dul ba'o// de la kung lani ker/ ltung ba 'dul ba ni ga pa zhen/ srung ba zhes bya ba ni yongs su rtog pa rtsa ba las byung ba/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba/ ma rig pa'i ma lasas byung ba/ byin gyi
153b2(mdo): kyigyi rtsa ba las byung ba/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtse ba las byung ba/ yod pa ma yin pa'i rtse ba las byung ba 'jig tshogs kyi rtsertsa ba las byung ba/ sems can mngon par zhen pa'i rtse ba las byung ba/ 'gyod pa'i rtse ba las byung ba
153b3(mdo): 'byung ba ma yin pa'i rtse ba las byung ba/ the tsom kyi rtse ba las byung ba/ nand cing mongs pa'i rtse galas byung ba/ shes rab nyam chung ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba ste/ 'di ni srung ba zhes bya ste/ de la srung ba 'dul ba kang zhe na/ 
153b4(mdo): myed pa la rab tu gnas pas 'byung ba ste/ srung ba ni yul na gyi kan rnas pa/ phyogs na gyi gnas pa/ phung por ma gyur da pa/ gzu bab pa myed pa snang ba myed pa'o// sems gang kas srung bar gyur
153b5(mdo): pa de yang zad pa bral ba/ rnam par gyur pa/ yul na myi ga nas pa phyogs na myi gnas pa/ phung por ma gyur pa/ gzung ba myed pa/ snang ba myed pa'o// sems ji lta bar ltung ba yang de bzhin no// 
153b6(mdo): ltung ba ji lta bar chos thams cad kyang de bzhin te/ rtsa ba myed pa'o// myi gnas pa'o// gang sems la som nyi myed pa dang / rnyog pa myed pa dang / yang ba dang zhi ba dang / yongs su gdung ba myed pa dang / bsal ba dang / 
153b7(mdo): shind tu byang ba bla ma'i cho ga la mos pa dang / ka cig tu nges par the tsom myed cing gcig pu yid ches pa 'di ni ltung ba 'dul ba zhes bya'o// de la nyon mongs pa ni keng / nyon mongs pa 'dul ba ni gang zhe na/ nyon mongs pa zhes
153b8(mdo): bya ba ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang kati mug dang / ma rig pa dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis dang / gang dag la 'dus byas 'jug pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa zhes bya'o// de la nyon mongs pa/ 
154a1(mdo): 'dul ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ni shin tu dul ba'o// de ci'i phyir na/ chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyis dul ba ste/ de la 'dod chags kun tu rgya ba myed do// zhe sdang byed do// gti mug byed do// 
154a2(mdo): chos thams cad ni mtshan ma myed pas dul ba ste/ de la nyon mongs pa thams cad kun nas rgyu ba myed do// chos thams cad ni smon pa myed pas dul ba ste/ de la kun tu rgyu ba thams cad kun tu rgyu ba myed do// chos thams cad ni mngon par
154a3(mdo): 'du bya ba myed pas dul ba ste/ de la mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad kun tu rgyu ba myed pa'o// chos thams cad kyi rkyen kyi kha na las pa ste/ de la lta bar song ba thams cad kun tu rgyu ba myed do// gang rten cing 'brel par 'byung
154a4(mdo): ba'i chos thams cad la nges pa dang / yang dag pa kho na dang / nyon mong / rnas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa ma yin pa dang / shind tu zhi ba da dang / stong pa nyid gang gis byang chub stong pa nyid stong pa nyid des/ nyan
154a5(mdo): modzes pa thams cad stong par gang de ltar stong pa nyid khong du chud pa 'ang da no/ nyon mongs pa 'dul ba zhes me/ gang 'di skad snga de ni 'dul ba bla ba yin no/ bdag 'dus pa'i phyir 'dul zhing kang
154a6(mdo): bdag 'dul ba shes pa de ni nyon mongs pa 'dul ba shes pa'o// de la bdag 'dul ba gang zhe na/ gang bdag la bdag myed par shes pa dang / bdag gi ngo bo nyid shes pa dang / bdag dben par shes pa dang / bdag ji lta ba/ 
154a7(mdo): bzhin dang / bdag kyi 'khrugs pa dang / bdag stong pa nyid dang / bdag dngos po myed pa dang / bdag de bzhin nyid dang / bdag myi dmyigs pa dang / bdag rgod pa myed pa dang / bdag sgro btags pa myed pa dang / bdag
154a8(mdo): rtag tu skye ba myed par shes pa ste/ kang de ltar bdag shes pa de ni nyon mongs rnam pa thams cad du shes par bya'o// ji ltar bdag myed pa la bdag tu 'du shes phyi nad ci log pa de bzhin du/ nyon mongs pa myed pa la nyon
154b1(mdo): mongs par 'du shes phyi nad ci log go// ji ltar bdag rang bzhin gyis myed pa de bzhin du nyon mongs pa yang rang bzhin kyis myed pa ste/ gang de ltar lhag mthong gis shes pa de ni nyon mongs pa 'dul ba zhes bya'o// de la 'das
154b2(mdo): pa'i nyon mongs pa dul ba ma yin ma 'ongs pa ma yin pa/ da ltar byung ba'i ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun tu rgyu ba myed cing yid la byed pa myed pa ni nyon mongs pa dul ba'o// gang kun tu rgyu ba myed cing yid la byed pa
154b3(mdo): myed pa de ni/ 'das pa ma yin ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin no// ji ltar sems gzugs can ma yin te nang na ma yin/ phyi rol na ma yin gnyi ka myed pa la yang myi dmyigs pa de bzhin du/ nyon mongs pa
154b4(mdo): gzugs can ma yin te/ nang na ma yin/ phyir yod na ma yin/ kanyi dag byed pa la yang myi dmyigs so// gyi dmyigs pa'i phyir nyon dmongs pa thams cad ni gnod pa byed pa'o// zhi ba byed pa'o// bya ba byed
154b5(mdo): pa'o// rnam par bya ba myed pa'o// byed pa myed pa'o// rnam par byed pa myed pa'o// gang de ltar nyon mongs pa rnams 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa myed par shes pa 'di yang nyon mongs pa 'dul ba'o// bu mo
154b6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di ltar nyon mongs pa shin tu 'dul ba de gzhan dag gi nyon mongs pa 'ang 'dul ba'i phyir/ chos stond pas de'i phyir/ 'dul ba smra ba zhes bya'o// // bden pa bstand pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// 
154b7(mdo): bden pa dang chos dang / rdod dang 'dul ba bstand pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' khri gyi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so// bu mo ran cen tshim zhing mgu ste/ mi rangs shing rab tu dga' ba nas/ dgal ba dang yid
154b8(mdo): bde ba skyes te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das ci tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas bden pa dang / tshig dang / don dang / 'dul ba bstan pa 'di legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar ste/ bco ldan
155a1(mdo): 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di ster smra bar 'gyur ba de dag ni rtsod pa ma mchis pa lhur len pa ste/ sems can thams cad kyi rtsod pa spangs pa'i slad du chos stond par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri bus
155a2(mdo): bu mo rani can la 'di skad ces sbas so// bu mo khyod co bden pa dang / chos dang don dang 'dul ba smra ba yin nas/ bu mo rin can gyis smras pa/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu bden pa ni bsta nang du byed pa'o// chos ni 'dod chags dang bral ba
155a3(mdo): don ni brjod du byed pa'o// 'dul ba ni lus dang / sems dben pa ste/ de ni len gdab par myi nus so// btsun pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang bden pa ni 'gog pa'i bden pa'o// chos ni dben pa'i mtshan nyid do// don ni cho ga 'bru dang / 
155a4(mdo): bral ba'o// 'dul ba ni rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid de/ de ni brjod pas da san gdab par gyi nus so// btsun pan ri'i bu gzhan yang bde na ba ni de bzhin nyid do// cham ni gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do/ 
155a5(mdo): don ni gnyis su myed pa'i don to// 'dul ba ni bya ba med pa'i don te/ de brjod pa byed pa/ bstan du byed pa'o// me dang ldan pa na rim dum yang su ma rab cad la 'di skad ces blas so// chu ma khyod kyam ra
155a6(mdo): po chetshe 'dra ba zhig blangs na/ des khyod 'on ce zhes bya/ de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo rini cen gisi/ tshe dang ldan pan mi 'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa sha rol bu sum bcu rtsa gnyim po 'di dag ni/ byang chub
155a7(mdo): pa 'a rnams rgyam 'a ga sum du mas pa bskyed mtshan pom / pa dang / rang cadas byed paragang nes/ 'dis te 'an 'ams sa mangs su 'phrum
155a8(mdo): byed mas bgyid pa mab kyi dang / kyigadu bab nyi'i khams bapyod pa na pa sa dang / ma gyis kun tul ma pa mthod mtshan pa me nga/ dge 'dun na gam
155b1(mdo): sgrub pa rgyun gyi gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che dang / sems can thams cad 'phags pa'i bden pa la dkod pa'i byams pa chen po'i sems bskyed pa rin po che dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir sdug ba#
155b2(mdo): sems cad sel ba snying rje chen ma la sems bskyed padzin pa me dang / bdag pa thams cad yongs su btang ning / sems can ser lacan rnams sangs su phyin par bya ba'i phyir nang dang bya mdzangs pos gyi sa mam sems babyed mche
155b3(mdo): me dang / bdag kyang tshul khrims la gnas la rang tshul ngan pa'i sems can yongs su sbyin par byed pa lci 'i mam bskyed pa rin po dang / bzod pa'i skabs dang / des pa dang / bde ba dang / dus pa dang / ni ba dang / rnam pa dang
155b4(mdo): ldan zhing sems can gnod sems dang / za ba dang / khro ba dang / nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dang / 'chab pa dang / ldan pa rnams kyi gtso bo dang / dmathul dang ldan par gyurd kyang lan gyi byed cing / bzod pa nyid skyed
155b5(mdo): byang chub kyi mes pa sems can la lta ba'i bzod pa'i stobs kyi mos bstod pa rin po che dang / zhum pa skyed cing zhan pa byed pa le mo byed de/ bco 'grus brtan zhing theg pa chen po las phyir myi ldog lag tshogs
155b6(mdo): la yongs su kyi myo zhing sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus chen po'i sems bskyed pa rin po che dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / zasas gtan ni mchog dang / rnam par tha da pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
155b7(mdo): shes rab tu dbye ba chos thams cad rab rib myed cing / ci lta pa bzhin du gnyis su myed pa tshul gcig pa la 'dug pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyis na par 'phrul pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che dang / mas can thams cad la sems mams
156a1(mdo): zhe 'gras pa myed pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ tha dad pa myed cing ro gcig pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du yongs su sbyin par byed pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che dang / rjes su chags pa dang / 'od khro ba dang / bral zhing sti steng byas pa
156a2(mdo): dag gi spangs byas pa ma tshungs par gyur cing / ma khengs la/ mdud par legs par gnas pa/ ying g.yo ba byed pa/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis gyi g.yos pa/ sems can rjes su srung ba'i sems bskyed pa'i don pa
156a3(mdo): dang / 'jigs shing sdang ba dang / skrag pa dang / bral la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo la 'jug pa la mkhas pa mthal dang mtha' myed par lta ba dang bral ba'i sems bskyed pa rin po che dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs sos
156a4(mdo): pam jams kyi zhes gang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs med par byed pa'i sems bskyed pa'i rin po che dang / sangs rgyas ma da thong bar 'dod cing / sangs rgyas mthong ba dang myi bral ba'i sems skyed
156a5(mdo): ba rim po me dang / zin 'amatshas la slob dpon 'chab pa'i byed pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che dang / log par zhugs ning gnas te/ chos dang yul khrims las nyams pa rtag tu rjes su 'dzin tham tham mamyod pa
156a6(mdo): chen po me / ma sabs pa las dang po sa la brgyal pa byed pa'i sems bsnyen pa'i da mazhi dang / dargyas dang / mngon pa'i rgyas dang / thal zhing brgyas byed pa/ bka' tho bde ba mthun pa 'dzad pa/ sam ma
156a7(mdo): zad bdud pa'i sems bskyed pa napa me dpa bapa ma mamams dang ba ni batheg pa ngan padab pa dang / zas ning / ga sa dzin pas som pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rig sa 'angamapas babyed pa rin po sa dang / 
156b1(mdo): kyi las dang bral zhing nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dag ste/ gtsang zhing dri me myed la rnyog pa myed kyang / 'dod chags kyi rdul dang / nyi mos pa dang ldan pa'i dus byas la dka' zhing yongs su skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa rin po che dang / rtag tu
156b2(mdo): rgyun gyi chad par dben par khyod cing / dgon pa'i yon tan mthong ste/ lus dang seMs dben par gyod kyang 'khor ba la 'du 'dzi dang / 'dre ba la gyi sdod pa/ snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed pa rin po che dang / lha dang kyi'o bde ba dang
156b3(mdo): bas gtan gi bde ba dang / rang gi bde ba thams nud 'dor zhing / seMs can sdug bsngal ba yongasu sbyin par bya ba'i phyir/ sdug bsngal myong bas yong su myi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa rin po che dang / zag pa myed pa'i chos thob pa'i
156b4(mdo): nus pa dang / bskal pa dang / dbang dang / bzod pa dang / ldan yang lag zil du song ba'i rna bar grol ba myi 'dod cing / 'dus byas myi spong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa'i seMs bskyed pa rin po che dang / chos nas/ 
156b5(mdo): la myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag myed par yang so sor rtog la skyo ba yang byed/ chags par 'gyur ba yang myed par dga' zhing / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yang dag par sgrub pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che dang / chos
156b6(mdo): zas cad stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa/ mngon par 'du bya ba myed par so sor rtog cing / sems can la lta yang chos de mngon gsum du yang myi byed la/ sems can la lta ba'i sems bskyed pa rin po ched
156b7(mdo): 'gro ba thams cad kyis skrag cing mgo'i thod pa la me 'bar ba lta bu'i brtson 'grus dang ldan zhing / thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes kyi phyir bskal pa grangs myed par 'khor bas yong su myi skyo ba 'di na'i byang chub sems dpa' seMs
156b8(mdo): dpa'i sems skyed pa rin po che'o// ji lta ji lta bur byang chub la nye bar 'gyur ba de lta de lta bur lus dang / longs spyod dang / ye shes shin tu rgya cher 'gyur yang / de che ba nyid kyi chos de yang 'dor zhing snying rjes dbul po'i
157a1(mdo): rjes su 'jug ste/ smon pa myed cing skyo ba myed pa 'di yang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che'o// gang sems can yongs su smyin par byed pa de dag thog pa kho nar/ bdag
157a2(mdo): byang chub par myi 'dod la lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan po'i sems bskyed pa rin po che ste/ btsun pa sha ra dra ti'i bu sum bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can rin po che ste/ des na
157a3(mdo): byang chub sems rin po'i 'byung gnas shes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bu mo rin cen la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ bu mo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' dag gi sems bskyed pa rin po che la 'jug
157a4(mdo): pa 'di legs par spras pa ni legs so legs so// bu mo gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag ni skyes bu dam pa yin te/ yon tan bstan pa mtha' yas so// 
157a5(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan pos rin po che dang / rang sangs rgyas rin po che ma sangs rgyas dkon mchog myi 'byung gyi/ sangs rgyas dkon mchon las/ nyan thos dparang sangs rgyas kyo rin po che 'byung ngo // byang chub
157a6(mdo): kyi sems rin po che las sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog 'byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bu mo rin men gyi zhes rab dang spon
157a7(mdo): pa bstand pa dang / ji ltar 'di so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa bstan pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHsad pa/ sha ri'i bu 'di la ji snyam du sems/ bu mo rin chen gyis so so yang dag par rig pa ma thob po
157a8(mdo): bu ga na de sbyar gyi lha ste/ bu mo rin rtsen gyim ma ma yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pargyan gyi dad pa thob bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ya dwa ti'i bus/ nu mo rin cen la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod kyis ma la yang dag par/ 
157b1(mdo): rig pa bstan pa las snyoms te/ spobs par gyis shig// bu mo rin chen gyis smras pa// btsun pa sha ra dra ti'i bu so so yang dag par rig pa ni thams cad du chos la dpyod pa dang / stond pa'i las byed de/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
157b2(mdo): sems shes bya ba de ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa bstan pa'i tshig go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ don thams cad kyis yang dag par bsdus pa'i sems de skyed pa de ni/ don so so yang dag par rig pa'o// chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du
157b3(mdo): ba'i sems de bskyed pa 'di ni/ chos so so yang dag par rig pa'o// de las byung ba'i dpyod pa thams cad dang / nges pa'i tshig thams cad po 'di ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa'o// sems bskyed pa de thogs pa myed
157b4(mdo): par ston cing spobs pas rgyun gyi 'chad pa 'di ni/ spobs pa so so yang / dag par rig pa'o// sgyu ma myed cing gnas pa myed pa'i don ni don te/ da 'di ni don so so yang dag par rig pa'o// sgyu ma'i sems kyi chos nyid ni
157b5(mdo): chos so so yang dag pa po rig pa'i// rnam par rig pa'i sgo nas nges pa'i tshig ni/ nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa'o// yul dru/ la sems myi chags shing spobs pa thogs pa myed pa 'di ni/ spobs
157b6(mdo): ba so so yang dag par rig pa'o// don ni nges pa'i don to// chos ni dbyen pa la lta'o// nges pa'i tshig ni sgra tsam mo/ spobs pa ni sgra rnam par rig pa'o// sangs rgyas shes bya ba de ni khong du chud pa'i don gyi tshig go// de las
157b7(mdo): nges par byung ba'i chos so// chos de ni nges pa'i tshig gis rab tu bya'o// spobs pa bstand pa na spobs pa po sa yang dag par rig pa'o// chos kyi don ni don to// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid ni chom mo/ chos
157b8(mdo): ya~M dpyod pa ni nges pa'i tshig go// chos la spobs pa ni spobs pa so so yang dag pa b.rig pa'o// dge 'dun gyi don dang 'dus ma byas kyi don so so yang dag par rig pa'o// dge 'dun dang don ro gcig pa ni chos so// 
158a1(mdo): dge 'dun la dpyod pa ni nges pa'i tshig go// gang rab tu ston pa de ni spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o// btsun pa sha radadwa ti'i bu de ltar na chos thams cad gi tshig bstand pa ni so so yang dag par rig par bstan
158a2(mdo): mA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bu mo rin cen gyis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ ni ji srid cig lag
158a3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang gi gsung rab lags// de skad ces gso ladra pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bkalas lad to// sha ra dra ti'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i
158a4(mdo): dus na/ bskal pa grangs myed pa'i yang ches grangs myed par gyu/ rang pa de'i tshe/ de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas par gzigs shes bya ba/ 
158a5(mdo): mkhyend pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'dzeka rten mkhyend pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo gyur pa/ bla na byed pa/ lha dang myi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
158a6(mdo): 'das 'jig rtend du byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzugs de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni 'jig rtend gyo khams shi nad tu rnam par dag
158a7(mdo): ba zhes bya bar kya rang to// shar dwa ti'i bu 'jig rten gi khams shinang tu rnam par dag pa'i longs spyod ni/ dka' ldan gyi lha'i longs khyod dang 'dra bar gyur da to// bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i
158a8(mdo): dge 'dun ni byang chub sems dpa' dag pa sha stag ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag 'dun bcu pa drug thams cad kyang phyir gyi ldog pa gzungs dang / spobs pa las nges par byung ba sha stag go// sha / 
158b1(mdo): dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyi gsung rab la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend gi khams kyi dbang phyug rin po che'i mdzod mtha' yas pa
158b2(mdo): dang ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa yongasu dag pa zhes bya zhig byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu rgyal po bsod nams kyi rnam par sbyid pa yongs su dag pa/ btsun po'i 'khor gyi bud med stong phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong yod
158b3(mdo): de/ de dag thams cad kyang skye bo bzang po sha stag go// de la bu khri yod de thams cad kyang mthu bo ci'i stobs dang ldan pa sha stag go// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar rgyal po bsod nams kyi rnam par sbyin pa yongs su dag pas
158b4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs/ byang churab sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la yid du 'ong ba'i/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gsos kyi
158b5(mdo): khyen sman dang / yo byad dang / bde bar gyu rad pa thams cad kyis yo bye ba phrag sum bcu ma drug du bsnyen bkur byas so// de nas com ldan 'das yang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol
158b6(mdo): to/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de'i sku tshe'i tshad ji tsam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de'i tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi skal pa bcu
158b7(mdo): thub bo/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar rgyal po bsod nams kyi rnam par smyin pa yongs su dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de la mchod pa dpag tu myed pa byas nas/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas/ bu dang bcas
158b8(mdo): g.yog dang bcas ste/ srog chags khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis bdun du bdar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs ka la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ 
159a1(mdo): bye ba brgya stong gis shind tu smras pa'i mu tig gi se mo des/ mngon par bkab nas/ thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ba
159a2(mdo): ldan 'das la mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod pa bgyis na/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa ma bgyis pa'i mchod pa khyad par du 'phags pa/ gzhan la mchis sam/ de skad ces gsold pa dang / de bzhin
159a3(mdo): gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyis/ rgyal po bsod nams kyi rnam par sbyin pa yongasasu dag pa de la/ 'di skad ces bka' saHlad to// rgyal po chen po gang khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa ma byas pa'i mchod pa
159a4(mdo): dam pa khyad par can/ gya nom pa/ khyod kyi mchod pa 'dis/ brgya'i dachar yang nye bar myi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du yang myi bzod pa gzhan yod do// de yang gang zhe na de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rna
159a5(mdo): par gzigs des rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa de'i bsam pa mkhyend nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// zhing rnams bye ba khrag ldeg brgya stong kang ka'i bye ma snyed/ gang gis rin cen bkang/ 
159a6(mdo): ste bskal pa bye ba brgyad rtag rgyun byin pa'i// bsod nams des ni gang zhig sems can don phyir snying rje snying rje ba byed// byang chub zhugs pa'i bsod nams de'i grangs cha gang du yang 'gyur ma yin na/ sangs rgyas bye ga/ 
159a7(mdo): khrag khrig stong phrag du ma'i bye ma snyed la/ bskal pa bye ba khraka khrig mang por me tog spos kyis mchod pa pas// byang chub brten pa phan byed gang zhig gom par bdun ni rab bor bas// rgyal ba mchod pas 'di ni dam pa gos
159a8(mdo): bo kya nom mchog gi tshul// gang zhig byang chub sems bskyed 'jig rten 'dren par 'gyur bar spon btab pa// 'di ni sbyin pa de bzhin tshul khrims gzhal yas bzod pa'i stobs kyi mchog/ de ni brtson 'grus brtan pa
159b1(mdo): ting 'dzind gzhal yas shes rab myi g.yos pa// de ni mtha' yas bstsags pa'i bsod nams las ste zad par 'gyur ma yin// gang zhika bsam pas yid dka' thams cad mkhyend la rab tu 'jug pa// bsngags dang
159b2(mdo): brjod dang grags dang gzugs dang ka yo ka ni shin tu mdzes pa 'thob// des ni longs nyid dbang phyug stobs rnams rtag 'thob sems dang dran pa 'phags// de ni 'khor los sgyur rgyal stobs ldan de ltar brgya byin tshangs pa
159b3(mdo): 'gyur// myi gapal la byang chub rdul dang bral ba bla byed zhi 'jug pa// de ni ngan song dang ngan 'gro las dang mye khom brgyad po thams cad gcod// de ni lha dang myi'i lam rnams rab tu 'byed cing rnam par sbyangs// long
159b4(mdo): bar myi 'gyur 'on par ma yin dbang po thams cad tshang bar 'gyur/ ka zhig byang chub 'jug cing blo gros ldan pa sems can bskyab sa gnyer ba/ sangs rgyas mthong zhing de dag la yang mchod byed ma'
159b5(mdo): bachos kyang nyan shes rab ye shes ldan zhing blo ni shind tu rlab sa che chen por 'gyur/ the tsom nes nur byed cing nga rgyal bral ba rtag tu drang por 'gyur/ gang zhig byang chub sems skyed 'di 'dra'o
159b6(mdo): dpal kyi byang chub 'jug pa de// 'dod pa'i dkal la dga' ba rnyed par myi 'gyur chos la dka' ba rnyed// de ni 'jig rten dri mas gos par gyi 'gyur chu las pad ma bzhin// shes rab ye shes yon tan rnams kyis kyi ngoms
159b7(mdo): phyir zhing tshol bar byed// byang chub zhugs nas snying rjem pa la las kyang zheg zad par gyi nus pa/ skyabs dang gling dang dpung gnyen dag dang sems can nams kyi pa mar 'gyur// de ni 'gro ba nad pa thob dpo thas
159b8(mdo): 'ad pon che por 'gyur// 'jig rten dang ni 'jig rten 'das pa'i phun byin na rnamapa ni 'ar byed// shar na ti'i bu de nas rgyal mo mabod rnams kyi rnam par sbyin pa yongs su dag pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa nas
160a1(mdo): par gzigs de las byang chub kyi sems kyi yon tan dang / phan yon dang / bsod nams tshad byed pa 'di thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dka' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bsam pa
160a2(mdo): bka sa nas/ blan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de// bud med kyi 'khor de dag dang / bu bu bo dang / blon po dang / 'khod kyi rgyal po dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po de la tshigs su bcad pa 'ang
160a3(mdo): dag smras so// sems can dag la snying rje byams bskyed nas/ pa ni byang chub dam pa mchog la zhugs// gang zhig gang la dka' ba yid 'ong 'dod// des ni byang chub sems brtan yang dag bskyed// myi rigs sbyor
160a4(mdo): sdug bsngal gyu ra pa yis// sngon chad 'khor ba bye ba ma shes kyi sa// byang chub mchog gi lam du zhugs shig dang / sems can don brtson sdug bsngal bde bar 'gyur// gang dag rdzu 'phrul
160a5(mdo): spobs pa ye shes dang / shes rab 'khor dang de bzhin mchod pa dang sangs rgyas rnam gzigs yon tan dpag myed pa/ 'di dag zas cad mkhyend pa'i sems las byu // lha myi 'jig rten bde ba gang dag
160a6(mdo): dang // brgya byin tshangs pa 'khor los sgyur ba dang // gang dag zag bcas zag pa byed pa'i bdel// 'di dag thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems las byung // bsdu dang bsam gtan de ltar tshad myed gang // de bozhin
160a7(mdo): gang dag pha rol byind lam dang // mngon shes rig dang so so yang dag par rig/ 'di dag thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems las byung // stobs bcu sangs rgyas kha dog bsam yas dang // gang dag de bzhin gshegs / 
160a8(mdo): myi 'jigs dang // gang dag sangs rgyas chos yangs dpag myed pa// de kun rnam dag seMs las nges par byung // gang zhig zhing rnams bye ba bskyod pa dang / thams cad kyis dbyangs go bar byed pa dang / 'od dang bkod pas/ 
160b1(mdo): dri byed rgyas 'dod pa// mkhas pa des ni byang chub sems bskyed cig/ mkhas pa gang zhig byang chub sems bskyed pa/ phyogs rnams kun tu mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur te / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bsngags
160b2(mdo): par 'gyur// gsol ba ma btab 'gro ba'i bshes su 'gyur/ gal te sangs rgyas thams cad gzigs pa yis// bskal pa mang por bsngags pa brjod kyang ko// byang chub sems dpa' ma bsod nams gang bya ba// 
160b3(mdo): brjod pas zad par 'gyur ba ma yin no// rgyal po bsod nams kyi rnam par sbyin pa yongs su dag pas// tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras ma thag tu/ de nas srogs chags khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag
160b4(mdo): rgyas po'i btsun mo'i 'khor de dag dang / bu khri bo de dag gis bla na rtsed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// stong gsum gyi grong chen po'i 'jig rte nang gi khams de yang rnam pa drug tu
160b5(mdo): rab tu g.yos so// lha bye ba phrag bzhi bcus kyang rjes su yi rang po zhes sgra phyung nas bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ses bskyed do// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po des phyis kyang lo bye ba phrag ba
160b6(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de la bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis sti stang du byas so// bla mar byas so// ri mor byas so// mchod do// tshangs par khyad pa'i bslab pa'i gnas lnga yongs su blangs so// rtag tu
160b7(mdo): rgyan gyi 'chad par de bzhin gshegs pa de la chos nyan pa'i phyir g.yog dang bcas te dong nas chos nyan to// des phyi zhig na bu thu bo rgyal por bcug nas skra dang / kha spu bregs te/ kol dra skyigs bgos nas/ yang dag
160b8(mdo): bar dad papo byab ras khyim myed pa ru rab tu byung ba// de de ltar rab tu byung nas 'di lta ste/ bden pa'i tshig dang / chos kyi tshig dang / don gyi tshig dang / 'dul ba'i tshig dang / tshig kyi zad pa bzhi po 'di dag gi yi na
160b9(mdo): 'tshams sbyor bas la yongasu 'jal lo// de la bye ba tshangs par dpyod pa la mkhas pa'i rjes su song ngo // rgyal po rab tu byung ba des rjesu bslabs nas/ de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend gi khams kyi
161a1(mdo): ka sems can bgrangs pa las shin tu 'das pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzig pa de'i gzung rab la rab tu byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po bsod nams kyi rnam par sbyin pa yongs/ 
161a2(mdo): dag pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na de ltar bye blta ste/ bu mo rin cen 'di nyid do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de las bu mo rin cen 'dis byang chub tu sems bskyed do// sha ra dwa d+ha
161a3(mdo): bus gsol pabacom ldan 'das las kyi sgrib pa ji lta bu zhig gis bu mo 'dis bud myed kyi dngos po yongasu gzung // bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalasaHlad pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpal dag ni las kyi sgrib pas bud/ 
161a4(mdo): byed kyi dngos po yongasu myi 'dzin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can yongasu sbyin par bya ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa dang ye shes dang thabs dang / shes rab kyi
161a5(mdo): stobs kyis bud myed kyi dngos po yong su 'dzind to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di sa ji snyam du sems/ bu mo rin cen 'di bud byed do snyam na yang de ltar gyi lha li/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni mngon par shes pa'i stobs can gyi
161a6(mdo): byang chub sems dbang blta ste/ de la ni bud myed kyi chos dang skyes pa'i chos myed do// bu mo 'di na dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan no// 'ong ba myed do// 'gro ba byed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu bu mo rin cen 'dis ni 'dzam bu gling 'dir/ bum
161a7(mdo): gzhon nu dgu khri bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu sbyin par byas so// de nas bu mo rin gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu budak+She lus kyis sems can na
161a8(mdo): mtshas ston gyi yod dang// sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo bdag ni skyes pa'i lus 'di nyid kyang kyi 'dod na/ bud med kyi lus yongs su gzung ba lu ci smos// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shar dwa ti'i bu lum la spyod de/ 
161b1(mdo): smras pa bu mo smod do// smras pa de bas na/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad las khyad par du 'phags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang nyan thos kyis smad pa de la ni byang chub seMs
161b2(mdo): dpa' myi smod do// nyan thos kyis smad kyi/ byang chub sems dpas ma yin pa gang zhe na/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched la nyan thos smod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni ma yin no// lus yongasu gzung ba la nyan thos smod kyi bya
161b3(mdo): chub sems dpa' ni ma yin no// 'khor ba yongasu gzung ba la nyan thos smod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni ma yin no// skye ba gnas pa la nyan thos smod kyi/ bsams bzhin du skye ba yongs su gzung ba la byang chub sems dpa'
161b4(mdo): ni ma yin no// bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba la nyan thos smod kyi/ sod nams kyi tshogs togs pas myi ngoms pa la ni byang chub ses da da pa' ni ma yin no// seMs can dang 'dre ba la nyan thos smod kyi/ seMs can thas
161b5(mdo): cad yongasu sbyin par bya ba'i phyir/ 'du 'jil byang chub sems dpa' de ma yin no// grong dang grong khyer du 'jug pa la nyan pos spyod kyi/ kro nga dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor du 'jun
161b6(mdo): pa la byang chub sems dpa' ni ma yin no// rang gi nyon mongs pa la nyan thos spyod kyi/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa la byang chub sems dpa' ni ma yin no// btsun la sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na gang dang kapa la nyan thos smod pa de dang / 
161b7(mdo): de la byang chub sems dpal ni ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo stobs gang gis de kyi smod par myi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sos dpa'i stobs gang yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu brgyad po 'di dag ni byang chub
161b8(mdo): sems dpa'i stobs te/ des de smod par myi 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'ong khro ba myed pa'i sems kyis byams pa'i stobs dang / sems can yongasu smin par byed pas snying rje'i stobs dang / gas ma yin pas lhag pa libs pa
162a1(mdo): stobs dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral bas shes rab kyi stobs dang / yongs kyi skyo bas/ thabs kyi stobs dang / zhum pa myed pas bsod nams kyi stobs dang / kati mug dang bral bas ye shes kyi stobs dang / sngon dam
162a2(mdo): bcas pa nyam pog tu chud par byed pas bzod 'grus kyi stobs ste/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu brgyad po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i stobs ste/ stobs de dag gis de gyi sod do// gnas brtan gyis smad pa/ ni bu mo 'on
162a3(mdo): stobs 'di lta bu dang ldan nas/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ldan te/ gang mnyam pa nyid kyis ldan no// gang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam 'a gnas so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang mnyam pa des de ni soH
162a4(mdo): ma yin/ nyams chung ba ma yin te/ de ni mnyam pa nyid do// nga mnyam pa nyid de la ni tha dad pa chung zad kyang myed do// mnyapa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' ste/ chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang // 
162a5(mdo): mnyam mo// ji ltar na nam mkha' snang ba myed cing bra gab myed pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad kyang nam mkha' ltar snang byed cepa/ zla kab byed pa'o// gang de ltar mnyam pa de ni nyams chungs
162a6(mdo): ma yin slabs dang ldan la ma yid mad kyi// 'od kyang bdun lashar dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang nyam chu ni de ni stobs dang ldan pa'o// de ni'i phyir zhe na/ gang nyon mongs pa nyams chung ba de ni yo zhes/ 
162a7(mdo): kyi glon pa dang ldan pa'o// kapasems nyam chung ba de ni sbyin pa'i spobs dang ldan pa'o// kang dang nus ngan pa nyam chung ba de ni tshul khrims kyi stobs dang ldan pa'o// gang gnod sems nyam chung ba de ni bzod pa'i
162a8(mdo): stobs dang ldan no// gang le lo can nyam chung ba de ni brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang ldan pa'o// gang g.yeng ba nyam chung ba de ni bsam gtan gi stobs dang ldan pa'o// kapa 'chal ba'i shes rab nyam chub ba de ni shes rab kyi
162b1(mdo): stobs dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin du chos thams cad de ka pa dang ka pa las byang chub sems dpa' gyi dge ba nyam chung ba de dang de lus de dge ba'i stobs dang ldan no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bu mo rin cen la men sa po 'i
162b2(mdo): bya ba gnang ste/ bu mo legs so legs so// ji ste bstand pa lta na de ltam bstan par bya'o// bstan pa 'di bkod pa na byang chub sems dpal lnga brgya 'azod pa skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bu mo rin chen gyis
162b3(mdo): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po de dag dge ba'i pha ba gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par gyur // de skad ces gsold pa dang / bcom ldan 'dra
162b4(mdo): kyis bu mo rin chen la 'di skad ces bka'al sa lang to// bu mo byang / deb sems dpal gang gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i khyad pa dpyod pa na/ theg pa dman pa 'dod cing bya ba ma yin pa byed par 'gyur
162b5(mdo): ba 'di ni gnas ma yin te/ skabs myed do// de yi dam la brtan pa'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub kyi snying po mchog da par song nas/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i mkhyend pa'i snyom
162b6(mdo): thob ste/ gnas la yang gnas dang / gnas ma yin pa la gnas ma yin par yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang po ste/ stobs de thob pas de bzhin gshegs
162b7(mdo): pa 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog ste// khyu mchog gi gnas su dam 'chal zhing / dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gang gis kyang 'jig rten
162b8(mdo): du chos dang 'thun par ma skor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa pyod
163a1(mdo): pa na ga rang gi las las gyurd pa/ las kyi rnam par smyind pa la rtond pa yin te/ de las kyi rnam par sbyind pa'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa rA
163a2(mdo): ma gad ltar byung ba'i las dang / las yang dag par blangs pa rnams kyi rnam par sbyind pa mkhyend pa/ gnas dang rgyas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gnyis pa ste/ 
163a3(mdo): sta zas de thob pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog ste/ khyu mchog gi gnas su dam 'cha zhing / dge' sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ 1
163a4(mdo): zhes kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma skor 'di tshangs pa'i/ 'khor lo rab tu sgo ba // bu mo gzhan yang byang chub semasas tu sa dpa' sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can rnams kyi dpan
163a5(mdo): po la brtags nas chos stond te de dag shes nas/ dbang po rnams ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug cing / dbang po rnams ji lta ba dang ldan te/ de dbang po'i rim pa mkhye nad pa'i stobs 'di dang ldan
163a6(mdo): zas/ byang chub thos pa dang/ sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang cag gzhan dag gi dbang po dang brtson 'grus kyi rim pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa gang sems can na/ 
163a7(mdo): rnams dag/ ga cag kA nam dag gi dbang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi rim pa yang dag pa ji lta bu bzhin du rab tu shes parjod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gsum pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems
163a8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i srung pa spyod pa dang / sems can rnams kyi khams pa 'dug ste/ zhugs nas/ sems ca rnams kyims pa jig pa dang / khams jig pa bzhin du gnas so// de khams sa 'ad
163b1(mdo): stobs 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ kham 'dus pa dpa' mas mchogs pa'i 'jig rten yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin kyang zhes pa 'di ni de bzhi gnags pa'i gathos bzhi pa'o/ thu bo gzhan yang byu
163b2(mdo): sems dpa' brang chub sems dpa'i phud pa spyod par/ sems cam thos pa pa dad pa rnams kyims pa dang / rnam par slob pa'i ye shes gsusasos te/ des mos pa sa kyi spyod do// rnamam pa 'i ste zab 'di
163b3(mdo): 'du dan papa ma / mtshags pa dka d+hi/ pa bzhin shes pa de
163b4(mdo): khrim gzhan yang bya nab sems dpa'i spyad pa myod yang / 'dus byas dang / 'das pa rtsam dang / na nas kyi theg pa dang / rab sa sa rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen pomam pa min sa gtung ngo // dedu
164a1(mdo): kya bachub sems dpa' sems dpa'i byud ba spod pa na/ rjo gi rgyalas byung ba'i dge' ba'i sa 'argyan gyi gsor te/ bgasod pa yid/ blon dam bcas pa mas kyi nyams pa yin na/ de snod gi zhum sa
164a2(mdo): sa byung ba'i dge' ba'i sa brgyad kyi gzod pa'i skabs 'di dang 'das/ byang chub ba'i bad/ bdag dang sems cad gzhan rnams dang / gang ba// gnan rnams kyi 'od ki gnas rnam pa su rjes ma drad pa mched
164a3(mdo): ba'i stobs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rgyad pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can gang yang sA 'gong bar gyi byed la/ ma bslab
164a4(mdo): pa dbang myi za zhing / sems can thams cad la snang bar gyurd pa yin no// de sdang ba'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na/ lha'i myig gi shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes pa 'di ni de bzhin
164a5(mdo): gshegs pa'i stobs dgu pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems/ dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems ca/ na gang gi zag pa 'phel ba'i phyir yang gnas pa ma yin gyi/ 
164a6(mdo): pa zad pa'i bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston te/ zag pa 'phol bar byed pa'i phyir ma yin gyi/ zag pa myed pa'i lam gyis sems can rnams la lam nye bar stond to// de mos pa zag pa myed pa'i
164a7(mdo): stobs 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na/ zag pa thams cad zad pa mkhyend pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu pa'o// bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs
164a8(mdo): bas pargya ste// byang chub sems da pa de / thogs par byas nas/ gonas bcu dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// bu ma de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i skabs bcu
164b1(mdo): yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang kyi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chom ma 'dres pa bco rgyad po 'di dag dang ji ltar ldan na/ byang chub sems dpal gyi 'jigs pa bzhi
164b2(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rab tu thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ bu mo 'di la byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa ra/ gzhan gis
164b3(mdo): shes par myi bya'o snyam nas/ slob dpon nam yang chos 'chab par myi byed de/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa yin/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing / chos mnyam pa nyid du
164b4(mdo): mthong ba yin pa pa dad pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba yin te/ de byang chub thob nas seng ge'i sgra yang dag par zlog ste/ pa yang ga par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas pa la chos 'di

164b6(mdo): ma yang dag ba rjes pa kyil mo do/ mdzangs spya na pa / ba da ga zheg sa pas 'de ba brnyes pa dang / 'jigs pa byed pa 'as pa dang / myi 'dugs pa rnam pa yi /

165a1(mdo): 'o// chos su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de bar du gcod pa'i chos la gyi sto nang to// gyi 'jug ko/ gyi spyod do// gzhan dag la yang gyi 'chad do// myi ston to// bar du gcod pa'i chos shes nas spong ste/ de bya
165a2(mdo): chub thob pa na seng ge'i sgra sgrog ste/ gang ngas bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa'i de dag la stend pa la ni bar du gcod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i gnas byed de/ 'dabangal gang yang rgol bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni
165a3(mdo): tha ma bzhin te/ 'din gyi 'jigs pa gnyis pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pang/ rtag tu chun kyi 'chad par dgar po'i chos la mos pa yin te/ rnam pa

165a5(mdo): bal rnam par dag pa'i lam gnon par 'gyum ba'i yan lag gi tshogs de dag la bdag kyang spyod/ sems can gzhan lastodang to// de byang chub thob pa na seng ge'i sgra sgrogs te/ gang ma/

165a7(mdo): 'di ni gyi 'jigs pa gsum pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pang / bdag gis shes shi mthong gi/ gzhan gis kyi shes kyi mthong ngo// zhes parang /

165b1(mdo): ngabashA ma zad nganas dpa bcas pa ma mag pa 'di lta bu zhig yangs sum zad/ zhes bya den bu'i gnas byed de/ 'dibangs sus gos pa 'gyu ba zhes bya ba di lus byazhi te/ 'di ci na

165b3(mdo): gam yo nas mthon dman gyi mnyam pa mnyam par byed do// zam pa dang rdo rje stegs kyang 'dogs so/ mtshan ma yun pa mun nag gi nang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me yang 'bul lo/ 
165b4(mdo): sems can ltung ba'i 'gyod pa la gnas pa rnams kyi ltung ba'i 'gyod pa sel to// kun nas ldang bar byed do// gzhan gi 'dod/ myi skyed do// gzhan gi ltung ba gleng bar gyi byed do// chos la dgas pa
165b5(mdo): bskyed pa'i sems can rnams la dogs pa thams cad gcad pa'i phyirachos ston te/ the tsom dang / yid gnyis dang dem chur myed parabyed do// chos kyi snang ba bsgrub bo// shes rab kyi snang ba chen po ya
