170b1(mdo): te/ mna' zad la me 'bab pa bzhin tu N+DI ltu cu byed kyi thom mchos la thos pa nyi zad byed pa yin / zos pa bsngags pa yid/ tshab lad kyi ba la dga' bas/ dka' ngas pa yis/ dam pa'i chos yongs su spyo
170b2(mdo): pa'i brtson pa yin te/ chos 'dod pa des phyi nang gi dngos po gang yang yongs su kyi gtong ba byed do// de tha ma la rim gro bya ba'i myi byed pa gang sa brjed do// de sdug bsngal gi phung po kyi bzod pa gang yang byed do// 
170b3(mdo): de bde ba'i yo byad kyi 'dod ba gang yang myed do// de chos 'dod pa des tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig nyad pa la shind tu dga' ba yin te/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams rin po ches
170b4(mdo): bkang ba la ni ma yin no// chos kyi tshig gcig la shin tu dka' ba yin te/ 'kho ba los sgyur ba'i rgyal po thob pa la ni yAyin no/ pha rol tu phyi nad pa'i lam nyan pa la shind tu dka'
170b5(mdo): yin te/ bas byi da ngas pa bab pa sa pa da/ tshig bzhi pa po tshigs su sa dag gcig gzhan dag la stonang par byed pa lashin dka' ba yin te/ kang 'ga'i klud gi kyi skyed kyi ga
170b6(mdo): glang gi khyis nyin thom ma sa ni ma yin do// gnang dgas pa'os tu byind pa dang / ra 'an pa'i chos kyi gtam rab tu yod pa la ston pa yin te/ brgya min da tshangs pa gang 'ga'i slong gi bye sa
171a1(mdo): thob pa la ni ma yin no// de lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bu la zhugs pas sti stang byed cing chos nyand to// sti stang byed cing gzhan la stond to// de de ltar mngon par brtson pas tshegs chu pud+ha ru lhas yongasu
171a2(mdo): bzung ba yin// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa yin no// de lhas yongs su bzung zhing sangs rgyas kyis dgongs pas/ 'jig rnyed pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtsug lag thams cad bdag nyid la
171a3(mdo): mngon sum na 'thung ba yin no// dges nub kyi snang ba'i rgo zad kyi zhes pas ltung ba yang yin no// mchom spang bab sti thod dang ldan pas// byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la shes rab nyams pabyed pa
171a4(mdo): zhes kyi ste/ de sa de byed pa yin do/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi skyed pa shes pa dang / dge' ba dang / kyi dge' ba dang / lung tu ma zas nad pa dang / khams pho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na pa tho ba byed par
171a5(mdo): zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa myed pa dang / 'jig rten pa/ dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las
171a6(mdo): dun pa dang / rlon kyi sgom sus rgyu sa chu rji rtog rnyed pa shes pa dang / 'dathams cad cichis parab bcis ca dang / mnyam pa'i byams dpa bstan du pa zhes padu
171a7(mdo): de'i shes rab de thogs pa myed cing sgrib pa myed pa yin no// de'i shes rab de sdod ki mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la chags pa myed cing / sgrib pa byed cing / ze zhes pa myed de/ phyin
171a8(mdo): me pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bstun dkyang / pa khyed de/ dpyod pa'i ting 'dzin paganing su ma rnams pas rjes su bsgyu da pa'i tshe 'phrul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chab kyi go gcig sas/ rlo kyi
171a9(mdo): sgo thams cad snang zhing / sgo gcig gis yang dag par bsgrub pa 'od ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu pa'o// bu mo ka zhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub sos
172a1(mdo): yong ba sa gnyis la nas shes/ stopa nyid pa rnyan danas mas rba da par byed do/ rton pa'i smom thathams cad la chags zhen pa sa mtshan ma myed pa bstan nas
172a2(mdo): da sasayin pa la rtson pa byed pa da das/ la su pa byed / 'di gas kyis panas zhen pas kyi thug pa'i rnam pa bad la pa
172a3(mdo): do// ston pa na // da pa gas na sa pa byung ga sa ma
172a4(mdo): byed na// ser sna la tshogs zhen pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu kyin pa/ nad nas mangs su ma dad par byed do// zad pa'i ngang tshul la 6/ sa 'dad pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsta dang ran
172a5(mdo): yongs ma dad par byed do// gnod sems la chags zhe pa ladapa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bstan nas yongs su thadad pa byed do// le grol chags zhen dpal brtson 'grus kyi mngasapa/ 
172a6(mdo): tu phyi nad pa bstand nas yongs su tha dad par byed do// g.yeng ba la chags zhen byed pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa bstanang nas yongs su thar dpar byed do// 'chald pa'i shes rab la chags zher
172a7(mdo): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bstand nas yongs su tha dad par byed do// so so'i skye bo'i skye bo'i mi la chags zhen pa la 'phags pa'i bded pa bstanang nas/ yongs su tha dad par byed do// phyi nad ci log pa chags
172a8(mdo): zhen pa la gyi brtag pa dang / sug bams pa dang / bdag byed pa dang ni ba bstan nas yongs su ba dad par byed do// smis pa dang / chod pa dang / kun nas dkris pa dang / lha ba thams cad la chags zhend pa la sgrib pa myed
172b1(mdo): pa'i rnam par bdad pas sna nga nas yongs su thar bar byed do// nyon mongs pa thams cad la chags zhed pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos bstan da das yongs su 'dad par byed do// de chos yang dag par thus pa 'di dang ldan nam/ 
172b2(mdo): byang chub tho pa ya/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rnam par grol ba gyed pa zhes bya ste// de la de byed pa yin no// de'i rnam par grol ba de kyi 'khrugs shing shin tu ma par dang zug ste/ dpa' rlabs byed la shin tu bsil pa'i
172b3(mdo): dngos po bgyur cing zab ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba yin// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba yin/ dri yi byed cing dri la dang bral te rtog pa myed pa
172b4(mdo): la shi na tu yongs su dag pa yin/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis rnga mas la shinag tu yongs su spyad pa/ byas pas zad kyi shes pa yin/ bstund pa mtha' yas mu byed pa yin// chags pa byemyed cing sgrib pa
172b5(mdo): myed pa yin// nam mkha'i dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba yin te/ dri ma byed pa'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin pa shi dang tu bsgoms padang / chos thams cad snang ba dang ldan pa'i gzungs la mkhas pa
172b6(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par grol ba'i mtshan gi chos stond pa dang / rdzu mthun pa yin te/ thams cad zhes byung zhing chos thams cad kyi sna ba ba dang ldan pa yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhon/ 
172b7(mdo): ba yin na/ mya ngan las 'das pa la 'bab pa yin// mya ngan las 'das pa la bab pa yin te/ shi nang tu mthar thug cing mthang phyin pa 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gcig pa'o/ 
172b8(mdo): byamo kazhanas bya chub ses dpa' bya bachu sos da'i spyad pa spyod pa shes su yin ma yin nye/ se shes kyi sgo sa dang / le ga zhaba' pa dang / le kyi byid dang ldan la yim do// de'i ye shes de ni nyams pa
173a1(mdo): byed par 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa yongasu spang bar byas pa las nges par byung ba'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par dpyod pa'i blo dang ldan pa yin te/ thas cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par
173a2(mdo): spyod pa'i blo dang ldan pas/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la yang / 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la yang / 'dod chags dang
173a3(mdo): bral ba'i seM su yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de bzhin du zhe sdang dang / bcas pa dang / zhe sdang myed pa dang / gti mug dang bcas pa dang / gti mug myed pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa myed
173a4(mdo): pa dang / 'khor byed dang bcas pa dang / 'khor byed byed pa dang za ba zed/ dang bcas pa dang / zang zing myed pa dang mchog tu 'dzin pa dang / chog tu 'dzin pa myed pa dang / bla me dang bcas pa nyid dang / bla na myed par
173a5(mdo): sgrib pa dang bcas pa dang / sgrib pa byed pa dang lung bstan pa dang / lung ma bstan pa dang / dge ba dang myi dge ba dang / khan ma po ba dpal ba dang // khan ma mo ba skyed pa dang / bag pa dang 'acas pa dang / zag pa myed
173a6(mdo): ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / kun nas nyan mongs pa ca dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa can pa yin pa dang / rnam par dag pa dang / rnam paras dag pa dang / chus dang / cher gyur rang po dang / maba' dang bcas pa/ 
173a7(mdo): mtha' yas pa dang / ser sna dang ldan pa dang / gtong ba dang ldan pa dang / ngang tshul ngan pa'i seMs dang / tshul khrims la sbyor ba'i mos dang / gnod sos kyi bag la nyas dang / gnod sos myed pa dang / me lo dang / 'artson 'grus dang ldan pa dang
173a8(mdo): gzeng pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa dang / 'chal bu'i shes rab dang / shes rab dang ldan la dang / so so'i skye bo'i seM pa dang / log pa nyid du nges pa dang / yang dag pa nyid du nges pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg par nges pa dang / rang
173b1(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi theg par nges pa dang / theg pa chen por nges pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba/ 'di ni
173b2(mdo): sdug bsngal 'gog pa/ 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lo mo zhes yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/ myi skye ba shes pas sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rab tu shes so// shin tu kun tu myi rgyu ba shes pas kun 'byung ba rab tu shes
173b3(mdo): chad pa myed cing rtag pa myed pa shin tu skad cig pa/ 'gog pa shes pas 'gog pa rab tu shes so// thams cad kyi rjes su song ba nam mkha' yang dag par 'du ba bdag gir bya ba myed cing yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa/ shin tu rna bar dag pa'i shes pas la/ 
173b4(mdo): rab tu shes// de 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di dag de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes kyang / sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba'i phyir/ mngon gsum du yang rab tu byed la/ bden pa yongasu shes pa dang / spang ba dang / 
173b5(mdo): sgo ba dang / mngon gsum du bya ba'i phyir sems can nas la chos ston to// de'i chos bstand pa de bden pa'i rjesu mthun pa yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / 'gal ba byed pa yin/ mthar lta ba thas cad yongs su spangs pa yin/ dbu ma'i
173b6(mdo): la zhugs pa yin/ rten pa'i chos mngon gsum du gyurd pa yin te/ de chos zas cad rgyu dang bcas shing / rkyen dang bcas pa'i kha na las kyi/ bdag kha na las pa ma yin seMs can ki kha na las ma yin/ srog gi kha na las ma yin/ gso ba'i kha
173b7(mdo): na las ma yin skyes bu'i She na las ma yin/ gang zag gi kha na las ma yin par rab tu shes so// de ma rig pa'i rkyen kyis 'du byed rnams su rab tu shes pa dang / 'du byed kyi rkyen kyis rnam par shes pa dang / rna bar shes pa'i rkyen kyis myang dang
173b8(mdo): gzugs/ mying dang gzugs kyi rkyen kyis skye mched drug dang / skye mched drug gi rkyen kyis reg pa dang / reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / tshor ba'i rkyen kyis sred pa dang / sred pa'i rkyen kyis len pa dang / len pa'i rkyen kyis srid pa dang / 
174a1(mdo): srid pa'i rkyed kyis skye ba dang / skye ba'i rkyen gyis rka shi dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'dod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid kyi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ba ste/ de ltar na lug bsngal gyi phung po chen po ma 'dres pa
174a2(mdo): 'di 'byung bar 'gyur bar rab tu shes so// de ma rig pa'i 'gag pa nas rga shi 'gag pa'i bar dang / de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po ma 'dres pa 'di 'gag par 'gyur bar rab tu shes so// de 'di la yang dag par slob pa na
174a3(mdo): gang ma rig pa'i rkyen las byung ba 'di ni/ bdag gi rkyen las byung ba ma yin/ sems can gi rkyen las byung ba ma yin/ srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag gi rkyen las byung ba ma yin no// gang bdag gi rkyen las byung ba ma yin pa nas
174a4(mdo): gang zag gi rkyen las byung ba ma yin pa'i bar de ni stong pa'o// stong pa ka/ yin pa de ni chad pa ma yin rtag pa ma yin no// chad pa ma yin// rtag pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni gdod ma nyid nas ma skyes ma byung ba'o/ 
174a5(mdo): gdong ma nyid nas ma skyes ma byung ba gang yin pa don dus gsum du brjod du byed do// dus gsum du brjod du byed pa gang yin pa den de ngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid do// dngas po byed pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin la de bzang
174a6(mdo): ba skyed cing bgrang ba las shi nad tu 'das pa'o// bgrang ba myed cing bgrang ba las shind tu 'das pa gang yin pa de ni don dam pa'o// don dam pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' yang dag pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bkal yang dag/ 
174a7(mdo): pa gang yin pa de 'thab pa myed cing rtsod pa myed pa'o// 'thab pa myed cing rtsod pa myed pa gang yin pa de dge sbyong gi chos so// gang dge sbyong gi chos gang yin pa de nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i de bzhin du des de ltar shes shing gnas
174a8(mdo): te/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa/ kun 'byung bas ma rig pa/ kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so// ma rig pa 'gag pa nas rga shi 'gag pa'i bar du rab tu shes te/ rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa'i shes pas// chad par lta bar sbyor ba
174b1(mdo): ma yin kyi bdag myed pa dang / sems can byed pa dang / srog byed pa dang / gang zag byed pa'i chos kyi rjes su song ba yin te/ mam lalas kyi sem/ nyebar gyi 'dzin/ phyi dmyigs po/ mtha' byor myi zhes pas / shum
174b2(mdo): dag par rjes su kyi mamang sa/ chos gang sa mas bya myigs pa des dbus ya ba ga sa 'gyur te/ de'i mas ci 'dra ba zhig stsas nas/ desapa'adang dbus byed pa tsho sa rnamapas 'dun no// rgyas kyi kyis
174b3(mdo): mkha' dang dbus dang bral bas mthal dang dpung byed pa chos ston pa yin do// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rnam par grol ba/ ye zhes mthong bas
174b4(mdo): nyams byed pa zhes bya ste de ltang byed pa yin no// slobs bkod pa de la ting nge 'dzin nani tu ba sgoms pa dang / mtha' las kyis da'i gzungs la mags pas/ de'i rnam par grol ba'i sa zhes mthang
174b5(mdo): mthang ba de chas kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbung byed par 'du ba yin gnas dang gnas ma yin pa pasan pa rnams la/ bya ma 'a'i cings skar rgya me zhing nam par bya ga la/ yun gis grub pas
174b6(mdo): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa shes pa bstan pa rnams la rnam par sbyin pa chud kyi za bar stonod pa yin/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po dang / 'acor 'grus kyi rom
174b7(mdo): shes pa bstan pa rnams la mngon gsum du gyur da pa yin khams du dang khams sna tshogs pa'i 'jig rten bstand pa rnams la shind tu rnam par gdon myi za bar stond pa yin/ mos pa du ma dang / mos pa sna tshogs
174b8(mdo): shes pa bstand pa rnams la myi zad par ston cing 'jug pa yin/ kun tu 'gro ba'i lam shes pa bstan pa rnams la phyogs kyi dri ba thams cad rnam par dbye ba rgyas par byed cing phyed par lung ston pa yin/ bsam
175a1(mdo): gtan dang / rnam par b.rad ba dang / ting nge 'dzi 'dzin pa dang / snyoms par 'dug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / ldan la zhes pa bstand pa rnams la / chos kyi sgo bsam rgyas kyi khyab pa
175a2(mdo): rnam par bzhag pa stond pa yin/ sngon gnas pa rnam pa du ma rjes su dran pa shes pa bstan pa rnams la/ sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang / tshe dang skye ba rab 'bring tha ma/ thog ma'i mthar chags pa myed cing sgrib pa myed pa'i
175a3(mdo): ye shes ston pa yin/ thogs pa myed cing sgrib pa myed pa'i lha'i myo ke shes pa bstan pa rnams la/ kun tu rnam par lta ba thams cad du shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa'i lung bstand pa ston pa yin/ zag pa thams cad zad pa shes pa
175a4(mdo): bstan pa rnams la/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba/ ma lus par spangs par shes pa ston pa yin/ myi 'jigs pa shes pa bstan pa rnams la/ zil gyis myi non pa ston pa yin/ snying rje chen po'i stobs
175a5(mdo): zhes pa bstan pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad du tha dad dubya ba myed cing / skyor ba mnyam pa rgyan gyi gcod pa ston pa yin/ mo so tsa rigs par chos bstan pa rnams la lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes rgyas
175a6(mdo): rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa yin/ sems can thams cad yongs su sbyin par byed cing / 'dul ba'i phyir myi zad pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba'i ye shes kyi yul bstan pa rnams la zab mo dang / sna tshogs dang / phrugs pa dang / 
175a7(mdo): sdeng zhing rgyu ba dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / stobs dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shes ston pa yin/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa yin te/ bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs
175a8(mdo): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gnyis pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ ye shes kyis byas pa'i las rnams byed kyi nga rgyal kyis byas pa rnams myi byed de/ de ye shes kyis
175b1(mdo): lus kyi las byed pa ni 'di lta ste/ 'khru ba dang / g.yo ba dang / gya kyu dang / tshul 'chos pa thams cad myi byed do// sdang ba myed cing chags pa myed pa yin/ rtag tu tshangs par byed cing de lus kyi las brtson 'grus pa thams pas byang chub
175b2(mdo): dang mthun te/ bdag dang gzhan la gnod pa khyad pa yin/ pha rol tu phyind pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i snying rje chen po la sbyor zhing / rtag tu sems can gi don la rtson te/ lus kyi las de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no// de chos yang dag
175b3(mdo): par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa lus kyi las thams cad sngon du ye shes 'gro zhing / ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste/ de la de yod do// gzugs thams cad kun tu ston pa'i
175b4(mdo): ting nge 'dzid shi nad tu bsgoms pa dang / kun nas snang ba'i gzungs la mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa kha dag du ma dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / gzugs dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng stond pa'i lus
175b5(mdo): kyis swa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / bsgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / bram ze dang / rgyal
175b6(mdo): rigs dang / rde'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen pa dang / srog chags brgya stong du ma lpags pa'i/ 'khor 'dus pa thams cad du gyod lam chad byed bu dang / kha dog dang / rtags na
175b7(mdo): dbyibs gnas pa/ mchog dam pa/ gtso bo gya nom pa'i lus bstan nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la chos kyi gtam kun tu stond to// yang dag par 'dzi nad du 'jug go// gzengs stod do// rab tu dga' bar
175b8(mdo): byed do/ kun tu bstan yang dag par 'dzi nad du bcug/ gzengs bstod/ rab tu dgal bar byas nas/ gyi ldang bar byed do// gyi snang bar byar da kyang song bar shes pa yang myed do// 'khor du 'dus pa de dag du 'dus shing 'as
176a1(mdo): ke/ tha'amathar gyi la yang dung 'das pa zhes pa yang byed do// res pas kyang dmas byed do// des bstan pa la dgal ba dang / mchog tu dgal ba rab tu rgya chen po yang rnyed do// 'dod pa la dga' zhing che ba dang / sus
176a2(mdo): yongs khyod thams cad la myi la ba yid la byed cing / sbyor ro// gyi snang bar gyur da na lta ba dang / mnyan pa'i phyir sgom par 'gyur ro// de la lta bas sgom pa dang / !/ 'dod pa dang chos nyan pas skom pa dang / chos nyan 'dod pa de yang
176a3(mdo): zag pa myed pa'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las thob pa'i rgyur 'gyur te/ bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dris pa bcu gsum pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub
176a4(mdo): sems dpa'i byed pa pyod pa sna/ ye shes kyis byas pa'i las rnams byed kyi/ nga rgyal gyis byas pa rnams kyi byed de/ de ye zhes kyis pa/ gi las byed pa ni 'dru ba dang / gso ba dang / gya klu dang chul 'chas pa
176a5(mdo): thams cad kyi byed de/ bden par smra zhing phra ma dang / ngag gtsub po dang / tshig khyal pa kyi sba ba yin/ phan pa'i tshig dang / ran pa'i cho ga dang chos kyi cho ga dang / de tshig de dag smra ste/ tshig des bdag dang gzhan la/ 
176a6(mdo): gdung bar myi 'gyur ro// tshig gang sangs rgyas kyis rjes su gnang ba don dang ldan pa'i tshig smra ste/ tshig des sems can thams cad tshim par byed do// de myi ga ne myi chog ste/ ye shes dang rab tu ldan pa'i cho ga dang ldan pa yin gyi/ 
176a7(mdo): nga rgyal dang rab tu ldan pa ma yin no// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi las thams cad sngon du ye shes 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste/ de la de
176a8(mdo): yod do// rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / 'khor gsum gi gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi las ci yang myi brjod kyang / de skad thams cad las sgra brnyan dang / 'khor zas
176b1(mdo): kyi sems kyi bsam pa tshim par byed pa'i sgra 'byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ki thams cad kyi gsung sgra dang dbyangs ni/ don dang ldan pa/ chos dang ldan pa/ bden pa dang mthun pa/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / mya
176b2(mdo): 'gal ba yid du 'byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'thun pa nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba/ 'bras bu yod pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi rgyur gyurd pa yin te// bu mo 'di no de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas
176b3(mdo): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu bzhi pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ rtag tu rgyun myi chad par ye shes kyis byas pa'i las rnams byed kyi/ nga rgyal gyis byas pa rnams myi byed
176b4(mdo): de ye shes kyis yid kyi las byed pa mi 'khu ba dang / g.yo dang / kya kyu dang tshul 'chos pa thams cad myi byed do/ rnam sems dang gnod sems dang / log par lta ba dang / bral zhing yang dag par lta ba yin/ byas
176b5(mdo): pa dang / snying rje la gnas pa te/ sems can thams cad la sems s+ho// mas shing / byang chub kyi sems brjed pa myed pa yin no// de yi shes dang rab tu ldan pa yid dang ldan pa yin gi nga rgyal dang ldan pa ma yin
176b6(mdo): de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi las zas cad sngon du ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste/ de la de yod do// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas mngon
176b7(mdo): gsum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgobs pa dang / brtag cing rtog pa myed pa'i gzungs mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems rab tu shes so// sems cas
176b8(mdo): thams cad rgyalas bu dang / sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'odagasal ba'i phyir/ rang gi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid du long du chung ba yin mo// sem can
177a1(mdo): thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis/ rang gi sems mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa yin no// sus thams cad gzugs brtan sa bu la byor/ rang gi chos nyid kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi chos nyid khong
177a2(mdo): du chud pa yin no// sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi chos nyid kyis/ rang gi lus chos nyid 'ong du chud pa yin no// rang gi lus sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi rjes su 'jug ci yang dag par 'du ba yin no// sems can
177a3(mdo): thams cad kyi lus kyi nges su 'dug cing yang dag par 'du ba yin no// sems can thams cad kyi sum sangs rgyas kyi skur bye shis rloma'o// de'i phyo gis rlabs de ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud dang bcas pa
177a4(mdo): dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dkang gis kyang g.yos pa 'am/ bskyod par myi nus te bu mo 'di ni de
177a5(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco lnga pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye she
177a6(mdo): chags pa byed pa thob pa na/ mam shing yid ches te/ the com gyi ba nes nur byed cing / myi ldang la kun tu gyi ldang zhing / gyi skrag la kun tu skrag par myi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gos kyi khyab pa la yang mos pa
177a7(mdo): yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi lus kyi las dang / lus kyi gyod lam yongs su dag pa/ chags pa myed cing sgrib pa myed pa/ 'jig rten go khams rab 'byam thos
177a8(mdo): cad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi reg gi las 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i dbyangs sgra brjod pa chags pa myed cing sgrib pa myed la/ bas gos kyi khyab pa thams cad
177b1(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi sgra skad dang / dbyangs dang / chos kyi sgo tshad myed pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi seMs kyi las dus thas cad dang / zhing thams cad dang / sangs rgyas thams cad dang
177b2(mdo): chos thams cad dang / sems can thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thas cad dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad/ 'gro ba mas cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa shin tu rnam par phye ba/ rnam par 'byed pa la moso// 
177b3(mdo): 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi 'od zer ki dA ba bkod pa chags pa skyed cing sgrib pa myed pa la yA mos shing yid ches te/ the tsom gyi ba zhes nur myed cing / myi sdang la kun tu gyi sdang zhing / gyi smag la kun tu skrag par gyi
177b4(mdo): 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis myi khyab pa la yang mos so// sems can gzhan dag kyang mos pa'i chos nyid rnam pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa
177b5(mdo): na 'das pa'i nus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba chags pa myed cidri thogs pa myed pa 'dug pa zhes bya ste/ de la de yod do// dpal bar 'gro ba'i tong nge 'dzin shin tu snyoms pa dang / gzi brjid de dang ldan pa'i gzungs la mkhas las
177b6(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnaMs kyi mtshan tha dad pa dang / che'i ched tha dad par rabs bzhin du brda sprod pa'i mtha' ni myi rtogs so// de bzhin du 'das pa'i byang chub seMs dpa' rnas dang / nyan thos rnams dang / 
177b7(mdo): rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / sems can rnams dang / sems can gi gyod pa rnams dang / sems can gi spyod pa byed pa'i las kyi rnam par sbyin pa so sor myong ba rnams dang / de bzhin du 'das pa'i skal pa las degs pa gapadag pas rgya
177b8(mdo): mas pa dag dang rnal pa gang dag sangs rgyas myed pa dag dang / skal pa gang dag sa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed byung ba'i skal pa de dag ko// rims bzhin du brda sprad pa'i mtha' na gyi
178a1(mdo): rtogs so// de bzhin du 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khas thams cad kyi mying tha dad pa dang / gang dag kun nas nyon mongs pa can dang / gang dag rna pa gang dag chung ba dag dang / gang dag mnus pa dag dang // gang dag
178a2(mdo): dag dang / gang dga'ags pa dang / gang dag rdul phra rab la 'jigs pa'i rjes su zhugs pa dag dang / gang dag kyi luzhugs pa dag dang / gang dag 'thun pa dag dang / gang dag phyogs dang / phyogs 'tshams dza par gzhan
178a3(mdo): ba dang / myig 'phrul na par 'byed pa la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa/ 'dres pa'i 'dzi/ rten gyi khas de dag thas cad ko rims bzhin du rnga sprod pa'i mtha' ni myi rtogs so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lung bstand pa thos \u0f7f
178a4(mdo): mongs pa myed do// lag 'thil dang sor mo lnga mthong ba'i tshul byed pa'i/ den gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis thams cad shes te/ bu mo 'dir dade bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos pa 'dres pa bcu drug par
178a5(mdo): bu lo gzhar yang byang chub ses dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i dpyad pa myod na/ ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes chags pa byed pa thos na/ mos zhing yid ches te the tsom gyi ba/ de 'ur gyi
178a6(mdo): byed cing / myi sngar myi sdug/ skrag par myi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i la yang mos pa yin no// ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra' bcom pa yang dag pa'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
178a7(mdo): dag gi lus dang / lus kyi las dang / lus kyi spyod la yongs su dag pa/ chag pa myed cing sgrib pa myed pa/ 'jig rten gi khas rab 'bye thams cad kyi rjes sung ba la mos so// ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi
178a8(mdo): ka lis / 'jig rten gi kham thas cad du khyab pa'i dbyangs brjod pa chags pa byed cing / sgrib pa byed pa la/ bsam gyis kyi khyab pa zas cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi snga skad dang dbyangs dang / chos kyi sgotshang byed pa bstad / 
178b1(mdo): thams na nad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so// ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i de dag gi/ sems kyis las kyis thams cad dang / zhing thams cad dang / sangs rgyas thas cad dang / chos thams cad dang / seMs can
178b2(mdo): thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thos cad dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi las na par spyad pa/ shind tu phye ba napapa 'byed pa la mos mo/ ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin
178b3(mdo): gshegs pa de dag gi 'od zer gyi tra ba bkod pa'i chags pa myed cing / sgrib pa myed pa la yang mos shing yis ches pa de/ the tsom myi za/ nem nur myed cing myi sdang / myi skrag/ sgeg par myi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi
178b4(mdo): yul bas kas myi khyab pa la mos pa yin no// sems can gzhan de dag kyang rmos pa'i chos nyid rnam pa 'di lta lta bu yang dag par 'dzi nad tu 'jug go// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas
178b5(mdo): byang chub thob pa na/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba/ chags pa myed pa 'jug pa zhes bya ste/ de la de yod do// snying rje chen po'i stobs dang / smon lam yang dag
178b6(mdo): par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin shi nad tu bsgoms pa dang / seng ge nas par sgyings pa'i gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'ongs pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan tha dad pa dang / 
178b7(mdo): tshe'i tshad tha dad pa rang bzhin du brda' spyod pa'i mtha' ni myi rtogs so// de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub mes dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnaMs dang / rang sangs rgyas rnaMs dang / sems can kyi spyod pa rnams dang / 
178b8(mdo): sems can ki las rnams dang / sems cad kyi rnam par smyind pa so sor myong ba rnams dang / de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i skal pa thams cad te// bskal pa gang dag sangs rgyas dang bcas pa dag dang / bskal pa
179a1(mdo): gang la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji ltar zung bar 'gyur ba'i skasad pa// de dag go rims bzhin du ra sprod pa'i mtha' na gyi rtogs so// de bzhin sum 'ongs la
179a2(mdo): ma'ajig rten gyi khas thams cad kyi mying tha dad pa dang / gang dag kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag dang / gang dag rnam par dag pa dang / gang dag chung ba dag dang / gang dag cher gyur pa dag dang / gang dag phra ba dag dang / gang
179a3(mdo): dag rags pa dag dang / gang dag rdul phra rab la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa dang / gang dag skye'u tshugs dag dang / gang dag 'thun pa dag dang / gang dag phyogs dang / phyogs 'tshams rnaM par bzhag pa dang / 
179a4(mdo): myig 'phrul rnam par dbyed pa la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa/ 'ongs pa'i 'jig rten gi khas de dag thams cad go rims bzhin du brda sprod pa'i mtha' ni myi rtogs so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa
179a5(mdo): lung bstand pa thas cad la rmongs pa myed de/ de lag 'jil dang / sor mo lnga mthong ba'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis thams cad zhes de bu mo 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs
179a6(mdo): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu'i bdud pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i myad pa spyod par da ltar byung chuba'i sangs rgyas chos kyi ye shes chags pa myed pa zos na/ mos shing yid ches te/ 
179a7(mdo): the tshom gyi za/ nem nur byed cing / myi sdad kyi skrag/ skrag par myi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis kyi khyab pa la yang mos pa yin no// da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra' bcom pa yang dag par
179a8(mdo): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi lus kyi las dang / lus kyi pyod lalam yongs su dag pa/ chags pa myed cing bsgrib pa byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khas rab 'byamams cad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so// da ltar thung
179b1(mdo): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi ngag gi las dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thas cad du khyab pa'i dbyangs sna chags pa myed cing / sgrib pa myed cing / bsam gyis myi khyab pa thos cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra skad dang
179b2(mdo): dbyangs dang / chos gi sgo tshad myed pa stand pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so// da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi las dus thas cad dang / zhing thas cad dang / chos thas cad dang / sems can thas
179b3(mdo): cad dang / byang chub seMs dpa' thas cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi thams cad dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smyind pa shi nad tu rnam par phye ba/ rnam par 'byed pa la mos so// da ltar byung
179b4(mdo): ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi 'od zer gyi dra ba bkod pa/ chags pa myed cing sgrib pa myed pa la yang mos shing / yid ches te the tsom myi za bar nem nur myed cing / myi snga pa myi skrag/ skrag par myi
179b5(mdo): 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bas kyis kyi khyab pa la yang mos pa yin no// sems can gzhan dag kyang bos pa'i chos nyid nam pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dza nad tu 'jug go// de chos yang dag par
179b6(mdo): grangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub po'ang/ da ltar byung ba'i dus de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba chags pa byed cing thogs pa gyid pa 'dug pa zhes bya ste/ del de yod da/ gnad tu dkang badril byed pa'i
179b7(mdo): phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin shi nang tu bsgoms pa dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gi gzung sa la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thas cad kyi mtshan tha dad pa dang / che'i chad tha dad pa
179b8(mdo): rabs bzhin du brda' sprad pa'i mtha' ni phyi rtogs so// de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' nas dang / nyan thos rnaMs dang / rang sangs rgyas rnaMs dang / sems can rnams dang / sems can kyi spyod pa
180a1(mdo): pa rnams dang / las rnams dang / las kyi rnam par sbyin pa sa sor myong ba nas go rims bzhin du bda' spod pa'i mtha'adi gyi rtogs so// de bzhin du du ltar zung ba'i skal pa thams cad te/ bskas
180a2(mdo): mapa gang dag sangs rgyas dang bcas pa dag dang / gang dag sangs rgyas myed pa dag dang / bskal pa ga la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed byung ba'i bskal pa de dag go
180a3(mdo): rims bzhin du brda' sred pa'i mtha' ni myi rtogs so// de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gi khas thams cad mying tha dad pa dang / gang dag kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag dang // gang dag rnam par dag pa dang
180a4(mdo): gang dag chung ba dag dang gang dag cher gyur pa dang / gang dag char gyu rad pa dang / gang dag phra ba dang / gang dag rags pa dag dang / gang dag rdul phra rab la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa dka dang
180a5(mdo): gang dag s+yai'u phrugs pa dag dang / gang dag 'thun pa dag dang / gang dag phyogs dang / phyogs 'tshams rnaM par gzhag pa dang / myig 'phrul rnam par 'byed pa la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa/ da ltar
180a6(mdo): byung ba'i 'jig rten gi khas de dag thos cad go rims bzhin du brda' srad pa'i mtha' ni myi rtogs so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa lung bstand pa thams cad la rmongs pa myed de/ lag 'thil dang sor mo lnga mthong
180a7(mdo): ba'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis thams cad shes te/ bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco' rgyad pa'o// bcwo brgyad po 'di dag las stsogs pa ni sangs
180a8(mdo): rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa thob ste/ thas cad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste / lus tshad myed pa dang / rdzas cad zild kyis gnod cing thas cad du khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir/ mye gtsug ltar myi mthong ba/ de bzhin
180b1(mdo): gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / lus d+hi smad dang 'dra ba'i phyir mthong ma thag tu/ sems skyo can rnams kyi spyod zhi bar byed pa dang / thams cad du kha na ma tho ba byed pas/ 'khor thas cad las
180b2(mdo): mngon par 'phags pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rab tu thob pras bag tsha ba myed pa dang / yang dag par spyod pas slob ma bsam pa can dang / gdam ngag dang / rjes su bstand pa dang 'thun pas/ slob ma dang myi
180b3(mdo): byed pa dang / seM sa cad la mtshungs par gnas pas/ slob ya ta shi nad tu dul ba dang / chos bstand pa la the tsom myed pas spobs pa myur ba dang / gleng ba myed pa sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa dang // don yod
180b4(mdo): pa'i chos stond pa dang / 'dul ba rnams kyi dbang po yongs su skyend pa sa 'khor thams cad rtse gcig tu sos gcig tu sems da pa la sangs rgyas kyi sgra skad 'byind pa dang / cho 'phrul pas kyis kyi
180b5(mdo): khyab pa'i sa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thas cad kyis mngon gsu da lta ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsod nas tshad myed pa// brtan pa'i phyir lta bas/ mi ngoms pa dang / yang dag par
180b6(mdo): khong du chud pas 'bras bu yod pa'i sa chos stond pa dang / smon lam gyi 'khrugs pas glang po'i lta stangs kyis lta ba dang / spro ba che bas seng ge ltar rna par skyengs pa dang / lus kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro bas
180b7(mdo): don yod par rnam par 'grol ba dang / ngag gi las yegs sngon du 'gro bas kun nas byig dang ldan pas dang / spobs pa myur bas bzung bar 'os pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig dang / bu myed pa'i skyon gnas
180b8(mdo): su gyu rad pas rnyed pa'i mchog dang / grags pa'i mchog dang ldan pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyis klas shing mthas gtugs pas bsod nas zad myi shes pa dang / mthul po che chen po'i lus dang / stobs ba mya dang / 
181a1(mdo): myi 'jigs pa'i mchog thob pas rdzi babyed pa dang / sems cad thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dpa sa chog ma yin pa zhes pas/ sems can la bdel bskyed pa las phyir gyi ldog pa ra/ 
181a2(mdo): 'khrul pa byed la/ brel 'phongs byed pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi stond par gyur pas/ chos dang gtsug lag mang po shes pa dang / chos kyi skus rab tu phye bas tshe dpag tu myed pa dang / shi nad tu mur
181a3(mdo): thug cing mthas klas pas mthong ba dang / reg pa dang bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / dran pa dang thos pa de ni yod pa dang / dus gsum mnye pa nyid du khong du chud pas/ shor pa myi 'khrugs pa dang / chos smra zhing nye bar
181a4(mdo): smra ba myed pas/ ka te rgyun chags pa dang / myi dge' ba'i chos sa cad ma lus par spangs pas bag chags thams cad yang dag par bya com pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rab byung bas slob dpon myed pa/ 
181a5(mdo): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma lus par khong du chud pas rnam paH/ mas cad shes pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 'di dag/ thams cad rab tu 'tho'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
181a6(mdo): bu mo rin chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan su bcul rtsa gnyis po 'di dag sngon dge' ba'i phra ba'i tshogs gang dag la zhugs na/ de bzhin
181a7(mdo): gshegs pa'i sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu'i rtsa gnyis mngon par grub// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol da/ bu mo rari ne chen la/ 'di skad ces bka' rtsa lang to// bu mo
181a8(mdo): sngon dge' ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs chad byed grangs myed pa dag la zhugs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la skyes bu chen po mtshan sum bcu' cha gnyis mngon par grub pa ste/ de dag las cung zad tsam zhig bstan
181b1(mdo): bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan 'bas shind tu gnas pa/ 'di ni sngon dam bcas pa la brtan pas mngon par grub bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i macad 'bas kyi 'phrim
181b2(mdo): 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa 'di ni/ sngon spyod pa sna tshogs brtsegs pas mngon par grub bo// zhabs kyi rting pa yangs shing / zhabs byin gyis mtho' ba ni/ sngon sos can gzhan dag khyad du ma bsad pas grub po// 
181b3(mdo): sor mo rang ba ni sngon sems cad rnams chos kyis bsrungs shing bskyabs te sbu ba byas pas grub po// phyag dang zhabs tra bas 'brel pa ni sngon gzhan gyi g.yog 'khor ma phye bas grub bo// phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'ja
181b4(mdo): pa ni sdod bko' ba sna tshogs byin pas grub po// bdun mtho' ba/ ni sngon bza' ba dang / btung ba rgya chen po byin pas grub po// dbyin pa ri dgas e na ya'i byed pa lta bu ni sdod sangs rgyas kyi chos
181b5(mdo): yongs su bzung bas grub bo// gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nu brda sngon gsang ba'i tshig bsrungs shing 'khrig pa'i chos spangs pas grub bo// ro stod seng ge'i ro stong lta bu ni sngon dge' ba'i las
181b6(mdo): rgya chen po mthar gyis gnas pas grub bo/ thal gong rgyas pa ni sngon dge' ba'i chos yang dag par spyad pas grub po// dpung 'go shiding tu b+hu pa ni sngon gyi 'jigs pas gzhan dbugs phyung bas grub bo// phyag
181b7(mdo): ma bdud cing / ring ba ni sngon gzhan gci bya'o// chog byed pa la stobs grub bo/ sku rnam par dag pa ni sdod gi dge' ba bcu'i las kyi la la ngoms kyi myong bar yang dag par spyad pas grub bo// mgur rung lta bun
181b8(mdo): sngon nad pa rnams la sman pa sna tshogs byin pas rtsub bopo// 'gram pa sreng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu de sngon dgel ba'i rtsa ba la sbyor ba yongasu rdzogs par byas pas grub po// tshes bzhi la bcu la tshang bas na sngon
182a1(mdo): sems cad la bsam pa mnyam par spyor pas grub bo// tshems zags bzang pa ni sems can gyi 'dum pa rnams/ bsdums byas pas grub bo// tshems mnyam pa ni sngon yod du 'ong ba'i do / 
182a2(mdo): mabu byin pas grub bo/ tshems mche' ba dkar ba ni sngon lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi las shi nad tu bsrungs pas grub po// ljags shi nang tu sngon bden pa'i tshig kun bsrungs pas grub po// ri bro'i mchog dang
182a3(mdo): ldan pa ni/ bsngod bsod nas tshad myed pas brtan cing yid du 'ong ba'i ro bro ba byin pas grub po// tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ka la bing kau'i snga dbyangs dang ldan pa ni sngon sems can la 'dza ba'i tshig smra ba dang / tshig sngan
182a4(mdo): pa dang / kun dga' ba'i tshig bsngags pas grub bo// s+yad 'thong ting dang ldan pa ni sngon byas pa dang ldan zhing thams cad srungs pas grub bo// spyan gyi rdzi mA'i rdzi ma lta bu ni sdor bas pa
182a5(mdo): pa spu myed pas grub bo// bral ba'i sbyin 'tshams kyi spyan/ da tu kar ba ni sngon bsngags par 'os pa nas kyi bsngags pas pa dpas grub bo// dbu 'acug tor dang ldan pa ni sngod bla ya la
182a6(mdo): gus shing grub po 'dud pas grubA/ pags pa srab pa de sngon chos yang dag par 'grol ba'i seMs las su rung bas grub bo// pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba ni sngon yid du 'ong ba'i gos dang mal ska pa
182a7(mdo): byind pas grub po// spu'i khung bu nas spyir re ni sngon 'du 'dzi yongs su yangs pas grub bo// spu'i rtse mo g.yas su 'khyil pa ni sngon 'khan po dang slob dpon dang / dka' ba'i bshes gnyen shijam ngag
182a8(mdo): 'thun par 'dzand pas grub po/ dbul oM ne tra ni la lta bu ni sdod srog chags thams cad la snying rje'ang / rdo dbyig dang mtshon cha bor bas grub po/ shing n+ya gro ltar chu zhe pa gal pa ni sngon mkhan po dang
182b1(mdo): bdag dang sems can ka'ang dag kyang ting nge 'dzind la spyod pas grub bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan mthu' po chen po'i lus kun nas mdzes pa 'di ni sngon de bzhin gshegs pa'i
182b2(mdo): sku gzugs byed pa dang / mchod rten zhig pa bcos pa dang / gzhan 'jig pa dag dbugs phyung ba dang / sems can mya 'dus pa'i sdes byas pas grub ste/ bu mo sngon dge' ba'i rtsa ba'i
182b3(mdo): chos tshad byed grangs myed pa 'di dag spyad pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skul/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu'acha gnyis mngon par grub bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ bu mo rin
182b4(mdo): chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi rgyu las byung ba'i dge' ba'i rtsa ba las thos te// sangs rgyas kyi chos thos cad bstand pa 'di
182b5(mdo): ngo mtsha rad to// 'di skad ces gsold pa dang / com ldan 'das kyis bu mor ni cen la 'di skad ces bka/ laH lad to// bu mo de de bzhin te/ bu mo de bzhin
182b6(mdo): gshegs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thos cad bstand pa 'di las bstan to// bu mo gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon rgyu las b+he ra ba'i dgel ba'i cha ba las tsas te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
182b7(mdo): bstand pa 'di thos la/ thos das kyang / de bzhin nyid du grub pa de dag dzas cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis/ rnam pa'i mchog zas cad dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i byang chub seMs dpal rnyed
182b8(mdo): legs par rnyed pa de dag ltos// de bzhin gshegs pa'i skabs dang / kyi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / mtshan rab tu dbye' pa bstanang pa'i chos kyi ni'am
183a1(mdo): 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi kham zas cad rab tu g.yos te/ snang ba chen po khyab par gyur da das/ sos can tshad myed grangs byed pa ni
183a2(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ses bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri lnga stong ni/ myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so// steng kyi bar snang las kyang / lha brgya
183a3(mdo): stong gis me tog gi char rab tu phab ste/ sil snyan yang bkrol nas/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / myi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / mtshan rab tu dbye' pa bstan
183a4(mdo): pa'i chos ki sgo'i le'u 'di thos la/ thos kyang mos shing yid ches/ te/ 'dzind cing de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa'i sems can de dag ni/ dge' ba'i rtsa ba ngan pa dang ldan par myi 'gyur te/ de dag ni
183a5(mdo): ji ltar da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhin du/ stang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi na du seng ge'i snga spogs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i srang du zhen/ 
183a6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das chos 'dini sems can dpal mos shing / nan tan la myi gnas pa nas kyi sdug par mchis par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su dag par spyod pa dang / chos myong pa'i sems can rnams ni/ 
183a7(mdo): chos 'di la dga' bar 'gyur te/ yid la 'bab cing mngon par dga' bar yang 'gyur ro// zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de ras bcom ldan 'das la bu mo rin chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// ba
183a8(mdo): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas/ sngon gi rgyu las byung ba'i dka' ba'i rtsabs sangs rgyas kyi chos thas cad bka' stsal pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub seMs dpa' chos pyod par gyurd pa'i chos
183b1(mdo): ba ni ji lta bu lagasabacom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nas kyis chos bapyod pa legs par bshad du gsol// de skad ces gsold pa dang / bcom ldan 'das su kyis bu mo rin byed la 'di skad ces bka'
183b2(mdo): rtsa lang ngo to// bu mo bsam pa rnam par dag pa ni chos stod pa'o// mdza' ba brtan pa dang / byas pa gzo' ba dang / byas pa shes pa dang / snying brtse ba dang bcas pa dang / skyabs su song ba myi rtong yongs su myi rtong pa
183b3(mdo): dang / nyam chung ba la bzod cing dang du lend pa dang / gtang ba dka' ba yongs su gtong ba dang / phan pa'i dngos po dang / phan 'dogs pa'i blo dang / ngang tshul ran pa rjes su srung ba dang / chos nges par
183b4(mdo): sems dang / chos kun tu srung ba dang / chos 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i chos srung ba dang / dben pa dang / gcig pur du ga' ba dang / dkon pa'i gnas la yongs su skyo ba dang
183b5(mdo): dgon pa'i yon tan la yongs su 'jal ba dang / 'du 'dzi yod sa su song pa dang / sems can yongs su srung ba dang / sems can rjes su bsrung ba dang / 'khrul pa la lta ba dang / 
183b6(mdo): byams pa la sbyor ba dang / snying rje chen po la 'jug pa dang / dka' bas chos dang dga' zhing mchog tu dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la bsam gtan 'cha' ba dang / seMs can rjes su srung ba dang / gzhan dag
183b7(mdo): byang chub kyi sems la sbyor ba dang / theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa smra ba dang / khur blangs pa khyer ba dang / sems myi zhum pa dang / rung ba 'tshod shes pa dang / tshol ba myed pa dang / sdig pa myi 'dod pa dang
183b8(mdo): phra dog myed pa dang / 'dod pa'i 'thob pa spong ba dang / 'phags pa'i rigs chog shes pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yo byad bsnyungs pa dang / 'thab pa myed pa dang / rtsod pa myed pa dang / gnod sos myed pa
184a1(mdo): dang / 'tho babyed pa dang / bzo' ba dang / nges pa dang / rgyu'i byed pa zhung su dran pad/ las kyi rnam par byed pa la yid ches pa dang / dad pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thal
184a2(mdo): dang / gtong ba dang / khrel yod pa dang / ngo che shes pa dang / shes rab kyi nor ga rjes su 'jug pa dang / tha la la gus pa dang / dge' la'i bshes gnyed la ba stend pa dang / bka' blo bdel ba dang / 'thun pa
184a3(mdo): 'dzind pa dang / nga rgyal byed pa dang / bdud pa dang / sems dmal ba dang / bdag la gyi stong pa dang / gzhan la gyi spong pa dang / rang gi yon tan gyi brjod pa dang / gzha gi yod tan la khyi spod pa dang / 'dod chags
184a4(mdo): la 'phyas pa dang / zhe sdang gi sa ba rnam par song ba dang / kan mug gi drug ga.ud pa yun dag byed pa dang / dargyal bcom pa dang spyod lam dang / yod pa lanan tan byed pa dang / chos la rim 'gro bye
184a5(mdo): dga' zhing dad la mngon tu dga' ba dang / sangs rgyas la myi byed pa dang / chos la mos pa dang / dge' 'dun la ston pa ltar 'a dzi nad pa dang / sbyidan pa dang / dul ba dang / sdom pa dang / khyim
184a6(mdo): nas 'byung ba dang / tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa dang / rnyed pa dang / marnyed pa dang / klags pa dang / ma grags pa dang / stong pa dang / smad pa dang / bde' ba dang / bsdug bsngal gyis gyi g.yos pa dang / 
184a7(mdo): 'jig rten gyi chos las shin tu kyi 'da' pa dang / byas sdang la mtshungs par lta ba dang / 'dod de gsong por sgru ba dang / bzhin 'dum pa dang / 'khro gnyer byed pa dang / tshul 'tsham pa byed pa dang / khags ga ce
184a8(mdo): pa dang / g.yo'i byed pa dang / sku byed pa dang / bcas ma ma yin pa dang / bsam pa zhin tu dga' ba dang / sbyid pa dang / snyan par sla ba dang / don byed pa dang / don 'thun pa dang / dka' bar 'gyur
184b1(mdo): chos nyid dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dka' 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / sa rjes su drad pa dang / spyon pa dang / 
184b2(mdo): tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / thabs mkhas pa mngon par sgrub pa dang / dge' ba'i rtsa ba thas cad
184b3(mdo): rna par dag pa dang / sems can nas kyi lus dang / ngag dang / sems rnam par dag par byed pa dang / dge' ba bcu'i las kyi lam srung ba dang / myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag myed pa dang / 
184b4(mdo): sems can myed pa dang / srog myed pa dang / gso' ba myed pa dang / gang zag myed par mos pa mye dang / stong pa nyid nges par sos/ dang / mtshan ma myed pa la gnas pa dang / smond pa myed pa shes pa dang / khas
184b5(mdo): gsum la myi gnas pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / ngadag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam la 'jug pa dang / 
184b6(mdo): zhig nas dang lhag mthong ste sor rtog pa ni chos spyod pa'o// bu mo gzhan chos dpyod pa ni gang na myig la myi spyod pa dang / gzugs la myi spyod pa dang / gzugs kyi mtshan ma la myi spyod pa dang / rna ba la myi pyod
184b7(mdo): ba dang / sbrul gyi spyod pa dang / sna'i mtshan ma la gyi myod dpa dang / snal gyi myod pa dang / dril gyi spyod pa dang / dri'i mtshan ma la myi pyod pa dang / lce la gyi spyod pa dang / rol gyi dpyod pa dang / ro'i
184b8(mdo): mtshad ma la khyi 'apyod pa dang / lus la khyi pyod pa dang / reg pa la gyi pyod pa dang / res pa'i mtshan mas myi myong ba dang / yid la myi spyod pa dang / chos la gyi dpyod pa dang / chos kyi mtshan pa la myi spyod pa ni chos myong
185a1(mdo): gzugs la gyi spyod pa dang / gzugs kyi mtshan ma la myi pyod pa dang / gzugs kyi phyi rtag lal gyi spyod pa dang / gzugs kyi bsdug bsngal ba la phyi spyod pa dang / gzugs kyi bdag myed pa la myi myod
185a2(mdo): mapa dang / gzugs kyi zhi ba la myi spyod pa dang / gzugs kyi stong pa la myi spyod pa dang / gzugs kyi mtshan ma myed pa la myi pyod pa dang / gzugs kyi smond pa myed pa la myi spyod pa dang / gzugs kyi mngon par 'du bya ba myed
185a3(mdo): pa la myi 'apyod pa dang / gzugs kyi dben pa la gyi spyod pa dang / gzugs kyi rang bzhin myed pa la myi spyod pa dang / gzugs kyi ji lta ba bzhin la myi spyod pa dang / gzugs kyi ma skyes pa la myi spyod pa dang / gzugs kyi
185a4(mdo): 'byung ba byed pa la myi gyod pa dang / gzugs kyi gzhi 'amyed pa la/ myi spyod pa dang / gzugs kyi gnas myed pa la myi spyod pa dang / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la myi spyod pa ni/ chos spyod pa'o// 
185a5(mdo): de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed nas dang / na ba ra shes pa la myi gyod pa ni chos spyod pa'o// rna par shes pa'i myi rtag pa la myi spyod pa dang / rna bar shes pa'i sdug bsngal ba la
185a6(mdo): myi spyod pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i bdag byed pa la myi dpyod pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i zhi ba la gyi 'apyod pa dang / rna bar shes pa'i stong pa la gyi pyod pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma byed pa la gyi pyod pa
185a7(mdo): rnam par shes pa'i srid pa pyad pa la gyi spyod pa dang / rnam par shes pa 'i mngon par 'du bya ba byed pa la gyi rtsod pa dang / rnam pa shes pa'i dben pas kyi myod pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la mya spyod pa nga / 
185a8(mdo): rnam par shes pa'i ji lta ba bzhin la gyi spyod pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa la gyi spyod pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'byung ba myed pa la gyi spyod pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi la byed pa la myi myod pa nga
185b1(mdo): rnam par shes pa'i gnas myed pa la myi spyod pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la myi spyod pa ni chos spyod pa'o//
