185b3(mdo): gzugs myed pa la gyi pyod pa dang / kar spyod par byed cing rab tu myod pa myed pa 'dod/ chos spyod pa zhes bya'o// kapa pyod pa byed dang/ na par myod pabyed pa dang / 'gro ba byed pa dang / napa
185b4(mdo): byed pa dang / 'jug pa byed pa dang / ka pan sems dang yid dang / rnam par shes pa la gyi spyod pa dang // mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / bye brag phyed pa dang / rnam par shes pa la gyi pyod pa dang / 
185b5(mdo): gangan 'dod pa dang / 'du byed la gyi pyod pa dang / gapa chos la yang kyi spyodon chos ma yin pa la khyim pa gyi rtsod/ da dang / nangs gnyis la gyi myod pa dang / sna tshogs la
185b6(mdo): myi myod pa dang / gang na 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa la spyod 'ongs da ltar byung ba la myi spyod pa dang / kang na phung po dang / kha sa dang / skye mched la myi spyod pa 'di na
185b7(mdo): chos spyod pa'o// ga na kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnaM par byang ba'i rlom sems la phyi dpyod pa dang / kang na ril po dang / rdzas la myi pyod pa dang / kang na bdag dang / seMs can dang / srog dang
185b8(mdo): gso pa dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shedabur 'dzind pa dang / sgro 'dogs pa la gyi pyod pa dang / gang na skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang / gnas pa la
185b9(mdo): gyi spyod pa dang / gapa dpa' 'did pa pa'i nga 'dzid pa la gyi pyod pa dang / gapang rtag pa dang / chang phul gyi dpyod pa dang / mthar 'dzin pa lta bal gyi spyod pa dang / gapang skye ba dang / 
186a1(mdo): 'jig pa dang / gnas pa la gyi pyod pa dang / gapa dang 'dzind pa dang / pa'i di 'dzin pa la gyi pyod pa dang / gapad rtag pa dang / chad pa la gyi myod pa dang / mthar 'dzin dpa
186a2(mdo): lta ba la myi myod pa dang / dbus la mngon par zhen pa la myi myod pa dang / bdag dang chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyi gnas dang gnas byed pa'i gnas dang / chos kyi rang bzhin gyi gnas dang / chos thams cad kyi
186a3(mdo): gnas dang / stong pa dang / myi stong pa'i gnas dang / shin tu gnas pa'i gnas dang / chos thas cad myi ga yo ba dang / myi gnas pa dang / ka nas myed pa dang / ngo bo nyid byed pa dang / sgrub myed pa
186a4(mdo): dang / spros pa myed pa dang / brang ba myed pa myed pa dang / dor ba myed pa dang / khas len pa byed pa dang / len pa myed pa dang / chos 'di zhes la zhes pas/ rloms sems kyang myed pa
186a5(mdo): 'di ni yang dag pa dang / de kho na dang / de bzhin nyid dang / chos shes pa zhes bya'o// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' gang de lta bur chos thams cad khong du chud nas/ sems can
186a6(mdo): zhan dag la 'dul ba'i phyir/ 'khor ba la yang spyod la/ mya ngan las 'das pa'ichos nyid las kyang phyi g.yo ba 'did byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang dag phul yin do// chos spyod pa bstan du
186a7(mdo): pa 'di bshad pad/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong de/ bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to// bu mo ron cin gyis ni/ mu tig gi sa mo dbye ba brgya' stong ri ba/ bcom ldan 'das la phul nas
186a8(mdo): tshig 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub seMs dpa' gang chos pyod pa 'di la brtson pa 'di ni/ chos thams cad la bcon pa lags so// de'i lung stand pa ni 'di lags ste/ byang chu
186b1(mdo): kyi snying po la gnas nas/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom ste/ phyir myi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas btab par lta'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bus/ bu mo 'odi cen la 'di skad ces smras so// 
186b2(mdo): bu mo khyod kyis byang chub seMs dpa' rnams kyi phyir myi ldog pa'i phyag rgya shes sa/ de nas bu mo rin chen gyis de 'tshe tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la/ tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'di la chos
186b3(mdo): dbyings sems cad bya khams// yang dag nyid kyis mnyam rtogs nas// gnyis byed rtogs pa gang yin pa// nged kyi ldog phyag rgya yin// gang dag 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang // da ltar pa
186b4(mdo): byung dang ma byon pa// thams cad chos kyi dbyings mnye par// rtogs pa de dag phyir myi ldog/ gang yang 'dus byas khams rnams dang / gang yang 'dus ma byas pa'i khams// 
186b5(mdo): dben pa'i don gyis stong par ni/ khong du chud pa phyir gyi sngo/ sngon gi mtha' ni mthal yas pa// dam chad na gyi dmyig// som kyi skad cig gcig ldan la/ kho
186b6(mdo): de chung phyir myi ldog/ 'jig rten pa'i chos gang dag/ spyod par btags pa'i spyod yul nas// shes rab kyis de de rtogs pa// gang yin de dag phyir myi ldog// bdud kyi yul ni ji snyed pa
186b7(mdo): gang gis sangs rgyas yul nas dang / de dag myi gnyis shes pa ning // phyag rgya 'di yis btab pa yin// 'dod chags zhe sdang ga ti mug gang // nyon mongs gang dag mtha' yas pa/ gang gis rtogs pa'i/ 
186b8(mdo): rtsa ba las// byung bar shes pa phyir gyi ldog/ 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// byang chub zhi bar bstand pa yang // tha dad ma yin kun mnye par// khong du chud pa phyir gyi ldog/ phung po ji bzhin byang chub ste/ 
187a1(mdo): phung po byang chub myi gnyis shing // sgyu ma 'dra bar ma nya shes te// rnam tog byed pa de dag mkhas// gang yang khas rnams bzhil po dag/ nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i khams yin te// bzung byed khong du
187a2(mdo): chud pa ni// yang dag phyag rgyas btab pa yin// myig ni byang chub byang chub myin// sangs rgyas kyis ni stong par gsungs// ji ltar myig bzhin byang chub ste// rtag tu mnyam pa nyid kyis mnye// de ltar skye mched thos cad kyang // 
187a3(mdo): rtag tu stong ste byang chub mnyam// tshul 'di rab tu shes pa dag/ phyag rgya nges ni btab pa yin// sems cad rnams ni kun gyi sems// sems cig gis ni rab shes pa// de ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub las/ phyir gyi ldog par the zom
187a4(mdo): byed// sems cad kun gyi dbang po de// rab dang 'bring dpa' na// pha rol phyin pa gang yin la// de dag phyir gyi ldog pas na// thogs pa myed pa'i yobs pa yin// rgyun mo med par rgyud
187a5(mdo): yang // bskal pa bye bar brjod kyang rung // de'i sngags pa de myi zad/ nam mkha'i khas ni zar 'gyur la// rlu di zhags pas gzung 'dru ra srid// de'i spobs pa 'jig rten kyis// zad par bya ba yong kyi
187a6(mdo): nus// gang gis sems ni myi mongs shing / thos pa'ang chung zad kyi 'gyur ba// chos rnams thams cad 'dzind pa'i// gzungs ni de dag spyod yul yin// phyogs bcu'i kun gyi 'dren pa yis// dam pa'i chos ni
187a7(mdo): kar bshad pa// gzungs thob pas na de zas cang // dran pa dang ni shes pas 'dzind // gzungs ni shi nang tu bslabs pas na// sdod gi bskal pa bye bar ni// skyob pa rnams kyis chos thos pa// de dag dris nas stong
187a8(mdo): par 'gyur// phyir gyi ldog pa gang yin pa// de dag gzungs ni 'di 'dra ste// yobs pa dag kyang 'di 'dra zhing // de dag ye shes 'di 'dra'o// chos nas phyag rgya stong pa nyid// na sgyid byed cing gsal myed pa// sdom
187b1(mdo): pa'i phyag rgyas gang btab pa// de dag phyir gyi ldog par bskrad // nam ma kha'i phyag rgyas btab pa 'jos// rang bzhi dag sa 'brung rtsod par// ma' 'di khong du bachungs// phyag rgyas btab pa'i phyir gyi 'on// 
187b2(mdo): chos ni rten nas 'byung ba ste// chu myed pa'i chos myed do// chos gang rgyu las byung ba dag/ de'i mtshan nyid 'gog pa'o// chos nas kun gyi mtshan nyid ni// dam mkha' mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid de// mtshan nyid phyag rgya
187b3(mdo): de 'dra ba'i// phyag rgyas gang btab phyir myi ldog/ phyir gyi ldog pa gang yin pa// sems cad kun gyi pyod pa dang // gzugs dang spyod lam dus rnams dang // skad cig gcig la rab tu stonang // sbyin pa'i tshogs
187b4(mdo): ni mtha' yas te// bsod nams rtag tu myi zad pa// gal te/ ro gcig 'gyur na ni// nam mkha'i khams kyang gang bar 'gyurade dag tshul khrims che ba nyid// sangs rgyas tshul khrims 'byung
187b5(mdo): gnas te// dpag tu myed cing mtha' yang byed// nam mkha' ni dbyings dang 'dra// sems cad kun dang nyan thos dang // rgyal ba re re'i tshul khrims ni// phyir myi ldog pa'i tshul khrims kyi// bcul
187b6(mdo): drug cha'i rin gyi mchog/ de dag bzod pa myi zad de// de dag skye ba byed pas bskyed// bzod pa khyi'i phun gsum 'tshogs// phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ba yin// de dag brtson 'grus che ba nyid// yang dag 'tshon pa dpag
187b7(mdo): tu byed// brtul ba yang dpag tu med pa ni// seMs can thos cad tshim par byed// brtan pa rtag tu mnyam par bzhag// g.yeng ba byed cing shi nang tu bsdams// bya ba rnams kun pa stond kyang // mnyam par bzhag las g.yo'
187b8(mdo): ba myed// shes rab kyis ni chags myed thob// lta ba'i bag chags rnam par sbyangs// sangs rgyas spyod yul rdzogs par thob// phun 'tshogs pa 'i zhing yang spyod// sangs rgyas phyag rgya btab pa de// ye shes pha rol
188a1(mdo): gyi nang pa thob// thabs ched dag kyang shind tu skabs// byang chub kyi ni sad pa spyod// sems can yongs su sbyin byed pa// de dag spyod mtha' yas te// spyod pa ni 'dra bas ma ci 'dra// de dag bapyod pa zhes pa byed// 
188a2(mdo): dgral bcom dag dang nga rgyal dang // bdud dang mu stegs gzhan kun gyis// de dag spyod yul tshad myed pa// shes par nus pa ma yin no// de dag pas gtan rdzu 'phrul dang // rnam 'phrul 'du byed bcas pa myin// dpa' bo lhun gis
188a3(mdo): grub par ni// bya ba de dag kun la 'jug/ tshe dang 'jug dang 'chi 'pho dang // byang chub kyi ni snying po dang // chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor dang / sangs rgyas kun kyi spyan snga na// zhing rnams kun na snang ba ni// nyi zla lta bur gsal
188a4(mdo): pa ste// de dag nam mkha' mtshungs par ltad// theg pa mos pa ji bzhin// par// mya ngan 'da' ba'ang ston mod kyi// myi ldog phyag rgya ga/ nga yin pa// phyag rgyad ni 'dor ma yin// nam mkha' ji tsam khyab pa dag/ 
188a5(mdo): de srid ye zhes khyab par byed// phyag rgya las ni gyi ldog pa// sangs rgyas kyi sa ni de dag mkhyenang // phyir myi ldog pa'i phyag rgya 'di bshad pa na/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g.yos so// 
188a6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong ni phyir gyi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas lung bstanang par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang // bu mor ni can la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste// bu mo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyir gyi ldan
188a7(mdo): par stand pa 'di ni legs par smras pa ni// legs so legs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis ga so spyad to// bcom ldan 'das bu mo rini chen gyis/ yobs pa 'di 'dra ba las ma// de phyir
188a8(mdo): myi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa lags te// the tsom ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das chos 'di mngon gsum gyur par 'di 'dra ba'i bstand pa stond par nus pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal rtsa lad pa/ 
188b1(mdo): rab 'byor de de bzhin do// ji skad sbas pa bzhin te// bu mo rin cen ni phyir gyi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa// bzod pa rab tu thob pa/ theg pa chen po'i gting thob pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bu mo rini chen gyis
188b2(mdo): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la bu ma rin chen gyis 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po/ theg pa chen po zhes brgyal ba ci'i slad du theg pa zhes 'byol// de skad ces gsold pa dang / 
188b3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das bu mo rini can la 'di skad ces bka' rtsa lad to// bu mo theg pa 'di ni si sa can thams cad la skabs dbye' pas rgya chen por// dge' ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kund tu stond pas/ theg pa de ni sgrib pa myed do// 
188b4(mdo): nyon mongs pa'i yun rag dang bral bas/ theg pa de ni dri ma myed pa'o// thams cad du rnam par grol ba'i sgo 'i mtshan nyid yin pas/ theg pa de ni kun tu snang ba'o// gdod ma nas kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pas
188b5(mdo): theg pa de ni 'od gsal ba'o// bag chags dang bral ba'i phyir/ theg pa de ni yongs su dkar ba'o// tshul khrims kyi phung po shi nang tu srung / ma pa'i phyir// theg pa de ni yongs su dag pa'o// ting nge 'dzind kyi
188b6(mdo): phung po shi nid tu brtags pa'i phyir// theg pa de ni mnyam par legs par gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi phung pos legs par brtags pa'i phyir/ theg pa de ni zag pa myed pa'o// rna par grol ba'i phung po shi ni tu dkar
188b7(mdo): pa'i phyir// theg pa de ni nges par grol ba'o// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes pa mthong ba shi nad tu rtogs pa'i phyir/ theg pa de ni chos thas cad mnya pa nyid du stond pa'o// stobs bcus shi nad tu yongs su zind pas/ theg pa
188b8(mdo): de ni myi thul ba'o// myi 'jigs pa bdis seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa'i phyir theg pa de ni 'jigs pa myed pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcolargyad kyis nang tu yongs su zind pas/ theg pa de ni myi thul ba'o// 
189a1(mdo): byin khyis tshul phogs par byed par 'gro'o// sems can thams cad la byas pa'i sems kyi phyir theg pa de ni// mnyam pa'o// chos dang 'thun pas bdud dang pas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcad pa'i phyir theg pa
189a2(mdo): de ni chos dang 'thun pas nges par 'joms pa'o// bdud kyi phyogs thams cad las rna bar rgyal bas theg pa de ni na bar 'jig par byed do// theg pa de ni nyon mongs pa'i bdud rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o// theg pa de ni phung po'i bdud yongs su
189a3(mdo): shes pa'o// theg pa de ni 'chi' bdag gi bdud dang bral ba'o// theg pa de ni nyon mongs pa'i bdud rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o// tha sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs pas theg pa de ni// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nang
189a4(mdo): pa yongs su rdzogs pas/ theg pa de ni yongs su gdung ba myed pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs pas/ theg pa de ni bdud dang phyir rgol ba'o bcom pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang
189a5(mdo): pa yongs su rdzogs pas theg pa de ni brtan pa gyi byed pa'o// drang po ma na pa dang / snyom las thams cad dang bral ba'o// theg pa den / na byed pa'o// bAsam gtan ga pha rol su phyid pa yongs su rdzogs pas/ 
189a6(mdo): theg pa de ni sems kyi gdung ba'i skyon dang bral ba'o// theg pa de ni lam bzang po thams cad kyi gnas su 'grol ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzon so pa'i phyir/ reg pa de ni dzas cad la mkhas pa dang
189a7(mdo): thams cad ma khyedad pa'i ye shes dang / 'jig rten pa thas cad dang / 'jig rten pa'i las 'das pa'i chos thams cad so so yang dag par rig pa'o// thabs la mkhas pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ theg pa de ni theg pa thos
189a8(mdo): cad kyis ci rigs par 'byung ba'o// mya ngan 'das pa'i 'gros kyis theg pa de ni 'ong ba dang 'grol ba myed pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gya nom pas theg pa de ni kye nom par 'gro ba'o// theg par de ni bdel
189b1(mdo): bar 'gro' ba'o// zhi gnas dang lcag mthong gi rlung gi shugs dang ldan pas theg pa de ni byin gis rlabs kyis 'gro ba'o// pas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis bltar gyi mthong bas// / theg pa de ni dbang po dang / stobs/ 
189b2(mdo): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi kha khyer kyis yongs su bskor ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad bde bar lta ba'i phyir/ theg pa de rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhis 'gro ba'o// dge' ba'i chos rdzas cud dang ldan pa
189b3(mdo): 'i phyir theg pa de ni yang dag par spong ba la mnyam par legs par gnas pa'o// bar myi phyed pas theg pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shi nad tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'o// zag pa myed pa'i chos 'ong ba'i phyir theg pa de ni/ 
189b4(mdo): khas gsum las byung ba'o// 'dus byas kyi khams kyi snang ba 'o/ ba pas theg pa de ni 'dus byas kyi khams 'dus ma byas pa'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa myi 'dod pas theg pa
189b5(mdo): de ni byang chub kyi sems ma brjed cing kha lo bsgyur te legs par khrid/ pa'o// spyi gtsug ltar myi mthong bas theg pa de ni mngon par 'ang gas pa'o// theg pa de ni bsod nas kyi tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o// 
189b6(mdo): theg pa de ni ye shes kyi tshogs kyis sems can gi bsam pa rab tu shes pa'o// gtan pa myed pa'i mchod sbyin byed pas theg pa de ni sgo bye ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mnyam pa'i phyir theg pa de ni ro gcig pa'o// grags
189b7(mdo): pa phyogs bcur grags pa'i phyir/ theg pa de ni bsgrags pa'o// legs par byas pa'i las kyi phyir theg pa de ni lha thams cad kyis phyag byas pa'o// bsngags pa mtha' yas pas theg pa de ni brgya byin dang / tshangs
189b8(mdo): pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thas cad kyis mngon par bstod pa'o// sbyin pa sngon du 'gro bas theg pa de ni/ ser sna can rnams la gtong ba sbyin pa'o// snying rje chen pos shi nad tu zind pas theg pa de ni dang tshul
190a1(mdo): dad pa rnams la tshul khrims sbyin pa'o// sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems myed pas theg pa chen por gnod pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams la bzod pa sbyin pa'o// go cha brtan pa myi 'dod
190a2(mdo): bar theg pa de ni/ le lo can rnams la brtson 'grus sbyin pa'o// sems cadul zhing zhi la las su rung bas theg pa de ni/ g.yeng ba rnams la bas gtan sbyin pa'o// sems can thos cad thos pa la sbyor bar theg pas
190a3(mdo): de ni shes rab 'cha lad pa dzas la shes rab sbyin pa'o// sdig pa thas cad kyi byed pas/ theg pa de ni bdel ba thams cad bsgrub cing sdug bsngal thas cad seld pa'o// theg pa de ni chags pa myed pa'i ye shes kyis// sangs
190a4(mdo): rgyas kyi ye shes dang / chags pa myed pa'i ye shes kun tu stond pa/ theg pa thams cad kyi spyi bor phyi nad pa ste/ de'i phyir theg pa chen be zhes bya'o// chos kyi rnams grangs 'di bshad pa na/ srog chag/ 
190a5(mdo): khro nyes stong ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas// 'di skad ces bdag cag kyang theg pa na po la zhugs te/ sems cad chad ma mchis pa rdeg pa chen po 'di
190a6(mdo): la dgod par bgyi'o// zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bu mo rin cen gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gis zas cad mkhyend par gyur du nges par myi 'byung ba theg pa chen po 'bim du
190a7(mdo): gcod pa gang lags// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo rin cin la 'di skad ces bka' rtsa lad to// bu mo thog pa chen po'i bar du gcod pa su bcu la rtsa gnyis te/ bar du gcod pa de da/ 
190a8(mdo): gis rdzas cad mkhyend par gyur du ngas par myi 'byung ngo // su bcul rtsa gnyis gang zhen/ 'di lta ste nyan thos kyi reg pag pa zhe na/ 'dod pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'dod pa dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa
190b1(mdo): nyid mngon par 'dod pa dang / skye ba la gnas te/ tshangs par pyod pa dang / dge' ba'i rtsa ba gcig la chags pa dang / longs spyod/ 'dog pa rnas la ser sna byed pa dang / sems can rnams la mnyam par
190b2(mdo): myi spyod pa dang / tshul khrims lhod pa dang / byang chub kyi seM sa myi srung ba dang / gnod sems dang / khong khro pA la nyal bar byed pa dang / sems zhu ba dang / brjed ngas pa dang / thos pa don tu myi gnyer ba dang
190b3(mdo): dpyod pa myed pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal 'phel ba dang / lus dang sems kyi las yongs su ma dag pa dang / dam pa'i chos mye srung ba dang / slob dpon chos 'chab pa dang
190b4(mdo): bsu pa'i dngos po rnams 'dor pa dang / yang dag par dga' ba/ ra 'gyur ba'i chos gtong ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs po dang / bstend pa dang / byang chub tu yongs su myi sngo ste/ phung po
190b5(mdo): gsum dang / myi mthun pa dang / dge' ba'i rtsa ba chung ngus rlom seMs su byed pa dang / thabs myed par ltung ba'i zla dang / phyir zhing dkon mchog gsum ki bsngags pa gyi
190b6(mdo): dang / byang chub seMs dpal la gnod par ses dpa' dang / ma thos pa'i chos spong ba dang / bdud kyi las khang du mi chud pa dang / 'jig rted rgyang phan pa'i gas pa tshig 'dzind pa dang / so sa
190b7(mdo): can yongs su sbyin par myi byed pa dang / 'khor lnga'i yongasu skyo ba ste/ bu mo su bcul rtsa gnyis po de dag ni theg pa chen po'i bar du ya bdag phul yin te/ bar du gcod pa de dag gis thams cad mkhyen
190b8(mdo): par nges par myi 'byung ngo // de lta mod kyi 'od kyang bu mo theg pa chen po'i yon tan ji tsam pa bar du gcod pa yang de tsam mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dus byas kyi skyod ji tsam pa theg pa chen po'i bar du ga
191a1(mdo): pa yang de tsam mo/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan ji tsam pa theg pa chen po'i yon tan dang / sngags pa yang de tsam mo// theg pa chen po'i yon tan dang / bsngags pa ni tsam pa de bzhin gshegs
191a2(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pas/ sos kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa/ rab tu mkhyend pa yang de tsam ste/ de dag thams cad ni theg pa chen po'i bar du gcod pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rab tu mkhyend pa ji/ tsam pa theg pa zhe
191a3(mdo): 'i bsngags pa dang yon tan yang de tsam mo// po mo de lta bas da mi nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos theg pa chen po'i nyon mongs par gyur pa'i chos yongs su spang bar bya'o// chos gang dag gis theg pa chen po rnam par
191a4(mdo): dka par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag la bstend par bya/ bsgom par bya/ mang du bya'o// de la theg pa chen po rna par dag par 'gyur ba'i chos gang zhe na// bu mo sum bcu' rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni theg pa chen po rnam par dag par 'gyur ba ste/ 
191a5(mdo): sum bcu 'a rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gsol ba ma btab pa sems can thams cad la dge' ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa dang / gzhan gyis byas pa rnams la mngon par dga' ba byed pa dang // dge'
191a6(mdo): ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad la bas pa gartan pa dang / bya ba thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa la zhu ba myed pa dang / bsam pa dag pas sos rnyog pa myed pa dang / pyod lam thams cad du rnam par myi rtog pas lus yongs su dag pa dang / 
191a7(mdo): ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pas// ngag yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub kyi sems myi 'dor bas sems yongs su dag pa dang / lan la myi ribs skyid pa yongs su dag pa dang / ngang tshul ngan pa yongs su skyob pas/ tshul khrims
191a8(mdo): yongs su dag pa dang / lus dang thog la myi lta bas bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / stobs bcu' dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhil yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/ bcon 'grus yongs su dag pa dang / nyon mongs pa thas cad
191b1(mdo): kyis zil gyis myi non pas/ bsam gtan yongs su dag pa dang / bag chags thams cad yang dag par 'joms pas shes rab yongs su dag pa dang / bdud kyi las thams cad yongs su saso babs/ sems dpal dang
191b2(mdo): kha 'og tu lus 'khrus par byed pas yi dam la brtan pa dang / sems can yongs su smind par byed pas bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams mya 'dor ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung bas/ sangs rgyas la byas pa gzol pa dang / 
191b3(mdo): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rab tu rdzogs par byed pas/ yongs su myi skyo ba dang / shes rab dang / ye shes rab tu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ thos pas myi ngoms pa dang / gong ma'i khyad par khong du chud pas de la mchig
191b4(mdo): pa dang / myi gtsug bltar myi mthong bar bya ba'i phyir nga rgyal myed par nyan pa dang / rgyu dang rkye nang tshogs pa ga nad du mthong ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad dang 'gal ba myed pa dang / 'phags pa 'dor bdun
191b5(mdo): rab tu thob pa'i phyir/ dbul ba myed pa dang / bdag la dbang bas rang dbang yod de/ bran ma yin pa dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs mngon par bsgrubs pa'i mngon par shes pa nas kyis
191b6(mdo): sos can thos cad gi nyon mongs pa zhig par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba 'asgrubs pas zhig nas kyi tshogs dang / lhag mthong gi tshogs dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed
191b7(mdo): dang / smon pa myed pa bsgom pa'i phyir/ rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo gsum go skom/ kund tu stond pa dang / chos can thams cad snyed kyi ye shes khong du chud pas dang nye bar zhi ba dang / myi skye ba'i chos la bzod
191b8(mdo): pa'i phyir/ zad pa dang myi skye ba shes pa dang / chos thams cad la nan tan snying por byed cing / gnas la lung bstand pa ste/ bu mo chos su bcu'irtsa gnyis po de dag ni/ theg pa chen po rnam par dag pa'i le
192a1(mdo): 'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang phyi'i skye dgu'i srog chags bdun khri nyi stong ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed do// byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong kyi skye ba'i chos la
192a2(mdo): bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to// steng gi bar snang las kyang lha brgyal stong gis maco dang ka zha'i sgra phyung ste// me tog kyang gtor sil snyan yang bkrol nas/ gang theg pa chen po'i yon tan dang / bsngags pa bstand pa 'chos
192a3(mdo): kyi sgo'i le'u 'di thos la thos nas kyang mos pa dang / mos nas kyang lend cing 'dzind te/ yang dag par nan tan byed pa'i sems can de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la nges par gnas par 'gyur ro// ched du brjod pa de skad ched du mdzad
192a4(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / myi mched kyi ba dag po tshangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gso/ dad to// bcom ldan 'das kye ma'o// ci tsam du chos kyi rnam grangs don mang
192a5(mdo): po dang / ldan pa'i sgrib pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar bgyid pa/ nges pa'i don dang ldan pa/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad 'dul ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kun tu 'dzin
192a6(mdo): pa shind tu gdon gyi 'tshal ba/ zab mo nges pa'i tshig bstand pa 'di/ bstand pa ni ngo ma tshar to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blang bar bgyi'o// gzung bar bgyi'o// chos kyi na
192a7(mdo): grangs 'di chos smra ba gang gi sug par mchis pa dang / mdzod du chud pa dang / glegs bag tu mchis par gyur pa dang // lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyid dang / dri za gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la los pa dang / 'jidad par 'gyur/ 
192a8(mdo): pa de dag yongs su bzung ba'i su ka lag bgyi'o// gang sems ma dad pas bskabs tshol ba de dag ci nas kyang / chos smra ba de dag la 'tshe bar myi 'gyur bar shi nad tu tshar bku bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brkyal
192b1(mdo): byin dang rgya mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / 'jig rted myong ba bzhi ra la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ grogs po dag chos smra ba yongs su gzung ba'i phyir dam bcas par gyu da pa ni legs so legs so// klonas
192b2(mdo): po dag chos smra ba yongs su bzung bas dpa pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba yin no// dpa'i chos yongs su gzung bas sems can thams cad yongs su bzung ba byas pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldad
192b3(mdo): pa kun dka' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dka' bo bu mo ngon cen kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su dris pa'i chos kyi ni grangs 'di zung shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ ka zha na dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston
192b4(mdo): cing / kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa la mos pa dmyigs pa la gnas pa'i bzod pas/ bskal pa brgya' stong du sbyin pa byin pa bas// gang yang byang chub seMs dpa' gzhan zhig
192b5(mdo): chos kyi ni grangs 'di la zhugs te/ gzhan dag la yang rab tu ston cing / sos can rab tu tha ra pa la bya ba la dmyigs nas snying rje chen po la gnas pa dang / kang byas pa chen po dang ldan 'ang
192b6(mdo): chos nges pang sems pa'i bzod pa la rab tu gnas na// de de pas bsod nams ches yang du 'phel te/ 'di ltar theg pa chen po la ches myur du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' cha lad pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa
192b7(mdo): kun dga' bos// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnga grangs 'di'i myang ci lagasu/ 'di ji ltar bzung
192b8(mdo): par brgyal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' rtsa lad pa/ kun dka' bo pas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bden pa dang / chos dang don dang / 'dul ba la mkhas pa'i sgo'i le'u zhes bya bar zung shig/ yon tan rin
193a1(mdo): po che/ yon tan ga yem lelas par sems skyed par bstan de pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / kyi la kris pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chom la 'dres pa dang / macan rab tu bye
193a2(mdo): bstand pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub ses dpa'i mya chos spyod pa mtha' dag ces bya ba dang / phyir gyi ldog pa'i phyag rgya bstan pa zhes bya ba dang / theg pa chen po'i min ngag ces bya ba dang / 'dus pa'i le lu zhes
193a3(mdo): bya ba dang / bu mo rin cen gis zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shika/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi sgo li le'u 'di 'thu zhing gzhan dag la yang bshadan/ yon tan dpag tu myed pa la chos kyi sdang ba thob pa
193a4(mdo): 'gyur ro// sems can rnams sangs rgyas kyis mdzad pas/ nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'das dang / mabyond pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
193a5(mdo): 'das rnams kyi mdun du ni 'dir 'dus pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan na des kyis de skad ces bka' cald pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / bu mo 'di can dang / lha dang myi dang lha ma yon dang
193a6(mdo): dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten// 'chom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la ya rangs te/ mdzod pa snyed // 'phags pa theg pa che pa'i yan dag ces rgya mkhreg pa yin pa'i mas
193a7(mdo): rdzogs s+ho// rgyag gi 'khan po 'dzin gyi tA da da zhi la dang/ na de ye zhes sdes skur cing gtan la pha3/ 
193a8(mdo): ga la bcwa dag sa nyis dag pa sus / dan / gam sa rgya thamasas kyi yum sa ma
193b1(mdo): snang ba'i rgyan ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdol/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sem dpal nas cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dum cig na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khag da/ 
193b2(mdo): bya rgod kyi phung po'i dri'i rtse mo'i drung // chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po'i khang ba'angs na 'di lta ste/ nyan thos chen po brkyang po kun zhes ke'u din rgyalas tshags pa/ dge' gro ba nyi zhe lnga stong ga dgel blong gi dge' 'dun can
193b3(mdo): po thams cad kyang / dgra' bcos pa/ zag pazang pa/ nyon mongs pa myed pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems zhin thun ma yang grol ba/ shes rab gan turnam par grol ba/ shes pa/ blang na
193b4(mdo): chen po bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ phur bor ba/ 'dug gdon rjes su thob pa/ srid pa kun tu spyor pa/ yongs su ba pa yang dag pa'o zhes pas/ sems shin pa tun ma par
193b5(mdo): krol ba/ sems cad thos cad kyi dbang gi de pa'i pha rol/ da tu son pa sha stag dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub seMs dpa 'a sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / nor dpal
193b6(mdo): dpal dang / sangs rgyas dpal dang / sma gi rgyal po dang / smon yang dag 'phags las sogs pa/ 'jig rten gi khams gzhan dang / gzhan dag go de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgyal stong gis
193b7(mdo): kun nas bkye ga'i byang chub sems dpa'/ bye ba khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis thams cad kyang / phyir myi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor la thams cad kyang shi nang tu rgyas pa'i sde/ dkon mchog
193b8(mdo): rtsegs pa'i mdol yongs su zhu ba la mkhas pa thams cad kyangs bcul pa chos kyi sprin thob pa/ thams cad kyang shes rab kyis ring ba lhar gyur pa/ thams cad kyang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang
194a1(mdo): smond pa myed pa dang / skye ba myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa yongasu bsgoms pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ thams cad kyang chos zab mo'i snang ba chen po thob pa/ thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lal dang ldan
194a2(mdo): thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa/ yongs su sbyangs pas nges par byung ba/ thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'di
194a3(mdo): snyam du bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi myur ba dang / stobs dang / shugs chen po yang dag par skyed par bya ba'i phyir chos gi gtam brjod par bya zhing / 'jig rten gi khams gang ka'i klung
194a4(mdo): gi bye ma snyed dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnams kyi myur ba dang / stabs dang / thugs chen pa yang dag par skyed par bya ba'i phyar chos ga gtam brjod par bya zhe gzi brjid
194a5(mdo): che ba dag bsdu bar yang \u0f7f/ bdag gis chos bstand pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad pa'i ltas snang ba chen po yang bstand par bya/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams lhag
194a6(mdo): nas/ bdag la chos bstand pa chen po yongasu zhu bar 'gyur bar yang bya'o snyam du dgongs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'dzin
194a7(mdo): rte na gi khams grangs myed cing // bsam gyis kyi khyab dag gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag 'od zer chen po'i sprin dag gis sdang bar mdzad do// de'i tshe na phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas kyang / byang chub sems
194a8(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brjod du byed pa bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnyed dag lhags so// de dag las byang chub sems dpa' re re yang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa/ 
194b1(mdo): 'phrul pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dag gis 'ongs te/ lhags nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'thun pa'i mchod pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang rang gi smon lam gyi stobs
194b2(mdo): las byung ba'i pad pa'i stan la 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la myig myi 'dzums par lta zhing sdod par gyurd to// de'i tshe na/ chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po'i khang bzangs de'i dbus su seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che chen po'i pad
194b3(mdo): ma'i snying po can/ rgyang dpag tshad bye ba phrag grangs myed pa yod pa/ ri mtho ba/ nor bu rin po che kun snang ba las grub pa/ nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron ma'i kha khyer gyis yongs su bskor ba nor bu rin po che 'od bsam gyis
194b4(mdo): myi khyab pa'i lan kan gyis yongs su bskor ba/ nor bu rin po dpe' myed pas yongs su bskor ba/ nor bu rin po che snang ba dpe' la sa 'das pa'i 'phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/ nor bu rin po che dbang
194b5(mdo): gi rgyal po'i dra bas kun nas g.yogs pa/ nor bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis smras pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgrengs pa dang ldan pa zhig byung bar gyu rad to// seng ge'i
194b6(mdo): khri nor bu rin po che chen po'i snying po can de'i kho ra khor yug nas/ 'od gzer grangs myed pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu byung ste/ 'od de dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtend gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag
194b7(mdo): snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// yang de'i che na/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas kyang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / phyi 'am ji dang / lto 'phye chen
194b8(mdo): po dang / brgya byid dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rte dang skyo ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum 'phrag brjod du byed pa bcu'i dul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag kyang lhags par gyur da te/ de dag las kha cig ni
195a1(mdo): rin po che'i khang pa legs pa dag na 'khod pa/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khraka khrig 'bum phrag grangs myed cing bsam gyis myi khyab pa/ klu dbyangs dang / rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa dag dang lcags so// 
195a2(mdo): cig ni me tog las byas pa dag dang / kha cig ni tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po las byas pa dag dang / Sha cig ni mu tika las byas pa dag dang / kha cig ni rdo rje las byas pa dang / kha cig ni nor bu rin po che rdo rje ltar
195a3(mdo): snang ba las byas pa dag dang / kha cig ni 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa dag dang / kha cig ni nor bu rin po che'i 'od thams cad yang dag par 'dus pa las byas pa dag dang / kha cig ni nor bu rin po che
195a4(mdo): dbang gi rgyal po las byas pa dag dang / kha cig ni rin po che yid bzhin gyi nor bu las byas pa dag dang / kha cig ni nor bu raM na po che brgya byin thogs pa las byas pa dag dang / kha cig ni rgya

195a6(mdo): 'bum phrag grangs myed cing bsam gyis myi khyab pa/ klu dbyangs dang / ros mo'i sgra 'byed pa dag dang lhags so// lhags nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / mtshungs pa myed pa/ 
195a7(mdo): dang / gzhal du myed pa dang / dpag tu myed pa las kyang / shi nad tu 'das pa'i mchod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang rang gyi smon lam gyi stobs las byung ba'i bstan dag la 'khod
195a8(mdo): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la myig phyi 'dzums par lta zhing sdod par gyur to// de'i tshe na/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams 'di 'dzam bu chu bo// gser las grub par kun tu gan
195b1(mdo): par gyurd cing / nor bu rin po che chen po sna tshogs kyi shing ljon pa dag gis legs par brgyan pa dang / lha'i me tog ki shing ljon pa dka dpo/ gos kyi shing ljon pa dag dang / can dang sprul ki snying po'i shing sngon pa/ 
195b2(mdo): dka dang / spos kyi shing ljon pa dag dang / a ka ru'i shing ljon pa dag gis kyang legs par brgyad cing / nor bu rin po che nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / grog gi sgron ma'i dra bas kun nas khyabs pa dang / gdugs
195b3(mdo): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba dang ldan la/ shing ljon pa thams cad la yang lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs myed pa mu tig gi do shal lus phyed pa thogs pa dang / rin po che chen po'i
195b4(mdo): 'phreng ba thogs pa dag 'khod par gyur da to// de'i tshe na seng ge'i khA nor bu rin po che chen po'i snying po can de las tshigs su bcad pa la de dag byung ngo // khyod kyi bsod nams stobs kyis bdag byung ste/ 
195b5(mdo): myi dbang rgyal tshur gshegs pa bzhugs su gsol// rgyal ba rkangaganyis dam pa gdeg bgyi ste/ de ring bdag gi brnag pa 'di rdzogs 'gyur// bdag gi lus 'di rin cen rgyas grub ste/ 'dren pa
195b6(mdo): khyod phyir bdag gi dkyil na ni// rin chen pad ma yid 'od gcig mchis te// skyob pa bdag gi brnag pa deng rdzogs mdzod// rin chen pad ma 'di la bzhugs nas ni// bdag dang 'jig rten 'di kun mdzes par
195b7(mdo): mdzod// gang thos seng ge'i khri 'di 'dra thob pa// chos de srog chags bye mar bstand du gsol// khyod kyi sku las 'od gzer stong byung ste// 'jig rten khams mang rab tu snang bgyid pa// de ni bdag kyi dag
195b8(mdo): mchog skyes pa'i mtshan// 'dren pa bdag gi slad du bzhugs su gsol// sngon yang bdag gis phyogs 'dir rang byung ba'o// thub pa bye ba phrag brgyad bteg gyurd pas// myur du bzhugs te phan/ dgas mdzad
196a1(mdo): du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das de ba 'dir phan gdags mdzad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das bdan snga ma las bzhengs te/ seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che chen po'i pad ma'i snying po can// de la dkyil mo krub
196a2(mdo): bcas te bzhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la rnam par gzigs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la yang dag phul gyi chos bstand pa 'di ltas mdzad do// de'i tshe na
196a3(mdo): thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ bdag cag gi/ 
196a4(mdo): zos nas yun ring du lon pa/ skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de yongs su zhus na ci ma rung snyam mo// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur de pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltas mdzad
196a5(mdo): pa yang rig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis mas kyi yongs su rtog pa yang sems kyis shes nas stan las la/ ngas te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i
196a6(mdo): lha pad ma'i snying po la btsugs te// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa zhes brgya
196a7(mdo): na/ bcom ldan 'das skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba de chos gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/ de la ma tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsol to// kyi skye 'gag pa ma mchis pa// rnam 'dren rjod/

196b7(mdo): chen po'i rang bzhin gis gzhi chen po de la yum bsu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / khang bzangs rnam pa re rgyal byed kyi gzugs brnyan kun tu snang bar 'gyur ba de ltar kun nas gnas par gyur pa la
196b8(mdo): de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin/ lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis brtse ba dang / dga' ba dang dga' dgur spyod par yang kun tu snang bar gyurd cing // de nas de'i tshe lha rnams kyis 'dzam bu klir ba'i skyes pa dang
197a1(mdo): zung byed dang khye'u dpa/ bu mo sems cad la tshig 'di skad ces kye skyes pa dang / bud byed dag tur sheg/ lha'i dbang po brgya byed 'di 'ang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed kyi nang na/ lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan
197a2(mdo): lnga po de dag gis phye ba dang / dga' ba dang dga' dgur gyod pa byed pa la ltos/ kye skyes pa dang bud myed kyi tshogs dag chung sheg dang sbyin pa dag byin cig/ bsod nams dag gis shig tshul khrims yang dag par long ste/

197a6(mdo): nas/ thal mo sbyor zhing me tog dag kyang 'bor bar byed/ spos dag kyang 'thor bar byed la/ tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag kyang lha'i dbang po brgya byin ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i lus thob par gyurd cig/ bdag cag kyang
197a7(mdo): ji ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed kyi nang na/ lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po 'di dag kyis rtse ba dang / dgal ba dang / dga' dgur spyod par byed pa de ltar gyurd cig ces brjod par
197a8(mdo): byed kyang / sems can de dag gis ni 'di ltar byed du ma chen po'i rang bzhin gis gzhi chen po la/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas dang / khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin snang ba 'di ni/ 
197b1(mdo): bye du rgya chen po'i rang bzhin yongasasu dag pa'i phyir gzugs brnyan kun tu snang ba yin no zhes de ltar yongasu myi shes te/ de dag brgya byin nyid 'dod pas sbyin pa dag kyang sbyin pa/ bsod nams dag kyang byed/ tshul
197b2(mdo): khrims kyang yang dag par blangs te/ gnas shing dge ba'i tsha ba dag kyang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas snang ba der skye bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed na/ 'jam dpal ji ltar bye du r+ya chen po'i rang bzhin gyis
197b3(mdo): gzhi chen po de la/ sum bcu gsum pa'i gnas kyang myed/ khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed kyang myed/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang byed mod kyi 'on kyang bye du rgya chen po yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ de la sum bcu pa gsu
197b4(mdo): pa'i gnas dang / 'ang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed dang / lha'i dbang da po brgya byin gyi gzugs brnyan kun tu snang ste/ de dag kyang lo// dad pa ma yin zhing / skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa yid bzhin du
197b5(mdo): bye ru rgya chen po yongs su dag pa'i phyir gzugs brnyan yang kun tu snang ba de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal sems yongs su dag par / skom pa shi nad tu goms par byas pa'i sems can la/ de bzhin
197b6(mdo): gshegs pa'i sku snang bar gyurd te/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus/ sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ba de yang ma byung ba/ ma skyes pa ma 'gags pa/ dngos po ma yin/ dngos
197b7(mdo): po myed pa ma yin/ ltar snang ba ma yin/ ltar myi snang ba ma yin/ 'jig rten ma yin/ 'jig rten myed pa ma yin/ sems pa yod pa ma yin/ sems pa myed pa ma yin/ bsam du yod pa ma yin/ bsam du myed
197b8(mdo): pa ma yin pa yod pa ma yin/ byed pa ma yin mod kyi/ 'jam dpal 'on kyang sems can rnams ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la dmyigs nas/ me tog dag kyang 'thor bar byed/ spos dang na bza' nga
198a1(mdo): rin po che dag kyang 'bul bar byed cing / tshig 'di skad ces bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'dra ba de 'dra bar gyur da cig ces brjod par byed de/ sangs/ 
198a2(mdo): rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pa de dag sbyin pa dag kyang sbyin/ bsod nams dag kyang byed/ tshul khrims kyang yang dag par blangs te gnas shing / de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su
198a3(mdo): sngo bar byed do// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ byed du rgya chen po'i rang bzhin gyi sa gzhi chen po de la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi gzugs brnyan snang ba de g.yo bar myi byed/ sems par myi byed/ spro bar myi byed/ 
198a4(mdo): rtog par myi byed/ rnam par rtog par myi byed cing / rtog pa myed pa/ rnam par rtog pa myed pa/ sems pa myed pa/ yid la byed pa myed/ pa zhi ba bsal bar gyur pa/ skye ba myed pa/ 'gag pa myed pa
198a5(mdo): mthong ba myed pa/ thos pa myed pa/ bsnams pa myed pa/ myangs pa myed pa/ reg pa myed pa/ mtshan ma myed pa/ rnam par rig pa skye/ dpa/ rnam par rig pa bya ba ma yin pa de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal
198a6(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang / g.yo bar myi byed/ sems par myi byed/ spro bar myi byed/ rtog par myi byed/ rnam par rtog par myi byed cing / rtog pa myed pa rnam par
198a7(mdo): rtog pa myed pa/ sems dpa' myed pa/ yid la byed pa myed pa/ zhi ba bsil bar gyur pa/ skye ba myed pa/ 'gag pa myed pa/ mthong ba myed pa/ zos pa myed pa/ bsnams pa myed pa/ myangs pa myed pa/ reg pa myed pa/ 
198a8(mdo): mtshan ma myed pa/ rnam par rig pa myed pa/ rnam par rig par bya ba ma yin pa ste/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni skye ba myed pa'i gnas yin mod kyi/ 'od kyang 'jig rten na gzugs brnyan bzhin du snang zhing / 
198b1(mdo): sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba'i bye ba phrag gis tshe'i bye brag ston par yang byed la/ yongs su smin pa dang / mos pa'i stobs bskyed pas/ byang chub kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can rnams la
198b2(mdo): gzugs brnyan snang bar gyur da te/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos zab par 'gyur// bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum du shes par yang 'gyur/ bsam pa ci lta ba bzhin du rnam/ 
198b3(mdo): par grol bar yang 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi bsod nams kyi stobs kyis grub pa'i chos kyi rnga bo che de gang gi tshe/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha rnams lha'i
198b4(mdo): 'dod pa byed mo dang / dga' ba dang / longs spyod kyi rtag par rgyun tu/ shas cher bag myed par gyurd cing / yang dang yang du lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs kyi nang du zhugs te chos yang dag par 'gro bar myi byed
198b5(mdo): pa dang / 'jam dpal gang gi tshe/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang / lho'i 'dod pa'i rtsed mo dang / dka' ba dang / longs spyod dag gis rtag pa rgyun tu shas cher bag myed par gyurd cing / yang yang du/ lha'i
198b6(mdo): bdun sa/ chos bzangs kyi nang du zhugs te/ chos kyi khri stan la 'dug nas/ chos smra bar myi byed pa de'i tshe/ chos kyi rnga bo che bar snang la 'dug cing myig gi las las yang dag par 'das te/ bltar gyi sdang zhing myi
198b7(mdo): mthong ba de ltas chos kyi sgra 'di lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ chos kyi sgra des sum bcu pa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha thams cad la 'di skad du grogs po dag gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dag ni myi rtag pa yin gyis/ bag myed pa
198b8(mdo): ma pyod cig/ gnas 'di nas myur du shi 'phos par gyur da ta re/ grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba yin no// grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni stong pa yin no// grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni bdag
199a1(mdo): myed pa yin no// grogs po dag 'di nas shi 'phos pa rnams ni yang 'dir skye bar 'gyur bar dga' ba yin gyis bag myed par ma byed par// grogs po dag chos yang dag par 'gro ba kyis shig/ chos kyi kun dga'/ 
199a2(mdo): pa la dga' bas dka' bar gyis shig/ chos gces par bya ba dang / chos la gzhol ba dang chos rjes su dran pa yid la byed pa la gnas par gyis shig/ lha'i 'dod pa'i phyed mo dang / dga' ba dang / longs spyod pa 'di dag
199a3(mdo): dang yang myi 'bral bar gyis shig ces smras go bar byed do// 'jam dpal de'i tshe na/ chos kyi rnga bo che bltar myi snang ba/ gzugs myed pa/ rtog pa myed pa/ rnam par rtog pa myed pa/ myig gi lam las yang dag par 'das
199a4(mdo): pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ myig gi lam yang dag par 'das pa/ sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang / bral ba de lta bu/ de'i sgra des sum bcu ha gsum pa'i ris kyi lha thams cad la yang dag par
199a5(mdo): bskul bas/ de dag 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa dang / skyo ba dang / yid 'byung bar gyurd nas/ lha'i mdun sa chos bzangs kyi nang du zhugs te/ chos kyi kun dgal la dga' bas dga' bar gnas shing
199a6(mdo): chos gces par bya ba dang / chos la gzhol ba dang / rjes su dran pa yid la byed pa gnas par yang byed de/ de dag de nas shi 'phos nas khyad par du 'gro bar yang 'gyur ro// de'i tshe na/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i bu
199a7(mdo): mdun sa chos bzangs gi nang du bzhugs te/ chos kyi khri stan la 'dug nas chos ston par byed do// 'jam dpal gang gi tshe lha ma yin rnams dang / lhan cig g.yul sprod par byed cing / der yang gang gi tshe sum bcu pa gsum
199a8(mdo): pa'i lha rnams pham par gyur pa de'i tshe na/ chos kyi rnga bo che de sgra 'di lta bu 'byin par byed de/ swa des lha ma yin rnams 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa dang / yid byung bar gyur da nas 'bros par byed do// 'jam dpal chos
199b1(mdo): kying bo de la ni sgrub par byed pa dang / lus gzugs chung zad byed de/ 'jam dpal chos kyi nga bo che de ni bltar gyi mthong ba/ byi snang ba yod pa ma yin/ bsam du med pa/ sems dpa' byed pa/ mtshad ma byed pa 'dun
199b2(mdo): can ma yin/ smra myed pa/ dngos po myed pa/ gnyis su myed pa ste/ myig gi lam yang dag par 'das pa yin mod kyi 'jam dpal 'on kyang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha'i bu sngon yongs su sbyang pa byas pa rnams la
199b3(mdo): chos kyi rnga bo che de sgra de lta bu 'byin cing / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyi gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed do// 'jam dpal ji ltar chos kyi rnga bo che de ltar skye
199b4(mdo): snang ba/ myi mthong ba/ yod pa ma yin pa/ ma byung ba/ bsam/ du myed pa/ sems myed pa/ mtshan ma myed pa/ gzugs nan/ ma yin pa/ sgra myed pa/ dngos po myed pa/ gnyis su myed pa ste/ myig gi/ 
199b5(mdo): lam las yang dag par 'das par / yin mod kyi/ 'jam dpal 'on kyang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha'i bu sngon yongs su spyong ba byas pa rnams la chos kyi rnga bo che de sgra de lta bu 'byin cing / sum bcu rtsa
199b6(mdo): gsum pa'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa/ thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ lha thams cad la yang chos kyi sgra yang dag par skul bar byed la chos kyi sgra de yang sum bcu
199b7(mdo): gsum pa'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyi gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed de/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sarba
199b8(mdo): rgyas kyang ltar gyi snang ba/ phyi mthong ba yod pa ma yin pa/ ma byung ba/ bsam du myed pa/ sem pa pa byed pa/ mtshan ma byed pa/ gzugs can ma yin pa/ sgra myed pa/ dngos po myed pa ste/ byig gi lam las yang dag pang / 
200a1(mdo): 'das pa/ yin mod kyi 'jam dpal 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par sbyin pas/ bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi sgra 'byung bar kun tu shes shing / chos kyi sgra de yang sems
200a2(mdo): can thams cad kyi gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir 'jug par 'gyur te/ chos kyi skad kyis 'jig rten na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ 
200a3(mdo): 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni yod pa ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'jig rtend na chos kyi sgra skad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya bar 'dogs par 'byung ste/ sems can rnams kho na'i sngon gyi dge ba'i nye ba'i las kyi
200a4(mdo): rnam par smin pas sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa las sgra 'byung bar kund tu shes so// sgra de yang sems can thams// cad kyi bde ba thams cad/ yang dag par bskyed par bya ba dang / bag
200a5(mdo): myed pa rnams la yang dag par bskul bar bya ba'i phyir 'byung ste/ 'jam dang pa la sems can de dag gis sgra de thos nas/ 'di ni de bzhin gshe gas pa'i sku yin no snyam du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rtog par yang byed
200a6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa rnams dang / byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa la dmyigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung yang thos mod kyi/ 
200a7(mdo): 'jam dpal 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa yin par rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ sos ka'i dus kyi mthar thug
200a8(mdo): nas dbyar zla ra ba byung bar gyur da pa na/ sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smind pas/ sa la gnas pa'i sa bon gi tshogs dang lo thog gi tshogs dang / rdza dang / shing gel ba dang / rtsi dang / nags tshal
200b1(mdo): thams cad kun tu bskyed par bya ba'i phyir/ steng gi nam mkha' bar snang kyi gnas la 'di 'dra ba'i rlung dag ldang ste/ des char ba sdud par byed cing bsdus nas kyang sa gzhi chen po la dbas par byed do// des sa gzhi chen po thos
200b2(mdo): cad kun tu tshim par byed cing / de'i tshe na/ 'dzam bu gling pa'i myi thams cad kyang rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skye bar byed de/ de la 'jig rten na sprin ces bya ba'i phying du 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gang gi tshe steng gi bar snang las
200b3(mdo): char pa'i tshogs chen po myi 'bab pa de'i tshe/ 'dzam bu gling pa'i myi thams cad 'di skad ces/ 'dir sprin myi 'khor ro zhes brjod par byed do// 'jam dpal gang gi tshe na/ steng gi bar snang las char tshogs chen po sa gzhi chen
200b4(mdo): po la 'bab pa de'i tshe na ni/ 'dzam bu gling pa'i myi thams cad 'di skad ces A la la sprin chen po'i char gyi rgyun 'bebs par byed cing / sa gzhi chen po yang kun tu tshim par byed do zhes kyang brjod par byed do// 'ja
200b5(mdo): dpal de na ni sprin yang myed la/ sprin du gdags pa yang byed de/ 'dza dpal sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi/ las kyi rnam par smin pa char pa'i tshogs chen po rlung gis kun nas bskyed na ni/ steng gi bar
200b6(mdo): snang las 'bab par yang 'gyur la/ 'jam dpal char pa'i tshogs chen po rlung gis kun nas dkrugs na ni/ steng gi bar snang de nyid du bag la zha bar yang 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de ltar sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi las
200b7(mdo): kyi rnam par sbyind pas/ steng gi bar sna ba la char pa'i tsho gas chen po de/ rlung kun nas 'dus pa dang / rlung kun nas 'khrug pa dag gis char pa'i rgyun kun tu 'dzind pa 'am/ 'bebs par byed pa/ de la sprin ces 'dogs
200b8(mdo): pa 'byung mod kyi/ 'jam dpal de la ni/ sprin yang byed/ sprin du gdags pa yang myed de/ 'jam dpal sprin de ni ma skyes pa ma 'gags pa/ sems kyi yul du myi 'jug pa/ 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang bral ba yin no
201a1(mdo): 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sngon dge ba'i phra ba'i tshogs la sogs pa dag dang / sems can nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pa gzhan dag dang / sems can dges
201a2(mdo): ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par bstand pa'i rgyu can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa thogs pa myi mngal ba dang ldan pa 'jig rtend du byung ngo/ 
201a3(mdo): 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ste/ de gang cig gsung ba de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin pa/ ma nor pa de bzhin pa/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin pa yin pas/ de la lha dang mi rnams kyi nang na de bzhin gshegs pa
201a4(mdo): zhes bya ba'i mtshan du btags pa yin te/ 'jam dpal de las lha dang / dmyi rnams kyi nang du/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i sgra la byung bar yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni
201a5(mdo): yod pa ma yin pa ste/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mtshan ma skye dpa/ mtshan ma dang bral ba/ yul na myi gnas pa/ phyogs na myi gnas pa/ ma byung ba/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa yin no// 'ja
201a6(mdo): dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs pa des lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten chos kyis yang dag par tshim par mdzad cing yang dag par 'dzin du btsud nas/ byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa rnams dang / byis pa so so'i skye bo yod
201a7(mdo): su mya ngan las 'dabs 'dul ba gzhan dag gri sngon gi las kyi rnam par sbyin pas myi snang bar gyur da pa na/ de dag 'di snyam du/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das so snyam du yang sems ste/ 'jam dpal de
201a8(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa ni skye ba yang myed/ 'gag pa yang myed do// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma mo skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa ste/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzod ma nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa
201b1(mdo): yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni yod pa ma yin pa ste/ 'jam dpal ji ltar char pa dmyigs pa las sprin ma byung ba ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ yod pa
201b2(mdo): ma yin pa de la 'jig rten na sprin sprin ces bya bar 'dogs pa 'byung ba de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal chos stond pa dmyigs pa las de bzhin gshegs pa ma byung ba/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ yod pa ma yin pa/ bzod ma
201b3(mdo): nyid nas skyes pa de la/ 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya bar 'dogs pa 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ stong gsum 'bum phrag bcu la dang
201b4(mdo): sbyar ba'i tshangs pa chen po zil gyis myi non cing zil gyis gnon par byed/ da pa ni/ nyin cig bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i ris kyi mthar thugadapa'i bar gyi lha'i ris kyi thams cad la rnam par lta bar byed de/ 'jam
201b5(mdo): dpal stong gsum gi 'bum phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba'i tshangs pa chen po zil gyis myi non cing zis kyis gnon par byed de/ lha'i ri/ sa thams cad la rnam par lta bar byed pa de'i tshe na/ lha'i ris thams
201b6(mdo): cad kyi nang na/ lha'i bu thams cad rang rang gi 'dod pa'i rtsed mo dang dga' ba dang longs spyod dag spangs te/ sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / klu dbyangs kyi sgra thams cad zhi bar byas nas/ 'dod pa'i rtsed mo dang / dga'
201b7(mdo): dang / longs khyod yid la byed pa btang ste/ gus pa dang bcas pas thal mo sbyar nas tshangs pa chen po de la myig myi 'dzums par lta bar byed do// tshangs pa chen po de yang gnas myi g.yo bar lha'i bu thams cad yud tsam zhag
201b8(mdo): bdag la ltar 'jug par byed de/ de'i tshe/ lha'i bu de dag tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'dod cing dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// 'jam dpal tshangs pa
202a1(mdo): chen po de yang tshangs pa'i gzhal myed khang de nas 'chi 'pho bar myi byed bzhin du sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / lha'i bu de dag gi sngon gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i mthus stong gsum 'bum
202a2(mdo): phrag bcu la dbang sbyar ba'i tshangs pa chen po zil kyis myi non cing zild kyis gnon par byed pa gzhan zhig byin gyis rlob par byed do// 'jam dpal sprul pa'i tshangs pa chen po de yang nyin gcig bzhin du rgyal chen
202a3(mdo): bzhi'i lha'i ris kyi mthar thug pa'i bar gyi lha'i ris thams cad la rnam par lta bar byed de/ 'jam dpal de'i tshe na/ lha'i ris thams cad kyi nang na/ lho'i bu thams cad rang rang gyi 'dod pa'i rtsed mo dang / dga' ba dang
202a4(mdo): longs spyod dag spangs te sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / grung byangs kyi sgra thams cad zhi bar byas nas 'dod pa'i rtsed mo dang dka' ba dang / longs gyod yid la byed pa btang ste/ gus pa dang
202a5(mdo): bcas pa'i thal mo sbyar nas/ tshangs pa chen po de la myig myi 'bru mas par lta bar byed do// sprul pa'i tshangs pa chen po de yang gnas nas myi g.yo bar lha'i bu thams cad yud tsam zhig bdag la
202a6(mdo): ltar 'jug par yang byed do// de'i tshe na/ lha'i bu de dag kyang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'dod cing dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang tshangs pa'i 'jig rtend du skye bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar yang byed do// 'jam dpal
202a7(mdo): de la ni tshangs pa yod pa ma yin te/ 'jam dpal tshangs pa de ni/ stong pa ya ma r+Ya/ ma byung ba/ yi ge myed pa/ sgra myed pa/ yul myed pa/ dngos po myed pa/ bsam du myed pa/ mtshan ma myed pa/ sems dang / yid
202a8(mdo): dang / rnam par shes pa dang / bral ba/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa yin mod kyi/ 'jam dpal 'on kyang tshangs pa chen po de nyid kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / lha'i bu de dag gis sngon gyi
202b1(mdo): dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i mthus/ lha'i ris thams cad la bltar snang bar yang 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'on kyang lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du/ tshangs pa chen po 'di ni srul pa/ stong pa ya ma R+Ya/ ma byung ba/ 
202b2(mdo): yi ge myed pa/ sgra myed pa/ yul myed pa/ dngos po myed pa/ bsam du myed pa/ mtshan ma myed pa/ sems dang / yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/ skye ba myed pa/ 'gag pa myed pa yin no// snyam du myi sems so// 
202b3(mdo): 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang stong pa/ ya ma rA/ ma byung ba/ yi ge myed pa/ sgra myed pa/ yul myed pa/ dngos po myed pa/ bsam du myed pa
202b4(mdo): mtshan ma myed pa/ sems dang yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang / bral da pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa yin mod kyi/ 'jam dpal 'o// na kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang
202b5(mdo): rgyas kyi sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa rnams dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang / 
202b6(mdo): byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi dge ba'i pha ba bsags pa'i mthus/ de bzhin gshegs pa gnas nas myi g.yo bzhin du mtshan brgya stong kyis legs par brgyan pa/ 'jig rten na gzugs brnyad bzhin du kun tu snang ngo // 
202b7(mdo): 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa rnams dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad dang / byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni 'di snyam du/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni stong pa/ ya ma rA ma byung ba
202b8(mdo): yi ge myed pa/ sgra myed pa/ yul myed pa/ dngos po byed pa/ bsam du byed pa/ mtshan ma myed pa/ sems dang yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa yin par/ mi sems mod kyi
203a1(mdo): 'jam dpal 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni spyod lam thams cad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan brgya stong gis legs par brgyan pa las/ sems can mos pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa rnams la chos
203a2(mdo): ston pa chen po 'byung bar yang byed do// chos bste nad pa de yang sems can thams cad kyi gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni de la yang thos
203a3(mdo): cad du mnyam zhing btang snyoms la rnam par myi rtog cing bye brag myi 'byed de/ 'jam dpal rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig bla dgas yin par rig par
203a4(mdo): bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' saHlad to// de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu skye mod chos/ chos rnams kun kyang bde bar gshegs pa dang 'dra// byis pa'i blo can
203a5(mdo): mtshan mar 'dzind pa rnams// 'jig rte nad dge na myed pa'i chos la spyod// de bzhin gshegs pa zag myed dge ba yi// chos kyi gzugs pa na yin te 'di la ning / de bzhin nyid myed de bzhin gshegs pa 'ang myed
203a6(mdo): 'jig rten kun na gzugs brnyan kun tu snang // 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od gzer dag ni/ 'dzam bu'i gling du dang po kho nar ri'i dbang po'i rgyal po rnams sdang bar byed do// de'i 'og tu
203a7(mdo): ri 'khor yug dang / khor yug chen po rnams snang bar byed do// de'i 'og tu ri chen po gzhan dag snang bar byed do// de'i 'og tu ri nag po rnams sdang bar byed do// de'i 'og tu sa phyogs mthon po mthon po dag snang bar byed
203a8(mdo): de'i 'og tu 'dzam bu gling 'di'i sa phyogs dpa' ba dpa' ba dag kyang snang bar byed do// 'jam dpal 'on kyang nyi ma'i 'od gzer de dag ni rtog par myi byed/ rnam par rtog par myi byed/ sems par myi byed/ rnam par
203b1(mdo): sems par myi byed de/ 'jam 'dapal nyi ma'i 'od gzer rnams ni/ sems dang yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ mtshan nyid myed pa/ mtshan nyid dang bral ba/ yid la byed pa myed pa
203b2(mdo): yid la byed pa dang / bral ba/ spros pa myed pa/ spros pa dang bral ba/ yongs su gdung ba myed pa/ yongs su gdung ba dang bral ba/ tshu rol na gnas pa ma yin/ pha rol na gnas pa ma yin/ mtho' ba ma yin/ dpa' ba ma
203b3(mdo): yin/ bcings pa ma yin/ grol ba ma yin shes pa dang ldan pa ma yin/ shes pa dang myi ldan pa ma yin/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa ma yin/ nyon mongs pa myed pa ma yin/ bden pa smra ba ma yin/ brdzun pa smra ba ma yin
203b4(mdo): pha rol na ma yin/ tshu rol na ma yin/ 'gram na ma yin/ gshod nam/ yin/ zang la ma yin/ chu bo na ma yin/ rtog ge'i khyod yul ma yin/ rtog ge ma yin pa'i spyod yul ma yin gzugs can ma yin
203b5(mdo): gzugs myed pa ma yin mod kyi/ 'jam dpal 'on kyang sa gzhi mtho ba dang / dma' ba dang / bar ma'i bye brag gis snang ba chen po dang chu ngu dang / bar ma'i 'od gzer sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de
203b6(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang rtog par myi byed/ rnam par rtog par myi byed/ sems dpa' myi byed/ rnam par sems dpar myi byed de/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems dpa
203b7(mdo): yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/ ma skyes pa ma 'gags pa/ mtshan nyid myed pa/ mtshan nyid dang bral ba/ yid la byed pa myed pa/ yid la byed pa dang bral ba/ spros pa myed pa/ spros pa dang bral ba/ yongs su gdung ba myed
203b8(mdo): pa/ yongs su gdung ba dang bral ba/ tshu rol na gnas pa ma yin/ pha rol na gnas pa ma yin/ mtho ba ma yin/ dma' ba ma yin/ bcings pa ma yin/ grol ba ma yin/ shes pa dang ldan pa ma yin/ shes pa dang myi ldan
204a1(mdo): pa ma yin/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa ma yin/ nyon mongs pa dang bral ba ma yin/ bden pa gsung ba ma yin/ brdzun pa gsung ba ma yin/ tshu rol na ma yin/ pha rol na ma yin/ 'gram nam
204a2(mdo): ma yin/ gnong na ma yin/ thabral ma yin/ chu bon ma yin/ thams cad mkhyend pa ma yin/ thams cad kyi mkhyend pa ma yin/ rtog ge ma yin/ tog ge myed pa ma yin spyod pa ma yin/ khyod pa myed pa ma yin/ 
204a3(mdo): kun tu 'byung ba ma yin/ kun tu myi 'byung ba ma yin/ dran pa dang ldan pa ma yin/ dran pa dang myi ldan pa ma yin/ sems pa ma yin/ sems pa myed pa ma yin/ yid ma yin/ yid byed pa ma yin/ sgra skad ma yin
204a4(mdo): sgra skad myed pa ma yin/ mying ma yin/ mying myed pa ma yin/ zugs ma yin/ gzugs myed pa ma yin/ brjod pa ma yin/ rjod du myed pa ma yin/ gdags pa ma yin/ gdags pa myed pa la
204a5(mdo): yin/ bltar snang ba ma yin/ bltar gyi snang ba ma yin/ tshum yin/ tshul myed pa ma yin/ lam ston pa ma yin/ lam myi ste/ na pa ma yin/ 'bras bu thob pa ma yin/ rtog pa ma yin/ rtog pa
204a6(mdo): myed pa ma yin/ rtog pa dang bral ba ma yin/ rtog pa dang ma bral ba ma yin mod kyi/ 'jam dpal 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ye shes kyi 'od gzer dag ni khams gsum po dag tu chos kyi
204a7(mdo): dbyings mtha' dang dpung myed pa dag la thogs pa myed pa'i 'od gzer gyi snang ba dag gtong bar mdzad cing / ye shes kyi 'od gzer btang ba dag gis kyang dang po kho nar byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa ri'i dbang po'i rgya
204a8(mdo): po chen po lta bu dang ldan la rnams kyi lus la 'bab par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi lus la 'bab par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu sems can lhag pa'i bsam
204b1(mdo): ba dge nga pra ji lta pa dang ldan pa names kyi sum sa 'bab par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma 'i dkyis 'khor bya ye shes kyi 'od gzer dag/ zan sems can log pa nyid du nges pa'i sems kyi rgyu
204b2(mdo): ldad pa rnams kyi lus la 'bab par 'gyur zhing de dag la ma/ 'ongs pa'i rgyu yang dag par skyed pas par 'dogs pa dang / dge ba'i chos rnams kyis yang dag par 'phel bar yang byed do// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshes
204b3(mdo): pa ni de dag sa yang thams cad du mnyam zhing btang snyoms la/ rnam par myi rtog cing bye brag myi byed de/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor kyi ye shes 'od gzer ni 'di snyam du/ bdag gis sems
204b4(mdo): can 'di la ni chos rgya chen po bstan par byo'o// 'di la bstan par myi bya'o// snyam du yang mi sems la/ 'di snyam du sems can 'di ni rgya chen po la mos pa yin no// 'di ni bar ma la mos pa yin no// 
204b5(mdo): 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la mos pa yin no// 'di ni bsam ba yin no// 'di ni dman pa dang log pa la mos pa yin no snyam du/ rnam par rtog par yang myi byed do// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs
204b6(mdo): pa ni 'di snyam du sems can 'di ni rgya chen po la mos pa yin gyis 'di la ni theg pa chen po bstan par bya'o// 'di la ni lhag pa'i bsam pa par ma la mos pa yin gyis 'di la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bstan par bya'o// 
204b7(mdo): 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la mos pa yin gyis 'di la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa bstan par bya'o// sems can bsam pa dge ba rnams kyi bsam pa rtogs par byas nas bsam pa rnam par spyad par bya'o// sems can log
204b8(mdo): pa nyid du mos pa'i bar dag ni lta ba drang por bya zhing / ji ltar rjes su 'thun pa'i chos bstand par bya'o snyam du yang myi sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ye shes 'od gzer snang ba ni de ltar rnam par
205a1(mdo): rtog par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gzhan pa pa nyi ma'i dkyis labar gyi ye shes kyi 'od gzer sdang 'di rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / shAb brtsas
205a2(mdo): cad yang dag par rgyun chad pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i bsam pa'i rgyud sna tshogs dag la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor kyi 'od gzer gyi sdang ba sna tshog pa dang
205a3(mdo): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// / 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya ma tsho chen po'i dpad/ nong bu rin po'i chen po bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhig yod de/ de rgyal mtshan gyi rtse
205a4(mdo): la btags na/ de las sems can gang gi bsam paci 'a bu de lta bu'i sgra 'byung bar sems can rnams kyis kun tu shes kyi/ dpa/ nor bu rin po che chen po de ni rtog par myi byed/ rnam par rtog par
205a5(mdo): myi byed/ sems par myi byed/ rnam par sems dpar byed cing / sems dpa' byed pa/ sems myed pa/ sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin

205a7(mdo): myed pa/ sems dang yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/ ma bzung ba/ yongasu bzung bar bya ba ma yin pa/ ma thob pa thob par bya ba ma yin pa/ so so'i bden pa gsal ba/ 'dod chags bsal ba
205a8(mdo): zhe sdang bsal ba/ gti mug gsal ba/ bden pa ma yin/ brdzun pa ma yin/ rtag pa ma yin/ mi rtag pa ma yin/ 'od ma yin/ 'od myed pa ma yin/ 'jig rten ma yin/ 'jig rtend myed pa ma yin

206a1(mdo): btags na/ de las sems can gang yin pa/ de'i bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba de lta bu'i chos stand pa 'byung bar sems can rnams kyis kun tu shes kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de ni de dag la yang thams cad
206a2(mdo): r+ya/ du mnyam zhing btang snyoms la/ rnam par myi rtog cing bye brag myi byed do// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ brag tsha ni gzhan gi rnam par rig pa las byung bar sems can rnams kyis kun tu shes kyang de ni 'das pa ma yin
206a3(mdo): ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin/ nang na ma yin/ phyi rol na ma yin zhing gnyi ga myed par yang myi dmyigs te/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ chad pa ma yin/ rtag pa ma yin/ shes pa dang ldan pa ma yin/

207a8(mdo): cad kyang 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / yangs par 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rten cing / de bzhin gshegs pa la gnas nas/ spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa las chogs pa mu stegs cad kyi gnas thams sa
207b1(mdo): kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / ba na log pa nyid du nges pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyang 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / yangs par 'gyur mod kyi/ 'jam dpal 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa
207b2(mdo): ni/ rtog par myi byed/ rnam par rtog par myi byed de/ 'jas dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / dmyigs pa dang / yid la byed pa thams cad rgyun

208a1(mdo): du dang 'bring dang chen po dag gis/ nam mkha' yang chu ngu dang // 'bring dang / chen por kun tu shes par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang

208a8(mdo): pa 'bring bstand par bya'o// sems can 'di ni bsam pa dang mos pa rgya che ba yin gyis sems can 'di la ni gzugs kyi sku'i kha dog yongs su 'grub pa rgya chen po bstand par bya'o snyam du myi sems so// 'jam dang
208b1(mdo): chos ston pa yang de bzhin du rtogs par bya ste/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di snyam du sems can 'di ni dman pa la mos pa yin gyis sems can 'di la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam dman pa brjod pa bya'o// seMs
208b2(mdo): can 'di ni bar ma la mos pa yin gyis sems can 'di la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam par ma brjod par bya'o// sems can 'di ni rgya chen po la mos pa yin gyis sems can 'di la ni theg pa chen po'i gtam rgya chen po brjod
208b3(mdo): par bya'o snyam du myi sems so// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di snyam du sems can 'di ni sbyin pa la mos pa yin gyis/ sems can 'di la ni sbyin pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can 'di ni tshul khrims dang / 
208b4(mdo): bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan la mos pa yin gyis sems can 'di la ni bsam gtan gyi gtam brjod par bya'o snyam du yang myi sems so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di snyam
208b5(mdo): du sems can 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la mos pa yin gyi/ sa sems can 'di la ni/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i gta ma brjod par bya'o snyam du yang myi sems te/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gsheg
208b6(mdo): pa la ni/ rnam par rtog pa de lta bu dag myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku yin pa'i phyir te/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ shin tu ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa yin no// 'jam
208b7(mdo): dpal de bzhin gshegs pa gyi rnam par shes pa ni mying dang gzugs dang / nges tshig gi rjes su 'brang zhing 'byung ba ma yin te/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtog par byed/ rnam par rtog par myi byed pa yin no// 'jam dpal de
208b8(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa ni skad cig pa ste/ myi zad pa'i mtshan nyid dang / myi zad pa'i mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i mthar nges pa yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos zas
209a1(mdo): cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi mtha' dang / gnyis su myed pa'i mtha' dang / shi nad tu 'byung ba myed pa'i mtha' yin te/ thams cad du mnyam zhing rnam par myi rtog la/ bye brag mi 'byed de/ dman pa ma yin/ bar ma ma yin mchog
209a2(mdo): ma yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang mnyam zhing rnam par myi rtog la bye brag myi 'byed de dman pa ma yin/ bar ma ma yin mchog ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni dmyigs su
209a3(mdo): myed pa'i phyir te/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad kyi dmyigs su myed pa gang yin pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no// mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnas pa nyid yin no// gnas pa nyid gang yin pa de ni myi g.yo ba nyid yin no// 
209a4(mdo): myi g.yo ba nyid gang yin pa de ni myi rten pa nyid yin no// chos thams ca de la myi rten pa'i sems kyi gnas myed do// sems myi gnas pa ni skye ba myed par 'gyur te/ de ltar mthong ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba rnaMs
209a5(mdo): ni phyin ci ma log par 'jug par 'gyur ro// gang sems phyin ci ma lo/ ka pa des ni ji lta bzhin thob par 'gyur ro// ji lta ba bzhin thob pa ni 'phro bar myi byed do// spros pa myed pa la ni spyod pa yang byed do// gang
209a6(mdo): ki tshe spyod par phye byed pa de ni tshe gyi 'khor ro// gang gi tshe myi 'khor ba de'i rnam par myi 'gro ste/ rnam par 'phro ba myed pa ni chos dang 'gal bar myi byed do// chos nyid dang myi 'gal ba ni thams cad dang rjes su 'thun par 'gyur ro// 
209a7(mdo): thams cad dang rjes su mthun pa ni chos kyi rang bzhin las myi g.yo'o// chos kyi rang bzhin las myi g.yo bas ni chos kyi rang bzhin thob par 'gyur ro// chos kyi rang bzhin thob pa ni cung zad kyang 'phro bar myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhen
209a8(mdo): 'jam dpal rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed pa'i phyir te/ rgyu dang rkyen kyis bskyed pa gang yin pa de ni shin tu ma skyes pa yin no// shi nad tu ma skyes pa ga pa yin pa des ni nges pa 'thob bo// nges pa thob pa gang yin pa ni chos thams cad yod
209b1(mdo): sa byed pa dang lha cig phyi gnas te/ gang gi tshe chos thams cad yid la byed pa dang / lhan cig kyi gnas pa de na me gnas par bya ba myed pa yin no// gang gi che gnas par bya ba myed pa de'i tshe gyi 'byung gyi 'jig go// gangag
209b2(mdo): myi 'byung gyi 'jig pa de'i tshe/ gnas zhing chos thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe gnas shing chom thos pa de'i rtse/ tshul bzhin gyis chom la zhugs par 'gyur ro// tshul bzhin gyi chos la zhugs pa la ni ka nga sangs rgyas kyi
209b3(mdo): chos ma yin pa'i chos de 'ga' yang myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa'i phyir te/ stong pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub bo// des de ltar stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
209b4(mdo): ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed par pa/ gnas myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / gzung ba myed pa/ dang / gzhi byed pa rjes su rtogs pa'i phyir byang chub ste/ byang chub ni chu
209b5(mdo): bzhin la sbyor ba'o// tshul bzhin la sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni/ gdeg pa myed pa dang / gzhag pa myed pa dang bya ba myed pa dang / rnam par bya ba myed pa la sbyor ba dang / chags pa myed pa dang / grol ba myed pa la
209b6(mdo): sbyor ba dang / gcig pa nyid ma yin pa dang / tha dad pa nyid ma yin pa la sbyor ba dang / 'ongs pa ma yin pa la sbyor ba dang / tshul bzhin la sbyor ba yin no// tshul bzhin gang yin pa la sbyor ba de la ni sbyor ba yang myed/ spang
209b7(mdo): ba yang byed 'bras bu mngon gsum du bya ba yang myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal sems ni rang bzhin gis 'od gsal ba'i phyir te/ de ni glo bur gyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis nye bar nyon mongs par zad kyi
209b8(mdo): rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa ni ma yin no// rang bzhin gis 'od gsal ba gang yin pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa nyid yin no// kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa nyid gang yin pa de la ni gnyen po gang gis nyo// 
210a1(mdo): mongs pa spong bar 'gyur ba'i gnyen po myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal de ni dag pa nyid yin pas/ dag pa ni dag par myi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ dag pa gang yin pa de ni skye ba myed pa'o// skye ba myed pa gang
210a2(mdo): yin pa de ni ma smad pa'o// ma spad pa gang yin pa de ni 'dod pa spangs pa'o// 'dod pa spangs pa gang yin pa de la ni srid pa thams cad 'gag go// gang la srid pa thams cad 'gag pa de ni myi skye ba'o// myi skye ba gang yin pa ni
210a3(mdo): byang chub bo// byang chub gang yin pa de ni mnyam pa nyid do// mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid de/ de bzhin nyid la ni 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad gnas so// de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de la
210a4(mdo): ni 'dus byas kyang myed/ 'dus ma byas kyang myed gnyis su gdags pa yang myed do// gang la 'dus byas kyang myed/ 'dus ma byas kyang myed/ gnyis su gdags pa yang myed pa de ni de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid
210a5(mdo): gang yin pa de ni gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid do// gzhan ma yin/ ba de bzhin nyid kapa yin pa de ni 'gyur ba myed pa de bzhin nyid do// 'gyur ba myed pa de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'ong ba byed pa de bzhin nyid do/ 
210a6(mdo): 'ong ba myed pa de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'gro ba myed pa de bzhin nyid do// 'gro ba byed pa de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ji lta ba bzhin de bzhin nyid do// ji lta ba bzhin de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni nam yang de bzhin nyid pa
210a7(mdo): yin pa ma yin no// nam yang de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs par myi 'gyur rnam par byang bar myi 'gyur ro// gang kun nas nyon mongs par myi 'gyur rnam par byang bar myi 'gyur ba de ni skye bar myi 'gyu
210a8(mdo): 'gag par myi 'gyur ro// gang skye bar myi 'gyur 'gag par myi 'gyur ba de ni mya ngan las 'das 'das pa dang mnyam mo// gang mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa de ni 'khor bar myi 'gyur yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba/ 
210b1(mdo): myi 'gyu ba ga pa 'khor bar myi 'gyur yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyi 'gyur de ni/ 'das pa la yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin no// gang 'das pa ma yin/ sa 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin
210b2(mdo): ba de ni/ dman pa ma yin/ bar pa ma yin pa chog ma yin no// kang dman pa ma yin par ma ma yin/ mchog ma yin pa/ de ni de bzhin nyid de/ de bzhin nyid ces bya ba de ni de kho nar don gi tshig bla dgas yin no// de kho na
210b3(mdo): zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid kho na'o// de bzhin kho na ni de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid dang bdag de ni gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar byed do// gnyis su myed pa'i don gang yin pa de ni byang chub ste/ byang chub ni don rtogs par
210b4(mdo): don ces bya ni chos bstand pa thams cad la rnam par thard pa'i sgo / sum du 'jug pa shes pa'o// shes pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa'o// chos thams cad kyi dbye
210b5(mdo): myed pa'i don de ni don ces bya ste/ don ni sgra myed pa/ brjod du myedapa/ tha snyad myed pa/ tha snyad yang dag par chad pa yin no// she sa pa zhes bya ba ni don rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / rnam par shes
210b6(mdo): pa rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni shes pa zhes bya'o// don ces bya ba ni de kho na'i don shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa rjesu rtogs pa'i zhes pas nges par rtogs pa gang yin pa ste/ de nyid chos nyid yin no/ 
210b7(mdo): chos nyid gapa yin pa de ni don yin no// don rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / nges pa'i don rjes su rtogs pa'i don shes pa gang yin pa de ni chos nyid do// chos nyid gang
210b8(mdo): yin pa den dan len no// dedag pa yin pa deni tsam nyid dang chos gnas pa nyid dang / nam nges pa nyid de/ de ni nos pa 'dug par gyi 'gyur ro// chos la ma zhugs pa ga pa yis pa dang / don dang cig 'bru mnyam sa nyid
211a1(mdo): gang yin pa de ni gnyis su myed pa'i don gis mnyam pa nyid yin te/ mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni don yin no// dod shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa la mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su myed pa'i spor 'jug
211a2(mdo): pas na shes pa yin no// nges pa'i don dang drang ba'i don dang / mnyam pa nyid kyis don mnyam pa de ni stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid du don mnyam pas gang zag mnyam pa mnyam mo// gang zag mnyam pa nyid kyis chos mnyam pa nyid
211a3(mdo): mnyam mo// chos mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par grol ba mnyam pa nyid mnyam ste/ rnam par grol ba mnyam pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa ni byang chub bo// 'jam dpal gzugs la chags pas chags par 'gyur ba rnams kyi myig ni
211a4(mdo): chags pa yin no// gzugs dang / myig ki rang bzhin shes pa ni chags te myed pa yin no// lta ba la chags pas chags par gyu dad pa rnams kyi rang gi lus ni chags pa yin no// lta bar gyurd pa thams cad kyi ra
211a5(mdo): gi lus kyi rang bzhin stong pa nyid du shes pa ni chags pa myed pa yin no// tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa la chags pas chags par bya/ rang pa rnams kyi chos kyi snang ba ni chags pa yin no// tshul bzhin yid
