255b7(mdo): par gyur da gor ma chag na de la bdag gis zab mo'i gtam bya'o// des ni ma nus na 'ang 'di ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgom pa'i rgyu tsam du'ang 'gyur ro snyam ste/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba'i dbang
255b8(mdo): pos/ dge la slong gi dge' 'dun thams cad gcig tu 'dun par bgyis nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'dod chags mya ngan 'das par gsungs/ zhe sdang gti mug de bzhin te// byang chub de dag
256a1(mdo): gnas nyid ni// sangs rgyas byang chub bsam gyi khyab// 'dod chags gang gis nam brtags pa// zhe sdang gti mug de bzhin te// sangs rgyas byang chub de la ring // gnam dang sa gnyis ci bzhin no// byang chub/ 
256a2(mdo): 'dod chags gnyis su myed// 'jug pa gcig pa mnyam pa nyid ldan pa ste// 'di dag chos la byis pa gang 'jigs pa// de dag sangs rgyas byang chub ring ba yin// 'dod chags skye myed 'jig pa ma yin te/ sems
256a3(mdo): kyang kun nas nyon mongs 'gyur ba myed// gang zhig dmyigs pa'i bdag la blo chags pa// 'dod chags ngan song de dag ltung bar byed// gang zhig 'dod chags dang ni sangs rgyas chos// de dag khyad par yang myed pa ste/ 
256a4(mdo): yi ge gcig cing tshul gcig mtshan nyid myed// de ltar shes pa bde gshegs nyid du 'gyur// tshul khrims 'chal pa dang tshul khrims rnam rtags shing / gang zhig tshul khrims rlom pas myos gyur da pa// dbyigs pa
256a5(mdo): lha la rab gnas de la ni// byang chub myed cing sangs rgyas chos kyang / myed gang zhig dgon pa'i gnas la rtog byed cing // bdag la s+ho// da byed gzhan la smod byed pa/ dgon par blta la rab gnas de la ni
256a6(mdo): mtho' ris myed na byang chub ka la yod// byang chub lta ba gnyis su khyed gsungs te// myed dang yi ge grangs dang sgra 'jug pa// de dag gang gis yang dag rtogs gyur pa// de la sangs rgyas byang chub ring ba myin// kun
256a7(mdo): nas nyon mongs de la rnam rtog cing // rnam byang lha la byis pa gang chags pa// dmyigs pa'i lta la rab gnas de la ni// byang chub myed cing sangs rgyas chos kyang myed// rkang zhig sangs rgyas chos la 'dod skyed pa// de dag
256a8(mdo): sangs rgyas byang chub ring ba ste/ yod myin chos / 'dod pa skyed pa na/ de ni sdug bsngal yongs su myong bar 'gyur// gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang myi rtog cing / gti mug chud pas byang chub yin lta ba// de la sangs/ 
256b1(mdo): rgyas byang chub ring ba phyin// bzod pa mchog kyang des 'phob 'gyur// 'dus ma byas dang 'dus byas sus mthong ba// de ni 'khor ba'i chos las gzhan myi 'grol// gang gis khams de mnyam pa nyid rtogs pa// de myur skyes
256b2(mdo): bu sangs rgyas mchog tu 'gyur// gang gis sangs rgyas chos dang sangs rgyas dag/ thams cad kun tu nam yang ma mthong na// chos rnams kun gyis gos pa myed pa ste// bdud bcom byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya yang // 
256b3(mdo): su zhig sems can rnam par 'grel 'dod pa// des ni sems can khams su blta myi bya// ma lus sems can mya ngan 'das dang bral// de ltar 'du shes de ni rang 'byung 'gyur// grong du phyind na/ spyod lam 'chos byed
256b4(mdo): de ni 'jig rten ltar bcas rkun po ste// de la byang chub sangs rgyas chos rnams myed// bdag ni sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes gang rlom pa// byis pa de ni gti mug dbang gis non// sangs rgyas chos ni nam mkha
256b5(mdo): mtshungs pa ste// brang dang dor ba'i sgra ni de la myed// rgyal bas na yang byang chub sangs ma rgyas// des ni nam yang sems can bkrol ba myed// myed pa'i chos rnams brtags shing byis pa rnams// sangs/ 
256b6(mdo): rgyas byang chub las ni ring ba yin// sems can 'di dag nyon yongs sus mthong ba/ de la nyon mongs mtha' yang 'byung bar 'gyur// sems can de dag sems can byed ces gsungs// sems can 'du shes gnas la
256b7(mdo): byang chub myed// gang gis sems can shind tu grol mthong zhing // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rtag byed la// sems cad zhi zhing rab zhin pa zhi bar/ gang gis shes pa de ni 'gon por 'gyur/ gang gis sos/ 
256b8(mdo): can sems can byed ma mthong // yang dag nyid du sangs rgyas chos la dmyigs// ji ltar sems cad de bzhin sangs rgyas shes// de ltas sus shes de ni 'gon por 'gyur// nyon mongs tog na nyan mongs yod par/ 
257a1(mdo): 'gyur// tshul bzhin lam sems de bzhin nyon mongs yod// nyon mongs lam du nam yang ma brtags na// des ni byang chub myi rtogs 'thob bo// stong pa'i chos kyis phyi mkhas gang 'jigs pa// de
257a2(mdo): dag sangs rgyas chos la ring ba yin// stong nyid chos la thetsom su byed pa// de dag sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// byang chub mchog thob par ni su 'dod pa// des ni 'dod chags chos la brtag myi bye// 'dod
257a3(mdo): chags chos kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa// de dag / sangs rgyas yon tan bsam myi khyab// gang zhig sangs rgyas chos la myi 'jug cing // sems can byang chub skye ba myed pa dang / sems dang sangs rgyas byang chub gnyis myed
257a4(mdo): par// shes par gyurard na de ni 'gon por 'gyur// sdig sems mu stegs can gyis gang brjod dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyis ka/ sungs gang bka' saHlad pa// de dag la yang tshul gyurd myed pa ste/ 
257a5(mdo): de ltar shes na de ni 'gon por 'gyur// gang gis byang chub mthong zhing nga smon byed pa// de dang byang chub ring ste byang chub myed/ sangs rgyas sangs rgyas myin pa myi mnyam zhe 'am// sangs rgyas 'di zhes myi rtog mgon
257a6(mdo): por 'gyur// gang zhig bdag ni sems can 'greld pa zhes/ rlom na 'du shes chags rmongs pas // dmyigs pa'i lta ba rab gnas de la ni// byang chub myed cing sangs rgyas chos kyang byed// 'dod chags nang dang phyin
257a7(mdo): kyi gnas te// phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams gang na'ang yod pa phyin// chos rnams yod byin rnam par brtags byas shing // byis pa 'dod chags 'du shes de ltar rmongs// sgyu ma smyig rgyu brag cha lta bu ste// mngon
257a8(mdo): bu dang skyi lam 'dra ba ni// nyon mongs 'di dag thams cad dmyigs su byed// byis pa de ltar myi shes rnam par rmongs// 'dus byas chos dang 'dus pa byas kyi chos// de dag la dang gnyis su skyed// gapal grangs
257b1(mdo): dang bgrang du myed pa dag/ de yi tshul gyis gnyis su myed par 'jug/ byis pa gang zhig byang chub sems rlom zhing // sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes rlom sems byed 'gyur na// chos kyi phyag rgya dngos nyid 'di bor bas// 
257b2(mdo): de la sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub myed// smra ba gang dag yongs rtogs pyod yul can// smra ba'i don la rnam par myi sems shing // mying dang legs pa de bzhin chags kyu rad po// de dag byang chub gyurard pa the tsom yod// 
257b3(mdo): blta ba'i rnam pa byang chub gnyis myed gsungs// mying dang yi ge grangs dang skad 'jug pas// myi mkhas gang gis chos 'di ma rtogs pa// de dag sangs rgyas byang chub ring bar gnas// myingal chags shing mying la
257b4(mdo): dga' ba dang / bdag tu blta la gang zhig gnas gyurd cing // 'dod pa chung dang chos shes rnams brtags pas// 'dod pa'i dang rang gis da dung de 'jug go// 'dod chags chos la shed skyes gang 'bros
257b5(mdo): de ni 'dod chags chos la gzhan myi 'grol// gang gis yang dag 'dod chags chos shes na// 'dod chags bral ba'i 'dod chags chos shes 'gyur// yun ring dus su tshul khrims srung byas shing / 
257b6(mdo): bskal pa bye bar bsam gtan bskyed byas kyang // yang dag nyid/ mthal 'di ni ma rtogs na// bstan pa 'di la de dag blo yod myin// ci yang ma yin chos 'di sus shes pa// nam yang de ni chos kun chags kyi 'gyur// / 
257b7(mdo): chul khrimapa 'das dang rdul khrims nas brtags pas// byim pa dbyigs pa'i yod yul par gyi 'gyur// nus khrims tshul khrims myed par sus shes shing // tshul khrims 'chas dang tshul khrims hrul cig ces
257b8(mdo): tshul khrims ngam cus de lta sus shes pa// tshul khrim pa 'ams bdes nam/ yang byed// rdob rgya ma chos la rtog pam sa gyur nan// thabs kyis la sems can rnams 'dul zhing // byang chub lag myed zhi ban
258a1(mdo): la yang // tshul cig chos kyis sems can 'dzud pa yin// chos rgyal dam pa'i chos 'di myi g.yo zhing // dngos myed mtshan nyid myed pa tshul gcig par// ngo bo nyid kyis stong chos ma thos pas// g.yang
258a2(mdo): sa chen por byis pa de dag lhung // chos 'di thos shing mya sdang gang gyurd pa'i// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga chags khyim pa'ang bla'i// bstand pa 'di la rab tu byung gyur da cing // dmyigs lta sbyangs pa'i yon tan rlom pa myin
258a3(mdo): phyogs bcu kun nas sangs rgyas rang byung ba// 'jig rten don mdzad gang dag bzhugs pa rnams// de dag kun gyis nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i chos// g.yol ba myed ces byang chub 'gyur zhes gsungs// myi mkhas gang
258a4(mdo): rnams myi sdug bsgom sems shing // chos rab 'di thos 'jig/ sa par 'gyur ba dag/ rtag par sdug bsngal tshe dang ldan gyur cing // bskal pa bye ba mang por sdug bsngal 'gyur// tshigs su
258a5(mdo): bcad pa bstand pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ lha'i bu stong phrag sum cu gnyis kyis myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// dge slong stong phrag brgyad cu nye bar lend pa myed par zag pa las sems rnam par
258a6(mdo): grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i blo gros kyang // 'chi ba'i dus bgyis nas dog sa'i sgo phye bas/ sems can dmyal ba chen por srung ngo // de sug las kyi sgrib pa des/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
258a7(mdo): brgya phrag stong du/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu sdug bsngal cha zhing rtsub pa/ yid du myi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myi bzod pa myong bar gyu rad to// tshe rabs brgya stong phrag bdun bcu pa bzhir myi snyan par brjod pa thon
258a8(mdo): par gyur to// bskald pa brgya stong mang por de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan tsam yang ma zos par gyurd to// de de nas slad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dag dang mjal te/ de dag gi bstand pa la rab
258b1(mdo): tu byung nas mngon par mos par ma gyur da te/ tshe rabs stong phrag blacu rtsa drug tu rab tu byung ba las slar babs par gyu rad to// sug las kyi sgrib pa de nyid kyi lhag mas che rabs stong phrag mang po dbang po rtu lad par
258b2(mdo): gyurar to// bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' dge slong chos smra ba rab tu dga' ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba byung bas ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te
258b3(mdo): da ltar bzhugs bzhugs shing 'tsho ga zhes chos kyang stond to// sharang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams bye ba brgya 'das pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin cen sna tshogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs
258b4(mdo): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi brjid sdug cing dri ma myed la nyi zla zi la kyis gnond pa bzhugs zhi dpa 'tsho ga zhes chos kyang stond to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong
258b5(mdo): rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bgyi bar gar gyur pa de dag ni/ bdag nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ dge slong rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bgyi bar gyur da te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de'i tshe tshul 'di ma 'tshal ba
258b6(mdo): de lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyurd to// bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid de 'dra ba'i gnas su gyur da te/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal ma mchis pa'i sdug bsngal yongasu brtag pa'i sdug bsngal phyi nad ci log gi sdug bsngal gyi
258b7(mdo): rnam pa de lta bu myong bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la zhugs pa 'am/ nyan thos kyi zag pa la zhugs pa ka yang rung ste/ de lta bu'i sug las kyi sgrib pa
258b8(mdo): myi 'tshal zhing / de lta bu'i sdug bsngal myi 'tshal na des dam pa'i chos spang bar myi bgyi'o// dam pa'i chos la dbye bar myi bgyi'o// chos gapa la yang khong khro bar myi bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam
259a1(mdo): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' saHlad to// 'jam dpal tshigs su bcad pa de thos pas khyod la khyad par ci zhig tu gyur// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das tshigs su bcad pa de thos
259a2(mdo): mapas// sug las kyi sgrib pa de las langs nas/ kapa dang gang du skyes pa de dang de dag tu yang zab mo'i bzod pa can/ nges pa'i bzod pa can du gyur to// chos zab mo stond pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
259a3(mdo): 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ 'jam dpal u'i mthus khyod kyis da ltar yun ring po na/ mngon par 'du byed pa'i las kyi sgrib pa rjes su dran/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub ses
259a4(mdo): dpa' rnams ni ci sems/ ci smra rjes su dri dran pa yang / de dag the// sa cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu' ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa las byung ba ni chos thams cad
259a5(mdo): do/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thob pa dang / 'di thos pa de ni/ mtshungs so// myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dang / 'di thos
259a6(mdo): pa de ni mtshungs so// 'dzam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa ni bsam gyis myi khyab po// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHla
259a7(mdo): 'jam dpal de de bzhin te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa na bsas kyis myi khyab bo// 'ond kyang spyong ba byed pa la sa de thos nas mos par myi 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa lung gyi stond to// de nas bcom
259a8(mdo): ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus lnga brgya ba ma la ci nas kyang chos kyi rngam
259b1(mdo): grangs 'di rgyas par 'gyur zhing / skye bo mang po'i sug par phyind par 'gyur ba dang / de la bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha dag gis klags rnyed par myi 'gyur ba de ltar byin gis rlab tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan
259b2(mdo): 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis rlabs pa'i phyir g.yas g.yos su gzigs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar gzigs ma thag tu/ de'i phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma
259b3(mdo): snyed rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyurapa/ rab tu g.yos par gyur// kun tu g.yos par gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin kyi rlab pa mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
259b4(mdo): gzhan dag kyis kyang / 'jig rtend kyi khams ka 'aka'i klung kyi/ dbye ma snyed dag nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gis rlabs so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ phyogs bcu na gang
259b5(mdo): 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed yod pa de bas kyang / shind tu mang ba'i seMs can rnams kyis myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyu rad te/ gang dag nyan thos nyid la gnas par gyurd pa deng/ slob pa'i sa 'am
259b6(mdo): myi slob pa'i sa la gnas par gyur pa dag ni smos kyang myi smos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dka' bos/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mying ci zhes
259b7(mdo): bgyi/ ji ltar gzung bar bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saH lad pa/ dga' bo de bas na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thams cad 'byung ba byed pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
259b8(mdo): saHlad pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / lha'i bu pad mo rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po
260a1(mdo): de dang dge slong lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang / tshe dang ldan pa dka' bo dang / lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten da yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rang ste/ 
260a2(mdo): ma mngon par dka'o// 'phags pa chos thams cad 'byung ba myed pa zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo' rdzogs s+ho// @/ rgya kar skad du/ sa pa tsa ra pra ta baM
260a3(mdo): d+hiSha ka dzu ti yin ya mAn tid ma sa hA yAn su tra// zod skad du/ 'phags pa yang dag par yod pa'i tshul nam mkhal mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdol/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
260a4(mdo): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das byed pa can na/ rnyog/ dpa sel pa zhes bya ba'i byed pa can gyi grong rdal du/ snang ba 'phel ba
260a5(mdo): zhes bya ba'i ri la/ drang srong rta rlung zhes bya ba'i mil dka' thub la ka/ nas pa na/ dge slong gi dge' 'dun brgya phrag phyed dang bcu ka su ki dge' slong gi dge la 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpal
260a6(mdo): sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyod yum chags pa myed pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par skuld pa/ chad byed pa'i byams pa chen po'i byin kyi rlabs kyis/ stobs rjesu thob pa/ tshad byed pa'i snying rje chen po
260a7(mdo): sems can gyi chu bo kun tu 'chang bar rnam par sprul pa/ tshad myed pa'i dga' ba'i byin kyi rlabs kyi stobs kyis/ sems can thams cad la bde ba'i dran pa'i char rab tu 'bab pas kun tu ngoms pa/ tshad myed pa'i
260a8(mdo): btang snyoms kyi ye shes kyis chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par 'jug pa la mkhas pa/ chos kyi sprin dang lhag mthong dang / rig pa dang ye shes kyi stobs kyis/ ma rig pa'i mun pa'i mun pa chen po rnam
260b1(mdo): bar 'jig pa yang mkhas pa/ bsdu ba nas bzhis sems can rnams chu bo bzhi las bsgos par bya ba'i phyir ye shes dang / sems can thams cad la mtshungs par sems pa'i phyir/ byams pa dang / khong khro ba byed
260b2(mdo): pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi lam yongs su dag pa/ chos kyis yang dag par 'jug pa ye shes chen po la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten la mchog gi lam yang dag par stond pa/ sems can rnam par rgyas shing dge ba'i
260b3(mdo): bas yongs su sred pa'i chu skam zhing ye shes kyi las kyi mtha' la rab tu 'jug pa/ mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes rnam par nye ba/ mngon par shes pa zla ba lta bu/ sems can thams cad kyi sems mtshung
260b4(mdo): par shes pa'i bsam pa mngon par yang dag par mgu ba'i phyir/ zabs la mkhas pa 'phel ba yang dag par stond pa/ nam mda' dang mtshungs pa'i gzungs kyis tshad myed pa'i snod chos rin po ches
260b5(mdo): yongasu bkang zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i phyir skye bo zas cad kyis nye bar 'tsho ba/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis rkang pa'i shugs chen pos chos kyi tshul gyis lam zab mo'i rjes su zhugs pa
260b6(mdo): mtshungs pa'i chos kyis gzhan gyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa/ bskal pa brgya stong grangs myed pa'i mthar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thug pa myed cing / rgyun ma bcad pa'i yon tan thams cad 'byung ba/ 
260b7(mdo): rlung dang mtshungs pa'i sems 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyis gos pa myed pa/ bag chags thams cad rjes su 'breld pa/ nyon mongs pa rab tu spangs pa tshad myed grangs byed pa
260b8(mdo): ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang bzod pa rnam par nye ba la mkhas pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpal rta dbaglang po che byi dkar baM zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri rab kun tu snang ba zhes
261a1(mdo): bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri rab zla ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpal rnam par bsgyings pa kyi zad pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems
261a2(mdo): dpa' myig sngon po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dur skyig eng ge sgra 'byind ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' nor gyi 'od kyi tshogs shes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri rab 'tshams shes bya ba dang
261a3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan rnam par sprul pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' grog gi phung po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gi gzi brjid dri ma myed pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang
261a4(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' ri rab stobs kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba dang / byang / chub sems dpa' gtogs 'dod mthu' bo che zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / de la sotshogs pa byang chub
261a5(mdo): sems dpa' stong phrag bcu dang / sngon du 'gro ba drang srong lta bu dang / drang srong stong phrag sum bcu da / lha'i bu brgya stong phrag bco brgyad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la yongasu bskor nas lhan cig tu
261a6(mdo): 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa legs par 'ongs pa la bka' saHlad pa/ legs par 'ongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri bshams pa de la bdag bdag 'dug ste/ nyan thos rnams la
261a7(mdo): nyan thos kyi gtam smra bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa legs papa 'ongs pa phyir nyand te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir pho brang zlum po byas par gyur to// de nas bcom
261a8(mdo): ldan 'das kyis 'khor thams cad dang ldan pa rnam par kun tu bltas te/ pho brang zlum por bshams pa nyid du bzhugs so// de nas dge slong gzhan dag kyang bstand las yangs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas na
261b1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar da te/ phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ces bgyi ba ni gang lags/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig/ 
261b2(mdo): rten du brtag par brtags pa ni ji lta bu lags/ de skad ces gsold pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces bka' saHlad to// dge' slong dag 'jig rten 'jig rten ces bya ba dang / de de bzhin
261b3(mdo): gshegs pas 'jig rtend du brtags pas/ brtags pa ji tsam zhes dge slong khyod de skad 'dri 'am/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no// de'i phyir dge slong khyod legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas bshad do// btsun pa
261b4(mdo): de bzhin no zhes gsol to// dge' slong de bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bkalas lad to// dge' slong 'jig rtend de zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten rnam pa
261b5(mdo): gnyis ste/ snod kyi 'jig rtend dang / 'du byed kyi 'jig rten no// dge slong de la snod kyi 'jig rtend gyi gang / 'du byed kyi 'jig rtend ni gang zhe na/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / myo'i
261b6(mdo): khams dang / rlung gi khams jitsam pa ni snod ces bya'o// dge slong de la nang gi sa'i khams yod de/ dge slong de la nang gi sa'i khams gang zhe na/ gang nang gi sra ba'i sra ba nyid zin pa ni 'di lta ste/ rus pa dang / sen mo dang
261b7(mdo): so'i bar du ste/ 'di dag ni bar gyi sa'i khams zhes bya'o// de la phyi rol kyi sa'i khams gang zhe na/ kang lus kyi phyi rol kyi sa'i khams ni 'di lta ste/ 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bye dur+ya
261b8(mdo): dang / rdo dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / sa le spra pa dang / gram bu dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo dang / shing dang / dang / sman dang / phyag dang dpa 'di dag ni phyi rold gi sa'i khams shes bya'o// chu'i khams gang zhe na/ phyi
262a1(mdo): ro la gi chu'i khams yod na/ nad kyi chu'i khams kyang yod de/ de la nang gi chu'i khams gang zhe na/ lus 'di la chu dang chu'i khams kyi khris pa dang / bad kan dang / rna ga dang / khrag dang / khris pa dang / grad pa dang
262a2(mdo): klad rgyas dang / mchi ma dang / dngul dang / dang snabs dang / snabs dang / rus pa dang / lgang pa dang / gcin yod pa kun tu len pa 'di ni nang gi chu'i khams shes bya'o// de la phyi rol dgi chu'i khams kang zhe na/ gang lus kyi phyi
262a3(mdo): rol gi chu'i khams ni 'di lta ste/ chu dang chu'i khams kyi snum pa dang / 'o ma dang / zho dang / dar ba dang / bu ram dang / shing gi ro dang / chang dang / chab mo dang / bu ram chang dang / me tog chang dang / lus kyi chu'i khams ji tsam

262a5(mdo): dang / yongasu cheg pa dang / des zos pa dang / 'thungs pa dang / 'chos pa dang / nyal ba de'i yang dag par yongasu smin par 'gyur ba 'di ni nang gi me'i khams shes bya'o// de la phyi rol gi me'i khams gang zhe
262a6(mdo): na/ gang es gdung ba dang nyi mas gdung ba dang / nor bu'i gdung ba dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / ts+li'i dro ba dang / lji ba'i dro ba dang / phyag dang gi dro ba dang / 'di dag ni phyi rolang gi me'i khams shes bya'o// de la nang gi rlung
262a7(mdo): ki khams gang zhe na/ kang sus 'di la rkyen du rgyu ba'i rlung dang / zur du rgyu ba'i rlung dang / ma zhu ba'i rlung dang / yan lag dang nying lag rgyu ba'i rlung dang / 'di ni nang gi rlung rnams shes bya'o// de la phyi rol gi rlung gang zhe na/ 
262a8(mdo): gang phyi rold tu yang dag par rgyu ba'i rlung dang / rnam par rgyu ba'i rlung dang / gyen du rgyu ba dang / grang ba dang / dro ba'i dmu rung phyed pa yang po dang / sa 'dzind pa'i rlung dang / phyi rolang gi rlung gi khams gang yang rung ba 'di ni
262b1(mdo): phyi rold gi rlung gi khams shes bya ste/ de ltar phyi dang nang gi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di ni snod kyi 'jig rten zhes bya'o// 'di gang gi snod ce na nye bar le nad pa phung po lnga'i snod do// dge' slong phyi dang nang gi 'byung ba
262b2(mdo): chen po bzhi po 'di dag la gang mos pa 'am/ dga' ba 'am/ byams pa 'am/ chags pa 'am/ rgya che ba 'am/ nga yir bya ba 'am/ bdag gir bya ba de thams cad spang bar bya'o// zhes so sor bslab par bya'o// gapal
262b3(mdo): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i phyi dang nang gi 'am/ che ba 'am phra ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ bzang po 'am/ gang ring ba 'am/ gang nye ba 'am/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de thams cad de bzhin du so sor bslab
262b4(mdo): par bya'o// gang la la 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de dag bdag gi ma yA de yang bdag ma yin no zhes de ltar de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o// dge slong dag dge' slong

262b6(mdo): sdug bsngal gi mthar byed pa ste/ dge slong dag de ni snod kyi 'jig rtend no// dge slong dag de la 'du byed kyi 'jig rten gang zhe na/ nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga ni 'du byed ces bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs te
262b7(mdo): bar lend pa'i phung po dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nye bar lend pa'i phung po ste/ dge la slong dag 'di ni 'du byed kyi 'jig rten no// dge slong dag sems can ji tsam pa gang sems can
262b8(mdo): gi sbu bas yang dag par bsdus pa/ de thams cad phung po 'di dag gis bsdus pa dang / ldan pa de ni 'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhes bya'o// dge slong dag nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga de la gang mos pa 'am/ dga' ba'am/

263a8(mdo): 'di dag ni/ kang 'dod pa'i khams myig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang myig dang gzugs kyi 'gog pa yang dag par gzhol ba

265b4(mdo): nam mkha' la gtor da pa'i me tog de phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhe da rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi stong pa dang / rnyog pa lnga sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skad cig ma gcig gis stong pa'i me tog re re

266a2(mdo): tu za ba skyed pa'o// shinang tu rang bzhin byed pa'o// gnyen po myed pa'i/ 'thas myed pa mo// shin tu 'thor ba myed pa'o// 'jungs pa myed pa'o// shi na tu bsam gtan myed pa'o// shi nang tu bsgribs pa
266a3(mdo): myed pa'o// shind tu 'ong ba byed pa'o// nyam chung ba'o// dngos po med pa'o// byed pa myed pa'o// tshor ba myed pa'o// zag pa myed pa'o/ 'dzind pa byed pa'o// rnam par shes pa myed pa'o// sbyin sgyu lta bu
266a4(mdo): brag cha lta bu'o// myig yor lta bu'o// chu zla lta bu'o// gzug/ brnyan lta bu'o// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o// dngos po skye/ da pa'o// mtshan nyid myed pa nas/ mtshan nyid myed pa dang / 
266a5(mdo): mtshan nyid dang bral ba dang / mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid cig pa dang / mtshan nyid myed pa'i bar du'o// chos thamasacad ni bdag myed pa'o// ngar sems pa myed pa'o// gzung du myed pa'o/ 
266a6(mdo): brjod du myed pa'o// chos thams cad ni skad cig ma'o// 'du byed zad pa dang bral ba'o// zhes bzod pa'i sems bsgom par bya'o// chos thams cad ni skad cig ma zhes zhi ba'i sems bsgom par bya'o// 
266a7(mdo): mnyam pa'i sems dang / rnam par zhi ba'i sems dang / 'dzin pa myed pa'i sems dang / 'byung ba med pa'i sems dang / sgrib pa byed pa'i sems dang / chog pa byed pa'i sems dang / phyin mi ma lon
266a8(mdo): pa'i sems dang / sa skyed pa'i sems dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems dang / sdug bsngal gi sems bsgom par bya'o// de bzhin du nye bar zhi ba stong pa phyi dpa dang gi 'jig brjod pa'i chos kyi sgo dang / chad byed/ 
266b1(mdo): grangs myed pa'i chos kyi sgo me tog de dag la 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sems can de yang chos kyi sgo de thos nas/ zang zing myed pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba thob pa de/ 'du byed thams cad ni myi rtag pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ 
266b2(mdo): bdag myed pa/ stong pa nyid kyi dran pa dang tshul khrims thob bo// khyim gyi bcings pa thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yang dag par 'ayangs ste/ byung nas ri'i sul dang / khyim myed pa/ stong pa'i nags tshal
266b3(mdo): stug por gnas par 'gyur ro// drang srong gi cha byad kyis 'bras bu dang / phra ba dang / ha'i zas la gnas par 'gyur ro// nye bar le nad pa'i phung po lnga po de dag la myi bzad par mos shing brtson 'grus rtsom pa la spro bar byed do/ 
266b4(mdo): nye bar lenang pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la nad dang / shu ba dang / zug du dang / myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang bdag myed par yid la byed do// mngon par shes pa lnga thob bo// tshangs pa dang 'jig
266b5(mdo): rten la gzho la bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 'a/ de 'dra ba'i bzod pa bsgom pa de ni myi dmyigs/ sems can mye da/ myigs/ srog myi dmyigs/ gso' ba myi dmyigs/ gang zag myi dmyigs
266b6(mdo): gzugs myi dmyigs/ tshor ba myi dmyigs/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa 'ang myi dmyigs/ myig myi dmyigs/ rna ba 'ang myi dmyigs/ sna 'ang ma yin/ lce 'ang ma yin/ lus kyang ma yin/ yid myi dmyig
266b7(mdo): gzugs kyi dmyigs/ sgra phyi dmyigs/ dri myi dmyigs/ ro myi dmyigs/ reg bya myi dmyigs/ chos myi dmyigs/ yid kyi dmyigs/ lus myi dmyigs/ tshig kyi dmyigs/ sems myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid myi tshogs pa/ 
266b8(mdo): mtshan ma byed pa/ mug pa khams gsum gtong ba myed pa/ mngon par 'du myi byed yang ma skyes pa/ ma sgoms pa/ ma byang ba'i bzod pa 'di smras so// ma byas pa/ bya ba byed pa/ de sngon gyi mtha' la byal myed
267a1(mdo): phyi ma'i mtha' la 'das pa myed/ dbus kyi mtha' yang dag par byed pa myi gnas pa myi dmyigs/ yid la myi byed pa'i bzod pa sgom pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam
267a2(mdo): mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i bzod pa thob bo// byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa 'od thob pas ji lta bur gong du bshad pa'i zhal 'di 'dra ba bya bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pa
267a3(mdo): 'di bstan pa ston cing brjod pa ni / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gyi chom pa zhes bya ba legs so zhes bya ba byas te/ byang chub sems dpal mang po dag cang skye smra bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das cang kyi gsung
267a4(mdo): bas zhal shes pa zhes par gyu rad pa dang / de nas dge slong drug bcu/ tsam 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu phung po rnam par// 'jig pa ci la bsams te rnam par 'di lta bu'i sgyu ma 'dra ba'i
267a5(mdo): 'du byed thams cad ston/ gal te gzugs bdag myed pa/ snang ba/ kun nas ldang ba myed pa/ yid la myi byed pa myi rtog pa/ rnam par myi rtog pa/ dmyigs pa myed ya/ rgya
267a6(mdo): myed pa'am/ 'ond te 'di lta ci sems can nam/ srog kam/ skye ba 'am/ gso ba 'am/ gang zag kam/ shed las skyes pa 'am/ shed can nam/ byed pa po 'am/ tshor ba'o 'am/ tshor ba
267a7(mdo): gzhan nam/ skye ba 'am yang dag par skye ba 'am/ ka myerga pa dang / myi 'byung ba myed par myi 'gyur ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang du byung / snying rje chen po ni gang na/ chos 'chad pa su zhig
267a8(mdo): chos kun shes pa ni gang zhig/ bslab pa sdom pa ni gang na gnas/ gal te phung por myi 'gyur na/ de ltar khams dang skye mched rnams kyang dge ba rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smidad par gyi 'gyur na
267b1(mdo): legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu ni gang du sbyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni gang du 'byung / nyan thos dang / rang rgyal rnams dang / lha dang / 
267b2(mdo): myi rnams dang / gang gzhan yang sems can gyi lus skye mched drug gis bzung ba ni gang du 'byung / bdag ni stan las langs te 'gro bar bya snyam mo// de nas dge slong drug bcu tsam stan las sangs te dong nas/ dge
267b3(mdo): srong gzhan dag kyang cad kyi smra bar gyu rad pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pa bcom ldan 'das la ngo tsha zhing myi sobs pa dang gnod par gyu rad to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' la/ 
267b4(mdo): na mar mye 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyu rad pa des/ byang chub sem dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pa la 'di skad ces smras so// don gyi dbang gang mthong ba dang / 'khor smra ba dang bcas pa la chos
267b5(mdo): kye tshul rnam pa 'di lta bu zab mo yang dag par stond// rigs kyi/ bu bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde gzhan la gang zag lnga rnaMm la chos kyi gtam dang / gtam ngan pa dang / dad pa myed pa la
267b6(mdo): dad pa'i gtam dang / ga ta ma prA dang / 'jungs pa la gtong ba'i gtam dang / gtam ngan pa dang / tshul khrims ngan pa la tshul khrims kyi ka tam dang / ga tam ngan pa dang / le lo la brtson 'grus kyi gtam dang / 
267b7(mdo): gtam ngan pa dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi gtam dang / gtam ngan pa'o zhes 'di ltar gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde gzhan la bstand pa mtshams myed par byed pa nam zla stong pa'i gta ma mye smra ba/ 
267b8(mdo): bya'o// log par lta ba'i lus rnams la sus dran par nye bar gzhag pa myi smra bar bya'o// brkam pa rnams la tshor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma yin pa smra bar bya'o// nga rgyal dang dregs pa dang / kha zas
268a1(mdo): mtshanas pa rnams ma/ sem pa drad pa nye bar gzhan pa kyi smra bar bya'o// boche ba'i chos kyi rtsa ba spong ba rnams la/ chos dran pa nye bor gzhag pa gyi lba bar bya'o// myi thob par 'dod pa rnams la sar
268a2(mdo): skye ba'i yon tan gyi zla bar bya'o// 'dod pa spyod pa'i snar bye ba yang dag par zhun pa ma rnasems sadangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin skye ba'i yon tan mi smra bar bya'o// gzugs pa khyad pa'i lhar skye ba gzung ba rnams la / 
268a3(mdo): 'dod pa spyod pa'i lha dang dpal kyi smra bar bya'o// gzugs byed pa'i 'ams su skye ba yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la/ gzugs pa gyod pa'i sde ba'i yon tan gyi smra bar byal// gzugs la spyod pa'i lhar skye ba gsu
268a4(mdo): pa rnams la/ 'dod pa spyod pa'i lha'i bde ba kyi smra bar bya'o// !na thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la/ rangs ngas rgyas kyi yon tan gyi smra bar bya'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi then
268a5(mdo): la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la/ nyan thos kyi yon tan dag rgya smra bar bya'o// theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnamal/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan myi smra bar bya'o// byang chub sems
268a6(mdo): dpa' pha ro lang tu phyind pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams la/ bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam bzhi myi smra bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i rnam par khyod pa la mngon par bar brtson pa rnams la/ tha dad pa
268a7(mdo): yang dag par shes pa bzhi myi smra bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor smra ba myed pa la rnam pa 'di lta bu zab mo zhi ba stong pa nyid kyi gtam myi smra bar bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i 'khor rnam
268a8(mdo): pa 'di lta bu'i smra ba dang bcas pa'i mdun du/ yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i' mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zab mo 'di smra bar bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po de thams cad dang ldan pas
268b1(mdo): mgrin gcig tu legs so zhes bya ba byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' lag na mar gyi la/ legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis gro ba yang dag par bskyed do// legs so legs so shes
268b2(mdo): rab che// rnam pa shes pas mchog gcod pa// mtshan nyid thabs dang chos rnams kyi// dus ni khyod kyis rab tu shes// 'khor rnams shes pa ci 'dra ba// de 'dra'i chul du stond par byed/ nyan thos rang rgya the
268b3(mdo): pa la// chos 'di marjod par myi byed do// nam ka mtshungs shing mnyam pa yi// byang chub sems dpa'i mdun dag du// chos 'di rab tu bstan mas na// tshul 'di kun tu shes par 'gyur// nam mkha'
268b4(mdo): ji ltar mtho myed la// dpa' ba myed cing gzugs myed pa/ shes rab pha rol byind pyod pa'i// byang chub sems dang de'i mtshan nyid myed// bskal pa grangs myed pa dag gis// 'dra
268b5(mdo): pa'i rgyal ba'i spyan sngar ni/ smra ba myed pa'i 'khor rnams la/ khyod kyis chos 'di thos pa dang // ji ltar brgyal ba des bsta nad pa des// grags pa chen po'i bzod pa 'di// brtson 'grus
268b6(mdo): bstand pa'i sems can la// 'jigs myed pa 'di rab tu bstand// byang chub sems dpa' rab dag cing // yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' myed pa skal pa ldan pa'i mdun du ni// chos 'di yang ni rab tu bstand/ 
268b7(mdo): nyan thos theg pa mngon brtson dang // rang rgyal dag gi mngon dka' la// chos 'di rab tu bstand pas na// de nyid 'tshang rgyar myi 'gyur to// myi shes pas ni spong ba dang // mos pa myed par skyes pas na/ 
268b8(mdo): bsod nams mang po 'byung byed kyi// ngan 'gror yang ni myur tu 'gro/ ting nge 'dzind bzod pa'i gzungs kyis na// gal te de lus 'byung byas te/ byang chub las la brtson bya phyir// la la thabs dang de
269a1(mdo): bral ba// 'khor dang gang bag rnams kyis kyang // sems kyis rtog par myi byed do// 'cham pa'i zhes rab sdod sbyin pa stong pa'i zhi ba smra bar byed// de yang myur du yangs pas da// mun pa'i phung / 
269a2(mdo): ma pos bsgribs pa dag/ gzhan dag gi ni gnas bcu la// myu rad tu yang ni 'gro bar 'gyur// dmyal ba yi dgas byol song du// lha ma yin dang lus srul po// gnod sbyin srin po gtum tsho
269a3(mdo): yang dang yang ni 'dir skye'o// phyir gyur du dka' byed thob pa dag/ gal te ji ltar thob na yang // sman pa'i gdol pa rnams dang ni// 'on pa long ba gzhar ba dang // rtag tu nad dang nyam chung ba// skur ba/ 
269a4(mdo): 'debs shing mchod pa myed// zas dang skom dang bral ba ste/ mkhas pa rnams kyis smras par 'gyur// pa dang ma la bkru sti byed// nyes par byas pa rtag tu spyod// sems can rnam/ 
269a5(mdo): la snying rje myed// ngan 'gror yang ni 'gro bar 'gyur// 'dirani rab tu song ba yi// dge slong drug cu tsam 'di dag/ yid kyis rtog pa zhe sdang ba// ngan 'gror yang ni myur tu 'gro
269a6(mdo): lus dbang byas pa'i sems can 'di// gang gis bzod pa 'di bstand cing // thabs la mngon sum ma yin pa// des ni dge slong de song ngo // ye shes thabs dang ldan pa dang // pha rol sems la blta ba yi/ 
269a7(mdo): 'jig rten la ni smon 'dzind pa// sems can kun la phan par smra// thams cad don gyi rjes shes pa// thog mar yang ni 'khor ltos la// ci 'drar 'gyur ba'i 'khor rnams la// de 'dra bar ni chos
269a8(mdo): kyang shod// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi ji lta bur nyan thos kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri bshams te// nyan thos 'dul ba'i phyir smra bar 'gyu ma
269b1(mdo): zhes bdag gis yongasu zhes so// rigs kyi bu yang 'dis sngon ma thos pa yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam ma kha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa bstan pa na// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bur bdag la zhugs partse
269b2(mdo): ba'i slad du/ yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa yon tan gyis dmyigs pa/ sbyor ba rgya chen pos bshad par bdag kyang / bcom ldan 'das la gsold pa gdab cing / bdag dang
269b3(mdo): sems can gzhan la yang thugs pa rtse ba'i slad du rjes su gzung bar 'gyur sum so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na ma gyes// byang chub sems dpal lag na rin pa che 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu gas
269b4(mdo): gi dus la bab par shes// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag nasadar byed stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa cig tu byas te/ bcom ldan 'das ka le ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag byas na/ 
269b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par ba stod do// thub pa tshangs pa rab tu dgal mdzad pa// ye shes nyams pa'i 'gro la sgron ma 'dzind// grol dang rig la khyod
269b6(mdo): ni dang bar mdzad// rdul dang bral ba'i chos kyi sgro 'di stond// rgyal ba nyi ma 'gro la mar mye mdzad// sems can du ma la ni snang mdzad pa// lam rnams rab ston la ni khyod stond pa// mchog gi chos kyi
269b7(mdo): sgo'adi bstand par mdzad// nam mkha'i rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i thugs// thugs dam mya g.yo ji ltar ri brtan bzhin// thub pa 'jig rten zla ba 'od 'dra ba// tshul mdog bzod pa'i dge ba 'di yang
269b8(mdo): stond// snying rje gnas shing 'gro la bzod mdzad pa// khyod kyi chog shes pa ni mchog tu che// rga 'chi nad gsum rab tu zhi mdzad pa// bzod pa mchog gi yon tan 'di yang stond// thub pa seng ge mu
270a1(mdo): bzod pa mchog gi thugs// bde dang sdug bsngal reg la khyo myi mdzad// mthon po ma yin da ltar mtho byin pa// yongs byin gzigs te bzod pa 'di yang gsungs// ye shes mchog gis nga'i nga rgyal gyi
270a2(mdo): rlung langs lta bu'i nyon mongs dgra yang gtong// des ni bzod pa'i dbapa 'di thob pa// lam gyi kye yis sred pa'i chu yang bskams// khyis kyis lta ba lkug sa sred chu tshig/ krung lta bur ni chos kyi char gtor ba
270a3(mdo): des ni 'dza 'di dga' bar 'gyur pa ste// yongs sbyid la gaN+Di/ shing bzod 'di gsungs// sems can rnams la ngamagro dal yon tan skyed// bzod pa mchog gi yon tan 'di ldan ci
270a4(mdo): gang gi bsam pa dri ma myed bzod 'gyur// de thob pa'i yon tan 'disathal yas// sems dpa' rin can lag la cang myi gsung ba sa zhal gyis bzhes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam
270a5(mdo): du dgongs te// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de gang na yang dag par 'apyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa bstand par yang dgongs so snyam
270a6(mdo): lha bran gyis gsol pa// spos kyi ngan ldang ba'i ril/ sdod yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// bzod pa 'di bstan nas// ji lta bu spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ril sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
270a7(mdo): kyis/ yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di bshad par 'gyur ro zhes/ bzod pa 'di bstand nas bdag nyid ye shes bstand pa la 'jog go// de nas bcom ldan 'das skar mda'i bad
270b1(mdo): po zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzind la snyoms par bzhugs nas/ ting nge 'dzin des// bcom ldan 'das drang srong gi rdul zhugs dang // spyod lam dang / mtshan ma dang / dbyibs kun tu snang ste/ drang srong de yang rgan po dang / 
270b2(mdo): rgas pa dang / 'khogs pa dang / sgra ril po ral pa 'chang ba dang / ma gcom ring po dang / dbyug pa dang / ril pa dang / gtsang ma 'dzin myed 'i sbyind bsregs chen po 'bar ba byed do// de las kyang 'od kyi phung po kha dog sna tshog
270b3(mdo): dang / 'dog ma pa' yas pa dang / bdag pargya byang dus dang / 'dag tu chen bzhind tu mang su dag sa drim byed pa'i 'od 'byung ba// de'i'od spang bas phyogs babu'i spong ba dang / rnyeg pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mapa' sa su da
270b4(mdo): masas dang / rin pa da/ dang / 'ad dang / da sbyin dang / lham yin gyi kya kyi snangang/ na dmyal ba dang / byel po dang / yid/ mang ma
270b5(mdo): phyi snang ngo // de'i tshe drang srong thub pa ma gtogs par sems can rnams kyi sgra dang / brjod pa dang / dbyangs dang / tshig dang / yi ge da pa/ chung ngu nas sa dang / chu dang / mye dang / rlung gyi sgra yang myi grag
270b6(mdo): ga de'i che phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthal yas su byed pa na/ sems can gang la sa theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de thams cad drang srong gi 'dul zhugs dang / lus dang / mtshan sa dang / dbyings kun tu
270b7(mdo): yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i drang srongs gtogs par/ nyan thos sas/ rang rgyal ba'i theg pa'i drang srong gi kun tu phyi snang ngo // yang theg pa chen po yang dag par zhugs pa'i drang srong des// nyan thos dang / 
270b8(mdo): sa rgya kyi mtshong zhing / nyan pos dang nga sa sa rgyas kyi theg pa pa yang gyi 'thong ngo // de'i dag pang nyan thos 'khod da ma mo dang / de bzhin gsheg sa phyir mang zhing / de byang chubams dpa' sabs da pa kyi thongs
271a1(mdo): de nas nyan thos chen ba des/ 'od srung chen po la smras pa/ sbyangs pa smra ba'i na pan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod mchog tu bstand na/ bcom ldan 'das da skar gapan pa moms shig/ 'od srung chen no/ 
271a2(mdo): smras pa/ ma ldan 'das dasbya ga na zhes kyi ma tha // ded pa nyin tha pa chen pa des me dang ldan pa dam ti'i bu la smras pa/ gnas btud nanga'i bu zhe sa sa dang
271a3(mdo): ba'i nang na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod mchog tu bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das gang nab soms shig/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' skyed pas// bcom
271a4(mdo): ldan 'das da ltar ga na zhes bya ba myi shes so// mye mthong ngo // de nas nyan thos chen po des/ me'u 'gal yan la smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa mye'u dga' ya na/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i nang na/ bcom ldan 'das
271a5(mdo): kyis khyod kyang mchog tu bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das da lta gang na ba soms shika/ mye'u dag la ya nas smras pa/ gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos smras pa// de nyid na bdag gis stong gsum gyi
271a6(mdo): stong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rjes su shes kyi/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang ni bzhugs pa gang du bzhud ces bya ba ni myi mthong ngo // myi shes so// de nas nyan thos chen po des
271b1(mdo): tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la smras pa/ lha'i phyig gi nang na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod kyang mchog tu bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang du bzhud/ gang na gnas/ spyod pa ni mi 'dra/ ci 'drar
271b2(mdo): spyod/ khyod kyi lha'i myig gis ltos// ma 'gags pas smras pa// kho bos 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi myig kis/ mtha' yas mu myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par bltas na/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na
271b3(mdo): bzhugs/ gang du bzhud ces bya ba bdag kyang myi shes so// myi mthong ngo // des smras pa/ yang tha dad par yang dag par shes pa thob pa'i nyan thos kyi ye shes gang la'ang myi 'jug gi/ bzod pa thob pa'i byang
271b4(mdo): chub sems dpa' ye shes de la 'jug go// bdag gis bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang du bzhud/ gang na bzhugs shes bya / chub sems dpa' la dri snyam pa dang / de nas nyan thos chen po des
271b5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i gcig kyang yang dag par rjes su bya mthong ngo tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'di la rig sa kyi bu gzhan gyis phung po bshad par byas pa de na/ dge slong drug bcu
271b6(mdo): tsam po stan las langs te dong bas tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das thugs myi dges nas// btang snyoms shing 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi spyod pas rigs kyi bu dang thabs cig tu spyod do// bdag cag ni rang rang gi spyi
271b7(mdo): por zhugs shing bsam gtan bya snyas te/ de nas nyan thos chen po de rang rang gyi skyil por zhugs nas/ bsam gtan byed do// de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chad myed grangs byed par
271b8(mdo): theg pa chen po la yang dag yar zhugs pa'i sems de bdag drang srong gi sa byad du mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag cag drang srong du gyur pa na/ gang drang srong las shin tu khyad par du 'phags pade
272a1(mdo): bdag cag gi mkhan por gzung ngo zhes/ bdag cag rnam par blta bar bya'o zhes snyam pa de thams cad rtog pa seld par zhes bya ba byed pa can gyi grong rdal na// drang srong chen po shag kya thub pa/ 
272a2(mdo): rgas pa 'khogs pa'i/ 'dug pa rnams me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / sman dang / zas dang / skom rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mye la gtor da pa zag ring bar mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ drang srong chen po 'od
272a3(mdo): nus pa chen po mthu chen po 'di'i mthus snang ba chen po 'byung ngo // drang srong 'di gang na ba de logs su nye bar 'gro zhing / drang srong chen po brtul zhugs dang / pyod po'i rdzas su bslab par bya'o snyam mo// de
272a4(mdo): nas de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' drang srong bye ba khrag/ khrig brgya stong bcom ldan 'das kyis tha dad du nye bar dong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' drang srong ting nge 'dzind dang / bzod pa
272a5(mdo): dang / gzugs dbang du byas pa de/ sems rtse gcig pa'i sto sa kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ ston pa de nyid kyi tshe// myi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi'o khams 'dir gang
272a6(mdo): lA dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto phye chen po dang / kyi dang gyi ma yin 'dul la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de thams cad drang srong gis byad kyi/ 
272a7(mdo): drang sro zhag kya thub pa'i thad du nye bar dong ngo // 'khor thams cad dang ldan pa de/ bcom ldan 'das ji lta bur smos kyi dang ldang ba'i ri la bzhud nas// de na yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam sa kha'i bdag gis 'dul ba'i
272a8(mdo): bzod pa 'di spyod pa'i phyir// chos can gyi 'khor lo gnyis la yang 'dug par bzhed pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis zhes so// bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi don kyi phyir lam brgyan dam sbyang bar bya na
272b1(mdo): lam des drang srong gi mchog spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la nye bar 'gro bar bya'o snyam ste/ de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dang / rgyamatsho dang / nor bdog dang / 'jog po dang / yid yod lam 'tshogs pa
272b2(mdo): klu'i rgyal po bye ba phrag drug cu tsam lhan cig du drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che ka ser dang / rdul dang / bye dur+ya dang / shel dang / byi ru dang / ma sman gar pa dang / mu sar kal ba las/ stsogs pa rin/ 
272b3(mdo): po che sna bdun gyi shing ta la'i 'phreng ba gser gyi shing la rdul gyi lo ma me tog dang 'bras bu rdul gyi shing la/ gser gyi lo ma dang / me tog dang 'bras bu nas mu sa ra gal ba'i shing gi bar du rin po che sna bdun gyi lo ma dang
272b4(mdo): me tog dang / 'bras bu'i 'phreng ba'i rgyan gyis lam de brgya nad pa ra sprul to// shing ta la'i 'phreng ba de la lha rdzas kyi gos/ stong phrag bye ba rnam pa du ma rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par rab tu 'phyang
272b5(mdo): lho de dag kyang drang srong ge cha byad kyis dka' thub kyi gnas nas/ spos kyi ngad ldang po'i ri'i bar du lam gyi zheng dpag tshad bcu pa sbyangs so// lam gyi mu gnyis su lha rdzas kyi gser nas/ mus
272b6(mdo): gal ba'i bar du rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bur yul to// gser gyi shing ta la la rdul gyi snying po 'phyang ba nas/ mu sa ra gal pa'i bar du smra bar bya'o// 'og logs su be dur+ya bzang po nas/ go pa log
272b7(mdo): kyi gnas su shel gyi bar du rgya chen pos smra bar bya'o// srin gyi lha'i bu drang srong gi cha byad kyis lam kye mu gnyis su rdzing rnyog po rin po che sna bdun gyi them skas can gyi rdzing de dag la gser gyi bye ma bdal ba la/ 
272b8(mdo): rdzing de dag la yang lha rdzas kyi me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu dang / pun da ri ka dang / a te muka ta ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / a sho ka dang / su nu ku kun dang / man dzu sha ka dang / ba ti lid
273a1(mdo): banan 'dun duban nga / sus dang/ sa ma dang / langs bu dang / byin lad kya gam pa gas su mngon par / sa thAg nas kyi gnod sbyin
273a2(mdo): byad kyis lam myong bar byed do// gzhan 'grus dbang byed kyi sku'i bu yang drang srong gis byad kyis/ las kyi su gnyis la/ lArdzas rgya rin po me bdun gyi rgyal mtshan mchog 'dzin to// rgyal mtshan gyi mchog de
273a3(mdo): dag la/ lha rdzas kyi gos dang / du sha dang / rgyan rab tu 'phyang ngo // 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdun gyi khang bu cheg ma mngon par sprul to// khang bu legs ma de dag gi
273a4(mdo): phyogs bzhi kun tu rin po che bdun gis so// khang bu tshigs ma de la ya lha rdzas kyi du sha sna tshogs dang / gos sna tshogs dang / na sna tshogs mngon par rab tu 'byung ngo // me tog sna tshogs kyis
273a5(mdo): kun tu gtor to// khang bu reg ma de la lha rdzas kyi rol mo rgyan chen po yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs byung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi byin/ kyis rlabs kyis rol mo dkrol ba dang / klu'i sgra bsgrags pa des
273a6(mdo): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad spras khyab par gyur da to// klu'i bu mo brgya stong phrag drug bcu rtsa brgyad lam mdzes pas// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir drang srong gi
273a7(mdo): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas rin po che sna tshogs kyi char bab po dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis 'di lta ste lha rdzas kyi me tog man da ra dang / man da ra chen po dang / tsam pa ka dang / pa ri ya
273a8(mdo): tra dang / 'dzo sha dang / 'jo sha ka chen po dang / ro tsa dang / ro tsa ka chen po dang // bal la dang / bal la chen po dang / tsag kra dang / tsag kra chen po 'od drim myed pa// mdab ma brgya la/ mdab ma stong pa
273b1(mdo): kun dpa 'od/ kun nas dri/ kun nas rnam par rgyu ba'i dri/ rtag tu me tog 'od srung ba/ kha dog mtha' byed pa/ bltar 'os pa/ myig gis mngon par dka' ba/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
273b2(mdo): kyi don dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mchod pa'i las kyi phyir las 'jas par byas so// char pa'i sprin gi lha'i bu brgya stong tu ma dag kyang drang srong gi ma byad kyis/ chu las skyes pa dang / thang las skyes pa'i tham rab tu
273b3(mdo): phab bo// klu glang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis yang dag par gnas zhing 'di lta ste/ mu tig sdon pa'i char dang 'go shir shu snying po'i char las sogs te char sna tshogs rab tu phab bo// ga
273b4(mdo): la la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten kye khams 'dir sngo na byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i lha 'am/ lha'i dbang pol/ klu 'am klu'i dbang po 'am/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma
273b5(mdo): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / ye dgas dang / sha za dang grul bum dang / grul bum gyi dbang po dang / brgya byind dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i
273b6(mdo): bar du de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad kyis men tog sna tshogs dang / phreng ba sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang / byug pa sna tshogs dang / rol mo dkro' ba sna tshogs dang / brdung ba dang / gru sna tshogs yongs su
273b7(mdo): bzung nas/ bcom ldan 'das s+yan myi 'dzums pa'i zhal la rnam par blta ba'i phyir 'khod do// gang la la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'dir lha'i bu mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am/ 
273b8(mdo): nam mkha' lding ki bu mo da ma/ lha ma yin gi bu mo 'am/ myi 'am ci'i bu mo 'am/ lho 'phye chen po'i bu mo de dag thams cad drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rol mo brdung ba dang / 
274a1(mdo): dgros pa dang / chu yong su 'azung ste/ dmang po dang / dkar ba dang / leb rgad dang / shel gyi kha dog gi shos gyi nang kha gyis khyad kyis rab tu phab po// myi 'am ci'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang dam
274a2(mdo): grong gi sa byad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa snga tshogs kyis las kyi phyir brtson no// tshangs pa'i dbang po lngam byang chub sems bskyed pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du la yang drang srong gi ma byad kyis/ bcos
274a3(mdo): ldan 'das la stod cing spyan sngar 'khod do// brgya byin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis phyag 'tshal bar byed cing / myi 'am ci'i dbang po brgya stong du ma yang stond cing phyag 'tshal lo// dri ba'i
274a4(mdo): dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ rab tu gas dal ba'i sems kyis zhal la rnam par blta'o// klu'i dab da po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong kyi cha byad kyis/ dus dang mthun
274a5(mdo): pa'i tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char chen po rab tu 'phebs so// lha/ ma yin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong kyi cha byad kyiphyogs bzhir rlung mchog tu 'jam pas kund tu reg pa/ mchon
274a6(mdo): tu dri zhes pa mchog tu 'jam pa gtong ngo // gnod sbyin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis len tog gi gdugs 'dzind no// gnod sbyin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma drang srong rgan por gyur
274a7(mdo): gser gyi dbyug pa'i gdugs 'dzin cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du lta'o// thul bum brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong rgan po'i mapyad kyis gas
274a8(mdo): kaM byug pa'i gdugs 'chang zhing // bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon logs su 'khod te// bcom ldan 'das sa de bzhin du sa'o// rnam pa'a' ldid kyi dbang po brgya thong du ma yang na khrod kyi mad kyis na
274b1(mdo): mtha'i kyil du gser gyi 'phreng ba 'byung bar gyu rad to// lha'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong kyi cha byad kyis me tog gi chu bo'i char chen po mngon par rab tu 'bebs so// klu'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis mu tig
274b2(mdo): nanamar po'i char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so// dra za'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis mu tig dkar po'i char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so// gnod sbyin gyi bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis
274b3(mdo): tsan dan phye ma'i char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so// lha ma yin gi bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis rgya nad kyi char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so// nam mkha' lding gi bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha
274b4(mdo): byad kyis 'dzam bu'i klung gi gser gi char mngon par rab tu 'bebs da lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis nam/ da mkha'i dkyil brgyan par byed do// sa'i gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma yang
274b5(mdo): drang srong gi cha byad kyis dbyings gtong bar byed do// bar snang gyi gnod spyan brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis nam mkha' la 'a bya nad to// bdud brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis lhung lhung / 
274b6(mdo): ldegs kyi sgra 'byind pa 'thun // drang srong lha brgya stong phrag brgyad cu pa bzhi rang bzhin gis brtan pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par spyod pa dang // drang srong stong phrag brgya nu bzhi rang bzhin gyis brtan pa'i brtul
274b7(mdo): zhugs yang dag par gyod sngo dag lha rdzas kyi me tog mun dang ba chen po blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir rnyog pa sel ba nas// chos kyis ngang ldang ba'i ri'i bar du mtshams spyod pa rab tu byin no// de napa
274b8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das bzhud pa'i zhabs kyis me tog gi snying po kun tu gnon par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla ba brgya stong du ma yang / drang srong gi cha byad kyis me tog gi chu ba'i char mngon pa rab tu 'bebs so// 
275a1(mdo): sna phran ba skye stong phrag brgya bcu nya bzhi dang / lhan cig du dang srong gi ma byad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das gang na pa de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'jas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'phrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon
275a2(mdo): bar bgod do// sems cad gyi srung krol byed gang gnyis mchog// mnyas dka' rgyal ba gzugs ngang 'dren mdzad cing // sdug bsngal gzir ba bde ba'i mdog sbyin pa// rgyal ba rkang gnyis dpa pa 'dir gshegs gsol
275a3(mdo): sred pa rab smrangs rnam par da gsum spyod da cing // 'grol nus gsum na dam sa zhes kyis bslab pa gsum sngon da prib gsum yangs pa// khams gsum las 'das thub pa 'dir gshegs gsol/ 
275a4(mdo): 'gro la byin ci log bzhinam par grol// 'khor bzhi dag gis zham sa la bsnyen bkur cing // 'gro la 'phags pa'i bden pa zhi rab stond pa// zla ba bas kyang lhag pa 'dir gshegs
275a5(mdo): gsol// thub pa phung po lnga 'di rab stond pa// 'dod pa lnga la skye bo rnam grol zhing // 'phags pa'i shes rab yan lag lnga stond pa// 'gro ba lnga yi 'phon ma rnam par bkrol// dbang po drug 'dus gnas/ 
275a6(mdo): pa skyon byed cing // sred lus drug las shin tu rgan grol shes// sum nu pa drug dran ston sems can mchog/ sos kyi drad ldang ri 'dir gshegs su gsol// rgyal ba mnyam bzhag rab tu dul ba'i thugs/ shind
275a7(mdo): tu snyoms pa byang chub dam pa mchog/ ye shes sems can bye ba rab dul mdzad// 'a lo rab sbyar spos ngang ri 'dir spyon// rgyal ba ye shes sems can rab stond pa// ye shes kyis ni 'jig rten snang
275b1(mdo): mdzad dpa// khyod ni mun pas bsgribs pa ye shes 'ad// zub pa dgon pa'i gnas 'dir gshegs su gsos// 'dzam bu gling 'dir yangs rgyas 'byung ba da// 'dis 'od 'gyur dalal bar 'dod cing // phyi'i dan sa
275b2(mdo): byang chub 'dir thob pa// myi'i 'dren ma khan khyod ni kri shegs gsol// sbyin dang 'dul ba gtong zhing dul ba'i thugs// sems can nang nan rtsimo stobs bcu'i mchog// sems can dbul la mnyen pa 'phags pa
275b3(mdo): khyod// spos kyi rang ldang nga 'dir gshegs su gsol// bar dka' khyod kyis lo drug dka' mdzad cing // bar 'ga' rgyal ba bdud phyir shing la bzhugs// dpel bcul gcig tun lam stond pa// thub pa 'dir
275b4(mdo): gshegs bzod parab tu bstod // ba lan sa 'tsha mo ngas paskrang / dashes rab dam pa dag gi mdzod cing gsungs// thos kyi ngad ldang ri 'dir bzod pa gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das lan
275b5(mdo): mas mdun du mdard cing // byang chub sems dpa' du mas bskor da na gdan las bzhengs pa dang // de nyid kyi tshe na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lan drug tu rab tu g.yos so
275b6(mdo): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams 'dir gang sems can nyan thos sam// rang sangs rgyas sam// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'am// nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang / gang yang sems can
275b7(mdo): gzhan thams cad gang nam mkha' la rgyu ba 'am// kang sa la rgyu ba 'am// gang tshu la rgyu ba de thams cad dran pa rgya chen po so sor thob bo// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend gi khams 'di lag mthil du
275b8(mdo): skyes pa snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par mthong ngo // myig gis gzugs la ni chung zad snang bar myi 'gyur ro// kang yang sems can dka' thub ngan pa'i rnal 'byor da dang ldan pa de yang / ngo mtshar chen po thob bo// 
276a1(mdo): nyas pab rnas na yod pa// 'ag pa sa sa pa can de thams cad da// 'ashus ngan pa yangs nas// phyogs dang phyogs marnams su bstsal so// ci'i rgyu mo'i rkyed kyis da/ rnam pa de'i lta bu'i man na
276a2(mdo): dang // snang bzhin pa 'di 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// denas bcom ldan 'das dang gro bachen pa'i sman ldan/ gang bya'i druphung po min pa dun pa de lung po gar kye 'phrums du mdzod par phru te// 
276a3(mdo): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dan pa dang / dag pa dzad byed dgrangs myed pa rnams su gtor to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te/ 
276a4(mdo): 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas de dag gi spyan sngar myer snang ba de me tog sa/ dar ba chen po kun tu gnas pa 'dug par gyur to// 'khor ji tsam pa 'dus pa dang / gang sngon byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de
276a5(mdo): thams cad drang srong kyi cha byad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi spyan sngar 'khod do// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang ka gnyis kyi bye ma snyed las shi nad tu 'das te/ 
276a6(mdo): de na rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rtend kyi khams der// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gyi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal gyi zhes bya ba bzhugs te// 'tsho skyong la chos kyang stond to// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang / 
276a7(mdo): kyi rgyal mtshan gyi 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dpal zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bza' shing ra ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de/ drang srong gi gzugs dang / lus
276b1(mdo): dang dbyibs kyis bdag mthong ngo // gzhan yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu thams cad drang srong gi gzugs dang / lus dang / dbyibs kyis mthong ngo // mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbang
276b2(mdo): kye rgyal mtshan gyi dpal la yongs su zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen kyis na/ gang me tog mer snang ba/ bye du r+ya'i dbyig pa 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur da / theg pa chen po 'di dag
276b3(mdo): la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad 'jand par grub/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal gyis/ rigs kyi bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka
276b4(mdo): salang to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag dpar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shig kya thub pa zhes bya ba nub phyog/ das kyi myi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na 'dug cing rnyog pa lnga'i 'jig
276b5(mdo): rten du 'jug pa na/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge ga/ na dang / dge snyen ma 'khor bzhi dag la theg pa gsum khyen stond par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa de da ltar yang dag par myod
276b6(mdo): ba'i chus nam ma kha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i 'azod pa bstan pas 'dod pas// de bzhin gshegs pa smon ma dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind la snyoms par bzhugs nas// de'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par yul to// 
276b7(mdo): ba'ad pa/ da pa 'di bag pal/ badz+ra ngi swA tu zhig/ bka' sa 'dapabazod pa 'di sa stegs can thams cadas 'dug pa'o// de skar gyi mad kyisangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bsas cad na
276b8(mdo): khyer pa rnamapas skal bar byed pa'o// chu bo bzhi gang zhen// 'dod pa'i chu ba dang / sa ba'i chu ba dang / srid pa'i chu bo dang / ma rig pa'i chu ba 'di dag las sems can rlom par byed pa'o// dad pa'i myi byed pa ban pa
277a1(mdo): dag par lo nang du 'jug par / 'jug par byed pa/ so sor 'god par byed pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas la dad pa myi byed pa/ sems can rnams la yang dag par le nad tu 'jug pa/ 'jug pa/ 
277a2(mdo): byed pa/ so sor 'god par byed pa'o// bsdud pa'i dngos po rnam bzhi la/ sems can rnams sbyor bar byed pa'o// tshul khrims kyi phung pos sems can rnams 'dod pa'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o// ting nge
277a3(mdo): 'dzind kyi phung pos sems can rnams lta ba'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o// shes rab kyi phung pos sems can rnams la ma rig pa'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o// rnam par grol ba'i phung pos/ sems can rnams
277a4(mdo): srid pa'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o// sangs rgyas la dad pa myi byed pas/ sems can rnams theg pa chen pos sgrol bar byed/ da pa'o// chos la dad pa myi phyed pas// sems can rnams rang
277a5(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi theg pas sgrol bar byed pa'o// dge 'dun la dang / pa myi phyed pas// sems can rnams nyan thos kyi theg pas sgrol bar byed pa'o// 'phags pa yid du 'ong ba'i tshul khrims
277a6(mdo): kyis// lta bar song ba thams cad spong ba la ston par byed pa'o// sbyin pas sems can rnams che ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed pa'o// ngag snyan pas lta ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed pa'o// don byed pas seMs
277a7(mdo): can rnams nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho las spros par byed pa'o// don mthun pas sems can rnams shes rab kyi pha rold tu sgrol bar byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsold pa// btsun pa bcom ldan
277a8(mdo): 'das bdag cag la bka' sa la du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa zhag kya thub pa de la blta ba dang // phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkung ba'i phyir// bdag cag nye bar ma lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gyi rgyas
277b1(mdo): brag drug cu lhan cig du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal de la drang srong gi ma byad kyis rkang pa gnyis sa kyi bos phyag 'tshal nas// g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba byas te 'khod do// 
277b2(mdo): skad cig ma gcig tsam gyis myi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du lhags nas// bcom ldan 'das drang srong shig kya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dug ste// thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal te// 'khod par gyur da to// de las
277b3(mdo): sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' tshad myed grangs myed pa rnams drang srong gi cha byad kyis// shar phyogs sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang // rnam par ma dag pas tshad myed grangs myed pa 'dir skad cig
277b4(mdo): ma gcig gis lhags so// de bzhin du g.yas phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang 'aka'i bye ma snyed las shi nad tu 'das te// de na ri rab kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya
277b5(mdo): ba'i 'jig rtenang gi khams der/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs so// 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang stond to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba dang // byang
277b6(mdo): chub sems dpa' klog gi mchog ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis drang srong gis byad dang / sus dang gzugs dang dbyigs kyis bdag mthong ngo // sngon ma byung ba'i thub pa chen po gzhan yang drang srong gi cha byad
277b7(mdo): kyis mthong nas// de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab chen po de la yongs su zhus pa/ de bzhin du lta bur kong du bshad pa nas/ de bzhin du nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di lam shinang tu 'das pa'i bar du ste// don 'a
278a1(mdo): pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten kyi khams der// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te// 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang stond to// de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod par
278a2(mdo): mthong ba dang // ku mu ta'i glang po zhes bya ba gnyis kyang ji ltar gong du bshad pa nas// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang ga gsum gi bye ma snyed shi nad tu 'das pa'i bar du ste/ 
278a3(mdo): de na rgyan gcig ces bya ba 'jig rtenang gi khams der// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan po che zhes bya ba bzhugs te// 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang stond to// de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdul dang bral ba'i
278a4(mdo): 'od dang / tshangs pa'i 'od ces bya ba gnyis kyang ji ltar gong du ba/ da pa nas// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang 'ag gcig gi bye ma snyed las sha nad tu
278a5(mdo): 'das pa'i bar du ste// de na me tog chen po zhes bya ba'i 'jigarte nad gi khams der// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs te// 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to// 
278a6(mdo): de na byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal shes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpal chen po zhes bya ba gnyis kyang ji ltar gong du bshad pa nas// yang steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhe
278a7(mdo): rgya bo gang 'ga' bdun gi bye ma snyed nas// shi nad tu 'das pa'i bar du ste/ de na 'od snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rtend gi khams de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i snying po
278a8(mdo): zhes bya ba bzhugs te// 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang stonan te// den byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyangs dang / bdud cing dbyangs shes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gnyis kyang ji snyed gong du bshad pa bzhin no// dol bya/ 
278b1(mdo): chub sems dpa' drang srong kyi cha byad 'dzind pas// myi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang ldan pa 'di kun tu rgyas nas// de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong chen po shag kya thub pa gang na ba de logs su thal mo/ 
278b2(mdo): sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas 'khod do// myi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sems can gang la la theg pa chen po la yang dag par ma zhugs pa ni// drang srong ki cha byad kyi ma gyurd pa'o// rgyan de dag la nyan thos sa
278b3(mdo): nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am// rang sangs rgyas sam// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas kyang myi mthong na/ sems can gzhan gyis mthong bar myi 'gyur ba lta ci smos// de nas bcom ldan 'das drang srong chen po
278b4(mdo): gdan de las bzhengs te/ thub pa dbang po'i 'gros dang / tshang / sa pa dbang po'i 'gros dang / tshangs pa drang srong gi 'gros da/ pa/ gnya' shing du lta ba'i 'gros dang / nye bar zhi ba'i 'gros dang / 
278b5(mdo): rab tu zhi ba'i 'gros dang / dge slong rnams mos pa chen po la 'gro sa dang / lha dga' ba'i 'gros dang / gnod sbyin 'dul ba'i'agros dang / lha ma yin dga' bar byed pa'i 'gros dang / klu dul
278b6(mdo): ba'i 'gros dang / rgyal ba nyon mongs pa myed pa'i 'gros dang / rnam par grol ba'i 'gros mi 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i 'gros su bzhud cing / sangs rgyas chen po rnam 'phrul pa'i 'gros dang / rgya chen po'i 'gros dang / 
278b7(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi byi nad kyis rlabs chen po'i 'gros su// bcom ldan 'das gros kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la me tog gi ze ba la zhabs 'degs pa dang / 'dor bas bzhud nas 'acos kyi ngad ldang ba'i pil byond to// dka' thub
278b8(mdo): kyi gnas gcangs/ dri ba dad pa byed cing dri ma byed pa'i phyogs su 'gro sel gyi lha mo chen mo 'od 'dres pa zhes bya ba gang na bden/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te/ glang po'i rnam par blta ba'i tshul gyis rnam par
279a1(mdo): bsdus par gyur pa de'i dus na/ yang 'di brjod do// la la ga 'dir brtan dang ldan pa la// byang chub sems dam pa mchog tu sems bskyed pa// bdag gis yang dag gyod pa bstand pa'i phyir// de dag
279a2(mdo): thams cad bdag gi mdun du 'ong // byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs spangs myed gang // dadung du yang 'khor ba'i bde 'dod cing // chos la bdag byed rab tu myi shes pa// bdag ni de dag thams cad 'ong na stond/ kun
279a3(mdo): tu sbyor ba 'angs kyad ga dag kyang // sgra ba'i lung ste shin tu ma yang zhing / babs sa ma khas pa ya na kyi zhes te// de dag thams cad 'dzin bdag stond to// brtson grus ldan pas po dpa pa mdzod sa
279a4(mdo): bas la mkhas tham mams can nams 'dus zhing// shes rab da byind mchog rtag spyod pa// bzod nyan thos byi da/ thams cad 'o// gangazhis mang+yas rgyam chum sngon pazed bkur
279b1(mdo): su yang 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing 'dir 'ongs pa gang dag kyang // byang chub mchog gi spyod phyir bzod pa bstand// nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa can mthong ste// de bas mu stegs gzhan kun 'dir 'dul lo
279b2(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor de yang de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi yi ge dang don dang // tshig brjod pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas su myed par song
279b3(mdo): ngo// de na sems can gang la la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de thams cad nyan cing / de phyogs bcur yang lta bar 'gyur ro// bdag cag gis blta ba'i sems can de// sems can gang gi dbyangs kyi
279b4(mdo): dkyil 'khor de ltar yid du 'ong ba// de ltar dga' ba/ de ltar ma/ dngon par dga' ba/ de ltar zab cing sems kyi dbugs 'byin/ dad pa// de ltar tshim pa// de ltar 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro
279b5(mdo): ba/ don dang / tshig dang / yi ge brjod pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khorar de ltar yang du 'ong ba/ bzhin du smra bar bya ba ji lta bur der de phyogs bzhi kun tu bltas te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus spos kyi
279b6(mdo): dang ldang ba'i ril drang srong brub pa dbang po zhi zhing thugs zhi ba/ dul ba dang zhi ba'i mchog thob pa/ gser gyi phung po ji ltar 'bar ba sa drang srong bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang pos mngon gsum du phyag 'tshal te// 5
279b7(mdo): yang skye rig par mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te// drang srong 'di ni mthu chen po drang srong gi 'khor chen po 'di ni snying rje chen po dang ldan par 'byung ba zhig sum ste/ kal te snying rje dang ldan par 'gyur
279b8(mdo): ba de'i rjes su 'gro'o// drang srong gi ma byad dang / lus dang dbyibs kyis bdag gi sus su gyurar pa de dag mthong nas// de dag 'di snyam du sems te// bdag cag kyang drang srong du byur dan/ drang srong chen po des
280a1(mdo): 'di nyin bku ba dang / 'jas pa'i phyi nye bar 'gro'o// ded/ kyang bams bskyed pa lanas pa// phyonas bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chad byed grangs myed gams drang srong gi ma byad cad kyed
280a2(mdo): grangs byed// zasam kyis kyi khyab mtshungs pa byed ning/ dpag tu byed pa/ chu tho gang ka'i byem snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mngon par lhags so// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
280a3(mdo): 'phrul pa'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis/ drang srong gi thub pa la mchod pa byas nas/ drang srong thub pa kang na bde logs su thal mo sbya rad te/ phyag 'tshal nas bstod de 'khod do// la la smon lam gyi dbang dang / la
280a4(mdo): ngan du myod pa'i rkyen kyis gang yang ngan song du skyes pa de dag pangs rgyas kyi mthus dran pa ma sor tho ba nas// drang srong kyi byad kyis kun tu 'dzad do// drang srong chen po thub pa'i dbang po gdun bA de 'on
280a5(mdo): su yang thal mo sbyar te 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal ba// sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'di snyam du sems te// shag kya thub pa bzhugs shing / 
280a6(mdo): ji ltar bur 'khor yang dag par 'ongs pa la// yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di gang na stond par 'gyur// de nas de nyid kyi tshan/ shar phyogs kyi nam mkha'i lam las 'ang pa
280a7(mdo): brtsegs pa blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis 'ang pa sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ dper na/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i khang pa btags pa lta bu/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu lhags so// de nas
280a8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po khang pa brtsegs pa de mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag kyi khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshangs pa mye mched kyi bdag po'i Sha
280b1(mdo): pa brtsegs pa dbyangs zhi ba 'di 'dra bar sprul te// drang srong thub pa gang na bzhugs pa deng bdag bzod pa 'di bstan snyam pa dang // de nyid kyi chen lho phyogs na nam mkha'i lam khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug pa
280b2(mdo): rin po che sna bdun gyis gang sna tshogs 'di lta ste// dper na/ tshangs pa mye mjed kyi bdag po'i khang pa brtsegs pa dbyangs zhi ba/ lta ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu lhags pa mthong nas// byang chub
280b3(mdo): sems dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshangs pa chen po glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa de 'dra ba mngon par sku lad te/ bcom ldan 'ad
280b4(mdo): de na bzhugs sheng chos stond to// snyam pa dang / de nas de nyid kyi tshe/ na nub phyogs nas nam mkha'i lam las 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshangs pa chen po glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug pa

280b6(mdo): lta ste/ dper na/ tshangs pa'i ri rab 'od ces bya ba'i 'ang pa brtsegs pa de nas de nyid kyi tshe// byang phyogs nas nam mkha'i lam las khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug pa/ rin po che bdun gyis gang ba sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ dper na
280b7(mdo): tshangs pa chen po ri rab kyi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dor bar byed pa dang ldan pa// khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug lhags so// de nas yang de'i tshe na khang pa brtsegs pa khrag khrig brgya stong du ma nam mkha' la 'khod do// de nas
280b8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di snyam du sems te// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi dond kyi phyir seng ge'i khri la rnam par bltas te// bcom ldan 'das kyi dond kyi phyir seng ge'i khri bshams pa'i khang pa
281a1(mdo): bcigs pag di na sus / de nas byang chun sems sa rgya ma / byong chub sems dpa' ga ci 'dzi nim byed pa la 'di nad ces ldam pa// rigs kyi bu 'da' 'dzigs pa 'di dag gang du lhags/ bu
281a2(mdo): kyis rnams byang chub sems dpa' ga ni brjid dri ma byed dam/ byang chum sems dpa' byams pa la smras// rigs kyi bu de bam chos kyi gachags pa thams cad rkun bcad pa'i phyir dadung kyi sgrub kyi/ 'di gnyis kyis 'khor ba
281a3(mdo): 'khyil pa'i sgrub bo// rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'o// 'di gnyis ni 'byung ba dang 'jig pa zhes bya ste/ gang myi skye ba myi 'byung ba de 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i 'du shes kyang myed do// de 'jig pa thams cad yangs nas
281a4(mdo): myi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob bo// 'khor ba'i rgyu nad bcad pa/ 'a 'di ni gnyis su byed pa'i chos kyi sgo'o// kang 'gro ba dang 'ong ba zhes/ bya ba 'di gnyis ni/ 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'o// rigs kyi bu gang bdag tu
281a5(mdo): sgro 'dogs pa myed pa dang / srog dang / gsol ba dang / gang zag dang shed las skyes pa dang / shed can dang / 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba'i 'u shes su 'jug pa myed pa 'di ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug

281a8(mdo): sangs pa/ rlom sems thams cad bcom pa/ gzugs kyi 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'di ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// 'bul ba dang / rlom zhing sems par rig pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// kang tshor ba'i
281b1(mdo): 'gul ba byed cing rlom sems byed pa/ g.yo ba byed pa yid la myi byed pa 'di ni gnyis su byed pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang tshor bar shes pa dang / tshor bar kun 'byung bar shes pa dang / tshor bar 'gog par shes pa
281b2(mdo): dang / tshor ba 'phrog par 'gro ba'i lam du shes pa 'di ni gnyis su'o// rigs kyi bu gang lang cor ba kun 'byung ba 'gog par 'gro ba gyi shes pa dang / gzugs kyi phung po dang / tshor ba'i phung po'i mtshan nyid tha dad par bya zhes pa dang /

281b4(mdo): phung po dang khams dang skye mched la nyan thos dang / rang byang chub tu 'dod pa dang / bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes 'dod pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang yang nyan thos
281b5(mdo): dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye she/ sa kyang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la rtend par myi zhes pa dang // yi ge'i tshig gi lam thams cad ni gnas myed pa// 
281b6(mdo): yi ge myed pa/ spyod pa myed par rab tu shes pa 'di yang / rigs kyi bu gnyis su myed pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang dge ba dang / myi dge bar 'du shes kund tu shes pa dang / pha rol dang tshu rol tu shes
281b7(mdo): pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang dge ba dang / myi dge ba 'di yang mtshan ma myed pa/ kun nas ldang ba dang myi bzad pa kund tu rtog pa 'di yang / rigs kyi bu gnyis su byed pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// rig
281b8(mdo): kyi bu gzhan yang chu ro yad na zag pa'o// pha ro la ni phyi nad mi log de gang chu ro lang dang / pha rol la rtog pa dang / 'dzind pa dang / dkrol ba 'di ni gnyis pa'o// gang yang chu ro yod dang pha royod la 'dzind pa myed pa dang / 
282a1(mdo): dkrol ba byed pa dang / mil yang btags pa byed pa dang / btang ba byed pa 'di ni gnyis su byed pa'i chos kyi gos 'dug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la chan pa dang
282a2(mdo): bcas pa 'am/ zag pa byed pa la/ zhes rtog pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// kang sang khams dang skyes ched la zag pa dang bcas pa zhes tog pa myed pa dang / zag pa byed pa'i 'du shes su bya ba'ang myed pa dang / 'du shes dang / du
282a3(mdo): shes myed byin thob pa yang / myed pa 'di yang gnyis su myed pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang phung po dang / khams dang skye mched la 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas su rtog pa 'di ni gnyi mas pa'o// gang yang
282a4(mdo): 'du byed skye mched thams cad la myi rtog cing / rnam par myi rtog par dang / chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba 'di yang / rigs kyi bu gnyis su myed pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug

282a7(mdo): skyes med 'byung ba ba rab tu shes pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// phung po dang 'bas dang skye mched dang / mying dang gzugs bral ba sa smra pa'i rang bzhin gi lta ba kun tu 'gro zhing / kun tu phyi 'gro/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das ma 'das pa
282a8(mdo): 'di yang / byang chub sem sa dpa'i gnyis su byed pa'i chos kyi mo sa 'dug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang ga rnam pa'i zhis pa 'byung ba rab tu zhes pa 'di ni gnyim ro// dngas 'byung ba byed pa skad cigs dang
282b1(mdo): skad cig ma ma yin pa la 'dus byas thams cad du myur du rab tu shes pa 'di yang gnyis su myed pa'i sgo la 'jug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bdag gir bya ba dang / rnam par shes par yongs su shes pa dang / nga yir bya ba
