282b2(mdo): dang / skye mched la chags pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// gang la la bdag dang bral ba'i rnam par shes pa thob pa bdag gi rang bzhin lta ba gnyis dang bral ba/ skye mched nyams pa myed pa bdag gir bya ba dang / nga yir bya ba bral
282b3(mdo): pa 'di yang gnyis su myed pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// gang la la rig pa dang rnam par grol bar rtog pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// rigs kyi bu ma rig pa ni rgyu ba myed cing bdag myed pa'o// reg pa ni glog gi rang bzhin can no// 
282b4(mdo): rnam par grol ba yang nam mkha'o// nam mkha' yang myi rtog pa/ dgas pa byed pa myed pa/ sros pa myed pa 'di yang gnyis su byed pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// gang rnam par shes pa la/ gzugs
282b5(mdo): kun tu spyod pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// gzugs nyid kyang nam mkha' bzhin du stong ste/ nam mkha' yang 'jig pa myed do// gzugs 'jig pa stong pa nyid/ gzugs kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rgyub stong pa nyid kyi/ 
282b6(mdo): rang bzhin yang stong pa nyid do// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed kyang de bzhin no// rnam par shes pa rab tu rgya bskyed pa ni/ nam ma'a' ji lta bur mun pa myed cing snang ba byed pa/ rnam par shes badring pa'ang de bzhin do// 
282b7(mdo): nam pa sapa'i 'dug pa nga sa yin te/ rnas par shes pa'i rang bzhin ba'o// de bzhin du bar med pa'i phung po lnga yang rnas ma'i rang bzhin par spongango // rnams 'a 'ji sa zu 'ang ga
283a1(mdo): dang skye mched la yang mdo chags myed zhe sdang byed gti sun byed/ gyi mgrol/ byi dmal/ byi tog rnam par gyi rtog/ kyi 'gro rnam par myi 'gro zhing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang
283a2(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myi tog/ rnam par gyi tog/ myi 'gro// rnam par myi 'gro ba 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i gnyis su myed pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// byang chub
283a3(mdo): sems dpa' gzi brjid dri ma byed pas 'di bstand pa ston pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis myi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag bzhi bcu
283a4(mdo): cha drug gnyis su myed pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa thob par gyur da / bcom ldan 'das kyang sgron ma dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting pe/ 'dzin las bzhengs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drang srong gi cha byad
283a5(mdo): ji tsam pa myi snang bar gyu dad to// sangs rgyas kyi skus mtshan rab tubacu pa gnyis kyis sku yang dag par brgyand te bzhugs te/ de ltar de bzhin du gang gzhan la la dag kyang drang srong kyi cha byad myi sAng
283a6(mdo): bar gyurd te/ sngon ki lus ji lta ba bzhin du 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjod dri ma myed pa la legs so// zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ji lta bur bstan/ 
283a7(mdo): pa de bzhin du gnyis su byed pa'i sgo 'di bstan pa'i bya ba legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod ni chos kyi sgo 'di la lus dbang du btsugs te/ de ltar khyod kyis chad byed pa'i sems can rnams la bla na byed pa yang da/ 
283a8(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod do// gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'amachi dang / rtsi dang kyi ma yin pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa lngachos / 
283b1(mdo): de nas de'i chen 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal lo sbyar da te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la chos stand du gsol ba'i phyir
283b2(mdo): tshigs su bcad pa'i yon tan 'di dag gis bstod do// rgyal ba'i nyi ma mnyam pa zhing mangs dag khyab pa// nyon mongs dgra zhi 'di la mngon par gnas// thub pa shin tu rnam grol 'dir bzhugs shing // khyod kyis
283b3(mdo): 'grol bzod pa'i mchog 'di stond/ rab tu zhi thugs brtul zhugs yongs su dag/ thub pa mchog sbyin bgyis pa bzod dge gsungs 'gro la bde sbyin drang srong shes rab 'chang // gti mug 'jig mdzad 'di la
283b4(mdo): bdud rtsi char// 'di la lha glu sems can myi mang po// shi nad tu dbasngal yid myur tu zhi gang ba// 'gro ba thams cad khyod zhal da lta zhing 'dug/ nyon mongs yongs su spangs te dam chos gsungs
283b5(mdo): sngon chad rgyal ba khyod kyang kun spyod brtan// myig gnyis rkang pa la ga pa lce byin zhing // pags pa mgo khrag yan lag ngam 'bru nor// klang rta bu grong shing rta rin cen rnam mang byin// zas skom
283b6(mdo): mal dang bran po bran mo byin// gnyen dang 'gro la sdug bsngal rtag zar byed/ 5/ bsam pa rdzogs shing sems can dga' mdzad pa// khyod kyis mchod sbyin brgya byas sems can phyir// sangs rgyas mngal sngon chad dge ma
283b7(mdo): byas// byams sems rtag pas zer zug sbyin la dga'/ brtul zhugs brtan pas ri rab ji bzhin 'bar// 'gro la bstand phyir bzod pa 'di bstand gsol// ngan song gsum spangs sems can mtho ris
283b8(mdo): khrid// khyim gyis brtan mo'i smon lam sngon rtag byas/ 'gro ba byang chub sdug bsngal zhi mchog reg/ rgyal ba sngon chad ji bzhin byang chub de thob bo// snying rje dpal chus sa rnams ma lus kang // nyon mongs dri
284a1(mdo): gsum thocom thams cad ni// lam ga zhi bas bya ba chub tho bston pa// ji ltar chos rtogs 'dis khyod kyi dus// shind tu spros yid 'gro la chos char phob// bdud kyi ros ngoms yang dag yon tan gsungs
284a2(mdo): lam ka bzhi des 'gro ba byang chub reg/ zhing mangs 'di la sems can yang dag 'ongs// rga shi dag las rnam thar da gang yod pa// thub pa chen po chos 'di gsung du gsol// nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul
284a3(mdo): ba'i bzod pa stond// de nas sgyu ma smyig rgyu spros par 'gro// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la// bcom ldan 'das cad myi gsung bas zhal gyis bzhes nas// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs
284a4(mdo): te/ bdag rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzind la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzind la snyoms par gang gis/ khang pa brtsegs pa rje snyed de dag du lus mngon par sru la nas/ khang pa brtsegs pa
284a5(mdo): thams cad na 'dug ste/ 'khor 'di dag kyang yang dag par dga' skyo bar bya'o snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'od shind tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind la snyoms par zhugs/ 
284a6(mdo): te/ mnyam par bzhag pa'i thugs kyis khang pa brtsegs pa ji snyed du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rang rang bzhugs te bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ngo mtshar dang ldan pas// byang chub sems dpa' dgra
284a7(mdo): rnam par 'grel pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khang pa brtsegs pa tshad myed pa 'di dag na kAng / rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa bdag 'ang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs pa ni ga // sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis
284a8(mdo): rlabs kyi khang pa brtsegs par sangs rgyas kyi sku bzhugs par yang dag par mthong ba zhig pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'gras bas// byang chub sems dpa' ngo mchar dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces smram mo// 
284b1(mdo): rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di ni smra ba myed do// ma rig pa yang sangs rgyas kyi chos la sros pa myed do// rigs kyi bu ci 'das pa'i sems kyis byang chub thob 'am/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ma
284b2(mdo): yin no// smras pa/ ci ma 'ongs pa'i sems kyis byang chub thob 'am// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ma yin no// smras pa/ ci da ltar byung ba'i sems dang / bsam pa'i gnas pa yod dam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu
284b3(mdo): myed do// smras pa/ gal te re shig sems dang bsam pa'i gnas pa myed na/ rnam par myi gnas pa dngos po la ji ltar byang chub thob// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ci dus gsum gyi chos thams cad spangs pas// de'i tshe cis
284b4(mdo): kyang chos khong du chud pa myed dam/ smras pa/ rtag pa dang chad pa yod nas su spangs pa/ myi 'gro ba/ myi skye ba/ myi 'gog pa/ kyi reg pa/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas la gnas pa byed pa'o// 
284b5(mdo): dngos po thams cad nam ka' dang mnyam pa la byang chub 'gro ba myed do// ji ltar nam mkha' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba myed cing / snyems pa myed pa de bzhin du/ byang chub kyang 'das
284b6(mdo): ba dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byed do// ji ltar nam ma'a' martog pa gyid cing / rnam par rtog pa byed pa de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang rtog pa skyed cing / rnam par rtog pa'ang byed do// ji sar na
284b7(mdo): myal las yun pa byed pa de bzhin du/ yangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang mun pa byed cing spang ba'ang byed de// ji sa nam mkha' la gzugs byed cing bsad pa byed pa de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi ros rnams kyang gzugs myed
284b8(mdo): ming bstan du yang byed do// ji ltar rnam pa'a' ma skyes sa 'gags pa de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyangs skyes pa gags so// ji ska dam sa'a'as 'gro ba byed pa bzhin du/ sa rgya kyi ngo/ 
285a1(mdo): kyi thob byeg pa babyed do// ji sa nas ma khas du ma byed pa de bzhidan/ rgya mas kya gnas pa byad nga// ji sa rnamama'a'as len pa byed pa de bzhin du/ 
285a2(mdo): rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang rig pa myed do// ji ltar nam mkha' la lam du dmyigs pa myed pa de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang ci la 'ang lam du zhugs pa myed do// ji ltar nam mkha' la dngos po myed cing mtshan nyid
285a3(mdo): myed pa de bzhin du// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang dngos po myed cing mtshan nyid myed do// ji ltar nam mkha' la brjod du myed cing yi ge myed pa de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang brjod du myed cing yi ge byed do// 
285a4(mdo): ji ltar nam mkha' rtag pa myed cing chad myed pa de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang rtag pa myed cing chad pa myed do// ji ltar nam mkha la la lus myed cing 'byung ba myed pa de bzhin du// sangs rgyas kyi
285a5(mdo): chos rnams kyang lus myed cing 'byung ba myed do// ji ltar nam mkha' lag zung ba myed pa gnas pa byed pa de bzhin du// sangs rgyas rgya chos rnams kyang gzung ba myed pa gnas pa myed do// ji ltar nam
285a6(mdo): mkha' la rtend pa myed pa/ gnas pa myed pa dmyigs pa myed pa rnam par rtog pa myed pa/ 'deg pa myed pa/ rnam par rig pa myed pa/ 'gro ba myed pa/ 'ong ba myed pa/ rtsa ba myed pa/ mtha' myed pa/ 'khrug pa myed pa
285a7(mdo): yongs su gdungs pa myed pa/ btags pa myed pa/ bkros pa myed pa/ mthong ba myed pa/ rtog pa myed pa/ mun pa byed pa/ dngos po myed pa/ mtshan ma myed pa/ sprul pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam/ 
285a8(mdo): kyang rtend pa byed pa nas mtshan ma myod pa'i bar du'o// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni myi skye bar bsgrags pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni gnyis su med pa'i chos zhes so// chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa'o// 
285b1(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni sems can gyi khams su yang dag par 'dus pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ nam mkha'i khams su yang dag par 'dus pa'o// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ rtog pa
285b2(mdo): dang kund tu rtog pa la yang dag par 'dus pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ gnas dang rnam pa'i gnas dang / rab kyi gnas su yang dag par 'dus pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni// shes pa dang / myi she
285b3(mdo): pa dang / rab tu shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / nye bar shes pa la yang dag par 'dus pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni mtshan ma myed pa yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rnam pa'i mtshan nyid dang // nye ba'i
285b4(mdo): mtshan nyid dang / rjes su mtshan nyid la yang dag par 'dus pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ 'das pa byed pa dang / rnam pa ra 'das pa dang / 'das pa dang / rjes su 'das pa la yang ngan
285b5(mdo): da/ snang ba dang / dag pa ma rkyen pa dang / rab tusna ba stod pa 'dag par zhus pa'o// kyim nam na/ dag pa dang zhin tu ya dag pa dang / rjes su sa
286a1(mdo): kun na tu gzugs dang / rnam par gzugs dang / bzungs par gzugs dang / yang dag par gzugs byed pa dang / nye ba'i gzugs sa yang dag par 'dus pa'o// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi byang chum
286a2(mdo): kund tu gyod pa dang / rnam par spyod pa dang / mtshungs par khyod pa dang / rjesu gyod pa dang / nye bar spyod pa la yang dag par 'dus pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub ni kund tu rjod pa dang / rnam par brjod pa dang / rjes
286a3(mdo): brjod pa dang / mtshungs par brjod pa dang / nye bar brjod pa la yang dag par 'dus pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub ni bgrang ba dang / rnam par bgrang ba dang / mtshungs par bgrang ba dang / rjes su bgrang ba la yang dag
286a4(mdo): par 'dus pa'o// byang chub ni kund tu yod pa dang / rnam par yod pa dang / rje su yod pa dang / nye bar yod pa la yang dag par 'dus pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub ni spros pa myed pa dang / rnam par
286a5(mdo): sros pa dang / spros pa dang bral ba dang / rje su spros pa dang / nye bar sros pa la yang dag par 'dus pa'o// rigs kyi bu ji lta ra nam mkha'i khams la gzugs myed pa de ltar/ sangs rgyas kyi byang
286a6(mdo): chub blta ba bya'o// rigs kyi bu la la nam mkhas spros par byas pa dang / tshad du bya ba dang / rnam par 'gran par bya ba dang / brgya nad par bya ba dang / ri mor bya bar nus sam/ rigs kyi bu myi nus so// smras pa
286a7(mdo): nam mkha' ji lta ba ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang de bzhin te/ nam mkha' cis kyang spros par myi nus pa ji lta ba ltar/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang de bzhin du/ cis kyang spros par myi nus so// rigs kyi bu 'ang pa bachags
286a8(mdo): par bcom ldan 'das bdag bzhugs pa ni kapa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku bzhugs pa ni gang zhes bya ba khyod ci'i phyir de skad smra// de ltar smos par byed ces byang chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'dzind pas/ gnyis su myed
286b1(mdo): pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di bstand pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig lnga bcu rtsa bdun myi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par gyu rad to// byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis de bzhin gshegs
286b2(mdo): pa'i rjes su 'jug pa gnyis su myed pa'i chos kyi sgo so sor thob cing // sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyang rgyas par gyurd to// sa dang nam mkhal la gnas pa'i sems can gyis legs so zhes bya ba byind te// 
286b3(mdo): skyes bu dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i rjes su 'jug pa gnyis su myed pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di ston pa// de nas de nyid kyi tshe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'od gzer 'byung ba'i bdag po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind las
286b4(mdo): bzhengs te// khang pa brtsegs pa gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs par yang dag par mthong ba ma gtogs par/ sangs rgyas kyi sku de dag dang / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag kyang myi snang bar
286b5(mdo): gyur de nas/ 'khor thams cad dang ldan pa de ngo mtshar thob par rgyu/ rad to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po mang po'i mchog gis byang chub sems dpa' drang srong rnam par 'grel pa la 'di skad
286b6(mdo): ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag ni gang nas 'ongs// yang gang du 'gro/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' drang srong rnam par 'grel pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po mang po'i mchog la 'di skad
286b7(mdo): ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod da dung 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i 'du shes su 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po mang po'i mchog gis/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar 'ongs so zhes bya ba 'di ni/ blo bur gyi chen
286b8(mdo): ko// rigs kyi bu 'dra'i zhes bya ba 'din/ bdag myed pa'i tshig go// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grom pas smras pa// rigs kyi bu ga phur ga tshig dang // rigs kyi bu bdag myed pa'i tshig kyang / rigs
287a1(mdo): bu pa yir bya ba dang / bdag gir bya ba'i tshig gi// skyes bu kang pa yid bya ba dang / bdag gir bya ba la chags pas/ phyin ci log bzhi ste/ rtag pa la myi rtag par 'du shes pa dang / sdug sngal pa
287a2(mdo): la bde bar 'du shes pa rnal 'byor da kyi rje su ldan pa dang / myi gtsang ba la gtsang bar 'du shes pa dang / bdag myed pa la bdag tu 'du shes par rnal 'byor da kyi rjes su ldan pa la zhugs pa'o// skyes bu gang zag seMs
287a3(mdo): phyin ci log la zhugs pas/ sgrib pa lngar 'gyur ro// lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa sred pa'i sgrib pa dang / chags sems dang / rmugs pa dang / gnyid dang / le lo dang / ro rgod pa dang / the tsom gyi sgrib
287a4(mdo): pa spangs pa myed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gang la la sgrib pa lnga po 'di dag tu 'gyur ba de/ mtshams myed pa lnga yang dag par spyod do// mtshams myed pa lnga ma spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag lha dang myi'i nang du
287a5(mdo): 'gro bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong na/ nyan thos kyi sangs rgyas lta ci smos// gang la nyan thos kyi byang chub myed pa de la/ rang sa ngas rgyas kyi byang chub dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub lta yang ci smos/ 
287a6(mdo): gang la ba yid bya ba dang / bdag gir bya ba ma yangs pa de la/ rtag pa dang chad pa yang yangs pa myed do// gang gang zag chad par lta ba can du 'gyur ba de/ dge ba la pyod pa mtshungs par lta ga la 'gyur// gang yang rtag par lta la
287a7(mdo): can du 'gyur ba de/ tha dad pa bsngos pa mtshungs par pyod pa dang / dge ba la spyod par lta ga la 'gyur// rtag pa lta ba dang chad par lta ba'i skyes bu gang zag ni/ lha dang mye'i nang du skye bar yang dag par rje su myi mthong na// nyan
287a8(mdo): thos dang / rang byang chub lta ci smos te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang ga la mthong // nga yir bya ba dang / bdag gir bya ba lta ba song ba gnas pa myed pas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas
287b1(mdo): ma 'dres pa'i 'khor ji lta bur yang dag par 'ongs pa/ smra ba myed pa de dang rigs kyi bu khyod kyang smra ba myed par mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpal lag bzungs kyis smras pa// rigs kyi bu mi 'gro ba dang / 'ong bar 'acu
287b2(mdo): shes pa yid la myi bya 'am// gal te yid la myi bya na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i gnas rnams la byin le nad dang / yo byad kyis ji ltar bsnyems bkur bya/ pha dang ma rnams rim 'gro'i gnas dang / nad pa
287b3(mdo): rnams la ji ltar bsnyen bkur bya// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu spros pa myed pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang / rab kyi gnas dang / gnas gzhan dang / rim 'gro'i gnas dang / kun da tu 'gro ba dang
287b4(mdo): lhag par 'gro ba dang / nye bar 'gro ba dang / rjes su 'gro ba dang / gzhan du 'gro ba 'di'i tshig de dag thams cad ni sros pa myed pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / 
287b5(mdo): rjes su rtog pa dang / nye bar rtog pa dang / rab tu rtog pa 'di dgagis 'khor ba 'drend to// gzhog go sgrub bo// mye tog ni lha dang myir skye ba'o// 'bras bu ni ngan song gsum du 'gro ba la yang
287b6(mdo): dang yang du 'chi 'pho skye ba dang skad cig ma'i chos brgyad la yang dag par gzhol ba dang // 'di dag ni nyes pa'o// gang spyod pa dang / rnam par spyod pa dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / rjes su spyod pa 'di dag gi dngos po thams
287b7(mdo): cad ni/ 'phags pa'i bzod pa spang ba'i phyir sgrub bo// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang sangs rgyas kyi son tan bsgrub pa'i phyir dge ba la spyod pade// mi 'phags pa'i bzod pa 'khrugs par 'gyur ram// smras pa
287b8(mdo): rigs kyi bu gang dge ba'i chos la nyung ngu 'dod cing / sdig pa la mang du 'dod pa ni/ 'phags pa'i bzod pa la 'khrug pa'o// rnam par 'jig pa'o// 'thong ba'o// gti mug pa'o// gang de dge ba'i chos yong su spa
288a1(mdo): pa de'i 'dod pa'i rtog pa de kun tu spyod pa'i bzod pa la 'khrug pa dang 'jig pa'o// de bzod pa'i tshogs myed pa 'di ni/ yong su spangs pa'o// rigs kyi bu ngag dang yid dang / drug gi skye mched kyi sdom
288a2(mdo): pa dang / mngon par 'du myi byed pa dang / brjod du myed pa dang / rtsol ba myed pa dang / rtog pa myed pa dang / rnam par rtog pa myed pa dang / dmyigs pa myed pa dang / sems dang yid kyis dmyigs pa myed pa de/ de ni
288a3(mdo): 'phags pa'i bzod pa'i tshogs so// gang yang sems kyi rnam par las dang / lus kyi rnam par las dang / ngag gi rnam par las de thams cad 'phags pa'i bzod pa la go ti mug dang / yong su spang ba'i phyir sgrub bo/ 
288a4(mdo): gzhan yang chos kyi bya ba 'am/ myi 'gul ba 'am/ mtshan nyid dam/ rtog pa de 'phags pa'i bzod pa la gti mug dang / yo/ dngasu spong ba'i phyir sgrub bo// gang yang lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi/ 
288a5(mdo): bya ba myed pa dang / 'gyur ba myed pa dang / mtshan nyid myed pa dang / rtog pa myed pa de 'phags pa'i bzod pa'i tshogs sgom pa'o// gnyis su myed pa'i chos kyi mtha'i rjes su zhugs shing yang dag pa'i man
288a6(mdo): dang ldan no// chung zad du ni/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi mtha' dang / chos thams cad kyi yang mtha'o// gang de ltar rab tu shes pa de bzod pa sgom pa'o// gang yi ge la 'khrug pa byed pa dang / gang nyon mongs
288a7(mdo): pa thams cad brald pa dang / brjod du myed pa la g.yo bskyed pa dang / spab thams cad la chags pa myed pa dang / gang kyi skye myi 'byung ba bsgrags pa'i chos rab tu shes pa de bzod pa 'asgol pa'o// / chos kyi khams la
288a8(mdo): gnas pa dang / sem sa kyi lams la ya dag par gnas pa dang / chos kyi 'ams dang / sems can gi khams dngos tshungs pa'o/ mas su bzung ste// tha dad par gyi byed pa dang / mtshan nyid kyi khams dpa'
288b1(mdo): bar myi byed pa dang / de bzod pa bsgom pa'i gang chos thams cad dmyigs pa byed cing / bdag dang gzhan med pa myi skye ba'i phyir/ snang ba myed pa dang // gzung du med pa/ kund nas ldang ba myed pa/ lus byed pa/ 
288b2(mdo): bsgom pa myed pa/ skye ba myi 'byung ba/ 'chi 'pho myed pa/ tond pa myed pa/ g.yo ba myed pa/ 'byur ba myed pa/ yod par rtogs pa dang / myed par rtogs pa dang / bral ba/ sdod ma yin pa/ yongs su rtog pa byed/ 
288b3(mdo): pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba/ rdul dang bral ba/ rigs spangs pa/ rang bzhin yongs su dag pa/ dri ma myed pa/ nyon mongs pa myed pa/ sgro btags pa myed pa/ kun nas langs pa myed pa/ 'khrug pa myed pa'i chos
288b4(mdo): thams cad myed par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa de bzod pa ba sgom mo// gang rkyend dang bral ba dang / rab tu rgyu ba nye bar zhi ba dang / lam ma rungs pa las yang dag par shi nad tu 'das pa dang / 'byung
288b5(mdo): ba myed pa dang / 'jug pa myed pa dang / rings pa myed pa dang / yul thams cad la rnam par dmyigs pa myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i lam las yang dag par shi nad tu 'das pa dang / btags pa myed
288b6(mdo): pa dang / bkrol ba myed pa dang / 'ong ba myed pa dang / gnas pa myed pa dang / sa bon myed pa dang / tsha ba myed pa dang / yid brtan pa nye bar zhi zhing rab tu zhi ba dang / yongs su gdungs pa myed pa dang / shi nad tu mthar thug
288b7(mdo): pa dang / yang srid pa kund nas ldang ba myed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / 'di 'dra bar yid la byed pas bzod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / kund
288b8(mdo): chu rtog pa dang / yang dag par rtog pa dang / nye bar rtog pa dang / 'gro ba dang / kun tu 'gro ba dang / mngon par 'gro ba dang / nye bar 'gro bar yid la byed pas/ bzod pa sgom par myi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'ong ba
289a1(mdo): da na na// thug da pa / na 'gyun pa / chung kyang da/ 'byed pa dang / 
289a2(mdo): byed pa'i kun dag ni kun tu gnom pa'i phyir// gnyis su byed pa'i chos kyi lha'i bzod pa bsgom so// rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba las kyi mtshan nyid la dmyigs pa 'di ni/ bzod pa bsgom pa yongs su spang ba'i phyir
289a3(mdo): yang dag par bsnun no// rigs kyi bu 'gro'o zhes bya ba'i las kyi mtshan nyid kyi rgyu 'di ni mtshan nyid byed pa/ mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bzod pa bsgom pa zhes bya'o// 'ong po zhes bya ba'i smon lam mtshan nyid kyi rgyu 'din
289a4(mdo): bzod pa 'gog pa'i phyir/ yang dag par bsgrub kyi/ 'di ni bzodasgom pa ma yin no// rigs kyi bu 'gro'o zhes bya ba 'di ni/ smon lam zad pa dang / myed pa dang / zhi ba'i bzod pa sgom pa zhes bya'o// 
289a5(mdo): rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid 'di ni/ bzod pa la gti mug pa yin gyi/ bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin no// rig sa kyi bu 'gro'o zhes bya ba dmyigs pa myed pa dang / 'gal ba'i mtshan nyid
289a6(mdo): 'di ni/ bzod pa sgom pa zhes smras so// rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba rnam par dmyigs pa'i sgo'i mtshan nyid 'di ni// bzod pa la bsgom pa yin gyi/ bzod pa la 'khrug pa ma yin no// 'grolo zhes bya ba rnam pa
289a7(mdo): dmyigs pa zad pa'i mtshan nyid dang / nye bar zhi ba 'di ni/ bzod pa sgom pa zhes smras so// rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba'i kun gzhi'i mtshan nyid 'di ni/ bzod pa la 'jig pa yin gyi// bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin no// 
289a8(mdo): rigs kyi bu 'ong zhes bya ba'i kund gzhi nub pa dang / zhi ba 'di ni bzod pa bsgom zhes smras so// rigs kyi bu 'ong zhes bya ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid 'di ni/ bzod pa yongs su spang ba yin gi/ bzod pa bsgos pa ni ma yin no/ 
289b1(mdo): 'gro'o zhes bya ba rgyu zad pa'i mtshan nyid 'di dang / rnam par zhi ba 'di ni/ bzod pa bsgom pa'o// zhes smras so// rigs kyi bu 'ong po zhes bya ba brda dang tha snyad kyi tshig gi mtshan nyid 'di ni/ bzod pa sgom pa ma yin no// 
289b2(mdo): 'gro'o zhes bya ba tha snyad rnam par zhi ba'i gnas 'di ni/ bzod pa sgom pa zhes smras so// rigs kyi bu 'ong po zhes bya ba sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' myi shes pa'i chu bor bying ba 'di ni/ bzod pa la gti mug pa yin gyi/ 
289b3(mdo): bzod pa bsgom pa ni ma yin no// 'gro'o zhes bya ba sngon gyi mtha' shes pa dang / myi shes pa rab tu spangs te/ rgya chen po nye bar zhi ba 'di ni/ bzod pa bsgom pa'o zhes smras so// rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba 'di ni lus dang
289b4(mdo): ngag dang / yid kun tu spyod pa'i mtshan nyid 'di ni/ bzod pa bsgo ma pa ma yin no// 'gro'o zhes bya ba sred pa'i 'du byed nye bar zhi pa 'di ni/ bzod pa bsgom pa'o zhes smras so// rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo
289b5(mdo): zhes bya ba rnam par shes pa nye bar zhi ba dang / rnam par dpyod pa chags pa myed pa tshig gi mtshan nyid 'di ni bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin/ no// 'gro ba zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa rnam par dmyigs pa dang / 
289b6(mdo): rnam par dpyod pa ba nub pa 'di ni/ bzod pa bsgom pa'o zhes smras so// 'ong ngo zhes bya ba'i mying dang gzugs kun nas ldang ba'i tshig gi mtshan nyid 'di ni/ bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin no// 'gro'o zhes bya ba mying dang gzugs
289b7(mdo): nye bar zhi ba 'di ni/ babod pa bsgom pa'o zhes smras so// 'ong ngo zhes bya ba 'dul ba kun nas ldang zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi gnas kyi mtshan nyid 'di ni/ bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin no// 'gro'o zhes bya ba dbang po drug
289b8(mdo): nye bar zhi zhing nus pa 'di ni// bzod pa bsgom pa zhes smras so// 'gro'o zhes bya ba reg pa'i chu bo sgom pa gzhan gyi tshig gi mtshan nyid 'di ni/ bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin no// 'gro'o zhes bya ba reg pa'i chu bor nye ba
290a1(mdo): 'gro ba 'di ni/ bzod pa bsgom pa'o zhes smras so// 'gro'o zhes bya 'chor ba gsum gyi rgyun gcod pa 'di ni/ bzod pa bsgom pa zhes smras so// 'ong zhes bya ba sred pa kun kazhi la 'di ni/ 
290a2(mdo): bzod pa paskyob pas yin no// 'gro gro zhes bya ba sred pa gtong ba dang nub pa 'di ni/ bzod pa pasgom pa'i zhes smras so// rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba nye bar len pa la 'dug pa'i tshig gi mtshan nyid 'don
290a3(mdo): bzod pa pa rnam pa sa yin no// 'gro'o zhes bya ba nye bar led pa 'di ni/ bzod pa bsgos pa'o zhes smras so// 'ang zhes bya ba bsgom pa mngon par 'dug pa'i tshig gi mtshan nyid 'di ni/ bzod pa bsgos pa ma yin
290a4(mdo): 'gro'o zhes bya ba khong du chud pa chags pa'i lam 'di ni/ bzod pa ba sgom pa'o zhes smras so// rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba yang / dang yang snying por 'jug pa'i tshig gi mtshan nyid 'di ni/ bzod pa bsgom
290a5(mdo): ba ma yin no// 'gro zhes bya ba skye ba zad pa 'di ni/ bzod pa bsgo/ ma pa'o zhes smras so// 'ong ngo zhes bya ba yang rga bar 'jug pa'i tshig gi mtshan nyid 'di ni/ bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin no// 'gro'o zhes
290a6(mdo): bya ba rga zad pa spang ba'i phyir/ bzod pa bsgom pa'o zhes smras so// rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba yang dang yang shi ba'i chu'i chu bor lhung ba'i gnas kyi mtshan nyid 'di ni/ bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin no// 'gro'o zhes bya ba shi
290a7(mdo): ba'i chu bo las rga lad pa 'di ni/ bzod pa bsgom pa'o zhes smras so// rigs kyi bu 'ong zhes bya ba mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug par 'jug pa'i gnas kyi mtshan nyid 'di ni/ bzod pa
290a8(mdo): bsgom pa ma yin no// 'gro'o zhes bya ba sdug bsngal dang / 'khrug pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba 'di ni/ bzod pa bsgom pa'o zhes smras so// rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal thams cad skye ba dang / rga zhi da/ 
290b1(mdo): mi po skye ba dang / phrad pa dang 'bral ba'i mug 'phral pa'i bye ba'i gnas gimapan nyid don/ bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin no// 'gro ma zhes bya ba 'du byed kyi sug 'asngam mams cad nye bar zhi 'do/ bzod pa pan/ 
290b2(mdo): ba'o// rigs kyi su'ong zhes bya ba ni/ mug 'phral thams cad bye zhing / byin gyi log pa'i kun nas ldang ba'i dang bzhin no// dge ba thams cad bsgob pa la 'gebs pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'gro'o zhes bya ba ni/ sa
290b3(mdo): cad nye bar zhim la// sdug bsngal gyi sbyin mi yig gi gnyen pol// rigs kyi bu de bas na/ 'dro zhes bya ba'i tshig ni/ nyan mongs pa thams cad kun tu 'drem pa'o zhes smras pa yin no// 'gro'o zhes bya ba ni/ nye
290b4(mdo): mongs pa'i bag chags kyi rjes su 'brel pa thams cad 'drend pa byed pa'o zhes smras pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de bas na/ brjod du byed dpal g.yo ba byed do// brjod pa thams cad la yang chags pa myed do// 
290b5(mdo): yi ge'i chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa myed do// bzung ba myed pa dang / kun nas ldang ba myed pa dang / lus myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / 'du byed pa thams cad la dmyigs pa'i rgyun chad pa dang / 
290b6(mdo): yod par rtog pa dang / myed par rtog pa dang / bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'greld pas 'di stond pa bstand pa na/ sngon du 'gro ba lag
290b7(mdo): bzangs las togs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu mya skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa/ thob bo// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang ldan pa sa dang nam mkha' khyab pa 'di la gnas pas mgrin
290b8(mdo): gcig tu legs so zhes bya ba byin pa'o// rigs kyi bu ji lta bur khyod kyang chos zab mo'i tshul gyi rjes su zhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa'i kun nas yon tan rnam par rol pa mngon par shes pa chags pa myed pa'i spob
291a1(mdo): bad # bzhin pa// nyid kyi/ gapa btsun lu 'a dang/ dang / 
291a2(mdo): lho 'phye chen po mang po lnga rdzas kyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / dri dang / byeg pas bye chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'brel pa la/ mchod pa'i las kyi bying / 'dun cing 'artson no// de'i lus la me tog dang / phrengs
291a3(mdo): dang / dri dang / byug pas bya bachub sems dpa' dgranas par 'grel pa la/ mtshan pa'i las kyi byib/ 'dun cing brtson no// de'i lus su me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / dri dang byug pas gtor bas/ rigs kyi bu
291a4(mdo): yang de ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi nabs kyis// rin po che sna tshogs su Sh+Ti/ dkyis brlabs te/ phung ga phyogs cig tu bzhag nas// ma ldan 'das kyi slad du/ rin po che sna bdun gyi seng ge'i khri/ 'bang / 
291a5(mdo): du dpag tshad stong / zheng du dpag tshad bcu pa lha rdzas kyi gos kyis kho d+ha pa ba/ blta na sdug pa rnam par sna tshogs 'byung ngo // sangs rgya sa kyi zhing 'dir mu stegs can gzhan dka' thub dang / brtul shugs
291a6(mdo): dang / yod pa dang / gyod lam la brtson par byind kyis 'arlabs pa ji snyed pa dang / gang yang phyogs bcu'i stong pa dang / rlon pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu khyed pa na// mu stegs can bka' thub dang / brtul
291a7(mdo): zhugs dang / spyod pa dang / spyod lam la brtson par byind kyis brlabs pa/ bka' thub ngan pa de dag thams cad rin po che sna bdun gi seng ge'i khri yang dag par mthong ngo // la la bka' thub lnga dag nyi ma dang / rna ba la
291a8(mdo): phyag 'tshal bar yang dag par mthong ngo // la la chu 'dzi nad pa dang / 'das 'dzind pa dang / chu dang 'das 'dzind pa dang / la la sgra 'dzind pa dang / ma gcom 'dzind pa dang / sgra dang sag com 'dzind pa dang / la la
291b1(mdo): rkang pa 'degs pa dang / la la nags tshal gyi rtsa ba dang / mdab ma za ba dang / tsher ma'i steng du nyal ba dang / la la rus pa'i phye mas lus bskus pa dang / myi'i mgo phreng ba dang / mgo lag mthil na 'chang bas yang
291b2(mdo): dag par mthong ngo // la las phyugs kyi brtul zhugs can dang / khyi'i brtul zhugs can dang / phag gi rtul zhugs can dang / ri dgas kyi rdul zhugs can dang / bya'i brtul zhugs can dang / mye'i brtul zhugs
291b3(mdo): can dang / zla ba'i brtul zhugs can dang / nyi ma'i brtul zhugs can dang / chu'i brtul zhugs can dang / 'dzeg pa'i brtul zhugs can dang / bka' thub rnam par sna tshogs kyi nad gsos de las sotogs pa/ mu steg
291b4(mdo): can gzhan la bka' thub dang / brtul zhugs dang / pyod pa dang / spyod lam la brtson par byind kyis brlabs pa/ bka' thub da ngan pa sna tshogs de dag thams cad de'i tshe na/ der seng ge'i khri yang
291b5(mdo): dag par mthong ngo // seng ge'i khri de'i steng ge bar snang na/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs zheng du dpag tshad stong phrag bcu par byen/ kyis brlabs so// gdugs de la lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgya nad sna
291b6(mdo): tshogs su yang dag par mthong ngo // rgyan de dag las/ log pa'i tshig gi tha snyad sna tshogs 'byung ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / 'jig tshogs kyi lta ba dang / mthar da 'dzind pa'i lta ba
291b7(mdo): tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs bsnyems pa'i lta ba dang / 'dod pa la bde ba skye ba'i lta ba byung ngo // 'thab cing gcig la gcig 'tshog pa dang / mgo gcod pa dang / myig 'byind pa'i lta ba dang / dge la bcu las kye
291b8(mdo): lam lta ba spros pas/ lta bar song ba drug bcu rtsa gnyis kyi lta ba'i tshig gi tha snyad kyi dbyangs 'byung ngo // gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasasu dag pa'i tshad myed grangs myed pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
292a1(mdo): 'dir lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag sgra de nyand to// seng ge'i khri la sems can tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs ngan pa sna tshogs sbyor ba'i rjes su ldan pa de dag kyang lha'o// kye ma
292a2(mdo): kyi hud/ lta ba nyon mongs pa thob pa 'di dag rnyog pa lnga'i myi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yang dag par mthong ba gang zhig ces de mchog tu skyo ba'i yid kyis 'di snyam du sems par gyur da to// bdag cag rab rang
292a3(mdo): gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o snyam ste/ de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhib 'di las 'gro bar 'dod kyang / de dag rang rang gi phyogs gang du 'gro bar myi shes nas// de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'grel pa
292a4(mdo): gang na ba de logs su thal mo sa 'byard te phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di/ smras so// rigs kyi bu bdag cag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'a de nas rang rang gi rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'dod pa ni/ 
292a5(mdo): rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di shind tu lta ba sdug pos bsgris sa shing / dog pa thob pas/ bdag cag kyang chung zad lus dang ngag dang / yid kyis 'khrus par 'gyur ba de'i phyir// bdag
292a6(mdo): nag myur tu 'gro bar 'dod do// bdag cag kyang phyogs thams cad mgo/ 'khor bar gyur da nas/ yang bdag cag rang rang gi phyogs gang du 'gro ba myi shes na/ de'i phyir/ rigs kyi bu khyod bdag cag rang rang gi sa
292a7(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar nus par nyams su long shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'grel pas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/ byang chub sems dpal yang dag par lpags pa de dag maM
292a8(mdo): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'i khyod cag reg pa chen po yang dag pa bzhugs sas// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'ad cig ni zan byed lam dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nas yun ring // rigs kyi nu
292b1(mdo): byang chub 'dod pa rnams 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su sbyin pa'i bya ba'i phyir// smon las kyi dpung kyis sems can dmyal bar skye ba la brtson pa ni gor ma chag/ de bzhin du byol song dang / yi dgas dang // 
292b2(mdo): ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / gnod sbyin dbul po dang / gshed po dang / de bzhin du lta ba tha dad par song zhing dogs pa rnyog pa'i mu stegs can gzhan la sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir// smon lam gyi
292b3(mdo): dbang gis der skye ba blangs pa 'di ni// byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi chal chen po zhes smras so// ji lta bur gnas de dang / de dag tu 'artson 'grus bstan pa pha rol gnon pas nye bar phyi nad to// sems can
292b4(mdo): rnams ni myi shes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / lhan cig tu 'grogs par tshe'i dgon par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i zhi ba'i lam rab tu nyams pa'o// sems can rnams ni srog chags su gyur pa la
292b5(mdo): myi dge ba'i bcu'i las la brtson pa'o// lta ba ngan par rdzogs pa/ dang / 'jig rtend pha rol do gyes 'jigs pa myed pa'i lta ba dang rtag pa dang / chad par lta ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sems can la
292b6(mdo): snyi brtse ba'i phyir/ bdag gi lus dang sems kyi sdug bsngal la mos so// sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can gcig kyang pha rol tu phyind pa drug la rab tu mos par nus pa dang / 
292b7(mdo): dge bcu'i las kyi lam gcig gis kyang sa bon bskyed cing 'dug pa dang legs par smra ba cig gis kyang rna bar go bar nus pas/ sems can re de'i phyir yang sdug bsngal rnam par mang po bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
292b8(mdo): brgya stong mang po rnam pa dum sna tshogs su mngon par brtson par ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi go cha gnyis te// byang chub sems dpal go cha gang gis bzhos pa ni/ bdud bzhi 'dzin cing / 
293a1(mdo): zhes nas kyi mun chum ma su dpa' rnam pa zhin tu brtan pa brtson 'grus kyim chos shing / ba mad gnod par gyur pa dang / pha rol dun kyind pa drug sa mthod zhing byams pa pa rnams pa
293a2(mdo): da / da pa byed pabyed pa dang / dam pa sa 'a dang / 'phags pa'i 'gyur ba 'dems dang / ngas su dag pa'i sangs rgya kyi
293a3(mdo): da/ rnams phyin da/ bang 'anan pa gas ma rlom par byed pa/ 2dag gi pa yang de bzhin du sam na
293a4(mdo): mongs pa'i skyabs su bslab par bya'o// bsdu ba'i dngos po nas bzhi ste/ sbyin pa dang / ngag stan pa dang / don bya ba dang / don 'thun pas sems can mgu 'dre bya'o// sbyin pa'i bsu 'ayinan
293a5(mdo): pos sems can mgu bar byed pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ zas dang skom nas mgo'i bar du byi nad pas/ kang smyon pa byin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de na/ thabs la mkhas pas yongs bsngos te/ pha rol tu phyin/ 
293a6(mdo): pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed do// gang sbyin pa byin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de na/ mtshan ma/ yongs su byon pa 'di ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa log bde na dngos po la dmyigasas rab tu zhi ba 'di ni// tshul
293a7(mdo): khrims kyi pha ro lad tu phyind pa'o// gang yul la bzod pa myed pa 'di na// byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// gang dngos po yongasu btang ste/ bden par sdod pa'i phyir 'byung ba 'din
293b1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha romang tu phyin pa'o// gang dngos po yongs su btang ste/ las thams cad la kun tu phyi spyod pa 'di yang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsag gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin da pan
293b2(mdo): dngapas yongs su sbyin pa'i phying/ bdan gi yodas kyi sems shing / dab po la dpon par sems dpa' ldanapa pa sbyin par gyi 'dod / led pa dang / sbyin pa gnyisang / rnam par gyito// 
293b3(mdo): kun nas kyi snang / de mo sa byed/ rnam pa gams pa myed pa 'di yang / byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin gyi skye ba'i tshis kyi bzod pa'i zhes rab kyi kho la tu phyin pa'o// yang bya chu ni sems dpa' thabs pa
293b4(mdo): pas dong rtse gcig byin pas kyang / pha rold tu phyind pa drug ji lta ma yongs su rdzogs par byed// rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan pa dang ldan gcig pas 'di ltar slob skye// lus
293b5(mdo): byed pa'i phyir/ longs 'apyod chen po'i sbyin pa rnam par myi skur/ long pa khyod chen po'i rgyus sbyin pa rnam par myi spong // longs khyod chen po'i sbyin pa yang dag par myi shes te/ rang bzhin gyis
293b6(mdo): stob pa 'dzind pa 'di yang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// gang 'dod pa'i khams kyi rnam par spyon pa myi 'dod pas/ sbyin pa byin pa'i rgyun bcad pa dang / de bzhin du gzugs dang / gzugs myed pa'i
293b7(mdo): rnam par sbyin pa myi 'dod pas/ sbyin pa'i rgyun bcad pa dang / brtson 'grus kyis mtshan nyid la myi 'jug pa dang / dran pa'i stobs kyi skye myi 'gog pa la dmyigs pas/ sbyin pa byin pa 'di yang / tshul khrim
293b8(mdo): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// gang sbyin pa ni g.yeng ba'i mtshan nyid dang / dran pa'i yul la yang dag par rgyas pa dang / len pa dang / dor ba'i byed pa'i rang bzhin can gyi yul la myi khom par dmyigs shing / snyes
294a1(mdo): byed pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin 'o// gang yang sbyin pade dbyinas pa thams cad kun ldang ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i ye shes dang / rnam par pyod pas lam gyi mthun pa yongs su 'as
294a2(mdo): ba'i ye shes dang // nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam la reg pa myed pa'i ye shes dang / dpa' zhing rab tu nyams pa'i lam dang / tshig pas gdungs pa'i rnams snying rje thams cad kyis yongs su bskyabs te/ 
294a3(mdo): zhi ba lam du bzhag pa dang / dben pa gyod pa la bdag bde ba skyed cing / theg pa chen po yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ sbyin pa byin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// gang sbyin pa
294a4(mdo): de las thams cad la mtshan nyid mtshungs shing / yul thams cad la ting nge 'dzind bsgrubs pas/ stong pa'i grong bzhin du rtog pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad blo myed cing dngos po myed par rtog par rtog
294a5(mdo): pa dang / 'dod chags thams cad rkyend la rag las shing bla na myed pa dang / rtog pa thams cad lus myed cing mtshan nyid skad cig tu 'jig pa dang / gnas thams cad yod pa ma yin zhing / myi 'gro rna
294a6(mdo): par myi 'gro/ kun nas myi ldang ba'i mtshan nyid du rtog pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// kang sbyin pa de bdag la sems dpa' myed pa dang / dben par sems dpa' dang / 
294a7(mdo): rnam par sbyin pa 'dod par sems dpa' dang / lend pa rnam par rtog par sems pa de las// 'dod pa'i khams kyi phung po la myi gnas po'i sbyin pa dang / sa'i khams la lend pa dang / dor ba myed pa'i sbyin pa dang / 
294a8(mdo): chu dang / mye dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la blang ba dang / dor ba myed pa'i sbyin pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang 'dul ba'i phyir myi rtog cing / rnam par myi rtog pa'i sbyin pa dang / phung po/ 
294b1(mdo): khams la nam mkha' kun nas ldang ba dang / gzugs kyi rang bzhin la rnam par myi dmyigs pa dang / na ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang rnam par shes pa dang chos la rang bzhin rnam par gyi dbyigs pa
294b2(mdo): sbyin pa dang / dran pa'i stobs kyis sbyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis rnam par myi rtog pa'i phyir// mtshan ma rgyun myi gcad par sbyin pa byin pa dang / sbyin pa de sgrol pa rnam par myi dmyigs// ma skyes ma byung ba
294b3(mdo): phyir/ 'dres pa myed cing 'chi 'gro dang / skye ba sbyin pa byin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zhes smras so// gzhan yang sbyin pa de/ bdag myi sems shing / longs khyod thams
294b4(mdo): cad gdon myi za bar 'grub po/ bde ba thams cad skye ba la bzod pa 'dadre nad pa dang / brtson 'grus kyis sems can la mtha' thug pa skye da cing / rnam par myi rtog pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad la blang ba du
294b5(mdo): do ba myed pa dang / bsam gtan la 'dug pa myed pa dang / khams gsum la shes rab kyi pha rol gnyis pa thams cad dang bral ba de dag gi thabs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' dong rtse gcig sbyin pa
294b6(mdo): byi nad te/ rnam pa de lta bu'i sems bskyed pa yongs su bsngos pas/ pha rold tu phyind pa drug po 'di dag thams cad la gnas par 'gyur ro// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas 'dul ba'i phyir/ shi nad tu brtan
294b7(mdo): par mos par 'gyur ro// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la re ba skyed par byed do// mu stegs can 'dul ba'i phyir/ 'gro ba thams cad la 'jug gi/ lta ba log par ni myi 'gyur ro// sems can
294b8(mdo): thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bya ba'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i las thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyend pa bsgrub pa'i dge bcu'i phra ba yongs su sngo bar byed do// bdag gi re bya ba'i lta ba thob de/ tshul khrims la nan tan du
295a1(mdo): byed / dus kun pa dang/ nga myod par 'gyur ro// myal ba dang / ma nga / na pa'i 'jig rten pa'i sems
295a2(mdo): masbyin par bya ba dang / sdug bsngal yongs su tha rad par bya bo'i phyir/ dge ba'i phra ba yongs su sngo bar byed do// bdag sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / shin rje'i 'jig rtend pa'i sdug bsnga/ 
295a3(mdo): gyi / 'jig pas sgeg par gyi 'gyur ro// bdag kyang de bzhin du snying rje chen po'i brtson 'grus btad pa/ pha ros dganond pa'i smon lam gi dbang gis/ der bsams bzhin du skye ba mtshungs par 'dzin te/ 
295a4(mdo): sems can yongs su smyind par bya ba'i phyir/ bzod pa thams cad da dang ldan par 'gyur ro// skad cig ma'i 'du byed thams cad brtadag par bya'o// yul gces pa thams cad yang dag par mthong / 
295a5(mdo): sems can thams cad yongasu smyind par bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i cha ba thams cad la brtan pa'i brtson 'grus pha rol gnond par 'a gyur ro// sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par b+h+yo bI'i phyir
295a6(mdo): slobs dpon dang / slobs dpon ma yin pa thams cad la 'jug cing / bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor de la mngon par brtson par 'gyur ro// mngon par 'du myi byed par brtags
295a7(mdo): nas/ yul thams cad kyi bdud kyi lam spyad pas/ bdag tu lta bar byed do// sems can 'dul ba'i phyir shes rab 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byis pa'i yul la spyod pa thams cad la 'ang bdag tu lta bar byed do// seMs
295a8(mdo): can yongs su smyin par bya ba'i phyir/ 'jig rte nad thams cad kyi yul las shi nad tu 'das shing / bsam gtan byed do// 'jig rtend thams cad kyi yul gyi lam pyod pa la yang yang dag par mthong ngo // seMs
295b1(mdo): can thams cad yongs su sbyin par byed pa'i phyir/ dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong 'ar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad yongs su mgu bar bya ba'i phyir/ rigs kyi bu rnam pa de lta bu'i sems can gyi go cha dang
295b2(mdo): sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i rgyan de dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsdu ba'i dngos pos/ sems can dbul po dbul ba las yongs su bdad par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di ni sems can yongs su smyid
295b3(mdo): par byed cing // byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sbyin pa byin pa 'di ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// ji lta bur bsams pas sems can yongs su mgu bar byed pa dang / yang na ni zang zing bsam pa'i sos
295b4(mdo): can rnams/ zang zing gis yongs su smyind par byed pa dang / chos la 'dod pa'i sems can rnams ji lta bur sems can rnams la/ zugs dang 'thun par chos bstand pas// yongs su mgu bar
295b5(mdo): byed cing / yongs su smyin par byed pa 'di yang / byang chub sems can sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// rigs kyi bur gzhan yang nga/ sems can yongs su smyind pas/ zang zang gi sbyin pa yang
295b6(mdo): byin pa'i lend pa'i de dag la/ byams pa dang 'thun par sems bskyed par bya ba de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smind par byed do// rab tu dga' ba skye ba'i blo dang ldan pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba de nyid kyis de dag
295b7(mdo): yongs su smind par byed do// snying rje ci bya'o cog byed pa la brtson pa/ dge ba'i sems skye ba dang / ldan par 'gyur ro// btang snyoms shing sdig pa myi byed pa/ dge ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba/ de nyid kyis de dag
295b8(mdo): yongs su spyond par byed do// tong nge 'dzind dang 'thun pa dang ldan pa/ sems skye bar 'gyur ba de nyid kyis/ de dag yongs su smind par byed do// don la ton pa bdag byed pa dang / ldan pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur
296a1(mdo): pa de nyid kyis/ de dag yongs su smyind par 'gyur ro// de yang sbyin pa byin pa'i lend pa rnams kyi sems dang bsam pa la/ dang por byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de nyid kyis/ de dag yongs su
296a2(mdo): sbyind par byed do// la la lend pa rnams la/ byang chub spyad par khyod pa de dag skyo ba skyed par byed pa de nyid kyis/ de dag yongs su smyind par byed do// la la yang yun ring po nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i bya
296a3(mdo): spyod pa rnams la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la spyod pa'i rgyund gcad cing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta
296a4(mdo): bu'i chos stond cing / rab tu stond pa de nyid kyis/ de dag yongs su sbyind par byed do// la la yang phyir myi ldog pa rnams la ji lta/ bur/ skyes bu dam pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / bzod pa'i gzungs thob
296a5(mdo): pas/ myi rtag pa dang / du sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag myed pa dang ldan pa/ rnams de lta bu'i chos stond cing / rab tu sto nad pa de nyid kyis de dag yongasu smyind par byed do// la la yang byang
296a6(mdo): chub sems dpal rnams la/ ji lta bu byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams rgyun gcad cing spyod spongs pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/ snying rje cher
296a7(mdo): bo skyed pa de lta bu'i chos ston cing rab tu stond par de na smon las byed do// de na bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'chang rgya zhing/ lta ba ngan pa dog pa rnyed pa'i sems can rnams/ theg pa gsum la
296a8(mdo): sbyar bar byed do// yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed do// thabs des sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po sbyind par byed do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i ba spu'i khung bu ji snyed pa de snyed kyi/ 
296b1(mdo): sbyin pa'i dngos po rnams/ yang na ni zang zing gi sbyin pa 'am/ yang na ni chos kyi sbyin pa'i thabs kyis/ sems can yongs su sbyin par byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dag spyand pa'i bsdu
296b2(mdo): ba'i dngos pos kyang / sems yongs su smyind par byed do// rigs kyi bu de na gang chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i myig gis/ blta ba dang / tshig snyan pas dga' bar bya ba dang / ngag 'jam pas slong ba po dang / chos
296b3(mdo): nyand pa rnams/ snyand pa la sbyor bar byed do// sems can yongs su khyad pas/ sdig pa las phyir ldog par byed/ lta bar song ba thams cad las phyir zlog par byed do// bral ba bzhi'i sems can rnams/ bzhi
296b4(mdo): la dgod par byed do// bzhi ga pa zhe na/ tshul khrims dang bral ba'i sems can rnams/ ngag snyan pa dang 'jam pas/ tshul khrims de la dgod par byed pa dang / sems can lta ba dang bral ba rnams/ ya
296b5(mdo): dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par byed pa dang / sems can bsam pa dang / bral ba rnams/ bsam pa yongs su sbyang bar byed pa dang / mas can cho ga dang bral ba rnams/ yang dag pa'i cho ga la dgod par
296b6(mdo): byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu de na sems can tshul khrims dang bral ba rnams/ byang chub sems dpa'i ngag snyan pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po/ 'phags pa'i tshul khrims la ji ltar dgod par byed/ yang byang chub sems dpa'
296b7(mdo): dben pa'i tshig myi rtsub pa de'i drung du/ slong ba po nye bar phyir pa'i sems can de dag kyang / bsam pa shi nad tu yongs su mgu bar byed do// de dag la mtshungs par dag snyan pas gtam smra bar byed do// de dag kyang 'du bar
296b8(mdo): byed do// sems can gang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / ldan par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad/ ngag snyan pas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par gzhog par byed/ dkod par byed do// tshul khrims ngan pa'i
297a1(mdo): sems can rnams/ tshul khrims la yang dag par gzhog par byed// dgod par byed/ 'thud par byed do// sems can le mo can rnams/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par gzhog par byed/ 
297a2(mdo): dgod par byed/ 'dzud par byed do// sems can bdag bde bar 'dod pa rnams/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par gzhog par byed/ dgod par byed do// 'dzud par byed do// gzhan yang sems can rnams brtson
297a3(mdo): 'grus rtsom pa la dgod par byed do// ma dad pa rnams dad pa'i brtson 'grus la dgod par byed do// thos pa nyung ba rnams / mang du thos pa dang / 'chald pa'i shes rab can rnams/ shes rab phun gsum tshogs pa dang / 
297a4(mdo): myi 'grogs pa'i sems can rnams 'grogs pa la sbyor ba byed do// ga zhun yang sems can par myi shes shing / mar myi shes te/ mgus pa rnams/ pha ma la gus shi / nad pa la bsnyend bkur bya ba dang
297a5(mdo): drang srong la sbyor bar byed/ dgod par byed/ sems thub pa rnas byams pa la sbyor bar byed// snying rje myed pa'i sems can nas snying rje la sbyor bar byed/ sems dman pa can rnams/ dga'
297a6(mdo): la sbyor bar byed/ sems kyis chags pa rnams/ btang snyoms la sbyor bar byed/ sems can ngan song gsum du 'gro ba rnams/ tshul khrims la dgod pas lha'i bde ba skye ba la sbyor bar byed do// 'dod
297a7(mdo): pa la spyod pa'i sems can kyi nang na/ ltung 'gro ba'i sems can nams bsam gtan la bkod pas// zugs la spyod pa'i lha'i bsam gtad kyi bde ba la sbyor bar byed do// sems can 'asas ka tams
297a8(mdo): pa rnams/ gzugs la 'jug pa snyoms par sbyor bar byed/ gzugs byed pa'i khams su snyoms par 'jug pa la mngon par chags pa'i sems can rnams/ phyi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / sto pa
297b1(mdo): bdag myed pa la sbyor bar byed do// sems can bdag tu 'du shes pa la mngon par chags pa rnams/ nye bar lend pa'i phung po la la myi 'jigs shing / dbu pa dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / mda' dang / ral gyis
297b2(mdo): 'phangs te gsod pa'i skyes bu lta bu'i sems can rnams la stond par byed do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dkod par byed pa nas/ dgra bcom pa'i bar du dgod par byed do// gzhan yang sems can gtan
297b3(mdo): pa ngan pa la rab tu mos shing / sangs rgyas dang / dge 'dun la mngon par mos pa byed/ sems can de dag sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ston par byed/ sangs rgyas la myi byed par rab tu mos pa la rab tu gzhog par
297b4(mdo): byed/ rab tu dgod par byed pa nas/ chos dang dge 'dun kau da ra du'o// gang log pa la lta ba'i sems can log par ston/ dad cing phyi rob kyi mu stegs can gyi tshul khrims la yang dag par zhugs
297b5(mdo): pa'i sems can de dag skyabs gsum du 'gro ba la sbyor bar byed/ ke snyen pa'i sdom pa dang / rab tu byung ba'i sdom pa dang / 'phag pa 'jig rtend pa dang / 'jig rtend las 'das pa tshul khrims la/ 
297b6(mdo): sbyor bar byed/ dgod par byed do// dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ni 'jig rtend pa'i tshul khrims/ 'phags pa'i slob pa la sdom pa ni/ 'jig rtend las 'das pa'i tshul khrims te/ mu stegs can gzhan gi tshul
297b7(mdo): khrims kyis ngan song gsum du 'gro ba'i sems can dag gang gis lha dang / myir skye ba thob pa 'jig rtend pa'i sems can la mngon par dgod par byed do// 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rnams la yang de nyid kyis de dag yongs
297b8(mdo): sbyin par byed do// sems can 'jig rtend pa'i tshul khrims la zhugs pa rnams/ 'phags pa'i slob pa'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims la dgod par byed do// gang gis zag pa myed pa'i lam gyi 'bras bu thob pa de nyid kyis/ 
298a1(mdo): de dag yongs su smyin par byed do// sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams/ gang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sbyor bar byed pa de nyid kyis/ de dag yongs su sbyin par byed do// rang sangs rgyas
298a2(mdo): kyi theg pa pa rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi yul pha rol tu phyind pa drug gi tshul khrims la sbyor bar byed/ dgod par byed pa de nyid kyis/ de dag yongs su sbyind par byed do// byang chub
298a3(mdo): sems dpa' thabs mkhas pas sems can nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims la sbyor bar byed do// rigs kyi bu de la 'phags pa byang chub sems
298a4(mdo): dpa'i tshul khrims gang zhe na/ sems can pha rol la gnod pa ca// na gyi nang na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la gnod pa myed par gnas pa dang / sems can ma byin par len pa
298a5(mdo): can rnams kyi nang na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi nor la myi rku ba'i sems kyis gnas pa nas/ pha rol kyi chung ma la myi g.ye ma pa dang / brdzun du smra ba la myi slu ba'i bar du'o// sems can
298a6(mdo): thams cad la bral gyi zer ba nas/ ngag kyi nub pa'i bar du ste/ tshig khyal pa zed pa spangs pa dang / gnod sems 'dod pa yangs pa dang / chags sems sangs pa dang / sems kyi rnyog pa yang ba'i phyir/ gan/ 
298a7(mdo): kyi bstan pa sangs pa dang / sangs rgyab dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi yon tan la gus par bya ba sa kyi bzad par mos zhing / nyand par 'dod pa dang / zab pa la myi bzad par gus pa skyes pa dang / khamam tho bcum
298a8(mdo): zad tsam la 'jigs par lta ba dang / theg pa gzhan mi 'dod pas tshul khrims ma zhig pa dang / ma tshungs pa skye ba la yang dag par gnas pa/ skyo bas tshul khrims ma ral pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i bag chags sa nga pa
298b1(mdo): tshul khrims 'dres pa myed pa dang / chos dkar po 'phel bas mkhas pas myi smod pa dang / dran pas smra ba dang / ting nge 'dzind kha na ma tho ba myed pa dang / dbang po drug srung ba dang / 'dod pa dang / chags sems
298b2(mdo): kyi 'dod pa rab tu spangs pas/ bsam pa bsngags pa'o// lha dang myi mngon par mos par bya ba'i phyir rtsod pa dang / 'thab mo'i 'du 'dzi can yongs su spangs pas/ de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smyin par byed do// ses
298b3(mdo): can yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir/ sems can snying rje'i myed pa'i nang na 'dug pa la byams pa spyod pa 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal thams cad bzod pa'i sems dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba la zhum pa myed pa'i sems dang / bdag 'khrul
298b4(mdo): pa'i phyir 'byind pa dang / gzhan 'khrul pa la phod cing 'dor ba de nyid kyis/ de dag yongs su smyind par byed do// nyon mongs pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir/ sems can mtha' myed par byed
298b5(mdo): pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la sku ra pa 'deb/ sa pa dang / le lo can dang / myi dge ba'i ra ba dang lhan cig cu 'grogs pa'i nang na/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i brtson 'grus
298b6(mdo): brtsams par 'gyur ro// lus dang / ngag dang / yid yongs su spang ba'i phyir/ tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / gtong ba dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa'i las dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la
298b7(mdo): bapon 'grus brtsams par 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i phung po nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi lta ba kund tu sbyong ba dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / khagasag gi mtshan ma dang / 'jig tshogs kyi
298b8(mdo): mtshan ma dang / mthar 'byind pa'i lta ba yong su snang ba dang / rab tu spang ba'i phyir grol ba de dang / de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa pa la yang sems can sbyor bar byed/ dgod par byed pa de nyid kyi/ sems can yongs su phyin/ 
299a1(mdo): par byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sems can yongs su smind par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus dang / tshul khrims kyi sems kyi go cha la brtson pa 'di 'ang / 'jig rten
299a2(mdo): ngag snyan pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po'o// gang gis go cha'i thabs la mkhas pas/ nyon mongs pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir/ byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu chen po'i thal gyis/ sems can mtshams myed
299a3(mdo): par byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la sku rad pa 'debs pa dang / myi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig 'grogs pa dag yongs su smyind par 'gyur ro// ji ltar yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par
299a4(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ rnam pa de lta bu'i skyes bu'i rtsal yod do// da rigs kyi bu de'i tshe/ gzhung 'dir gang nyon mongs pa dang / ga pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/ byang chub sems dpa' pha rol
299a5(mdo): tu phyind pa drug spyad pa spyod cing / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ltar rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spu'i khung bu ji snyed pa de snyed kyi/ ngag snyan
299a6(mdo): pa'i ba su'i dngos pos sems can yongs su smyind par byed do// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rtend las 'das pa'i tshul khrims dang / sems can yongs su smyin pa dang / 
299a7(mdo): don bya'i bsdu ba'i dngos po gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir/ byang chub sems dpa' brtan pa'i snying rje chen pos/ bcings pa dang / bdag gi smon lam gyi khyad
299a8(mdo): par gyis bcing ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ phyags shing la btags pa ltar/ sdug bsngal myong bas na/ sems dang bsam pa la 'jigs pa 'am/ skrag pa 'am/ yongs su bsdigs pa skye bar myi 'gyur ro// 
299b1(mdo): de chung na/ sems kyi skad cig ma cig gis kyang / sems can yongs su sbyind par bya ba'i phyir/ snying rje chen po 'di sgom pa na/ de ltar bslob bo// de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can 'di gang sems can 'di mying
299b2(mdo): tsam zhig gam/ sems can 'di phyin ci log tsam zhig gam/ gti mug tsam 'am/ thog mar dag pa 'di sems can zhes bya ba 'am/ yang dag pa ma yin par/ gti mug ma gtogs par shi nad tu mngon par myi
299b3(mdo): sgrub pa dang / 'du byed sna tshogs kyi phyin ci log kun nas ldang ba rnams/ mngon par 'du bya ba na/ sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba myong ba dang / 'dus byas thams cad kyi dngos po gang mkhan gyi tshon 'dra ba dang
299b4(mdo): rgyo lam lta bu dang / rang bzhin gi smyig sgyu lta bu dang / 'khor ba las/ chags pa rnams/ bde bar 'dod cing mngon par 'du bya ba des sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs myong ba dang / chos thams cad nam
299b5(mdo): mkha'i rang bzhin myi shes pa dang / kun tu sbyor bas 'khruld pa dang / myos pa'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyi nad 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gis 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba la 'khor lo stug po lta bu'i sdug
299b6(mdo): bsngal gyis yongs su 'khor ba de dag kyang / bdag cag gis phyin ci log bzhi spangs te/ ji lta ba bzhin du zhi ba'i lam la dgod par bya zhing / yang dag pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad kyi yongs su smyind par bya ba
299b7(mdo): zhig snyam pa dang / de sems can rnams la tshul bzhin du rtogs te/ sems can rnams la dmyigs pa 'ang myed do// srod dang / gsol ba dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed can dag
299b8(mdo): pa'ang myed do// sems can yongs su smyind par bya ba'i phyir/ snying rje chen po yang rnam par myi spong ngo // brtan pa la mos pas/ sems can rnams 'jig rtend las 'das po'i tshul khrims la sbyor bar byed
300a1(mdo): thabs la mkhas pas/ dgod par byed/ dgon pa dang / nags 'dag tu 'dug pa'i phyir/ spyod par 'gyur ro// 'du 'dzi yongs su spangs shing / brtson 'grus brtsams pas/ nye bar mend pa'i phung
300a2(mdo): po lnga la lha dang / myi mngon par mos pa bya ba'i phyir/ yid la byed pa'i rnal 'byor da dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gang yang phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / 'du 'dzi spang ba'i phyir/ sems can de dag gi drung du nye bar
300a3(mdo): phyin nas chos stond to// gang la nyal ba sang ba'i phyir/ 'gro ba lnga la mngon par chags pa rjes su smon pa rnam par byang ba'i phyogs la sbyor bar byed do// nyes pa mang po'i lta ba dang / nga yir bya ba dang / bdag gis bya ba dang / 
300a4(mdo): rtag pa dang chad pa yongs su sang ba'i phyir// dgon pa'i gnas dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis la rab tu gnas par byed pa de dag/ gi gam du gus pa skyes par 'gyur ro// de dag la 'ang 'jig rten las
300a5(mdo): 'das pa'i tshul khrims ston par byed pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyis gan pa 'i 'jig rtend las 'das pa'i tshul khrims 'di'o// gang dang ldan pa'i sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i 'dod chags 'jig
300a6(mdo): par byed do// gzugs dang gzugs myed pa'i 'dod chags thams cad 'jig par byed do// bag la nyal ba dang / nga yir bya ba dang / bdag gir bya ba thams cad 'jig par byed do// myur du chos zab mo'i gting
300a7(mdo): dpag dka' ba'i bzod pa thob bo// myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// sems can 'jig rtend pa'i tshul khrims can yang dang yang sdug bsngal gyi zil gyis nond
300a8(mdo): cing / 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor lo la yang dag par gnas pa/ pa yir bya ba dang / bdag gir bya ba la rten pa dag/ byang chub kyi lam rab tu myi zhes te/ de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul chen po'i 'jig rtend las 'das chus
300b1(mdo): khrims kyis/ sems can rnams dgos pa myed pa ni gang na bdag gi gnas myed cing / sems can dang / srog dang / gaspo' ba dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed can gyi gnas myed pa dang / gzugs kyi gnas
300b2(mdo): myed pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i gnas myed pa dang / sa'i khams kyi gnas myed pa dang / chu dang / rlung dang / mye dang / myig dang / gzugs kyi mtshan ma la myi gnas shing / rna ba
300b3(mdo): dang / sgra'i mtshan ma la myi gnas/ lce'u dang / ro'i mtshan ma la myi gnas/ lus dang / reg bya'i mtshan ma la myi gnas/ yid dang / chos kyi mtshan ma la myi gnas/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi mtshan ma la myi gnas/ 
300b4(mdo): nga yir bya ba'i rang bzhin gi mtshan ma la myi gnas/ rtag pa dang chad pa/ de'i mtshan ma la myi gnas/ 'jig tshogs kyi lta ba dang / mtha rang/ 'dzind pa'i lta ba la myi gnas/ rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / 
300b5(mdo): kun tu rtog pa dang / nye bar rtog pa la myi gnas/ mya ngan dang / nye 'i mya ngan dang / rjes su mya ngan dang / zad pa'i mya ngan dang / gnyis pa'i mya ngan la phyi gnas// stong pa nyid dang / smond pa myed pa dang / 
300b6(mdo): mtshan ma byed pa dang / khams gsum gi rgyungs kyi gnas/ mngon par 'du gyi byed/ ma skyes/ ma byung / ma byas/ mngon paras byas pa la gyi gnas/ dus gsum la phyi gnas/ sems dang yid kyi sa can nyid la gyin nga/ 
300b7(mdo): nyan mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / cig pa dang / rnge su tshig pa dang / skad cig tu 'jig pa'i mthu'i rnas sa kyi gnas// mngon par gyi zhes pa dang / 'thun pas kyi gnas/ nyan thos kyi theg ma thom pa la phyinan
300b8(mdo): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la gyi gnas// mtshan ma la myi gnas shing / pha ro la tu byind pa drug la snyems par myi gnas kyi/ sems kyi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par spyod pa nam mkha' bzhin du gnas shing // yang dag pa dang
301a1(mdo): yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par spyod pa la mtshungs par gnas so// zhen pa gnyi shu myed pa'i rnam par dpyod pa dang / chags pa gnyis su byed pa rnam par dpyod pa dang / ye shes gnyi su byed pa rnam pa/ 
301a2(mdo): dpyod pa dang / rnal 'byor gnyis su byed pa rnam par dpyod pa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa gnyis su byed pa rnam par dpyod pa dang / rtog pa gnyis su byed pa rnam par dpyod pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa gnyis su byed pa rnam
301a3(mdo): par dpyod pa dang / lam gnyis su byed pa rnam par dpyod pa dang / nyon mongs pa byed pa'i 'dren pa gnyis su myed pa rnam par dpyod pa ste/ rigs kyi bu rnam pa de lta bu'i tshul khrim pa dang ldan pas/ rigs kyi bu chos zab
301a4(mdo): mo'i bzod pa thob bo// thog ma byed pa'i stong pa nyid rab tu 'byed pa'i ye shes la mkhas par 'gyur ro// shes rab snang bar byang chub kyi lam dernam par spyong par byed do// 'jig rtend kyi chos kyis gos pa'ang
301a5(mdo): byed do// bdud kyi las kyis gos pa 'ang byed do// bag chags kyi rjesasu 'brel pa'i nyon mongs pas gos pa 'ang byed de// phyogs ban+d+ha ra shes rab kyi snang bas ldan par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi stong
301a6(mdo): skyes pas/ yul thams cad yongs su shes par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la snang bar thob par 'gyur ro// 'dod chags kyi 'khor bas ldan pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang / dngos po dang / dngos
301a7(mdo): po myed pa thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba yongs su shes pa dang / chags pa thams cad las yang dag par shin tu 'das pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' bam 'gro ba'i spyod yul du 'gyur zhing 'khor ba'i yul
301a8(mdo): dulab yang dag par mthong ngo // dben pa'i gyid yul du'ang 'gyur zhing / 'du 'dimams cadas mngon pa chags par yang dag par mthong ngo // thasam gtan gi khyod yul du'ang 'gyur zhing / btsun mo'i 'khor du 'ang
301b1(mdo): yang dag par mthong ngo // mngon par 'du myi byed pa'i yul du'ang 'gyur zhing / 'du byed thams cad kyi yul du 'ang yang dag par mthong ngo // ma skyes pa'i spyod yul du 'ang 'gyur zhing / bdud bzhi'i yul gyi spyod yul du
301b2(mdo): 'ang yang dag par mthong ngo // 'phags pa'i skye bo'i spyod yul du 'ang 'gyur zhing / 'phags pa'i skye bo'i spyod yul ma yin par yang dag par mthong ngo // 'jig rtend kyi yul las yang dag par shind tu 'das par yang
301b3(mdo): 'gyur zhing / 'jig rte nad thams cad kyi yul gyi spyod yul du'ang yang dag par mthong ngo // ye shes kyi spyod yul du'ang 'gyur zhing / byis pa'i yul gyi spyod yul du 'ang yang dag par mthong ngo // yang dag pa'i yul mngon
301b4(mdo): gsum zhing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yul spyod pa la yang dag par dga' bas kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i yul la spyad pa spyod do// yul thams cad mtshan nyid myed pa'i spyod yul la
301b5(mdo): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom par byed/ spyod pa dang / mtsha/ na nyid dang / dpe byad dang / sangs rgyas yul la yang dag par ga zhol ba'i rnam par shes pa la brtson pas/ bdud bzhi'i yul
301b6(mdo): la dbye bar 'jug pa'i shes pa 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing rim 'gro bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du nye bar 'gro ba la brtson par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
301b7(mdo): bstand pa 'ang byed do// sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad yongasasu rdzogs par byed cing / thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes kyi yul la yang 'jug par byed do// dmyigs pa thams cad kyi dge 'a gyod pa la/ ses
301b8(mdo): can yongasu sbyind par byed do// nyon mongs pa'i ri rnam par phye mar byed do// spros pa thams cad rab tu ded par byed do// lta ba thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la
302a1(mdo): yang dgod par byed do// rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ sems can myi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig tu 'grogs pa rnams kyi nang na/ byang chub sems dpa' na
302a2(mdo): pa de lta bur/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa de lta bu'i don bya ba bsdu ba'i dngos pos sems can rnams/ 'jig rtend las 'das pa'i tshul khrims la sbyor bar byed/ dgod par byed do// 
302a3(mdo): yon tan gyis sangs rgyas kyi yon tan don bya ba la sems can rnams dgod par byed pa 'di dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu chen po'i 'khurd// sems can gyi bsdu ba'o// sems can gi tshogs so// ses
302a4(mdo): can yongs su smind par byed pa'o// gapa sems can shind tu dbuHda po las yongs su tha dad par byed pa'o// rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo'o gsum la dgod par byed pa'o// ji lta bur sangs rgyas kyi
302a5(mdo): zhib rnam par ma dag par/ byang chub sems dpa' la la rnam pa de lta bu 'i lal byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i ba spu'i khung bu ji snyed kyi/ don bya bas/ sems can yongs su sbyin par 'gyur ro// 
302a6(mdo): kyai bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i don maskrun pa/ sems can yongs su sbyin pa'i rnal chen po gang zhen/ rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa dang / drug pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'ding / byang chub sems dpa
302a7(mdo): kyi pa rtsod pana'an pa gyur ni/ byin pa da / ni/ ma dang / bzod pa dang / 'od gru / 
302a8(mdo): shes kyi sa byed pa la 'dzin par 'gyur ba da dang / sem nanamapa byang ba byed do// gas tes nga sa sems dang byin btsun pasas/ nam nan
302b1(mdo): du gtong bar 'gyur ba de// de ltar sems can rnamasas sbyin pa'i pha rom tu phyind pa'i yon tan ston pa des sbyor bar byed do// gang gi che byang chub sems dpa' srog gcod pa spangs shing sems can rnams la snyi rje ba de/ 
302b2(mdo): de ltar srog gcod pa de myi slob par byed/ sems can thams cad la snying rje bar sbyor ba byed do// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims la dgod par byed pa nas/ yang dag pa'i lta ba'i bar du smra bar bya'o// ji ltar bya
302b3(mdo): chub sems dpal bdag bzod pa'i yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / bka la nyal ba spang ba'i phyir/ bzod pa sgom par byed pa nas/ myi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob pa'i bar du/ de la sems can rnams sbyor bar
302b4(mdo): byed cing / myi skye bo 'chos kyi bzod pa'i bar du dgod par byed do// ji da ltar byang chub sems dpa' bdag brtson 'grus brtsams nas sems yongs su sbyind par bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i lus kyi las byen/ 
302b5(mdo): kyis brlabs pa dang / dge ba'i ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las byin gyis brlabs pa nas/ dge ba'i rgyur 'du shes pa dang / zhi ba dang snying rje chen po'i rgyur 'dus byas rnams/ rnam par myi spong ba de la
302b6(mdo): sems can rnams sbyor bar byed/ dgod par byed do// ji lta bur byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba 'dul ba'i phyir/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la gnas te/ bsam gtan la bsam gtan du
302b7(mdo): byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba dang bral ba'i bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed pa nas/ 'khyild pa dang / ldo la pa'i bsam gtan
302b8(mdo): thob pa'i bar du/ de la sems can rnams de dang de dag gi yon tan la sbyor bar byed/ dgod par byed do// ji ltar byang chub sems dpal bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par bton pa na/ thabs sna tshos
303a1(mdo): kyis shes rab kun 'byung bar byed do// ji ltar bdag mngon gsum du 'gyur ba de ltar sems can rnams sbyor bar byed// ji lta bur chos thams cad la ye shes thob cing / pha rol ma yin pa'i rkyen mngon par
303a2(mdo): shes pa ltar sems can gi rgyu'i phyir/ chos 'di dag 'byung ba 'di ni/ sems can yongasu smyind par sbyor ba'i thabs la mkhas pa'i ye shes te/ gang gi las kyis sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par nus pa de'i bar du sbyor
303a3(mdo): bar byid kyis brlabs pa'i phyir/ chags pa yang byed do// sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la sbyor bar byed do// sems can rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
303a4(mdo): la sbyor bar byed do// sems can ji ltar bur phra ba'i chos la ye shes mngon sum du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de ltar/ byang chub kyi spyod pa zab mo/ la sbyor bar byed// las kyi rnam par sbyind pa la mkhas pa'i ye shes dang
303a5(mdo): ldan pa'i dra ba rnam par myi spong ba 'di yang / byang chub sems dpa' tha/ bas la mkhas pas rab tu 'byed pa'i ye shes mngon par bslu bas pa'o// gang byang chub sems dpa' chos dang sems dbang byed pa
303a6(mdo): rab tu shes shing / nad cig yar 'jog pa'i mtshan nyid la yang rtog pa dang / sems can la snying rje chen po rnam par gyi spong ba 'di yang / byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongasu sbyind par
303a7(mdo): mngon par bsgrubs pa'o// kang byang chub sems dpa' sems can stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa thams cad kyi mtshan nyid du dmyigs pa yang myed cing / sems can rnams theg pa gsum la spyo
303a8(mdo): bar byed pa dang / sems can yongs su sbyin pang sbyor ba'i rgyun pa bcad pa 'di yang // byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'o// gang byang chub me
303b1(mdo): dpa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi 'du byed bdag byed pa dang / ldan pas chos stond pa la dmyigs pa myed pa dang / nyand pa dang / sgra dang dbyangs la dmyigs pa myed pa dang / las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smisbyin pa
303b2(mdo): la dbyigs pa myed pa dang / sems can rnams la snying rje ba'i phyir yang / sems can phyin ci log la yang dag par 'du ba myed pa rnams la/ sems can gyi mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'brel pa stond pa 'di yang / byang chub
303b3(mdo): sems dpa'i thabs la mazhes pas/ sems can yongs su spyad pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'o// byang chub sems dpal rang bzhin gyis 'du byed par myi dmyigs shing // gtong bar yang myi dmyigs pa dang / lend
303b4(mdo): pa dang rnam par smind pa'i 'bras bu yang ma yin la/ sems can la snying rje ba'i phyir yang / sbyin pa byin par 'gyur la/ sems can rnams la sbyin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smyin pa la yang stond par byed pa
303b5(mdo): dang / sbyin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po la sbyor bar byed pa 'di byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas/ sems can yongs su smyind pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'o// yang byang chub sems dang/ 
303b6(mdo): ji ltar sems can gyi lus spyod pa myed pa dang / 'gyur ba myed pa dang / myi snang ba'i gzugs brnyan lta bur rab tu shes pa dang / sems brag cha lta bur brtag pa dang / 'du byed sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ltar rab tu shes pa dang / 
303b7(mdo): sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rab tu sbyor ba rnam par myi spong ba dang / sems can rnams lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi 'du byed pa la sbyor bar byed pa dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu yang dag par stond par byed pa 'di yang
303b8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa dang / sems can yongs su smin pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'o// yang byang chub sems dpal ji lta bur bdag myed cing mngon par 'du myi byed pa'i tshul khrims la rtog par
304a1(mdo): byed pa dang / gyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rab tu shes pa dang / 'di la sems can gyi btang snyoms su rab tu spyo ba myi 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams yang phung po gsum la sbyor bar byed pa dang / stan
304a2(mdo): mapa'i rdul khrims su spong pa dang / lhag pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab la sbyor bar byed pa 'di yang / byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa dang / sems can yongs su sbyind pa bsgrubs pa'o// 
304a3(mdo): yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'di ltar lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi 'du byed skad cig du 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid du shes te/ 'dus ma byas kyi gnas dang bral bar yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing / sems can
304a4(mdo): rnams la ting nge 'dzind dang / bzod pa'i rgyu dang / 'bras bu mtshungs par stond pa de la/ sems can rnams sbyor bar byed pa 'di yang // byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas/ sems can yongs su
304a5(mdo): skye nad pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar ya nga blang ba myed pa dang / dor ba myed pa'i 'du byed thams cad shes shi nga/ rgyu dang 'bras bur yang rtog pa dang / chos thams cad skye ba dang
304a6(mdo): 'gog par dmyigs pa myed pa dang / rgyu dang rkyend kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang bral bar rab tu myi shes pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smyind pa myed pa dang / snying rje chen po'i rgyun myi gcod pa dang / yang seMs
304a7(mdo): can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba dang / phung po yongs su shes pa dang / ye shes mngon gsum du bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus nyams pa dang / rgyu'i 'bras bu stand par byed pa dang / sems can le lo can rnas
304a8(mdo): 'azod 'grus la dmyigs pa'i sdug bsngal 'dzin pa la spyor ba 'di yang // byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas/ sems can yongs su sbyind pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'o// byang chub sems dpal je ltar
304b1(mdo): mapagatan na mam ga tud du byed ci / 'du byed thams cad kyi rtag pa yang dag par rjes su yong 'a dang / sdug bsngal dang / bdag myed pa dang / byang babyed pa dang / byas pa skyed pa dang / bya 'byed pa dang / 
304b2(mdo): kun nas ldang ba byed pa dang / skad cig du zad pa myed pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa'i 'du shes rnams yang dag par rjes su mthong ba dang / sems can rnams la yang phung po la te nad pa'i gtan tshangs par gyod pa mngon par
304b3(mdo): shes pa thob pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu stond pa dang / bsam gtan gyis nyon mongs pa spang bar byos shig ces/ de ltar las gzhan ma yin pas/ sems can rnams bsam gtan la sbyor bar byed pa dang // thob pa chen
304b4(mdo): po thob par bye ba zhog ces/ bsam gtan la sems sbyor bar byed/ pa 'di yang / byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas/ sems can yongs su smyind pa mthong bar bsgrubs pa'o// yang
304b5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar blang ba myed cing dor ba myed pa dang / gas pa dang / khong khro ba gnyi ga dang bral bas/ thams cad gtang snyoms thob pa dang / nan tan dang / bdag shes pa dang
304b6(mdo): myi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi dbang po la/ yid kyi 'du byed rnams rtog par myi byed/ rnam par rtog par myi byed pa dang / sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rab tu sbyor ba yongs su 'grub pa rab
304b7(mdo): tu myi spong ba dang / shes rab bsgom pa la brtson pas/ sems can rnams 'khor ba'i baphon ra las rab tu tha rad par stond pa dang / sems can rnams thos pa dang / bsam gtan la brtson zhing tshol ba sgom pa
304b8(mdo): la sbyor bar byed pa dang / yang byang chub sems dpa' ji lta ji lta bur/ dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par khong du chud pas/ 'khor ba'i 'dam las rgal bar 'gyur ba de lta bus/ sems can rnams chos de dang de dag
305a1(mdo): la yang dag par gzhog par byed// sbyor bar byed/ dgod par byed pa 'di yang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi thabs la mkhas pas/ sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyir/ don 'thun
305a2(mdo): ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po mngon par bsgrubs pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i ba spu'i khung bu ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can yongs su sbyind pa don 'thun pa'i dngos po'o// gzhan yang nyon mongs pa/ rlo
305a3(mdo): pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/ ngan song gsum dang / ngan song du pyod pa'i nyes pa dang / sems can nyon mongs pa dang / tshe dang lta ba dang / bskal pa'i rnyog pas byang chub sems dpa' rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
305a4(mdo): 'di las/ smon lam gyi rgyun myi bcod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi go/ natan gyi tshogs la mngon par myi 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par smon lam myi byed do// yang nyon mongs pa dang
305a5(mdo): rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug gis/ byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can mtshams byed par byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la sku rad pa 'dren
305a6(mdo): pa dang / myi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig du 'grogs pa rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam bzhi po 'di dag gis/ sems can rnams yongs su skyed par byed do// theg pa gsum la sbyor bar byed do// pha rol tu phyind pa drug
305a7(mdo): la dgod par byed do// de yang 'di di tsam gi byang chub kyi khyod pa khyod cing / sems can yongs su smin par byed do// 'dir yang 'dul ba 'dzin pa nas/ than byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngod papa 'tshar
305a8(mdo): bya ba'i bar du'o// byang chub thob pas na/ yang sems can mtshams myed par byed pa nas/ myi dge ba'i rdza ba dang lhan cig tu 'grogs pa'i b.radu/ yongs su phyind par 'gro zhing / sems can rnams theg pa gsum sa
305b1(mdo): yongs su smyin par byed pa/ nyon mongs pa'i lta ba thams cad las yongs su tha rad par byed pa 'di yang / rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa dang / rnyog pa lnga sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dis/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsal chen pos
305b2(mdo): yongs su sbyind pa'i go cha'o// gang byang chub sems dpa' la las/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par/ sems can gi go cha rnams pa de lta bus/ sems can yongs su smyind par bya bar myi nus pa 'di yang / 
305b3(mdo): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chen po go de lta bu dang ldan pas/ sems can yongs su sbyin par bya'o// yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul/ nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba// theg pa chen po'i
305b4(mdo): mdo'o// // le'u gsum pa'o// / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs
305b5(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu nyon mong/ sa pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir/ byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ bar dag lo na
