305b6(mdo): ji zhig tu skyes pa na/ sems can mtshams myed par byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos song bra dang / 'phags pa rnams la sku rad pa 'debs pa dang / myi dge ba'i pha ba dang lhan cig 'grogs pa rnams/ yongs su smind par byed
305b7(mdo): dge ba'i chos thams cad la sbyor bar byed/ nyon mongs pa dang lta ba'i bag chags thams cad las/ sems can yongs su smyind par byed cing / sems can re re'i don kyi phyir/ bskal pa'i sdug bsngal mang po bzod pa na
305b8(mdo): sems can 'khor ba'i 'das las sgrol pa dang / sangs rgyas cig gi zad du phul ba nas/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi zad kyi bar du phul lo// gang gi Ni/ sems can dge ba'i za ba la brtan par 'gyur
306a1(mdo): bde/ 'is rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bya ba byas pa dang / rnam par ros pa mngon par zhes pa'i ting nge 'dzid du kyi stozas kyi sa rob thob pas// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang ga'i bye ma snyed du / 
306a2(mdo): 'phrul gyi stobs kyis nye bar 'gro nus par 'gyur ro// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bku rang to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gi tshogs nye bar rtogs so// de na yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
306a3(mdo): gyi yon tan gyi chog pa chen po yang ci 'dra ba yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // de na yang rigs kyi bu de'i shi nang tu sred pa dang ldan pa skye bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la yongs su zhus pa las cis na
306a4(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas la lta ba dang / chos mnyand pa dang / dge 'dun la/ bsnyen bkur bas bral ba myed par 'gyur ro// nyan thos dang / rang
306a5(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas 'dres pa myed pa'o// nyon mongs pa tham sa cad kyis 'dres pa myed pa'o// ting nge 'dzind dang / gzungs thams cad kyis bral ba myed par 'gyur ro// yang nyon mongs pa dang / 
306a6(mdo): rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mye skye ba ji tsam pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang myi rgya'o// byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rgya che zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon gyi tshogs kyis rgyas par 'a
306a7(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po dag la yang dag par zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de khyab par 'gyur ro// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i sems can gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bral bar 'gyur ro// 
306a8(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ rigs kyi bu de lA/ ji lta ba bzhin du/ gsungs pa las gang dang spyod pa dang / nan tan gang gis yon tan de dag thob par 'gyur ba de yang / rigs kyi bu che tshe rabs rabs su yon tan
306b1(mdo): rab rtsod pa dang tan dpas bzod par 'gyur ba nas/ der skye bar 'byur ba'i bar dum// yon tan cimam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs zhing sangs rgyas kyi ni gi yon tan gyi chogs pa rgya chen ba thams cad kyis
306b2(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du khyab par 'gyur ro// gang na rigs kyi bu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba de/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas rnam par spangs pa ste/ byang chub
306b3(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag pa rnams la/ theg pa chen po dag pa'i gtam smra bar byed kyi/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam ni ma yin no// sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / yongs su sbyang
306b4(mdo): bar byas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan mang po dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan tshad myed pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa rnams la// so stond par byed do// gang dag la chos
306b5(mdo): stond pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye ba ra bya ba'i phyir stond kyi/ yongs su ma dag par ma yin no// pha rold tu phyind pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs
306b6(mdo): kye zhing yongs su dag par byang chub kyi khyad pa bsngags par byed kyi/ yongs su ma dag par na bsngags par myi byed do// sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su dag pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag dang 'grog
306b7(mdo): shing ste nad pa dang / sdom pa la dgod pa dang / yon spyod pa bsngags par byed kyi/ yongs su ma dag pa ni ma yin no// rigs kyi bu gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
306b8(mdo): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyi/ sngon rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag par/ thog mar sa bon bskyed nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/ 
307a1(mdo): gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pasad byed/ grangs byed par da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tsho 'askyong ba/ byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po dag pa la yang / 
307a2(mdo): dag par zhugs pa rnams la/ theg pa chen po dag pa'i gtam smra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ sngon nyon mongs pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir/ thog mar sa bon bskyed nas/ bran
307a3(mdo): byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 'dir yang sngon dge ba'i pha la la brtan par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa gang gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasasu dag pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
307a4(mdo): gzhan du 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa thob par gyu rang to// kapan yang sa rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gi tshogs tshad gzung ba dang / brtag pa der phyin cad kyang skye bar smon lam byas pas/ der bla na myed
307a5(mdo): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par 'chang rgya'o// yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par/ sa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon papa
307a6(mdo): rgyab de dag thams cad kyis// rnyog pa lnga sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag par/ thams cad kyi thog mar dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub bo// gang ga
307a7(mdo): sems bskyed pas mngon par shes pa thob cing // sa ra ba nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par/ bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du'o// gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs
307a8(mdo): rgyas kyi 'apo yongs su dag par// byang chub sems dpa' dag da lta chos kyi sgra sna tshogs kyis/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs dang bral zhing / chos tha' mo'i tshul 'jug cing / shes pas mkhas pa dang phyir gyi ldog pa dang / 
307b1(mdo): kapas bcom zab mo'i bzod pa thob pas/ dka' ba de myong bar 'gyur ro// gang yang da ltar khyed cag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing phyi mjed kyi
307b2(mdo): rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir/ mngon par lhags pa khyed cag thams cad kyis thog mar nyon mongs pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed nas/ bla na byed pa yang dag pa
307b3(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// thams cad kyi thog mar pha rol tu phyind pa drug la brtson par byas pa de la yang / mngon par shes pa gang gis/ byis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gzhan du
307b4(mdo): 'gro ba'i mdza par zhes pa thob par 'gyur da to// gang na sangs ca/ kyi zhing gi yon tan gi tshogs kun da zhes shing / rtogs pa der gyi ma skye ba mngon par shes pa'i smon las byas pas/ de dag de nyid
307b5(mdo): kyi nan tan gis zhus pas/ bsam pa ji snyed pa yongs su rdzogs sngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa der skyes pa rnas sangs rgyas gzhan 'phel ba'i phyir yang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas
307b6(mdo): kyi zhing yongs su ma dag pa 'di ni myi 'dod do// nyon mongs pas bsgribs pa dang / lta ba dog pa thob pa 'di dag smod cing / 'di la snying rje chen po myi skyed pa de dag/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i/ sems
307b7(mdo): dpa' chen po zhes myi bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ gtar mkhas pa la la mchog tu dri zhim pa dang ldan pa'i sman gyi yo byad kyis/ myi zhar ba dang / long ba rnams kyi myig gi nad chung cas rab tu zhi bar byed do// 
307b8(mdo): zhi bar shes nas/ de dag cig la gcig smras pa/ bdag cag gis gzugs kyi snang ba la blta ba yang brtsams te/ bdag cag sgron mar gyur pa'i sman pa'i khyim 'di nas byung la 'gro/ 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/ phyir
308a1(mdo): 'ong ba yang myed pa mang po de dag kyang / gang sman pa'i khyim de las 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ji lta bur nad 'di dag tu zhi ba byed pa de dag myig gi nad yun ring por gnas pa bltas nas yang 'ong ngo // de dag kyang
308a2(mdo): sman pa'i khyim der gnas par 'gyur ro// de dag yun myi ring bas kyang nad thams cad grol bar gyu rad to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du gang byang chub sems dpal nyon mongs pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
308a3(mdo): gang la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / lta ba ngan pas rtag tu gtse ba'i sems can rnams/ de la la la dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba de dag kya
308a4(mdo): ji ltar yon tan khong du chud pa de ltar rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de las 'byol bar 'dod do// gang yang de las 'das shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par/ rnam par pyod pa de nyon mongs
308a5(mdo): pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gdon myi za bar 'gro bar 'dod do// de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu myed pa/ gra ngas myed pa rdul shi nad tu phra ba snyed las shi nad tu 'das pas yun ring
308a6(mdo): bor sdug bsngal 'dod par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe/ de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang myi rgya ba 'di yang / byang chub sos
308a7(mdo): dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gi tshogs yong su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/ snga dro'i dus kyi gcig gis kyang / tshul
308a8(mdo): khrims bsrungs so// tshul khrims bsgoms so// byin pa byin no// bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed do// brtson 'grus brtsams so// bzod pa bsgoms so// shes rab kyi yon tan 'jam mo
308b1(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bskal pa brgya stong du'ang / pha rold tu phyind pa drug la brtson pas/ khyad pas spyod pa yang ma yin no// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang yang nyon mongs pa dang / rnyog
308b2(mdo): pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/ thams cad kyi thog mar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sa bon bskyed do// yang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'gro zhing / 'dir de tsam gyi brtson 'grus par mra
308b3(mdo): pa'i bton 'grus kyis dge ba'i chos yongasu tshol ba la mngon par brtson par gnas so// gang de lta bu'i ye shes snang ba thob pa de thams cad/ yul smra ba rnam par dpyod pa'i ye shes g.yo ba myed par 'gyur ro// 'jig
308b4(mdo): rtend gi chos rnams las 'phags par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi// zhing lta ba snang bar 'gyur ro// sems can gyi spyod pa brjo/ dad du myed pa mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la mkhas par 'gyur ro// 
308b5(mdo): bems can lus ma rungs pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang ldan cig tu 'grogs pa rnams la yongasu gtong ba yang myed/ se mas can lus nyon mongs pas dkrugs pa rnams/ ci 'dra bar
308b6(mdo): mthong ba la/ sems can gyi nad ci'i phan du rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ de 'dra ba'i sems kyi sman gyi yo byad rab tu stond par byed do// gang gi nyon mongs pas sems can ngan du spyod pa dang ldan par mthong ba'i
308b7(mdo): nyon mongs pa de dag bdag gis spangs ste// sems can de la snying rje chen po bskyed do// nyon mongs pa de dag spang ba'i phyir 'phon pas/ sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do// ji ltar nyon mongs pa las yongs
308b8(mdo): tha rad par bya zhes/ 'dod chags spyod pa rnams/ mye mdzes pa la rab tu sbyor bas rab tu zhi bar byed do// zhe sdang spyod pa rnams byams par rab tu sbyor ba dang / gti mug khyod pa rnams rtend cing 'brel
309a1(mdo): sbyong ba dang / skal pa dang bcas par pyod pa rnams/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyab dran par rab tu sbyor ba dang / 'dod chags snrel gzhir spyod pa rnams/ byams pa dang gyi dge bar rab tu sbyor ba dang / zhe sdang snrel
309a2(mdo): gzhir spyod pa rnams/ mye mdzes pa dang / byams par rab tu sbyor ba dang / gti mug snrel gzhir gyod pa rnams/ mye mdzes pa dang / rtend cing 'breld par rab tu spyor ba dang / lta ba ngan pa thob pa rnams
309a3(mdo): stong pa nyid rab tu thob pa dang / rkyen stobs can rnams la rjes su bsrung ba/ dang ldan pa rab tu sbyor ba dang / rab tu gzung du myed cing dngos po myed pa dang / sprog pa myed par shes pa rnams zab mo rnam par zhi bar
309a4(mdo): rab tu sbyor ba dang / spros pa shes pa rnams lhag mthong spros pa'i gtam rab tu sbyor bas zhi bar byed do// nges par 'dod pa rnams/ rim gyis smra ba dang / tshig zad pa rnams bsdu bar rab tu sbyor zhing / 
309a5(mdo): zhi ka nas dang / lhag mthong du rab tu sbyor ba dang / lhag ma/ thong la gus pa can rnams rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rab tu sbyor ba dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la gus pa can rnams
309a6(mdo): cung zad myed pa'i skye mched rab tu sbyor ba dang / cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la gus pa rnams/ mtshad ma myed par rab tu sbyor ba dang / smo na la la gus pa can rnams/ smon pa myed par smra ba rab tu sbyor ba dang
309a7(mdo): tshul khrims la gus pa can rnams/ ngan song gsum las yongs su thar par rab tu sbyor ba dang / thos pa la nga rgyal can rnams/ srid pa thams cad 'byung ba myed par rab tu sbyor ba dang // dgon pa ba la nga rgyal mngon
309a8(mdo): bar brtson pa rnams dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan can la nga rgyal mngon par brtson pa rnams/ tshad myed par rab tu sbyor ba dang / phung po la rtag par 'du shes pa rnams/ 'byung ba dang zad par rab tu sbyor ba dang / 
309b1(mdo): khams la bdag gir bya ba yongs su spangs pa rnams/ smyig rgyu bar rab tu sbyor ba dang / skye mched yong su sangs pa rnams/ lbu ba'i phung por rab tu sbyor ba dang // 'dod pa'i khams yongs su spangs pa rnams/ chu
309b2(mdo): shing gi snying po myed par rab tu sbyor ba dang / gzugs kyi khams yongs su spangs pa rnams/ 'du byed myi rtag par rab tu sbyor ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams yongasasu spangs pa rnams/ 'du byed thams cad sdug par
309b3(mdo): rab tu sbyor ba dang / bsam gtan la dka' ba dang / bde ba yong su spangs pa rnams/ chos thams cad bdag myed pa rab tu sbyor ba dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'dod pa rnamapa/ mya ngan las 'da' ba zhig par rab tu
309b4(mdo): sbyor ba dang / gzhan yang lam ngan pa yongs su spang ba rnams/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rab tu sbyor bas/ lta ba de dag rab tu zhi bar byed do// yid du 'ong ba'i skye bo yongs su spangs pa rnams/ myi
309b5(mdo): mdzes par rab tu sbyor ba dang / gzugs la chags pa yongasu spangs pa rnams/ ro sngon por rab tu sbyor ba dang / reg pa la chags pa yong su spangs pa rnams/ brag cha 'byung ba dang / zad par
309b6(mdo): rab tu sbyor ba dang / dri la chags pa yongs su spangs pa rnams/ rlung du rtog par rab tu sbyor ba dang // ro la chags pa yongs su spangs pa rnams myi mdzes pa rnamasna tshogs rab tu sbyor ba dang / reg pa la chags pa
309b7(mdo): yongasu spangs pa rnams/ myi gtsang ba'i yan lag sum bcu rtsa drug rab tu sbyor ba dang / snying rje myed pa rnams/ byams par rab tu sbyor ba dang / gtong ba myed pa rnams// sbyin pa chen po lnga rab tu sbyor ba dang
309b8(mdo): gti mug gis bsgribs pa rnams/ kha ton rab tu sbyor ba dang / 'dul ba rnams/ 'phags pa'i rigs la dga' bar rab tu sbyor ba dang / sdug bsngal 'dul ba rnams/ rim gyis sems/ gcig tu 'dus pa
310a1(mdo): rab tu sbyor ba dang / 'du byed thams cad kyis mngon par spros pa rnams/ rims kyis sems gcig tu 'dus par rab tu sbyor ba dang / 'du byed thams cad kyis mngon par spros pa rnams/ 
310a2(mdo): sgyu ma lta bur rab tu spyod pa dang / nyon mongs pa de dag zhi bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang sems can lha dang myi skye ba bsam pa rnams la/ dge ba bcu'i las yongs dag pa sbyor bar byed do// nyan thos kyi theg
310a3(mdo): par bsam pa rnams la/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang ldan par yid la byed pa sbyor bar byed do// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par bsam pa rnams la// rtend cing 'brel dra bar smra ba yid la byed pa sbyor bar byed// 
310a4(mdo): sems can theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la pha rol tu phyind pa drug sbyong bar byed do// thog mar sems pa skyed pa rnams la/ lhag pa'i bsam pa phyir myi ldog pa'i sems
310a5(mdo): bar byed do// sems can pha rol tu phyind pa drug spyod pa la yang / dag par zhugs pa rnams/ snying rje chen po la yongs su myi skyo ba sems can yongasu smyin par bya ba'i phyir sbyor bar byed do// byang
310a6(mdo): chub sems dpa' phyir myi ldog par rnams la/ de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gi tshogs yong su dag pa sbyor bar byed do// ji lta bur sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gzhan du rnam par spyod cing / sa
310a7(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gaphyogs yong su dag pa spyong bar byed pa de da// de'i 'og tu mngon par zhes pas rnam par ba pa'o// ji lta bur sangs rgyas kyi ning yongasu dag pa gzhan du rnam par byed cing / sangs rgya
310a8(mdo): zhing gang gi tshogs mngon par 'dod pa de dag/ de'i 'og tu mngon par shes pa rnam par rtse ba de la/ skye bar 'dod pa'i ji snyed pa der skye'o// yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs par rnam par myi spyod cing / sangs rgyas kyi
310b1(mdo): zhing gi yon tan gi tshogs yongs su dag par 'dod par yang myed pa der skye bar 'dod pa de ji tsam pa der skye'o// yang nyon mongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar myi 'dod pa des/ bla na myed pa yang dag par
310b2(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du/ rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/ sems can lta ba dog pa rnyed pa dang / mtshams myed par byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la
310b3(mdo): sku rad pa 'debs pa dang rtswa myi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig du 'grogs pa rnams rgyun gcod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par/ sems can bsam pa yongs su dag pa rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed cing
310b4(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed/ grangs myed pa da rnams la/ 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa rnams la/ chos snond par byed do// yang byang chub sems dpa' rnyog pa lnga'i
310b5(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir/ rnam pa de lta bu'i rgyal byed kyang // byang chub sems dpa' la la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa/ pa/ rnam kha de lta bu'i phal byed myi nus so// yang rnyog pa lnga
310b6(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems can cig gi 'dod chags kyi 'gyod pa stong phrag nyi shu pa gcig bar du shes pa de ltar/ thabs rab tu sbyor ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis/ 'dod chags
310b7(mdo): rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / gar+b+ha te sems can gcig gi zhe sdang spyod pa stong phrag nyi shu pa gcig bar du shes pa de ltar thabs la mkhas pa stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis/ zhe sdang zhi bar byed pa dang / gal te byang chub
310b8(mdo): sems dpa' sems can gcig gi bskald pa dang / bcas par pyod pa stong phrag nyi shu pha gcig rab tu shes pa de bzhin du/ thabs la mkhas pa stong phrag nyi shu dang gcig gis/ zhi bar byed pa dang / byang chub ses dpa' gdas
311a1(mdo): sems can gcig gi skal pa dang bcas par pyod pa nyon mongs pa kun nas ldang ba rab tu zhi bar nus pa de ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' phal chen po byed do// gang sems can gcig gi nyon mongs pa'i rgyu
311a2(mdo): gyod pa stong phrag brgyad cu rang bzhi rab tu shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de yang / sems can gcig gi dgos par brtson 'grus brtan pa la mos shing / pha rol gnon pa na/ thabs la mkhas pa stong phrag brgyad cu
311a3(mdo): rtsa bzhi rab tu sbyor ba/ pha rol gnon pas gzir ba rnams/ byang chub sems dpa' phal chen po 'di la ltos shig/ ji ltar sems can cig gi nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar nus pa de ltar/ gnyis dang / gsum dang / 
311a4(mdo): bzhinas/ gling gcig gi sems can yongs su tshang ba re re'i dgos pas/ nyon mongs pa pyod pa'i mtshan nyid stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rab tu zhi bar byed cing // gling gnyis pa dang / gleng bzhi pa dang / phyogs bcu'i
311a5(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhi cu bo gang ga'i bye ma snyed du/ sems can thams/ cad nyon mongs pa thams cas songs su pa dbar byed pa des// byang chub sems dpa' drug pa'i lha'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/ 
311a6(mdo): bzod pa thob pa zhes bya'o// ji ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' se mas can re re'i nyon mongs po la dab tha khyod pa stong phrag brgyad nu pa bzhir 'jug pa de ltar/ sems can gcig gi mos pa stong phrag
311a7(mdo): brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rab tu shes shing // bri ba'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang / 'phel ba'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang / gnas pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang / rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes
311a8(mdo): pa pa dang / myi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang / sdug sngal gyi mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang / bdag byed pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang / sems can gi mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang / 
311a9(mdo): stong pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang / dben pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa nas/ de bzhin du mtshan nyid myed pa'i bar du rab tu shes pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang / 
311b1(mdo): sems re re'i ma chags pa'i mtshan nyid sna tshogs rgyad cu phra bzhi rab tu shes pas/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid mngon par shes par 'gyur ro// bsam pa'i tshul shes pas
311b2(mdo): sems can nyon mongs pa dam pos bcings pa las yongs su tha dad par nus so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/ sems can yongs su smyin par byed do// 
311b3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems can myi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig cig tu 'grogs pa rnams la/ snying rje chen po rgyun myi gcod cing // yongasasu smyind par bya ba'i phyir/ 'dus pa 'di yang / byang chub sems dpe
311b4(mdo): phal chen po'o// yang byang chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'grel da pas/ 'di bstan pa ston pa na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi de zhing tshad myed par/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par lhags pa
311b5(mdo): dang / byang chub sems dpa' chu 'og pa'ag sum bcu'i bye ma snyed/ myi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par 'gyurd to// byang chub sems dpa' chu bo gang 'ga'i bye ma snyed kyi dga' byed pa zhes bya ba
311b6(mdo): ting nge 'dzind thob pa de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas// mgrin gcig tu 'di ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// chu bo gang rnams blta dka' chu bos
311b7(mdo): khyer// nga rgyal mngon pa'i nga rgyal yul la shes// nyon mongs pa rgya mtsho las ni mthard phyind myed// lam gyis bdag cag kyang ni rnam par gnas// sems can gang rnams nyon mongs gtums pa gdungs// nyon
311b8(mdo): mongs sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rtag rnam myos// ngan song 'gro ba rtag tu sdug bsngal bsogs// 'chad mkhan dam pa'i don gi theg pa stond// bdag cag nyon mongs sems can rnams dgongs pas// sangs rgyas
312a1(mdo): zhing der smon lam byed 'gyur ba// nyon mongs zhing du bdag cag spyad pa pyod// sems can nyon mongs dam bcings grol bar byed// gang dag 'dod chags zhe sdang nga rgyal dregs// gti mug la
312a2(mdo): stor sdig pa par myed pa// sdig pa thams cad las ni bdag cag zlog/ 'khor ba'i dkon pa 'jigs las rab tu sgrol// gang dmyal byol song yi dgas 'jig rte nad du/ rtag tu 'dod chags myed sdug bsngal
312a3(mdo): myong ba dag/ bdag cag sdug bsngal thams cad las grol byed// nyon mongs sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub pyod// yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus par khyab pa'i 'khor thams cad dang ldan pa des kyang / legs
312a4(mdo): so zhes bya ba byi nad te// skyes bu dam pa legs par spobs shig/ mchog tu rgya che ba'i brtson 'grus brtan pa la batshon pa/ @/ rol gnond pa/ sems can yongasu sbyin pa'i chos kyi sgo snyan pa
312a5(mdo): leg pa po yigs so// gang ma thog pa ka'i bye ma snyed kyi skyes dus pa 'dis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par/ chub kyi gyod pa bor te// rlog pa lnga'i sangs rgyab kyi zhing du myod pa
312a6(mdo): na/ myed pa byed pa dang / pa'i la 'os / pas nus pa das / nga/ na pa bdang/ zhes po sa su spyod/ 
312a7(mdo): par bya ba'i phyir/ snying rje chen po bskyed do// nyon mongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing phran med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du stod to// lus byed pa rung ba spong ba'i mtha' yod da to// tshigacas gis skyes bu de dag po mo'im
312a8(mdo): kya pa de dag la/ gang lnga dang / 'jig rtend du rabs pa'i mchod pa sa chog tu su me pa byed na/ de dag gi brtan pa'i brtson 'argyam pa med gnon pa 'di la martso mas samapa te// rjes pa cheg zhes dam
312b1(mdo): pa de ltar/ dgos pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de nas de nyid kyi tshe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pas legs po bya ba byind te/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu
312b2(mdo): ji ltar smra ba'i tshig tsam gyis rtsom par 'gyur ba de de bzhin te// de dag la gang lha dang 'jig rtend du bcas pas/ mchod pa mchog tu rgya chen po byed na/ de na shes pas nyon mongs pa dang / rnyog pa lha'i sangs rgyas
312b3(mdo): kyi zhing du rnam pa de lta bu'i phal chen po bya bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ mtshams myed par byed pa nas/ myi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig 'grogs pa'i bar du/ rnam pa de lta bu'i brtan pa'i brtson 'grus pha rol gnon/ 
312b4(mdo): pa'i thabs la mkhas pas yongs su smyind par 'gyur ro// ji ltarabyang chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'grel pas/ da ltar se can yongasu spyond par/ shes rab kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i chos kyi sgo
312b5(mdo): bstand nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di brjod ma zag tude nas de nyid kyi tshe na/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sa chen po 'di lan drug tu g.yos so// lha rdzas kyi me tog
312b6(mdo): gi char yang rab tu bab bo// lha rdzas kyi rol mo yang rab tu dkrold to// lha rdzas kyi dri dang / myi'i 'khor thams cad dang ldan pa de dag kyi / byang chub sems dpal dgra rnam par 'grel pa dang / byang chub sos
312b7(mdo): dpal na bo gang ka'i bye ma byed po de dag la mchog tu bya me ba'i mchod pa'i las kyi byir brtson no// ji snyed ye zhes mdzod 'di bstan phug sol ye zhes phyir yang ston pa 'di nyid po dang // mkhyen pa khyod kyis gang gi blor
313a1(mdo): ston// ji ltar byang chub gyod phyir shes 'byung ba// rgyal ba ye shes rgya mtsho 'di 'jug/ ji ltar nam mkha' dri myed stong pa'i chos// bdag dang mthun pa'i gtam dag bstand tu gso lang// ston/ 
313a2(mdo): mkhan myi'i gtso bo 'di la mchog/ mchog tu yid du 'ong zhing mdzes pa stond// stong pa nyid kyis nyon mongs dgra zil mnan// rtag pa dang ni chad pa thal bar byas// dpa' dang rtul pod gang zag dam pa mchog
313a3(mdo): sred pa zhi ba gang zag dab pa mchog/ sred pa zhi zhing zhi gnas rab tu stond// rgyal ba rab tu zhi ba 'di la 'jug/ rgyal ba stong pa nyid zhi bar bstand gsol// rgyal ba stong pa nyid 'di la yang 'jug/ 
313a4(mdo): kha dog dung dang khu ba 'dra ba yi// zhi ba mdzes pa'i stong pa nyid stan/ gsol// nyan thos kyis ni 'di la chogapa rnams spangs/ ston gyi nyi ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ldang // gtso bo dag gis shen/ 
313a5(mdo): tu gsal zhing mdzes// 'dir ni lam zhi stong pa nyid bstan gas la// brgya byind tshangs pa skad ltar sgra dbyangs snyan// sre mas can dma' la thugs btso thugs rje yis// thub pa 'ang
313a6(mdo): ni stong pa nyid la 'jug/ mya ngan dang bral 'gro ba 'di la tshim// dma' ba pyod pa rtag tu byind brlabs pa// shes rab mang gzigs stong pa nyid zhi gsungs/ sdig pa gcom zhing nyes 'chog dri ma myed// 'di
313a7(mdo): ni 'gro la theg pa ngan pa spangs// dge ba'i mtshan nyid spyod yul rab nyams pas// kye ma'o da ltar stong pa nyid zhi gsungs// rma bya ngang pa ne co skye ka dbyangs// nyams pa'i phyogs cha can gyi dgra rnams 'jig
313a8(mdo): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas// lha rdzas kyi me tog/ ud pa la dang / pad po dang / ku mu dadang / bud da rigs mngon par gtor to// 'phags pa yang dag par khyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'
313b1(mdo): mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / le'u bzhi pa'o// 
313b2(mdo): de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mtha' yas pa'i tshogs kyi rgyal pos// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du khang pa brtsegs pa na myi bzhugs pa de tsam gyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyi don kyi slad du/ lha
313b3(mdo): rdzas kyi bai dUr+ya sngon po'i sgras mngon par sprul te// spras de dag gi ngos gnyis la/ bram ze'i byis pa tshe lo sum bcu pa lta bu/ tshangs dbyangs dang ldan pa/ gser gyi dbyig dang gdugs 'dzind pa/ tshangs pa'i spyod
313b4(mdo): lam dang ldan pa/ stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi mngon par sprul to// de nas bram ze'i byis pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar da de/ phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das
313b5(mdo): la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// khyod ni rab nyon mongs la sngon thugs bskyed// nyon mongs theg la byangachub phan pa rgyu// nyon mongs zhing phyir rgyal ba bsnyen kyang bkur
313b6(mdo): nyon mongs thabs mdzad rgyal ba 'dir gshegs gsol// nyon mongs pyod pa thams cad khyed kyis spangs// sems can nyon mongs la ni rtag tu gnyen// khyed ni nyon mongs zhi las las 'gro ba zlog/ nyon mongs// 
313b7(mdo): sho sad pa'i rgyus ni rtag tu mos// nyon mongs ma rungs khyed kyis rab tu zhi// bdag gi blos ni nyon mongs dri ba bcad// 'gro ba rtag tu nyon mongs chu las sgrol// nyon mongs sun 'byin rgyal ba 'dir gshegs gsol
313b8(mdo): nyon mongs zhing du byang chub dam pa reg/ ye shes smon 'chang 'gro ba shes nyams pa'i// sems can thams cad la ni mtha'i snyan pas/ nyon mongs ldan spongs zhi phyir 'dir gshegs gsol// ye zhes 'od gzer gyib ni
314a1(mdo): ni rnam par nga ston da khyod thugs brtse bas 'gro ba ye shes khyab// ye shes kyi so mi 'grol myig ldan pas// rgyal ba ye shes nyi ma 'dir gshegs gsol// mkhyend pas lha dang myi mang tha rad par mdzad// khyed kyi
314a2(mdo): ye shes srog dang gar zag myed// thub pa ye shes dpa' bo 'di la 'jug/ nyon mongs pa la sbyin mdzod dran pa gsungs// nyi ma zla ba mchog tu mdzes pa'i spyan// rgyal ba sems can thal mo sbyar la gsungs// thub pa
314a3(mdo): byang chub mchog phyir bstand tu gsol // 'phags pa thub pa 'di la 'jug pa gsungs// rgyal ba byang chub rgyu can mdzes gzigs pa// phyogs bzhi 'dir ni yang dag lhags mang la// stong pa nyid dang bzod khyod shes rgyu dang
314a4(mdo): gsungs// rgyal ba dpa' gtong 'di la shind tu 'dug/ bram ze'i byi das pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan 'di smras ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba byind te/ de nas dran srong
314a5(mdo): thub pa ga dan de las bzhengs pa dang // de nyid kyi tsha na/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chen po 'di lan drug du g.yos so// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / myi 'am ce dang
314a6(mdo): lho phye chen po du mas kyang myi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus par lha rdzas kyi me tog gi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi a ka ru dang / ta ga ra dang / dus dang / 'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi char mngon par phab bo// lha rdzas kyi gon
314a7(mdo): dang / rgyan dang / yid bzhin gi gos dang / nor bu dang / mu tig gi se mo do dang / rin po che'i char mngon par phab bo// lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung ba mngon par dgrol to// dbyangs kyis lhung lhung ldegs kyi sgra phyung nas/ 'di
314a8(mdo): nad ces gas pad to// bdag can sngon ma bstad pa'i chomo ma nyand par mgyi'o// bdud kyi yul las yang dag pa bzhin tu 'da' bar bgyi'o// nyan mongs pa'i yul gnam par bgyi'o// ye shes kyi yul 'ong du chud pa/ 
314b1(mdo): bgyi'o// zab mo stong pa nyid lam khong du chud par bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das khang pa brtsegs pa de dag la 'dzegs te// seng ge'i khri bshams pa de nyid la bzhugs nas/ myi mjed kyi sangs rgyas
314b2(mdo): kyi zhing thams cad ldan pa/ sa dang nam mkha' la khyab pa'i 'khor kun cang mye smra bar gyur da nas/ thal mo sbyar te sems rtse gcig tu drang srong thub pa la lta bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyab kyi zhing thos
314b3(mdo): cad dang ldan pa ma lus par sa dang nam mkha'as khyab pa'i 'khor la rnam par gzigs nas// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// sems can ji snyed 'dir ni kun lhags pa// byang chub 'dod rnams yongs su chos
314b4(mdo): tshol na// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa rab bstand kyis/ de dag zas cad rtse gcig sems su nyon// sems can la la gti mu sred pas/ de bsgribs// phung po dag la 'ang lta ba rnams myi spong // gang dag da dung
314b5(mdo): byang chub mchog gyod bsngon// yang yang 'di la yon tan chung zad gyid/ dbang drug stong pa gyi lta ste// mtshan ma myed pa'i 'dzind pa bdag sa zung / byang chub phyir ni chung zad myod ba rtson khyod kyi// shes rab 'on
314b6(mdo): tan thams cad spyod pa byed// ji ltar bye 'dod khyis kyi nang // bcal pas kyang ni mye dag rnyed pa byur// de ltar sems can la la byang chub 'di skyong ma bsgoms par shes rab thob pa byed// de bas gang dag byang chub sdug 'dzis
314b7(mdo): lung po khams dang skye mched macan pa dag/ rtsilas sbyin rgyas bu thams cad ltos// 'di ni byang chub dam pa mchog kyilam// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' bzang byungs pan
314b8(mdo): yad pa// rig kyi buM yang dag par byed pa'i drul nas sa 'di dig gis 'dul pa'i badzid pa 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa 'tshun kyi yum mam cad mamasan bzhin tu 'das te/ ngami rnam pa nga/ 
315a1(mdo): bdag gir bya ba thams cad kyi sred pa'i bka la nyal ba dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / ma rig par lta ba thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro// 'jig rtend kyi khams thams cad 'dres pa myed pa dang / sems kyi go cha dang
315a2(mdo): ma sems sgyu ma lta bu dang / tshor ba du ba dang rdul dang nam mkha' dang / sprin lta bur rab tu shes so// mtshan ma dang / mtshan nyid thams cad nam mkha' spros pa lta bur rab tu shes so// dge ba'i pha ba thams cad las 'das par 'gyur ro
315a3(mdo): las yongasu zad cing / sems can nye bar 'tsho bar yang 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / ma skyes pa'i gnyen lta bur 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la/ sgrib pa myed par stond par 'gyur ro// pha rold kyi rdos
315a4(mdo): ba thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs par thul ba myed par 'gyur ro// sang ngas rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rgyas pa seng ge lta bu dang / rgya mtsho chen po lta bu chos chen po'i char gyi chu bo rab tu gtor dang / 'khrul pa myed pa'i
315a5(mdo): rnam par shes pa dang / chags pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa dang / bstod pa dang / rab tu bsngags par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu bzod pa 'odi bsgoms pa nas/ lus dbang du btsugs pa'i bar du/ 'di las
315a6(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis myi khyab par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di la bzod pa 'di rnam gnyis te/ yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul gyi bzod pa dang / nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod par 'gyur ro// rigs
315a7(mdo): kyi bu de la yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa gang zhe na/ ri rnam pa lnga ste/ rigs kyi bu yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul gyis/ bzod pa rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
315a8(mdo): dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la gzugs kyi phung po gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu rnam pa brgyad te/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin yid la byed pa brtags pa'i bzod pa bsgom par bya'o// rig
315b1(mdo): kyi bu brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs shes bya ba ni// 'byung ba chen po bzhi'o// gzugs shes bya ba ni nad do// 'dod chags shes bya ba ni/ rnam par 'jig pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid do// gang rnam par 'jig pa'i rang ban
315b2(mdo): de ni myi rtag pa'o// de'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid yongasasu chad pa'o// phyi dang nang gi rang bzhin za ma'i nyon mongs pa'i rgyud bcad pa'o// nam mkha' ji ltar thams cad dang ldan pa'i de bzhin du/ myi rtag pa dang
315b3(mdo): sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag myed pa dang / stong pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bzod pa sgom par byed do// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin pa nye bar 'tsho ba ni bzod pa blta bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzha/ 
315b4(mdo): yang gzugs de yang 'byung ba chen po bzhi ste// rigs kyi bu 'byung / ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag nang gi 'am/ phyi rol kyi 'am/ che/ ba 'am/ phra ba 'am/ dma' ba 'am/ bde ba 'am/ gal te
315b5(mdo): ring ba 'am/ gal te nye ba de dag thams cad myi 'gro// rnam par myi 'gro// myi skye myi 'byung / bdag myed/ bdag gi myed par brtag par bya'o// zad pa tshul dang / zhi gnas kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshul dang / rtog
315b6(mdo): pa myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i tshul dang / 'byung ba myed pa'i mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis brtag par bya'o// ji ltar rdul shin tu phra ba kun 'byung ba dang / lus kun 'byung ba'i phyir/ nang gi sa'i khams sra bar brtag par
315b7(mdo): bya'o// shin tu phra ba snyed rdul cig po de la ltar mthong phra mos brtag/ rdul phra mo gcig po de la ji ltar mtshan nyid myed pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi spyod lam du gyurd pa rab tu shes// bdag myed pa'i dang / rnam
315b8(mdo): pa dang / bral bar rab tu shes/ dngos po myed pa dang / tshig gi lam dang bral ba dang / dmyigs pa dang bral ba dang / sgra dbyangs thams cad dang bral bar rab tu zhes/ bdag byed pa dang bral ba dang / bdud kyi
316a1(mdo): mtshan nyid rab tu shes/ yi ge myed pa dang / rgyu dang rkyend dang bral bar rab tu shes/ dngos po myed pa rgyu dang rkye nad dang bral bar rab tu shes/ mtshan ma myed pa las rdul shi nad tu phra ba rab tu shes/ ji ltar
316a2(mdo): 'du byed thams cad rab tu zhi ba la/ rnam pa brgyad po de dag gis/ rdul shi nad tu phra mo gcig tu brtag go// de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / de bzhin du gsum pa dang / nang gi lus thams cad kyi bar du gcig la
316a3(mdo): yang so sor rnam par brgyad po 'di dag gis/ rdul shin tu phra mo gcig tu brtag go/ nad gi lus ji lta ba de bzhin du/ phyi rol tu lus kyi sa'i khams kyang rnam pa brgyad po 'di dag gis/ so sor rdul shi nad tu
316a4(mdo): phra bar brtag go// mtshan nyid myed pas na/ mtshan ma myed/ pa'i bar du sa'i khams thams cad nang gi 'am/ phyi rold gyi 'am/ che ba 'am/ phra ba 'am/ dam pa 'am/ bde ba'am
316a5(mdo): kang ring ba 'am/ gang nye ba de dag thams cad zad pa'i chos su ya bdag par rjes su mthong ngo // gang zad pa 'di ni myi rtag pa'o// gang myi rtag pa 'od gang sdug bsngal ba'o// gang myi 'byung ba de bdag
316a6(mdo): myed pa'o// gang 'du byed thams cad kyi tshig gi lam dang bral ba de yang stong pa ste/ ji ltar phyi dang nang gi sa'i khams ji lta ba bzhin du stong par rab tu shes pa de ltar/ rab 'bring dang tha ma'i nyon mongs pa nye bar 'gyur/ 
316a7(mdo): nam mkha' ji ltar 'du shes myed cing tshor ba myed pa de bzhin du/ sa'i khams kyang 'du shes myed cing tshor ba myed pa dang / myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag myed pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i
316a8(mdo): bzod pa bsgom par byed pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad yongs su sbyind pa nye bapa 'tsho ba'i bzod pa blta bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang lus 'di la gsher ba'i mtshan nyid ni chu ste
316b1(mdo): chu'i mtshan nyid phran tshegs su yang / skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam du/ nang gi lus chu'i khams thams cad so sor thigs pa tsam du lhag mthong gi tshul gyis brtag go// che ba 'am/ phra ba 'am/ dma' ba 'am/ bde ba'i
316b2(mdo): mtshan nyid myed pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa nas/ mtshan ma myed pa'i bar du de dag thigs pa tsam du 'du byed thams cad nye bar zhi bar rab tu shes pa ji lta bur theg pa gcig la/ rnam
316b3(mdo): ba brgyad po de dag gis ji ltar ba bzhin du brtag go// de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / de bzhin du gsum pa nas/ nang gi lus kyi sa'i khams thams cad rnam pa brgyad po de dag gis so so ra la thigs pa pra ba ji lta ba bzhin du
316b4(mdo): brtag go// mtshan nyid myed pa nas/ mtshan ma myed pa'i bar du/ na dang gi tshu'i khams ji lta ba de bzhin du/ phyi rold kyi chu'i khams che ba 'am/ phra ba 'am/ dma' ba 'am/ bde ba 'am/ gang rig pa 'am/ kang nye
316b5(mdo): ba de dag thams cad zad pa'i chos su yang dag par rje su mthong ngo // gang zad pa'i chos de'ang myi rtag pa'o// de'ang rtog pa myed pa'o// / gang rtog pa myed pa'ang sdug bsngal ba'o// gang 'byung ba myed pa de'ang
316b6(mdo): bdag myed pa'o// gang 'du byed thams cad kyi tshig gi lam dang bral ba de'ang stong pa ste ji ltar nang dang / phyi rol kyi chu'i khams ji lta ba bzhin du/ stong par shes pa de ltar rab 'bring dang / za a'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar 'gyur
316b7(mdo): nam mkha'i ji ltar gnas myed cing spros pa byed par de bzhin du/ phyi rlung gi chu'i khams kyang spros pa myed cing gnas myed pa dang / bye rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa bdag myed pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bzod pa
316b8(mdo): bsgom pa 'di yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongasu smyin pa nye bapa 'tsho ba ste/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams ji ltar ba de bzhin du/ mye'i khams dang / rlung gi khams rgya chen pos bya'o// rigs kyi bu
317a1(mdo): gnan yang 'byung ba chen po ba'i las/ gzugs ni the tsom gyi rgyal bu ste/ nang zhe 'am/ phyi rol gyi 'am/ rje ba 'am/ phra ba 'am/ dma' ba 'am/ bde ba 'am/ pa rib ba 'am/ 
317a2(mdo): ba de dag thams cad dngos po myed cing / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / drug gi skye mched dbang du gyur pa/ sa'i khams nas rnam par shes pa'i rgyu'i bar du'o// gang skad cig du 'byung ba zad pa'i chos nyid dbang po la
317a3(mdo): zag pa dang / 'gog pa'i 'byung ba zad pa nyid du brtag go// dngos po myed pa dang / bdag myed par dmyigs pa tshig gi lam myed pa dang / rnam par myi 'gro ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / bdag byed pa
317a4(mdo): bdag gi skyed pa/ zhi gnas kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshul dang / rtog pa myed/ cing sngon pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul dang / lcag mthong gi tshul gyis brtag par bya'o// mtshan nyid myed pa dang / nyon
317a5(mdo): mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / rnam pa dang bral ba dang / bad ga myed pa dang / yid kyi 'du byed dang bral ba dang / yi ge myed pa dang / rgyu dang rkyend dang bral bar rab tu shes so// dngos po myed pa
317a6(mdo): shin tu skad cig ma dang bral bar rab tu shes so// 'du byed thams cad mtshan ma myed pa dang / yul rgyun chad byed par rab tu shes so// 'du byed thams cad gnas myed cing / nye ba'i zhi bar rab tu shes so// rnam pa 'ang
317a7(mdo): dag gis gzugs dngos po skyed pa drug pa'i phung po ltar brtag go// mtshan nyid byed pa nas/ mtshan nyid byed pa'i bar du/ de dag thams cad zad pa'i chos su yang dag par rje su mthong ngo // gang zag pa'i chos de skye
317a8(mdo): rtag pa'o// gang skye rtag pa de ni rtog pa myed pa'o// gang rtog pa myed pa de'ang sdug bsngal ba'o// gang 'byung ba myed pa byed de/ de'ang bdag myed pa'o// gang 'du byed thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba myed pa de 'ang stong 'o// 
317b1(mdo): gang nang dang phyi ros kyi gzugs de dag slu ba'i phung po lta bu dngos po myed cing / gzugs brnyan lta bur spong pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu zhes pa de ltar/ rab 'bring dang / tha ma'i nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi bar 'gyuraro
317b2(mdo): nam mkha' ji ltar dmyigs pa myed cing 'dus byas myed pa de/ de bzhin du gzugs kyang lbu ba lta bur 'du shes myed cing / 'gyur ba myed pa dang / tshor ba myed pa dang / myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag
317b3(mdo): myed pa dang / stong pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bzod pa sgom par byed pa 'di dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems can yongs su smyin pa nye bar 'tsho ba'i bzod pa lta bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gzugs ni
317b4(mdo): phyi rolod dang / rang gi nas gang nye ba'i bar du/ rang bzhin gyis ka dazugs brnyan lta bu'i rgyu 'dra ba mngon par myi 'gyur ba dang / sgyus da lta bu dang / yum mngon pa'i mtshan nyid du brtag go// gzugs
317b5(mdo): ni ci la'ang chags pa myed/ bsnyems pa'ang myed/ blang ba dang der ba myed par shes te/ gzugs ni gnyi su myi byed do// chos thos cad chos kyi dbyings la yang dag par gzhol bar shes pa pas
317b6(mdo): 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i gzugs thams cad chung zad kyang dbyer myed do// tshig gi lam thams cad gnas myed par yang dag par shes so// gzugs ni gzhan song ba 'ang myed cing / yul myed pa dang / blo bur gyi sdug
317b7(mdo): bsngal dang / rgyun bcad pa dang / rgyun ma bcad pa'i bdud pa gnyis dang bral ba dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / gnas myed par brtag go// gzugs thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ni/ lbu ba'i phung po lta bur dmyigs su
317b8(mdo): myed pa dang / kun 'byung ba myed pa dang / shi nad tu rang bzhin myed par brtag go// 'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams ni/ rnam par dag pa/ rnam par myi rtog pa/ myi 'byung ba mngon par myi sgrub pa/ chos thams cad spros pa'i
318a1(mdo): rgyun bcad pa thams cad du zhugs pa myed par brtag go// 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i gzugs kyi phung po'i mtshan nyid ni/ snyems pa myed pa dang / gtong ba myed pa dang / mun pa myed pa dang / snang ba myed pa dang / 
318a2(mdo): yid la myi byed pa dang / gnyis su myed pa dang / stsogs pa myed pa dang / spros pa byed pa dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dbyer myed pa dang / dngos po myed par brtag go// gzugs 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni/ shi nad tu rnam par myi rtog pa
318a3(mdo): dang / zad pa dang / lbu ba lta bur blta ba'o// rnam pa 'di dag gis/ gzugs dngos po myed pa gzugs brnyan lta bur brtag go// mtshan nyid myed pa nas/ mtshan ma myed pa'i bar du/ 'du byed thams cad zad pa'i chos
318a4(mdo): su yang dag par rje su mthong ngo // gang zad pa'i chos de myi rtag pa'o// gang myi rtag pa de rtag pa myed pa'o// gang rtag pa myed pa de sdug bsngal ba'o// gang 'byung ba myed pa de'ang bdag myed pa'o// gang 'du byed thams
318a5(mdo): cad kyi tshig gi lam dang bral ba de'ang stong pa ste ji ltar phyi dang nang gi gzu sa lbu ba 'dra ba stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du bAr tu shes pa de ltar rab 'bring dang / tha ma'i nyon mongs pa'ang nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// 
318a6(mdo): nam mkha' ji ltar zad pa myed cing gzugs myed pa dang / bstan tu byed pa de bzhin du/ zad pa myed cing mtshan nyid myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa dang / bstan tu myed pa dang / lbu ba lta bur myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 
318a7(mdo): bdag skyed pa dang / stong pa'i mtshan nyid la dmyig pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bzod pa sgos par byed pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems can yongasu sbyin pa nye bar 'grob blta'o// rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang gzugs 'byung ba
318a8(mdo): chen po bzhi'i mtshan nyid na pa gi nas/ nye ba'i bar tu gang smas pa de'i bar du gzugs kyis can nyid kyang byin yongs bu dang / grib ma lta bu dang / srubs bung gnas myed pa dang / nam mkhalas bu chag pa babyed pa dang / brjod
318b1(mdo): du myed pa dang / sogs pa myed pa nas/ khams gsum gyi 'khor ba bdag myed pa lta bu dang / dus gsum gyi mtshan nyid thob pa dang / dmyigs pa myed pa dang / yi ge myed pa dang / gnyis su myed pa'i mtha' dang / rtag pa'i
318b2(mdo): mtha' dang / kun tu gzung ba'i mtha' dang / zad pa myed par spyod pa'i mtha' dang / nyon mongs pa myed pa'i mtha' dang / yul myed pa'i mtha' dang / rab tu rgyu ba myed pa'i mtha' dang / smra ba myed pa'i mtha' dang / gzugs
318b3(mdo): brnyan lta bur gzugs de'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes so// 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams de nyid kyi gzugs kyi snang ba nam mkha' lta bur brtag go// myig yor gyi mtshan nyid nam mkha' lta bur dngos por dmyigs
318b4(mdo): pa myed pa ste/ nam mkha' ji ltar bur gzung du myed cing kun nas ldang ba mye dra pa dang / dngos po myed pa de ltar de bzhin du gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyang myig yor lta bu dang / tshu rol dang pha rol bral ba'i gnas
318b5(mdo): myed pa'o// gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ni mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dang / smra brnyan lta bu dang / lbu ba'i phung po lta bu dang / chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha'i khams kyi gzugs kyi ba sgra brnyan ni khams myed pa dang / 
318b6(mdo): tha dad pa myed pa dang / mtshungs pa myed pa dang / 'khrug pa myed pa'o// de ltar de bzhin du chos 'odi dag kyang nam mkha' lta bu'o// gzugs kyi snang ba de'ang gzung du myed pa dang / baphags pa myed pa dang / skye ba myed pa dang / 
318b7(mdo): 'byung ba myed pa dang / g.yo ba myed pa dang / 'gyur ba myed pa dang / 'chi 'pho myed pa dang / myi gnas pa dang / bdag dang gzhan gyi la myi len pa dang / yongs su myi rtog pa dang / chags pa myed pa dang / byas pa myed pa thams cad
318b8(mdo): gzugs kyi ba snang ba'o// de ltar de bzhin du 'du byed thams cad kyi lam las shinod tu 'das shing / phyag gi rnam par shes pa'i lam kun nas ldang ba/ slu ba'i phung po lta bu'i gzugs kyi snang ba myig gi rnam par shes pas
319a1(mdo): stong pa de yang / myig 'byung ba chen po'i bzhi'i rgyu'o// bdag myed pa'i phyir/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de dag stong pa ste/ ji ltar gong du bshad pa bzhin du/ bdag tu dmyigs pa 'ang myed do// myig gnyis ni dkun 'bru
319a2(mdo): ma/ tsam ste/ myig re re la yang chad myed pa'i rdulazhin tu phra ba'o// rdul zhi nang tu phra ba la'ang 'byung ba chen po bzhi sngogs so// 'byung ba chen po bzhi me me la'ang bdag tu kyi shes shing // sems can du gyi dmyigs ma/ de la rnam
319a3(mdo): shes pa'i gnas sam/ kun nas ldang ba 'ang lam du shes par lta ci spos/ rdul zhin tu phra ba de dang de dag la ji lta ba bzhin du/ byig 'byung ba chen po bsags pa dang / dkun 'bru cam du yongasu brtag go// yongs su bta
319a4(mdo): 'das/ de la byig gi rnam par shes pa'i gnas dpa ma ma yang byed do// des yang dag par yongs su brtags pas/ sems can gyig yod su brtags par 'gyur ro// gang myig gi rnam par shes pa spong 'ji lta
319a5(mdo): po bzhin du shes pa de dag 'dod chags dang bral bar dgra'o// ji ltar/ yang myig gi rnam par shes pa stong par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu zhes pa de bzhin du/ khams gsum gyi myig myig gi rnam par shes pas
319a6(mdo): po ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya'o// ji ltar yang myig gis gzugs kyi snang ba lta bu'i phung po/ lta bu ni/ phyi dang nang gi gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba nas/ nye ba'i bar du de dag thams cad lba ba'i phung po gzugs kyi snang ba
319a7(mdo): 'byung ba chen po nam mkha' la myi rtend par 'gyur ro// nam mkhal ji ltar dngos po myed cing mtshan nyid myed pa dang / mtshan nyid kyis stong pa ltar/ gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba lnga ba'i phung po lta bu dag thams cad kyang snang ba'o/ 
319a8(mdo): ji ltar gzugs gzhan gis nam mkha' stong pa ltar/ nang dang phyi'i lus kyi mtshan nyid lbu ba lta bur snang ba nas/ nye ba'i bar du de dag thams cad kyi mtshan nyid snang ba 'ang stong pa'o// ji ltar myig myig gi rnam par shes pas
319b1(mdo): stong pa de bzhin du/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ngo // 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams thams cad kyi myig kyang myig dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pas stong pa ji la
319b2(mdo): ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'byung ba chen po lta bu myi rtog rnam par myi rtog cing / dmyigs par yang dag
319b3(mdo): par rjes su myi mthong ngo // sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed can dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa dang / tshor ba dang / tshor bar 'dug pa dang / skye ba dang / kun tu skye ba
319b4(mdo): dang / kun nas ldang bar yang yang dag par myi mthong ngo // gzugs kyi ma tshan nyid snang po'i mtshan ma las dmyigs pa 'ang myed do// sems kyi bzung ba dang / btang ba dang / mngon sum du bya ba dang / khong du chud pa dang
319b5(mdo): gnas dang / kun nas ldang ba'i gnas dang / yid la byed pa'i gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba/ dmyigs pa myed pa/ stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gzugs kyi phung po dang / nam
319b6(mdo): mkha' dang / sems kyi rnam par shes pa tha dad par rab tu myi shes so// khams gsum thams cad stong pa nyid stong par rab tu shes/ gang phyi rol dang / nang gi nas nye bar rab tu gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba thams cad lnga
319b7(mdo): ba'i phung po lta bur stong pa nyid dang zad pa'i tshul dang zhi gnas la 'tshe ba myed pa'i tshul dang / rtog pa skyed pa'i tshul dang / myi skye ba dang myi 'gog pa dang / myi 'byung ba myed pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i rdul gyis rtog go// nam ma 'an
319b8(mdo): dang bral zhing / gnas skyed pa dang / tshig gi las la bral bar rab tu shes so// nang dang / phyi rol gyi 'du byed nas nye ba'i bar du gzugs kyi mtshan nyid thams cad 'jig pa'i chos dang / dngom po'i rgyun 'chad pa stong pa dang / 
320a1(mdo): 'jug pa rgyun 'chad pa ji lta ba bzhin du rag tu shes so// gang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid thams cad zad pa'i chos de 'ang myi rtag pa'o// gang zag myed pa de'ang sdug bsngal ba'o// gang 'byung ba myed pa de'ang bdag
320a2(mdo): myed pa'o// gang 'du byed thams cad kyi tshig gi mtshan nyid kyi lam dang bral ba de'ang stong pa ste// gang phyi dang nang gi nas/ nye ba'i bar du gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rab tu shes pa de ltar
320a3(mdo): rab 'brang dang / tha ma'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni mongs par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid rgyun cod pa myed pa'i bzod pa'o// nam mkha' ji ltar rlung myed pa de bzhin du// bka la nyal ba dang bral ba'i bzod pa'o// 
320a4(mdo): nam mkha' ji ltar 'gyur ba myed pa bzhin du/ gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba myed pa'i bzod pa'o// nam mkha' ji ltar brtses pa myed cing / gnas pa myed pa de bzhin du/ sems dang rnam par rtog pa dang
320a5(mdo): rnam par dpyod pas bcas pa myed cing gnod pa'i bzod pa'o// nam mkha' ji ltar bag la nyal thams cad dang bral ba de bzhin du/ ga ki lam thams cad bag la nyal dang bral ba'i bzod pa'o// nam
320a6(mdo): mkha' ji ltar ma skyes/ ma byung ba de bzhin du/ mtshan nyid thams cad snang ba ma skyes ma byung ba'i bzod pa bsgrubs pa'o// nam 'a' ji ltar smos pa myed pa de bzhin du/ khams gsum kyi bag la nyal ba thams cad spros
320a7(mdo): bskyed pa'i bzod pa'o// nam mkha' ji ltar khams gsum pa rtogs pa de bzhin du/ gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba khams gsum par gtogs pa yang myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag byed
320a8(mdo): pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bzod pa bsgom par byed pa 'di yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems can nye bar 'tsho ba'i bar du blta bar bya'o// / yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mngon
320b1(mdo): gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdol// le'u ste lnga pa'o// / rigs kyi bu gzhan ya
320b2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba'i phung po yang tshul bzhin du brtag par bya'o// de la tshor ba'i phung po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshor ba'i tshogs rnam drug ste/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba dang / rna ba
320b3(mdo): dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba ste/ 'di dag ni tshor ba'i phung po zhes bya'o// tshor ba'i phung po de la/ tshor ba rnam gsum du shes par 'gyur te// ka ru
320b4(mdo): gang zhe na/ bde bar tshor ba dang / sdug bsngal bar tshor ba dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal du'ang myi shes par tshor ba ste// 'di dag nas gsum ni tshor ba'i phung po zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu/ de la bya
320b5(mdo): chub sems dpa' rnam pa brgyad po de dag gis/ tshor ba'i phung po chu la bzhin du brtag par bya'o// de la brgyad gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba gsum ste// 'dod chag pa dang / zhe sdang
320b6(mdo): dang / gti mug ces bya'o// nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba gsum po 'di dag gis/ sems can ston spongs pa rnams/ 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zag pa zad pa dang bcas par myi 'gyur ro// nyon mongs po'i rtsa ba gsum po
320b7(mdo): 'di dag/ tshor ba nam gsum la zhugs pa de la/ nyon mongs pa rnam par tha dad par 'gyur ro// de la tshor ba'i tshogs drug gis/ tshor ba nam gsum tshul bzhin du brtag par bya'o// tshor ba rnam gsum gyis nyon mongs
320b8(mdo): pa'i sa la 'byung ba dang / sa khyim pa dang / zad pa'i la 'anus pa'i tshul bzhin du brtag par bya'o// de myig gis gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba dpa' ba 'am/ bde ba 'am/ che ba 'am/ gang nye ba 'am/ gang ri
321a1(mdo): mthong ba de la tshor ba 'byung ngo // gang gzugs bde ba 'am/ che ba 'am/ phra ba 'am/ gang ring ba 'am/ nye bar mthong ba de la tshor ba sred pa'i gnas chu'i chu bur lta bu dang / mngon par 'ga' ba 'byung ba 'gyur
321a2(mdo): ba de la yang tshul bzhin du brtag par bya'o// ji ltar yang myig rmis stong pa 'am/ ji ltar gang du bshad pa'i bar du/ de glo bur dang / lus ma yin pa dang / gnas myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa dang / bstand tu myed pa dang
321a3(mdo): dngos po myed pa dang / yi ge myed pa tshor ba'i chu'i chu bur lta bu 'byung ngo // 'dod chags kyis kun tu bsgribs pa 'byung ngo // spong ba po 'am/ dgod pa 'am/ kund tu rgyu ba po 'am/ sogs par yang myi shes so// 'byung
321a4(mdo): pa'i mtshan nyid bdag po myed pa dang / 'gog pa la yang bdag po myed pa dang / mtshan nyid tshor ba la yang bdag po myed pa ste/ mtshan nye/ da myed pa'i chos 'di thams cad la yang / srog myed pa dang / srog dang
321a5(mdo): bral ba dang / sems can myed pa dang / sems can dang bral ba dang / gso ba myed pa dang / gso ba dang bral ba dang / gang zag myed pa dang / gang zag dang bral ba dang / 'dod pa myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa dang / 
321a6(mdo): mtshan nyid myed pa dang / bdag po myed pa dang / mtshan nyid 'jig pa dang / zad pa'i 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dngos po myed pa dang / dus gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha' la des de dag stong ngo // brjod du myed pa 'dod
321a7(mdo): chags kyi mtha' la de dag stong ngo // gnyi su myed pa'i 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo / rgyun chad pa myed pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo // rtag pa myed pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo // 
321a8(mdo): mtshan nyid myed pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo // smon pa myed pa 'dod chags mtha'i la des de dag stong ngo // tshor ba myed pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo // byed pa po rnam pa byed pa 'dod chags
321b1(mdo): kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo // shes pa myed pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo // len pa myed pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo // grol ba myed pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo // 
321b2(mdo): dngos po myed pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo // mun pa myed pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo // snang ba myed pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo // dus gsum gyi 'dod chags dmyigs pa/ 
321b3(mdo): rnam par sotshogs so// gnas sam byed du 'jug pa 'am// stsogs par bya ba yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // sems sgyu ma lta bu dang / dus gsum gyi 'dod chags kyi dngos po dang / dngos po myed pa yongs su chad par
321b4(mdo): yang rnam par myi rtag go// ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa ci la yang chags da pa myed do// thams cad la myi rtend pa dang / mye gnas pa dang / 'bros pa myed pa la gnyis su myed do// chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings
321b5(mdo): su yang dag par gzhol bar shes pas/ chung zad kyang 'bye bar myi s+yA da do// de chags pa'i gzugs la sems rtog pa dang / gzugadang tshor ba gnyis bral ba'o// gang chags pa'i gzugs tshor ba gang tshu'i
321b6(mdo): chu bur lta bu dang / kang 'byung ba zad pa 'jig pa brtag pa 'di dag ni/ 'du byed brtag pa myed pa'o// khams gsum las 'byung ba 'di yang / smon pa myed pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o// gang 'dod chags de la brjod du
321b7(mdo): myed pa'i tshor ba dang / dus gsum gyi bsgom pa thob 'di yang / 'du byed sdug bsngal rab tu 'byed pa'i ro'o// khams gsum gyi 'dod chags kyi kun gzhi tshor ba po myed pa dang / nyon mongs pa myed pa 'di yang / mtshan ma
321b8(mdo): myed pa rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo'o// gang 'dod chags kyi kun gzhi tshor ba blang ba myed cing do ba myed pa dang / tshig gi lam bdag myed pa dang / yi ger dmyigs pa myed pa dang / khams gsus kyi tshor ba yul myed cing
322a1(mdo): myig yor myed pa 'di yang / 'du byed rnam par zhi ba'i ro bdag myed pa stong pa nyid rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo'o// kar khams gsum thams cad la tshor ba dngos po myed pa dang / snang ba myed pa dang / yi ge myed pa/ 
322a2(mdo): ma dang / brjod du myed pa dang / zad pa myed pa dang / rtsi la yang chags pa myed pa deng // de ltar rab 'bring dang / tha ma'i nyon mongs pa rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' ji ltar sbyor ba myed pa de bzhin du/ 'dod chags kun nas ldang ba
322a3(mdo): dang / tshor ba sbyor ba myed cing brjod du myed pa dang / gnyis su myed pa dang / sems dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la khams gsum gyi tshor ba ci la yang chags myed pa dang myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag
322a4(mdo): byed pa dang / 'dod chags kyi kun kazhi tshor ba mtshan nyid dmyigs pa mye// da pa dang / mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bzod pa sgom par byed pa 'a da de yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems can nye bar 'tsho ba'i bzod pa
322a5(mdo): blta bar bya'o// de bzhin du rna ba la sgra/ sA la dri/ lce la mo// lus la reg/ yid la chos te// kang yid kyis 'das pa dang / ma'o/ sa pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'dod chags kyi kun gzhi kun nas ldang
322a6(mdo): ba yid du 'ong ba'i chos rnam par shes shing / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / reg pa mngon par dag pa rjes su dran pa de la yang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa byung ngo // tshor ba 'dod chags kun gzhis bskyed do// 
322a7(mdo): de la yang byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin du yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / tshor ba 'dod chags kyi kun gzhi tshul bzhin du tog ko// gzugs kyi dngos po rang bzhin gyis spyal lta bu sems dang / yid kyi rnam par shes
322a8(mdo): pa zhes bya ba 'di sems dang yid kyi smras brjod do// gang 'das pa'i sems de 'gags pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i ma byung ba dang / da ltar 'byung ba'i sems dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnas pa'ang spyod// / 
322b1(mdo): skad cig tu 'jig pa dang / myi rtag pa dang / lus myed pa dang / ngo bo nyid myed pa dang / yi ge myed pa dang / mtshan nyid myed pa dang / bya ba myed pa dang / 'gyur ba myed pa dang / gzung du myed pa dang / gtong ba myed pa dang / 
322b2(mdo): mun pa byed pa dang / snang ba myed pa dang / gcig pu ma yin pa dang / tha myi dad pa dang / gnyi su myed pa dang / gnyis lta bu myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa dang / snyems pa myed pa dang / spros pa byed pa dang / dul ba myed pa
322b3(mdo): dang / sel ba myed pa dang / kun gzhi thams cad dang bral ba dang / chu zla lta bu dang / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chu'i gnas mngon par dga' ba'i phyi rol kyi dngos po sems dang / yid kyi rnam par
322b4(mdo): shes pa rkyend ji ltar bu bzhin du/ snang bar 'gyur ro// nam ma'aji ltar nye ba dang zla ba la snang ba myed pa'i nam mkha' dang / snab dpa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid myed pa de// mying tsam gyis brjod pa de bzhin
322b5(mdo): du/ sems dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la 'dod chags kyi gnas snang ba dang / brjod du myed pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid kyang / myongam gyis brjod pa yang gnyis su myed pa dang / gnas pa myed pa dang
322b6(mdo): gzugs byed pa dang / bstand tu byed pa dang / ngo bo nyid myed pa dang / yi ge myed pa dang / slong ba po myed pa dang / stond pa'i bar du 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo // dus gsum gyi 'dod chags la kun
322b7(mdo): gzhi rnam par sogs so// 'di la gnas myed pas ci la'ang chags pa myed pa'i bar du/ de ltar rab 'bring dang / tha ma'i nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha' ji ltar mun pa myed cing snang ba myed pa dang
322b8(mdo): mtshan nyid byed pa de bzhin du/ yid kyi rnam par zhes pa 'dod chags kyi kun gzhi yang mun pa skyed cing snang ba myed pa dang / mtshan nyid myed pa ngo bo nyid byed pa dang / sems dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ci ma yang ma chags par
323a1(mdo): khams gsung gi 'dod chags kyi ga'i tshor ba kyi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag myed pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bzod pa bsgom par bya ba 'di yang // byang chub sems dpa'
323a2(mdo): sems can yongs su sbyind pa nye bar 'tsho ba'i bzod pa yongs blta bar bya'o// de bzhin du 'dod chags kyi rgyun gcod par yang 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang skye ba nyon mongs pa'i
323a3(mdo): ba las zad par nus par tshul bzhin du brtags bya'o// gang myig gis gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba yid du 'ong ba dma' ba nas nye ba'i bar du/ de la tshor ba chu'i bur myi sdug par mngon par dga' ba myed par 'byung ba'i tshor
323a4(mdo): ba ste / de la yang byang chub sems dpa' sa tshul bzhin du brtag go// ji ltar myig rmis stong pa dang / myig gi gzugs rnam par shes par stong pa nas ji ltar gong du bshad pa'i bar du'o// skad cig 'jigs pa zad pa'i 'du
323a5(mdo): byed dus gsum gyi zhe sdang gi mtha' la des stong pa nas/ snang ba myedapa'i bar du/ zhe sdang gi mthal la des de stong ste/ dus gsum/ gi zhe sdang dmyigs pa rnam par tshogs so// zhe sdang gnas myed pa nas
323a6(mdo): zhe sdang can gyi gzugs sdang ba la sems gzhog pa dang / zhe sdang gi tshor ba dang / gnyis bral bar 'gyur bA ra du'o// zhe sdang can gi gzugs la/ zhe sdang gi kun gzhi 'byung ba dang / tshor ba chu'i chu bur 'byung ba zad pa 'jig
323a7(mdo): par brtag pa 'di dag kyang / 'du byed myi rtag pa zhes bya ba'i bar du/ bzod pa blta bar bya'o// de bzhin du rna bas sgra nas/ yid kyi chos kyi bar du/ yid kyis gang myi sdug pa dang / myi mdzes pa'i chos rnam par shes pa de la
323a8(mdo): yang / zhe sdang gi kun gzhi kun nas ldang ba'i tshor ba kun nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de la yang byang chub sems dpa' na sdang gi kun kani/ yid bzhin gi tshul du kun tu rtog par bya ste/ nyini dag ni gzugs myed pa las
323b1(mdo): lta bur gong ma bshad pa'i bar du'o// nam mkha'i ji ltar khro ba myed cing gshe ba myed pa ltar/ zhe sdang gi kund gzhi 'ang de bzhin no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhi ba de la zhe sdang myed cing / gshe ba myed pa dang / ci la
323b2(mdo): yang chags pa myed pa dang / khams gsum thams cad kyi zhe sdang gi kun gzhi tshor ba myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal dang / stong pa dang / bdag myed pa dang / mtshan nyid dang bral ba/ bdag myed pa mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bzod
323b3(mdo): pa sgom par byed pa 'di yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad yongs su smind pa nye bar 'tsho ba'i bzod pa yongasu smyind par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' myig gis nang gi 'am/ 
323b4(mdo): gzugs kang ji ltar yod pa dag mthong nas/ gang yang 'di la 'ad// sa pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar ba'i gzugs/ yang dag/ pa ma yin pa'i gzugs// yang dag pa ma yin par kun tu rtog pa
323b5(mdo): mun par 'gyur ba 'dod chags kyang gnas/ zhe sdang gi gnas/ rtag/ pa dang / bde ba dang / zer gzugs pa dang / bdag dang myi g.yo ba'i 'du byed du dmyigs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i rkun po skye zhing 'phel ba dang
323b6(mdo): khams gsum po thams cad bsdus nas/ rnam pa gnyis su nye bar 'gro/ nye bar lend/ byin gyis rlob/ mngon par chags shing / rgyu dang rkyen grangs myed/ bdag tu myed pa la dmyigs shing / nye bar 'dzin te// de la
323b7(mdo): rang bzhin gis myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang bdag myed par myi ston// skye ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 'jig par yang nye bar myi rtog gi/ bdag dang / srog dang / gsol ba dang / gang zag tu dmyigs shing
323b8(mdo): rtag pa dang chad par snyem ste/ nang dang phyi'i rkyen la phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyang yang dag par ji ba bzhin du rab tu shes/ rgyu dang / 'bras bu dpalas dang / rnam par sbyin pa'i kun nas ldang ba la dbyig
324a1(mdo): pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa myed pa dang / 'khrugs pa dang / ma 'khrugs pa dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / yang dag par rtog pa yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes shing / bde la/ 
324a2(mdo): dang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang bral ba'i/ shes kyi dbang po ma skyes pas/ chos la rnam par rtog pa 'di yang / sdug bsngal yang myed pa/ bde ba yang myed pa'i tshor ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sa nang dang
324a3(mdo): phyi'i mtshan nyid du snang ba dang / gzugs kyi mtshan nyid du snang ba gang ji snyed yod pa dag la yang dag pa nyid dang / de kho na nyid du brtag par bya'o// gang ji ltar sngar bstan pa'i 'dod chags kyi gnas dang / zhe sdang gi
324a4(mdo): gnas la ji ltar rtag pa la/ skad cig gis 'jig pa'i tshul dang / rtag pa 'am mya rtag pa'i tshul dang / bde ba 'am sdug bsngal gi/ tshul dang / bdag gam bdag myed pa'i tshul dang / khams gsum po zas
324a5(mdo): cad kyi 'du byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i rgyun pa zhi ba dang / rgyu myed pa dang / bdag po myed pa'i rgyun ma zhi ba dang / gnyis dang bral ba/ myi skye ba la mngon par myi chags pa'i tshul gyis yongs su rtog pa dang / 
324a6(mdo): khams gsum po thams cad dang / dus gsum gyi sdug bsngal yang myed/ bde ba yang myed pa'i tshor ba myi skye ba ni// tshor ba gnyis kyi skye ba'i mthar 'ong du chud par bya'o// de dag gi rtag pa'i mtha' dang / chad pa myed pa'i
324a7(mdo): mtha' dang / brjod du myed pa'i rjes kyi rgyu nad byi mtha' dang / lus myed pa'i mtha' dang / gnas myed pa'i mthar khong du chud par bya'o// tshig gi lam dang / bral ba'i bag la nyal gyi sems dang yid dang / rnam par shes pa la Ur
324a8(mdo): bsngal yang myed/ bde ba yang myed pa'i tshor ba myi dmyigs par so sor brtag par bya'o// yang de ltar zhi gnas kyi tshul gyis/ rgyu dang / rkyend dang / rgyu myed pa dang / rkyen myed pa'i lhag mthong rnam pa bcu gnyis ni yang dag pa'i shes
324b1(mdo): par gyis/ gti mug gi un par lta'o// 'di la ma rig pa'i gnas tshul bzhin ma yin par yid la byed pa ni/ gang tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni/ kabal dmyigs/ lus dang ngag yid kyi 'du byed
324b2(mdo): la dmyigs pa ni/ lus de yang 'byung ba chen po bzhi la gnas pa/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de dag kyang / g.yo ba myed/ 'gyur ba myed pa/ bdag myed pa bdag gi myed pa ste// ji ltar sngar bstand pa bzhin no// 
324b3(mdo): tshig gi lam yang dmyigs su myed pa yi/ yi ge myed pa ste/ bdag myi dmyigs pa'i phyir gnas myed pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gnas myed pa/ myi gnas pa/ tshig gi lam tsam du brjod pa ste/ 'di
324b4(mdo): la bdag dang / yan lag can dang / gang zag myed do// lus dpa / dang yid kyi dmyigs pa gnyi ka stong pa ste/ des na ma rig pa yang stong pa'o// lung du ma stan pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyang 'gro ba byed
324b5(mdo): pa'o// mtshan nyid du snang ba yang brjod du myed po'o// ma rig pa da / srid pa sred pa dang / sems dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / khams gsum dang / dus gsum la dmyigs pa yang / yang dag pa'i
324b6(mdo): mtha' myi dmyigs la/ dge ba dang / myi dge ba dang / dge ba mtshan nyid kyis myed de/ des ni ma rig pa ni stong pa'o// yang ma rig pa shi nad tu byung nas/ 'du byed la rtog ste// skad cig ma gapal ma rig pa skye ba skad
324b7(mdo): cig ma de nyid la myi gnas shing 'gag ste// skad cig ma gnyis la myi gnas so// skad cig ma gcig la gnyi ga skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa myed kyi/ ma rig pa 'gags nas/ skad cig ma gnyis par 'du byed skye ste/ 
324b8(mdo): de nas ma rig pa stong pa ste/ bdag myed pa'i ngo bo'o// yang skad cig ma gang la/ 'du byed des lus kyi 'du byed dang / ngag gi 'du byed dang / 'du byed gsum 'gags so// yang lus kyi 'du byed skyes nas/ 'dod chags
325a1(mdo): kyi dang bral ba'i mtha'i gnas na ngag gi 'du byed skye'o yang rnam par grol ba'i mtha' yang yid kyi 'du byed kyi rgyun gyis/ ngag gi 'du byed la 'jug go// lus kyi 'du byed ma skyes na/ ngag dang yid kyi 'du
325a2(mdo): byed kyang 'jug pa myi stsogs so// 'du byed nye bar len pa la yang dag par rtog pa dang / lus kyi 'du byed nye bar 'tsho ba la rnam par dpyod cing / chags par yang myi 'gyur ro// yid kyi 'du byed ma skyes na/ lus dang
325a3(mdo): ngag gi 'du byed rnams kyi dus gsum gyi 'jug pa bstsags pa stsal du 'ang myed do// ngag gi 'du byed ma skyes na/ lus dang yid kyi 'du byed rnams kyi dus gsum gyi 'jig pa bstsal du'ang myed do// yang 'du byed gsuM
325a4(mdo): gi mtshan nyid kyi gnas de 'dra bas/ khams gsum na spyod pa'i rnam pa ra shes pa'i gnas dang / snang ba thob par byed pa yang myed/ seld par byed pa yang myed de/ de nas de dag stong pa'o// 'du byed kyi mtha' las skyes
325a5(mdo): pa yang rang bzhin gyis bsal bas rnam par dag pa gnyis su myed pa/ 'i rjesu song ba/ smon pa myed pa/ 'du byed rnam par bzhag pa// nam mkha' ltar stong pa'o// lus kyi 'du byed kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'
325a6(mdo): rang bzhin bdag myed pa ste/ sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / bar du yang ma byung ba dang / gnas myed pa'i phyir stong pa'o// ngag gi 'du byed kyang tshig gi lam dang bral ba'i rjesu 'gro ba/ nam mkha' ltar sgro btags pa
325a7(mdo): ste/ khams gsum dang gnyis dang bral bas stong pa'o// yid kyi 'du byed kyang thob pa khyad pa/ mngon gsum du bya ba byed pa/ dus gsum thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba sems cad byed pa nas/ gang zag gi bar du byed
325a8(mdo): myed pa la rnam par rtog pa/ gti mug gis rnam par bsgrubs pa/ mun pa myed pa snang ba myed pa/ blang ba byed pa/ spros pa byed pa/ mi ga myed pa stong pa/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o// 'du byed kyi rkyend kyis rnam par zhes
325b1(mdo): pa la yongs su rtog par byed de/ 'du byed rnams ni skyes nas 'gag pa yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa'i rgyun ni bkri bar bya ba myed pa ste/ rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug pa 'di dag kyang 'dra ba dang / myi 'dra ba dang / bdag myed pa dang / 
325b2(mdo): skad cig pa dang / 'god pa'i mtshan nyid la myi kanas pa'o// yang rnam par shes pa ni/ rnam par dpyod pa'i mtshan nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / nang dang phyi myi dmyigs pa dang / dge ba dang / myi dge ba phyi dmyigs pa dang / zag
325b3(mdo): pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa myed pa myi dmyigs pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas myi dmyigs pa dang / rgyu dang rkyen kyis myi dmyigs pa dang / khams gsum gyi dang / dus kyi dang po myi dmyigs pa dang / 'dod pa
325b4(mdo): lnga'i yon tan nyams pa'i phyi dbyigs pa dang / 'byung ba chen po bzhi gyi dmyigs pa dang / khams drug myi dmyigs pa dang / bskam pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / bar chad myed pa'i lam nas/ phur po'i
325b5(mdo): lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / phung po lhag ma lus pa'i bar gyi rnam pa/ ra shes pa myi dmyigs pas/ gzugs la nye bar bkri ba myed pa nas/ yid kyi bar la nye bar bkri ba myed pa/ sgyu ma snang ba lta bu rang
325b6(mdo): bzhin myed pa/ lus myed pa gnas myed pa'o// rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / bar gyi mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mtha' byung ba myed pas/ gzugs kyi mtshan nyid gang du'ang rnam par brtag pa'i gam
325b7(mdo): su snang ba dang / spyod par shes par myi nus te/ des na rnam par shes pa ni stong pa'o// yang rnam par shes pa'i rkyend kyis/ mying dang gzugs la rtog pa byed de// skad cig ma gcig la rnam par shes shing dag pa 'gags nas
325b8(mdo): mying dang gzugs skye'o// mying dang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i phung po 'di dag go// phung po yang rdzas myed pa'i dond te// gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang dbyibs/ 
326a1(mdo): kyi snang ba la myi 'dug pas/ de dag ni phying zhes bya'o// gzugs shes bya ba ni/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi la gzugs shes bya'o// gzugs myed pa'i phung po bzhi po 'di dag kyang / dngos po myed pa/ kanas/ 
326a2(mdo): byed pa/ rdzas myed pa/ mtshan nyid myed pa/ mtshan nyid dang bral ba ste/ tshor ba'i rnam par sbyidan pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu myi shes pa'o// rgyu dang rkyen la dmyigs pa dang / 'bras bu 'grub pa rab tu myi zhes pa'o// chos 'di
326a3(mdo): dag ni phan tshun nas 'du ba dang / gnas rab tu rnam par dbye ba rab tu myi shes pa'o// 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i rnam par smyind pa nas/ rnam par phye ba'i bar du rab tu myi shes pa'o// de ni
326a4(mdo): 'i phyir zhe na/ chos 'di dag thams cad ni khams gsum las grol ba dus gsum las shi nad tu rnam par 'das pa/ mnyam pa myed pa/ yongasu 'dzind pa myed pa/ kha zas myed pa/ dngos po myed pa/ chags
326a5(mdo): shing rnam par rtog pa myed pa/ sgra myed pa/ 'byung ba myed pa/ gnyis myed pa/ rgyu myed pa/ kun gzhi myed pa/ dbang du 'gyur ba myed pa 'tsho 'pho myed pa/ rkyen myed pa/ mtshan nyid myed pa/ byas pa myed pa/ 
326a6(mdo): rgyu byed pa/ bdag gi byed pa/ brjod du byed pa/ chad pa myed pa/ rtag pa byed pa/ bya ba myed pa/ mying myed pa'o// gnas myed pas gzugs myed pa'o// yid myed pa'o// rnam par rtog pa myed pa'o// rnam par sbyin pa myed pa'o// 
326a7(mdo): rnam par shes par bya ba myed pa'o// gzhal ba skyed pa'o// mngon par 'grub pa skyed pa'o// dus gsum dang / 'ams gsum thams cad kyi gzugs byed pa'o// phung po bzhi po 'di dag ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o// rnaM
326a8(mdo): nyid byed pa'o// rlung dang mtshungs pa'o// rtogs pa skyed pa'o// byig gi lam du brjod pa'i mtshan nyid do// dus gsum tha dad pa myed cing/ 'gro ba byed pa'i tshul gyis yang dag pa'i mtha'i rjes su ma zhugs pa'o// 'jig
326b1(mdo): pa myed pa'o// snang ba myed pa'o// rang bzhin myed pa'o// ngo bo nyid kyis pha ba byed pa'o// yi ge byed pa'o// de dag ni gang du yang bsgom pa dang / skyes pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang
326b2(mdo): baphags pa myed pa'o// kham gsum thams cad na gtam gyi dngos por btags pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'jug pa myed pa'o// brang ba myed pa'o// dor ba myed pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i phung po bzhi po 'di dag ni
326b3(mdo): mtshan nyid kyi 'jug pa myed pa'o// phung po 'di dag ni/ myig gi gnas kyi dbyibs su gnas pa nas/ lus kyi gnas kyi bar kyi dbyibs su gnas pa ma yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i gnas kyi dbyib su
326b4(mdo): gnas pa ma yin/ sems dang / yid dang / yid kyi rnam par shes dpa'i gnas se lad pa'i brda' dang / mtshan ma rnam par bzhag pa ma yin no// gzugs myed pa'i phung po bzhi po 'di dag ni/ gnas
326b5(mdo): kyi dbyibs su gnas kyang / gzugs myed pa'i phung po bzhi 'di dag ni/ gzugs kyi phung po'i gnas kyi dbyingasu gnas pa ma yin// no// khams gsum gyi las kyi mtshan nyid rnam par dpyod pa'i rjesu
326b6(mdo): 'brel la/ gzugs myed pa'i phung po 'di dag ni/ gnas kyi dbyings myi gnas pa'o// de dag ni bdag myed pa nas/ gang zag gi bar du myed pa'o// brjod du myed pa'o// yi ge myed pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i phung po
326b7(mdo): bzhi po 'di dag ni/ stong pa'i mtshan nyid kyis shin tu skad cig gis 'jig pa/ ther zug ma yin pa'o// gnas myi dmyigs pas/ mtshan ma myed pa'o// skad cig gis skye zhing 'bri ba'i tshul gyis smon pa myed pa'o// 
326b8(mdo): 'gog pa myed pas chags pa myed pa'i shes par 'jig pa ste// des nas phung po bzhi po 'di dag ni stong pa'o// gzugs kyi phung po 'byung ba chen po 'di dag kyang / ji ltar sngar bstan bzhin du stong pa'o// nya
327a1(mdo): len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag kyang / skad cig ma'i rgyun gyi tshul gyis skye ba ma yin// phan tshun las shi nad tu 'das shing myi gnas pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ phan tshun du nye bar snyon spongs pa ma yin
327a2(mdo): phan tshun las shin tu 'ong ba ma yin no// skad cig ma dang po la/ gzugs myed par myi skye ba ma yin/ skad cig ma gnyis pa'i gnas la/ mying myed par gzugs skye ba ma yin gyi/ skad cig ma gcig gi gan
327a3(mdo): la/ nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag thams cad skye zhing 'gag ste// skad cig ma lhag ma gnyis po la gnas pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji ltar sems las byung ba'i chos myu rad tu 'gyur ba bzhin du
327a4(mdo): bsgrubs par sla ba yin te// de dag kyang dngos po myed pa skad cig/ sa 'jig par gnas pa ma yin no// yang mying dang gzugs kyi rkyend kyis/ skye mched drug la rtog par byed de/ myid dang gzugs
327a5(mdo): skyes shing 'gags nas/ skad cig ma gnyis la skye mched drug skye ste/ skye mched drug po 'di dag ni/ phyig dang rna ba dang / sna dang / lce pa/ lus dang / yid do// myig gi rnam par shes pa yang / rna ba'i
327a6(mdo): rnam par shes pa dang 'dre ba dang / 'bral ba'i las stsogs pa ma yin/ gcig la gcig 'brel pa sel ba ma yin/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'i las kyi dmyigs pa skyes pa/ rnam pa'i rnam par shes pa'i skad cig shes pa'i
327a7(mdo): skad cig mar bya bar myi nus/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i dmyigs pa yang / myig gi rnam par shes pa'i dmyigs pa'i rgyur myi skyed pa nas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o// myig gi rnam par shes pa
327a8(mdo): yang / rtag pa dang / myi rtag pa dang / 'dres te 'byung ba ma yin// khams gnas kyi chad pa dang / rtag pa'i mtha' dpa'adres te/ 'byung ba ma yin/ chos thams cad dus gsum dang / tha myi dad pa'i mtha'
327b1(mdo): nye bar lend pa ma yin pa nas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o// phyag gi rnam par shes pa ni/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi dngos po'i bdag gi mtha' dang 'dres te 'byung ba ma yin// bdag dang
327b2(mdo): bdag myed pa ma yin/ sdug pa dang / myi sdug pa ma yin/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas ma yin/ chad pa dang / rtag pa ma yin/ mtshan ma yin/ mtshan ma myed pa ma yin/ gnyis su myed pa'i mtha' mo yin
327b3(mdo): yang dag pa'i mtha' nye bar 'dzind pa ma yin pa nas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar dag kyang ngo // myig gi rnam par shes pa la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid stong pa 'am/ myi stong pa zhes chags pa myed/ sel ba myed/ 
327b4(mdo): tha dad pa myed/ bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / nang dang / phyi'i rna dpa smyig rgyu ba lta bu dang 'dres te 'byung ba ma yin/ theg pa gsu ma dang / myi khom pa'i mtha' dang / 'jig tshogs kyi mtha' sel
327b5(mdo): ba ma yin/ gsum gyis gus pa'i tshul du byed pa ma yin/ zad kyi shes pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khyam pa ma yin pa nas/ yid kyi rna par shes pa la tshor ba skad cig ma bde ba nye bar 'gro ba myed/ skye
327b6(mdo): myed pa nas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o// sgyu ma lta bu'i phyig gi rnam par shes pa yid ma yin pa 'di la/ skad cig ma'i spyod pa myed/ shes pa myed/ snang ba myed/ yi ge myed de/ skad cig ma'i skye ba
327b7(mdo): dang / 'god pa dang / chos 'di dag na skad cig la gcig la skye zhing 'gag ste/ 'di la byed pa po dang / byed du 'dug pa dang / tshong ba po dang / tshor bar byed pa dang / skyed pa po dang / skyed par byed pa dang / ldang bar byed pa dang / ldang
327b8(mdo): bar byed du 'jug pa dang / byin kyis rlob pa po dang / rnam par 'jig pa po myed do// de skad cig ma dang po la skyed la/ skad cig pa gnyis pa la gnas pa ma yin/ skyes nas phan tshun tha dad par byed pa ma yin/ rgyu myed pa
328a1(mdo): las byung ba ma yin te/ chos de dag ni skad cig gis 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid pas/ des ni de dag ni stong pa'o// yang dag pa'i yid la kun tu rtog pa las skye zhing 'gag ste/ de na de dag ni stong pa'o/
